1.content:
Gotham City.

A city ravaged by crime, infected by a disease of corruption. Ruled by infamous underground organizations, this beacon of defecation had little hope of recovery. Freaks and mobsters alike waged war over the fate of the city, and there was little resistance.

One man however, stood up for justice. That one man was the legendary Batman.

Batman waged his own war against crime and injustice, battling to save the city from desolation. Soon the criminals of Gotham recognized the dark fist of purity, and only a few notorious figures stood to rebel against this ever-growing shadow of justice. He was soon joined by others willing to place their own lives on the line for the restoration of their beloved city. It looked as though Gotham city would finally be cured from the disease.

Amidst its revival, the city had witnessed many remarkable stories of strength and courage, but few were more bizarre than those that can be found in this interactive story. No one was spared from humiliation, and few were provided the power of domination. Whether it be for better or worse, the dark knight himself was amidst the list of victims of such weird circumstances.

So which story type would you prefer to follow?
1.title: Gotham City

11.content:
The caped crusader was at his most vulnerable as the victim of size manipulation. Whether it be three feet tall or one foot tall, or even a mere three inches in size, the dark knight struggled to cope under the watchful, looming eyes of his allies and enemies alike. One of his most infamous battles was against one of his most deadliest adversaries, the venomous Poison Ivy. The beautiful eco-terrorist was obsessed with plants, botany and environmentalism, utilizing toxins and pheromones for her criminal activities. One fateful night, the dark knight was lured into an abandoned cottage on the outskirts of Gotham city, where Poison Ivy prepared to strike her opponent in perhaps her most powerful plot yet, with the intentions of reducing her enemy to utter humiliation.

Or perhaps one of his more closer calls, Batman fell victim to a trap, courtesy of his more unusual opponents, Catwoman. Sharing a confusing relationship with the caped crusader, Catwoman was an accomplished burglar with malicious intentions. A rare artifact caught the attention of the mischievous feline, an item that she could use to her advantage. Even if the dark knight arrived on the scene, she knew that, once he arrived, he would be no match for such a powerful artifact, capable of total domination.

A former psychiatrist, Dr. Harleen Quinzel, now known as Harley Quinn became obsessively fixated on her first patient, her current boyfriend, the Joker. Under orders, Harley Quinn managed to steal a high-tech shrink ray. Using this device, Harley lured the caped crusader into her clutches, where she planned to place her boyfriend's arch nemesis into her dirty hands. Harley however, had plans of her own.

Even Catwoman however, was forced to endure such a minuscule point of view, more significantly with her battle against the Riddler. With rumors circulating around the mysterious disappearance of the dark knight, the Riddler suspected Catwoman as the culprit to his demise. As a result, he teamed up with the Mad Hatter to lure the cat burglar into their maze, where she was forced to consume size-manipulating substances, similarly to that from Alice in Wonderland, in order to access certain points in the maze. This was truly a puzzling position for Catwoman.

So which story would you like to follow?
11.title: Shrinking Stories

choices: I had shrunk to the size of Ivy's leg.
I had shrink to a mere one foot in size.
I had shrunk to a mere three inches in size.
111.content:
The mysterious wreckage of an armored truck displayed all the traces of only one person in all of Gotham city, the deadly Poison Ivy. The truck contained a certain species of plants, new to the country, with strange qualities. I investigated the crime scene where I detected a familiar pheromone in the atmosphere surrounding the area. I followed the trace, and I managed to track Ivy to her latest hideout; a small, abandoned cottage, on the outskirts of the city, surrounded by lush woodlands.

When I arrived at the scene, everything was quiet. Too quiet. Ivy's scent was detectable, almost too easy to detect. Something was up. I knew that I was walking into a trap, I just had no idea what I was bringing myself into.

Before making my move, I contacted the police, prepared to capture the criminal before her crimes grow out of my control. The police would arrive at the scene in about an hour. This meant that I had only one hour to subdue Ivy before they could take offensive action. I had no time to spare.

I entered the cottage and, to my surprise, the interior was completely restored. It was a little dream cottage out in the countryside, rich in forestation. Then I detected the presence of my target, lurking in the kitchen. I entered the kitchen, prepared for anything, until there she was, hands behind her back, approaching me with an innocent smile on her deformed lips. Surrounded by shelves loaded with piles of dust and plant pots, I didn't like it one bit.

"Why Batman," she politely remarked, "What a pleasant surprise!"

There was reason to suspect her intentions. I saw through her innocent facade and inquired about her latest plot.

With a smirk, she revealed the reason for her actions. The plants she stole were from an endangered species, very few remained on the entire planet. They contained powerful qualities. The pheromones they produced were capable of size manipulation, capable of both increasing and reducing the size of any living creature, including humans. Skeptical, I was not convinced that such power could exist, but I knew that I had to keep my guard up, no matter what.

Before I could take any further action however, Ivy suddenly made her move. She swiped her hands forward, revealing some sort of powder in her palms, and blew the powder into my face. I realized that this was no ordinary powder, and immediately, during a brief moment of confusion, I forced Ivy to relinquish her hands. She stepped back, pressing her back against the wall, relishing her accomplishment. For a moment, I was stunned, my vision was momentarily impaired. Besides the arrogant laughter of my adversary, all I could hear was a loud ringing sound in my ears. I could even feel my muscles twitching at the stress that I was enduring. I felt faint and disorientated. All I could do was hold my fists up, prepared for a possible fight with Ivy, and shake the pain off. However, this was not what happened.

When I regained my senses, I realized that something remarkable had happened.
111.title: A Pinch of Poison

choices: I managed to even the score and shrink Ivy.
To my horror, Ivy began to grow instead.
1112.content:
Stunned by the blast, I inhaled some of the toxic powder without realizing. Temporarily blinded by the blow, I prepared for a possible attack from my deadly adversary. But to my concern, she did not strike. Instead she continued to laugh maniacally, proud of her disorientating offense. I soon regained my senses, and then I realized why she behaved so triumphantly.

Expecting to look into the eyes of my opponent, I opened my eyes, and I was horrified by what I saw. Instead, I found myself looking directly at her foot, which was remarkably huge, even larger than me. Confirming the worst, I looked up high, only to see a huge green giantess looking down at me with a wicked smile on her red lips. Looking around, I noticed that my surroundings had also increased in size, recognizing the wooden shelves upon the walls, once within reach, now seemed like they towered over me. At that moment, I realized that everything Poison Ivy had told me was the truth, she had successfully used some sort of substance, produced by the rare plants she stole earlier, and managed to shrink me. From my feeble point of view, I estimated that I had to be no bigger than one foot in size, the same size as my adversary's foot to be more precise.

I could see Ivy's humongous legs rising. Feeling confident with her vantage point, she slowly approached me, her massive feet drawing ever closer. I stepped back, overwhelmed by the tremendous size. Noticing me doing this, Ivy saw the fear in my tiny figure and giggled.

"Well, well, well," she remarked as her massive figure cast a dark shadow over me, "Not so tough now, are we? What's wrong? Feeling a little small, are we Batman?" She suddenly started to bend over, raising her hand, as if she intended to scoop me up from the ground. Outraged, I tried to avoid her grip, but unfortunately I could not resist her awesome might, she was far too big to avoid, as she tightened her grip around me, I felt as if I was caught in a vice as she lifted me up to her face. I was awestruck by the fact that I wasn't even bigger than her head!

She drew my close to her lips, my own head almost swallowed by her immense lips. I was suddenly blinded by the glimmering shine of her teeth as she revealed a devious smile.

"You see, Batman," she added, continuing to answer my question from earlier, "These precious plants were being sent to the Botanical Garden in Gotham North. The vile, little man who bought them was a mister Nolan Black, but I know a secret about him. Unknown to the rest of this putrid city, Mr. Black conducts experiments in the gardens, hurting valuable plants and murdering my precious babies. So, I've been conducting my own little experiment right here, and I have to admit," she chuckled, "You made out to be the perfect test subject! And now with my greatest enemy no longer a threat, I'm going to pay Mr. Black an unwelcome visit."

Shocked by her devious plot, Poison Ivy failed to realize that I had planted a plastic explosive on her wrist. It was fortunate for me that, while I shrunk, so did my outfit and equipment, so with the hope of ruining Ivy's plans, I activated the explosive. The blast hardly left a scratch, but did enough damage for her release her grip and roll me into her other hand, where she held another pile of powder. I held my breath and threw as much as I could into the face of my giant opponent, who managed to inhale some of the powder through her mouth. I anticipated the reaction.
1112.title: Small Problem

choices: Satisfied, Ivy decided to return to her work.
Unsatisfied, Ivy decided to search for me in the garden.
11122.content:
I held my breath and threw as much as I could into the face of my giant opponent, who managed to inhale some of the powder through her mouth. Unfortunately however, she endured a slightly different alteration.

Desperate to escape sight, I jumped from her open hands, gliding a seemingly safe distance from the giantess and landing safely back upon the windowsill. I turned around and, to my horror, I was unable to settle the score. In fact, Poison Ivy gained an even greater advantage, growing another two feet in height. If she wanted to, she could suffocate me between her toes, that was how big she was now.

Dropping to her knees in search for me, Ivy continued to gloat. "Oh, I'm sorry, I forgot to mention. The effects of the powder are completely random. There's no telling how much you will shrink, or grow, but I think you've realized this by now. It was awfully generous of you to give the woman the advantage though."

Before she could continue any further however, she noticed me, on the windowsill, climbed back to her feet and, before I could react, swiped another blast of powder at me. I tried my best not to inhale, but I couldn't resist, the aroma was far too delectable. Before I knew it however, to my dismay, unlike my adversary, I shrunk even further. From my estimation, I couldn't no bigger than a mere three inches! Horrified by this transformation, I felt another cold shiver as my vision was clouded by the looming figure of Poison Ivy, now even bigger than ever. Compared to me, she looked even bigger than Wayne Tower!

Licking her lips while doing so, Ivy attempted to smack me with her giant palm. Just in time, I managed to dodge the crushing blow, avoiding a humiliating death, squashed under the palm of an insane woman obsessed with plants. Before she could attempt further damage however, I had little other choice but to dive out of the window and glide as far as I could into the lush garden. I landed hard on the soil, the night sky suddenly disappeared, clouded by the towering foliage. Most of the plants in the garden were three times the size of me, some of them even looked bigger than the buildings in Gotham city.

Despite being lost in what seemed like an immense jungle of a garden, there was a moment of relief, knowing that the massive, seven foot tall Poison Ivy lost track of me. Before I could regain my composure however, I heard a familiar voice echo from a distance, thundering through the garden like lightning. I could tell, from the thunder in her voice, that she was annoyed.

"Why Batman," she yelled in an ironic volume, as if she knew that I was close, "Aren't you gonna stay behind for dinner?"
11122.title: Bigger Problems

choices: The blast of powder caused a growing reaction of giant proportions.
With a second blast of powder, Ivy received a taste of her own medicine.
111221.content:
Realizing that I no longer posed a threat to her diabolical scheme, Poison Ivy made a decision. "Well then," she added, without any concern of interruption, "If you insist on hiding, I've got some things to do, but as soon as I finish, I'm going to find you, and squash you like the little bug that you are!" With that said, she returned into the cottage and resumed her plot.

She expected me to return. I knew that she realized that she would be better off letting me return to her. Realizing this, she had no intention of hunting me down in the garden. But I couldn't just hide for the rest of the night. Not at three inches tall. Not ever. I had to return and fight. The police were scheduled to arrive on the scene in less than an hour. Ivy had the only substance capable of returning me to my normal size. If the police apprehend her, they would confiscate the rare plants as evidence, leaving me here in this lush garden with no contact or direction. I would never be found. And what if Ivy escaped with the substance? She would be capable of turning Gotham city into her ant farm! Despite her tremendous advantage, I had to fight her, for the sake of Mr. Black, for the sake of the police, for the sake of Gotham city, and for the sake of my own well-being.

It was hard not to be distracted by the lush plants that loomed over me like huge trees, but I was completely awestruck by the world from my new point of view. Despite these distractions however, I trekked through the vast garden until, finally, I reached the cottage. Cautiously I crawled under the door, as silent as I had ever been before. It was a struggle, but I managed to climb onto the top shelf on the wall of the kitchen. There, I could see the giantess, Poison Ivy, sat on a wooden chair next to a table, fiddling with a dash of powder.

On the table, I noticed a potted plant, one of the plants that produced the powerful substance responsible for the whole ordeal. To my luck, I realized that, upon the shelf, I was standing next to another potted plant. Realizing that, whatever she was doing, Ivy would soon draw her attention to that very plant, I acted quickly. I climbed onto the pot and researched the plant. I discovered that the entire bud was full of the unique powder. I reached my hand in and grabbed as much as I could. With each handful, I filled a pair of empty containers from my utility belt. Turning away from the plant, I then realized that Ivy had left the table.

For a moment, I lost sight of Ivy, until she suddenly popped her head from beneath my view, my vision was impaired by the immense size of her glamorous face. "There you are," she sighed, "I knew you couldn't resist me, little bat!" I could see, from her gleaming eyes, that she had dreadful intentions for me. She smirked, and raised her hand in an attempt to grab me once again, her hand now even larger than I remembered, but before she could, I released one of my containers and blasted it in her face.
111221.title: Back to Work

choices: I managed to leap out of sight just in time.
Ivy managed catch me just before I could escape.
1112211.content:
I managed to launch the container into her face, but even blinded by the blast of powder, Ivy continued her move, and tightly grabbed me in her massive hand. Trapped in between her fingers, I realized that my desperate attempt to distract Ivy had backfired by giant proportions.

I was trapped in her rapidly expanding hand. Her fingers grew bigger and stronger, almost crushing me in the process. Struggling to breathe, I watched as Poison Ivy, still stunned by the blast of powder, shot up high. Her head crashed through the roof of the cottage, completely destroying her makeshift laboratory in the process. Ivy continued to grow and grow until she stood approximately thirty feet in size!

Still stunned, Ivy failed to realize that she had released her tight grip, but standing there in the middle of her immense palm, looking up to the heavens at the skyscraper of the evil woman, I was disheartened. I had become a mere speck of dust compared to the god-like size of Poison Ivy! From what I saw, there was no possible way I could defeat her with such an astonishing size difference. While I was a mere three inches big, Ivy had become a giantess, capable of posing an enormous threat to the people of Gotham. Looking around, there wasn't even any possible way I could escape her massive grasp. Out of desperation, all I could do was rush to the edge of her hand and dive off before she could crush me.

Regaining her vision, Ivy was pleased by the result of her growth. Before she could analyze the situation however, she looked down at me and smiled. "How cute," she thought to herself, "He's actually trying to get away from me!"

As I rushed towards the edge of her massive hand, I noticed a looming shadow from high above. I looked up to see her other hand closing down on me. If she pressed her hands together she could easily crushed me. There was nothing Poison Ivy would enjoy more than to crush her greatest enemy in between her hands!

Desperate, in my last gasp, I dived for the edge.
1112211.title: Reaction of Giant Proportions

choices: I quickly inhaled as much powder as I could
11122111.content:
I quickly dove off of her gigantic hand. I felt myself falling what seemed like forever. Quickly I managed to flip myself around and fire my grappling hook at a nearby plant. It latched on and I swung at blinding speed. The cable snapped and I went crashing to the ground. I landed hard on the floor but luckily it wasn't too hard. I quickly dashed behind under the remains of the table sitting directly between her feet, hoping Ivy didn't see me. As I dove for cover I managed to crane my neck up, hoping she didn't spot me. Her legs seemed to stretch forever. Past those I can make out her mountainous breasts and barley see her evil, but still pretty face. "Man this isn't even fair" I thought to myself. I need to find a way to buy myself some time...
"You foolish little bat, thanks for the boost, now nothing can stop me." "Hmmm but now where are you hiding again."

I peered up again and saw she was slowly lowering herself into a squatting position, directly above me nonetheless. I could see her city block sized rear slowly descending towards me. Her tight outfit leaving little to the imagination. "Wow." Snapping out of it, I had to think of something fast. It is only a matter of time until she finds me again. I needed a way of distracting her so I could return myself to normal, and cut her down in size. I then remembered I had a few bombs, still filled with the growing powder.
"This is probably my worst idea ever, but it just might work."
11122111.title: I managed to leap out of sight just in time.

choices: She's completely distracted, Try to climb over her growing body
111221112.content:
Holding a bomb in my hand, I began running out from under her. I peered up again, her flat stomach and mountain sized breasts now above me. Finally I made it directly under her face. Man I hope this works.
"Hey I'm down here, didn't you say you where going to squash me like a bug." I screamed up at her. She must of heard me because soon my entire field of vision was now her pretty face.
"There you are Batspeck, too bad for you I will not reward you for your bravery. I have a better way for you to die now."
She licked her lips and slowly stuck out her skyscraper sized toungue. I stood my ground and watched as it slowly came towards me.
"Just a little closer..." "Here! Have some more you giant psycho." I shouted.
I grabbed 2 of my remaining bombs filled with the growth powder and threw them straight down her throat. The effects where almost instant. Startled by the blast, Ivy fell backwards off of her feet and onto her butt with a thunderous boom, knocking me off of my feet. Quickly getting up I looked forward and saw her sitting there dazed. Suddenly, her entire body started quaking and trembling. Oh boy, here it comes, I thought to myself. Without warning she began to expand at an alarming rate. Arching her back and resting her hands behind her she began growing bigger and bigger. I couldn't help but watch for a second as the already enormous Poison Ivy stretched larger and larger. She seemed to be almost in ecstasy. Then I realized something I had overlooked... I was now trapped between her giant, growing legs. I took off running towards her growing feet, hoping to make a escape. I heard her moan and noticed she was growing even faster now. Still running, I looked over my shoulder only to see her giant growing crotch closing in on me.
Getting stepped on or eaten is one thing, but now she's going to crush me with her growing crotch? I just can't catch a break tonight...
I was now between her thighs. I stopped and turned to see the massive wall of green closing in on me. Another good/bad idea came across me. I quickly launched another growth bomb towards her face. It went off right under her nose, causing her to grow even faster, and fall completely onto her back, arms and legs stretched out. "Oh my god YES!" She screamed. I really hope this works....
111221112.title: Bad ideas sometimes work

1112211122.content:
I just stood and watched as her now miles tall(from my 3 inch perspective) butt and crotch quickly closed in on me. And there I saw it, My path of escape. There was what looked like a small "cave" in front of me. There was just enough gap between her butt that i could fit. I quickly ran for it. I was now underneath her giant growing butt. Luckily for me I had made her big enough that I could fit between her butt cheeks and not be crushed. There was just enough light for me to see. I glanced up to see the "ceiling" of my cave slowly rising higher and higher. I could hear her moaning and the ground was shaking around me. "I sure hope I didn't overdue it."
Finally after running for about 2 minutes I was able to make it out from under her butt and to the arch of her back. Suddenly, she slowly began to sit up. I turned and looked back at my "cave" and watched it disappear.
"You are such a fool!." I heard the loudest voice ever. "Come on batty, give me one more! Make me even bigger! Growing feels sooo good!" She cooed in a sarcastic, yet seductive voice. " I will crush this entire city under my thumb! And it's all thanks to you Batmite!" Fearing the worst, I slowly turned and saw her impossibly huge back, still growing but nowhere near as fast. It covered my entire view. She must have been close to 1000 feet tall. I watched, completely mesmerized by her sheer size as she slowly got to her feet. I got sick to my stomach knowing I had given her so much power. I was nothing but speck to her. She was impossibly huge. I stared up and up and up and up. I could Just make out the bottom of her curvy butt that I was Just under moments ago. She was a goddess. An incredibly evil and crazy one at that.
"Yeah I think I over did it." I thought to myself. But hey, at least she couldn't see me, right?
"Now its time for the good part of my plan." I pulled out the 2 remaining bombs I had filled with growth powder earlier and opened them And inhaled as much powder as I could. Almost instantly I could feel a tingling and began stretching taller. It kind of does feel good... Wasting no time I bolted towards the remains of the cottage which somehow survived(somewhat) Ivy's monstrous growth spurt. As I dove over the remains of it I noticed I had finally returned to my normal size. "Well it's about time I'm back to normal." I muttered to myself. I scanned the remains of the cottage for more plants. Lucky for me I spotted 2 of them that survived, both slightly different looking from one another in the corner. I quickly made my way towards them, stumbling over debris. Almost as if on cue I heard a thunderous BOOM. Then another BOOM. Then some evil laughter.
1112211122.title: Find another route of escape

choices: Hurry and stop her! She's heading towards the City
11122111221.content:
Slowly, I tilted my head back to look up, fearing she had spotted me. Once again I found myself directly between her feet. She slowly slid her legs farther apart, causing the ground around me to shake. My jaw dropped as all I could do was stare straight up at her crotch and butt. She had finally stopped growing but she must be close to 1100 feet tall. "Now what is she doing?" "I really need to stop ending up underneath her." I muttered under my breath as I watched her slowly spreading her legs farther apart.
"Batty, if your down there somewhere you really did a number on my back." I watched on in awe and horror as her massive form slowly bent over, bringing her giant hands to the ground. Once again mesmerized by this evil beauty, I took in the view. Her impossibly long legs extended upwards for what seemed like forever only to be connected by the canopy of her green leotard. Her curvy butt slowly extending outwards as she bent over to stretch. My eyes slowly moved forward to her house sized womanhood witch was pushing her leotard to the limits. Her flat stomach, followed by her now building sized breasts which where barley contained from her bending over.
Realizing I was completely ogling this evil goddess I literally had to slap myself in the face to keep with the task at hand. I hastily grabbed both of the plants and started extracting powder from them in and placed it in 2 separate piles. I noticed her shadow above me move again and I glanced up to see her now leaning forward with her hands on her back, stretching again. Forcing myself not to enjoy the view of her butt too much I carefully took a tiny bit of powder on my finger tips and inhaled ever so slightly. I slowly shrank about six inches. I the did the same with the other powder and returned to normal. I filled the remainder of my bombs with each, making sure to label which was shrinking and which was growing powder. Just as I finished filling the last one I heard a thunderous BOOM and looked up to see....
11122111221.title: She didn't notice me

choices: Mistakes were made... she's growing even bigger
Finally luck was on my side, she's quikly shrinking
111221112212.content:
I stared up her impossibly long body to see her face peering over her breasts staring directly at me. "Well, well, well, looks like the little bat survived once again." Without warning she lifted her massive leg high in the air. Without thinking I started sprinting away from her. Her giant foot slammed down just behind me, sending me tumbling forward. I got to my feet and quikly looked back up to see her other foot raised high. I am definitely starting to regret my "idea" to make her bigger... SLAM. Again I was sent tumbling across the ground. SLAM. Another near miss.
"I can do this all night Batman." She said laughing.
BOOM. Once again her giant foot landed right behind me. I'm starting to think she is toying with me. Suddenly without warning a massive green wall came crashing down in front of me. Unable to stop sprinting in time I smacked right into it landing hard on my back. I looked up, completely helpless on the ground and saw her massive form squatting down, her hand outstretched. A giant fingernail was placed just in front of me.
"You'll get on if you know whats good for you."
Feeling a major shot to my pride I obliged and climbed on. Suddenly at blinding speed I was brought up to her face. "Now what should I do with you?" She said with an evil smirk on her face. All I could do was watch in fear as she was deciding my fate. In an instant I was plunged into her mountain sized cleavage.
"Should I crush you right now?" She said peering down at me, gently squezzing her breast together. "Or should I leave you here so you can see first hand as I destroy this pathetic city you have sworn to protect? And it will be all your fault seeing as how you are the one that has made me unstoppable."
She must have chosen the first choice of death for me because the massive walls of flesh on either side of began getting tighter and tighter. I managed to reach down to my belt and grabbed two bombs. Unable to tell if they where the growth or shrinking bombs I had made I launched them up at her face. Again they exploded just under her nose, releasing huge amounts of the powder.
Hoping for the best, but fearing the worst I watched her inhale as much as possible.
"What are you trying to do Batman, grow me to death?" She laughed. "I am going to get so big I will conquer this entire planet!"
Removing her hands from her breast, I slid deeper between them. She arched her back and spread her arms out, awaiting the familiar growth sensation. "Well at least I can breath now." I thought. Suddenly I felt a slight tingle go through her body. I looked down and realized the which powder I had hit her with.
111221112212.title: She's staring straight at me

choices: Stunning me momentarily, Ivy reached the powder first.
Seizing the moment, I reached the powder before Ivy.
1112212.content:
It was a small, inferior blast. It had little effect on Ivy's senses, but it did enough damage for her to inhale the tiny cloud of powder through her nose. I watched as Ivy slightly shrunk, her head slightly falling out of sight, and out of reach. Realizing what I had done, and realizing that she had returned to her original size, Ivy became irritated. For the first time since this whole fiasco started, there was a glimmer of hope.

"Stupid little pest," she squealed, slightly unnerved by the loss of her once tremendous height, "You're going to pay for that!". In retaliation, she once again reached for me, her hand slightly smaller than earlier. For a moment, it seemed that resistance was futile, as she caught a hold of me, catching my cape in between her fingertips. She pulled me from the edge of the shelf and held me, by the cape, in front of her furious eyes. Despite my little offense, all it did was restore her normal size. This had little effect on the overwhelming size advantage she maintained, at least, not at the moment.

Struggling to catch my breath as I hung from my cape, I saw Ivy licking her crimson lips. I could tell, from the look on her massive face, what she intended. "It looks like I'm going to be treated with a midnight snack," she remarked before raising me over her head. She tilted her head back, opened her mouth and released her tongue, intending to drop me onto her tongue and into her mouth, swallowing me whole. Before this could happen however, I managed to release the second container, blasting the powder directly up her nose once again. The first blast had little effect, but the second blast packed a real punch to the face of my deadly foe.

Stunned by the blast, Ivy released her grip of my cape. I struggled in the air, but I managed to land safely on the table, where Ivy was previously conducting her experiment. I turned to face my opponent, who was screaming on the spot, struggling to breathe, as she faded to the floor, out of my sight. At last, Poison Ivy had a taste of her own medicine.

Regaining my composure, I turned to see the potted plant, next to a pile of powder, right on the opposite edge of the table. At that moment, I was relieved that this ordeal would soon be over, but unfortunately, I was swept off my feet. Returning to a vertical position, a noticed a familiar shadow loom over me.

I turned around and looked up to see Poison Ivy, horrified to find that she now stood at approximately fifteen inches, five times larger than me. Even despite all of my best efforts, it seemed as though I would never defeat Ivy, at least not on this night. Luck just wasn't on my side. Despite everything I did, she still maintained a powerful size advantage over me. Never have I endured such an immense challenge. Standing tall in front of me, my agitated opponent looked down at me and smiled as I stepped back in shock and awe. Standing no taller than her knee, I let out a sigh of disbelief.

I made the first move. I dove in between her massive legs and made a break for the powder on the opposite end of the table, but Ivy was far too quick and far too strong. Before I could gain momentum, she grabbed me by my cape and pulled me back towards her, where she lifted me above her head and slammed me onto the surface, landing hard on my back. She then placed one of her big feet onto my chest, slightly tickling with her toes. I was unable to push her off as she looked down with a sinister laugh.

She soon reached her first obstacle. In a square room, she noticed the small entrance to some kind of ventilation system high above. The vent was big enough for a normal-sized person to squeeze in. Unfortunately however, it was far too high, it was completely out of her reach. If she was normal-sized she would have easily entered the vent, or if she at least had her whip with her she could have climbed up to the vent, but alas, she had neither size or equipment, other than the frilly dress that constantly scratched her otherwise smooth skin.

"Well, well, well," Selina looked up to see the Riddler's face on another monitor, smirking at her defeated stance, "Can it be that the great Catwoman has been defeated by a vent in the wall? Is she so small that she can't even figure out how to reach the next part of my maze?"

The gloating was almost endless. "Or is she so stupid that she even failed to notice the three pieces of gum sitting in the corner?" With that said, Selina followed his finger, finding three small pieces of blue candy, possibly gum, sitting in the corner. "At last," the Riddler added, "For a moment, I thought you lost your sight as well as that ludicrous costume of yours!"

Inspecting the three pieces of gum, small enough for her to hold in one hand, Selina was once again distracted by the sound of Edward Nygma's voice. "It's perfectly understandable my dear little kitten. Only one of those sweets will enable you to reach your next destination. The other two however, well, let's just say that you won't be so lucky. All you have to do is choose one. But do choose wisely. Oh, and you'd better choose quickly, before the room fills with poisonous gas."

Distressed, Selina struggled to make her decision. She had to choose quickly, before the Riddler filled her lungs with poison, then she may never be able to leave his dreaded maze at all!
11413.title: The First Decision

choices: "Time for a game of Human Pinball!"
"Time for a game of Claw Crane!"
114132.content:
It took a moment for her to decide, all the way to her final seconds before the room was filled with poisonous gas, but in the end, she simply shrugged, closed her eyes and planted one piece of gum in her mouth, dropping the other two where she stood. Before she could open her eyes again however, she felt a tingling sensation that coursed through her entire body. Strangely, she felt bloated.

She opened her eyes and looked down, horrified by the sight of her frilly dress tearing at the seams. The pressure was too much for the dress to withstand and, almost immediately, it snapped right off, shattering into tiny pieces, exposing her already inflated chest. She felt her entire body inflating. She could feel her thighs pressing against one another as her arms sunk into her torso that grew into a large, round shape, blown out of proportion, as if her entire body was being inflated like a balloon!

Before she could react, her legs sank into her enormous posterior. She tried to waddle, but her body continued to swell. She grew far too heavy. She tried desperately to reach for the remaining pieces of gum on the floor, but all she could do was waddle her hands and feet. She fell off balance, tipping onto her stomach. The swelling cushioned the drop, but still it felt horrible. She lost all ability to move under her own free will. All she could do was lay on her fat stomach, in the nude, and kick her feet wildly in the air. As if she didn't feel vulnerable after shrinking already, now she couldn't even defend herself. She couldn't even scratch her nose if she wanted to! She was disabled. She was completely helpless. Perhaps worst of all, she was still tiny. At this point, literally anyone could have their way with her!

As if things couldn't get any worse, I heard a familiar voice from above. "Oh dear," the Riddler laughed, "It seems that you chose wrong!" All Selina could do was blush, her promise to expose her naked body in his presence had backfired immensely, rendering her in such an undignified state and position. "Looks like you've gone and turned yourself into a tiny little ball! Now how are you ever going to complete my maze?"

"Don't worry your soft little head," he continued, much to Selina's chagrin, "Fortunately I've planned ahead for such an inevitable scenario. So don't go anywhere! It's not like you can anyway!"
114132.title: Cat Ball

choices: Alison managed to beat the high score.
1141321.content:
Selina was helpless. Her body was completely bloated, blown into an almost perfectly round sphere, rendering her hopelessly stuck. All she could do was waddle her hands and feet. She had literally become a human soccer ball!

As the Riddler's voice faded out, Selina suddenly felt the floor below her tilt. The floor continued to shift until Selina's round form rolled to the edge of the room. The wall then lifted from her path, forcing her to roll further down until she reached some kind of huge contraption. From her point of view, she could barely see what laid ahead. All she could hear was the constant sound of mechanical gears, and all she could feel as the freezing cold steel below her spherical back.

Suddenly, once again, the Riddler made his presence felt. "Roll up! Roll up! Watch as the fate of the bloated Catwoman rests in the hands of this poor individual!" From the voice of the poor individual, it seemed that she was in peril. The Riddler was clearly addressing some kind of hostage, forced to do his bidding.

"I know you can hear me down there my little fat cat. Of course I wasn't going to leave you down there like that all alone. So you've failed to overcome my first challenge. Don't worry, you still have eight lives left, right? Of course I'm right! You've most probably noticed my lovely hostage down there with you, crying for help. Here name is Alison, and today, she'll be playing a game of Human Pinball. And guess what? You're going to be the pinball! Whether you continue through my maze or not, it entirely depends on her performance. So I hope you're up for the challenge Catwoman, because I'm sure that Alison will. After all, if she fails to beat the high score, you'll both die. Now have fun! I know I will!"

Things had gone from bad to worse. Selina's fate rested entirely in the hands of this poor hostage. Selina had no way to telling, but Alison was looking over her, from high above, strapped to an electric chair, with the pedal controls in her hands. Realizing what had to be done, Alison prepared to begin the game. She pulled down the spring. Selina gulped at the sound of the spring loading into position.

As Alison activated the game, Selina was launched by a mighty thrust, rolling her into the massive contraption that was a giant pinball machine. Every hit caused her tremendous pain, the constant rolling was enough to make her sick, an illness that, for some reason, was restricted thanks to the strange gum she consumed earlier. She had become a human pinball. All she could do was hope that Alison managed to reach the high score.
1141321.title: Human Pinball

choices: The next challenge involved the use of a small, round ball...
The next challenge involved something else entirely...
11413211.content:
Every roll, every bump and every crash felt worse and worse as Selina continued to fill the role of the human pinball. Something had happened to her that prevented her from throwing up or falling unconscious, it seemed like an endless nightmare, a glimpse of what hell might look like. Alison was completely oblivious to Selina's pathetic pleas to stop, but who could blame her, she wanted to escape the clutches of the crazed Riddler. One thing that Edward Nygma failed to take into account however, was that Alison was very fond of her games, and pinball was of no exception.

Regardless of Selina's well-being, Alison continued the game, as if she were playing an ordinary game of pinball until, finally, she managed to beat the default high score, much to the surprise of the Riddler.

"Congratulations Alison," the echoing voice boomed across the area as Alison was released from the electric chair high above, "I didn't expect such a pretty face to be so fond of a traditional arcade game, let alone be any good at it!"

As Alison rushed out of the electric chair, with a damaged nurse outfit and make-up running down her face from her previous sobbing, she quickly approached the edge of the massive contraption below, where Selina, the human ball of fat that she had become, laid faint with her feet sticking in the air. Opening one of her closed eyes, she caught a glimpse of the massive face that loomed above her. She was horrified as the giant woman stretched out her hand and reached for her. As she grabbed her in between her fingers, as if she was holding a mere ping pong ball, Selina slightly twitched at the pinching fingers that dug into her flesh. Alison lifted Selina in front of her face in awe.

"I'm so sorry about this," she apologized, "But I had no choice! He threatened me!"

Selina was unimpressed. "Thanks," it was hard to make out what she was saying, she was completely drained from all the rolling, "Can you put me down now? This is so humiliating."

"I wouldn't do that if I were you Alison," the annoying voice of the Riddler suddenly boomed across the room, "You might need that little ball of yours for your next challenge. As for you, my little fat cat," his attention then shifted to Selina, "I probably should have told you that you are not alone in my maze. You see, Alison also wants me to help her find your precious dark knight. She has a few personal problems that only he can solve, but as you already know, only I know who's responsible for his mysterious disappearance. The question however, is who wants it more? As it stands, it seems that Alison needs the information more than you do. Alison has been able to succeed in the challenges ahead of her, while you, my little fat cat, have not. Now it seems that you're unable to move without the assistance of your competition, and to be honest, I'm hardly surprised!"

Alison then turned her attention to the locked door with some kind of computer lock. With Selina in hand, she activated the lock, and the annoying voice returned. "Congratulations for overcoming this challenge. In order to progress, you must first solve this simple riddle. Riddle me this! I am full of holes, and yet I am full of water. What am I?" Shrugging, as if she immediately knew the answer, Alison typed in the answer with her free hand. "A sponge," the voice replied, "Of course you solved that one easy! You were supposed to!" Suddenly the door opened, revealing a vacant passageway. As Alison continued through, gripping Selina tightly in her hand, the Riddler continued speaking over the speakers.

"Riddle me this! When does a cat become a ball? When she fails to overcome her first challenge! But what happens when she faces her second challenge? Will she succeed, or will she yet again fail and suffer the consequences? Well, I guess we're about to find out!"
11413211.title: High Score Cracked

choices: Selina managed to reach the end of the maze in time.
Selina failed to reach the end of the maze in time.
114132111.content:
Alison scratched her rich brunette hair as she approached her next challenge. Inside another small enclosed room, before her stood some kind of miniature maze of slides behind a glass wall, with what appeared to be a joystick controller sticking out in front of her. Inspecting this new contraption, Alison twitched the joystick to the left and, as she confirmed, she watched as the maze itself tilted to its left side. It was still unclear to her however, what was it that she needed to guide through the maze, and what was it that she needed to reach at the end of the maze?

That was when Edward Nygma once again returned to the speakers. "Gazing at your latest challenge I see," he said, noticing the expression on Alison's face, with total disregard of Selina's unfortunate predicament, "It's simple, all you have to do is find your way through the maze and press the button to activate the next riddle! But I bet you're wondering, what exactly can you use to guide through the maze? Surely there must be something, or someone, you could use, right?"

With that question, Selina immediately knew the answer, and realized what she had to endure. From her point of view, she could barely pick out what the maze exactly looked like, but she knew that it would involve a lot more rolling and bumping across hard surfaces, as if she didn't endure such a humiliating, undignified scenario already. She then noticed Alison looking down at her, who also realized what had to be done. "I'm so sorry about this," was all that could be said.

She looked back at the contraption before her and, at the top of the wall, she noticed a small gap in the wall, too small to fit her hand through, but big enough for her to squeeze the spherical Catwoman through. Predicting this hole to be the entrance to the maze, Alison proceeded to stuff Selina through the gap, her sides struggling to squeeze through, until Selina landed on her bottom and began rolling down a gentle hill until she banged into another hard surface.

Taking the joystick controller, Alison then proceeded to tilt the maze left and right, backwards and forwards, much to the dismay of the unfortunate little ball of fat.

"Oh, how predictable," the Riddler suddenly blurted, unable to distract Alison from the task at hand, "I take it that you failed to notice the tennis balls that I've provided for you to progress through this particular challenge, but I like your resourcefulness nonetheless!"

Selina was outraged, but this meant little to her at this particular point in time, her ears were ringing and her mind was boggling, all she could do was try her best to endure the impending punishment of bumps and crashes. Alison however, blushed at her failure to notice the small tennis balls sitting in the corner of the room, but since Selina was already stuck in the middle of the maze, it was pointless attempting to take her out and start all over again. As she continued, the Riddler continued to speak.

"It's pointless trying to help her out now Alison, you've already started the challenge, so you might as well finish it. After all, if the fat little cat fails to reach the end of this maze and press the button in less than two minutes, I'm afraid that you won't be able to proceed any further, unless of course you happen to me immune to poison gas, which I doubt! Now hurry up ladies, time's running out!"

Alison was horrified and she started to panic, her nerves started to unsettle her calm nature, but despite her sudden claustrophobia, she proceeded with the task at hand.
114132111.title: The Second Challenge

choices: The next is another physical challenge.
The next is another transformation challenge.
1141321111.content:
A minute had already passed, and Alison started to become desperate, almost losing all hope of success, but by some miracle, Selina was finally led towards the end of the maze, her body striking the button with a hard thump, with several seconds to spare. As promised by the Riddler himself, the poison gas was not released, and another computer lock opened on the side of the maze. As Selina rolled down the bottom of the maze, dropping back onto the floor beneath Alison's toes, Alison scooped her back into her hand.

"Well solved Alison," the familiar voice echoed across the room as Alison comforted her bruised partner, "A bit sloppy towards the end, but I'll chalk that up to stress. All you have to do now is solve the next riddle and you'll reach your next challenge, but don't get your hopes up just yet, there's still a long way to go!"

It took some time for Selina to recover, the world was still spinning in her mind, but when she came to, she noticed how tense Alison looked, she noticed the exhaustion in her squinting eyes. Alison was clearly under pressure. Selina was in her absolute mercy, and there were signs that Alison was unable to continue risking her life for her own. Selina knew that Alison would crack soon enough and, unfortunately for her, so did the Riddler.

Regardless of her condition however, Alison addressed the lock and activated the next riddle. "Riddle me this! The person who makes it sells it, the person who buys it never uses it, and the person who uses it doesn't know they are. What is it?" Distracted by the mournful Selina in her hand, still recovering from the bumps and bruises, but eventually she managed to solve the riddle. "Correct, it is a coffin! Even a child could have solved that one, but good job nonetheless!"

Similar to before, a section of the wall collapsed, revealing a vacant passageway, clearly leading to the next challenge. As Alison and Selina made their way towards the next challenge, the Riddler continued to brag over the speakers.

"I see that the two of you are becoming a a formidable team! Let's just hope that this alliance of yours will be able to survive the next challenge!"
1141321111.title: The Second Riddle

choices: Selina drunk from the bottle first.
Alison drunk from the bottle first.
11413211112.content:
"I see that you've already reached my latest challenge. But I wonder which one of you will advance?"

Before the participants stood another small table, in the middle of another small blank room. A small bottle, similar to what Selina drunk from earlier, sat on the table. Alison also noticed a monitor on the wall, obviously intended for the Riddler to make his presence felt once again, as if hearing his voice was annoying enough! Confused at the sight of the small bottle, Alison picked it up to investigate, but before she could contemplate the possibilities, the Riddler appeared on the screen.

"As you can see, there is a small bottle, filled with a mysterious liquid, but I will not reveal its contents to you, nor will I tell you what will happen to you once you consume it. Unfortunately however, there is only the one bottle, and yet there are two of you, so you must now make a choice. Which one of you is going to drink from the bottle first? Just remember, whatever your decision, it may effect the outcome of your next challenge. So I implore you, choose wisely, but also choose quickly, for you will once again be timed, and if either of you refuse to take a sip before the time runs out, the room will be flooded with poison gas. Now have fun!"

It was a difficult decision. Neither Alison or Selina knew what would happen to them if either of them drunk from the bottle, but as the Riddler clearly stated, one of them must drink from the bottle, or else they would both be poisoned there and then. The question however, is who drunk from the bottle first?
11413211112.title: A Drink for Two?

choices: Although she was still tiny, she returned to her normal shape.
Selina endured a different transformation entirely.
114132111121.content:
The burden that she had was too much for Alison to bare. She had already used the tiny ball of fat that the once incredible Catwoman had become as a pinball, and then as a ball in a maze. She couldn't stand treating her as a ball anymore and, despite Selina's refusal, she gorged her tiny ally with the liquid, pouring it between her lips, in the hope that she would change into a less degrading shape.

As the mixture poured into her throat, Selina's nerves were instantly set ablaze. Her eyes watered as she felt a familiar tingling sensation course across her entire round body. Noticing the agony that she was in, Alison gently placed Selina back onto the table and watched in horror as she rolled onto her curvy back, wiggling her hands and feet as she did so.

Alison could only watch as the changes engulfed Selina's body, anticipating her latest transformation, trying her best to ignore the constant glare of the Riddler on the monitor, who smiled with delight. Witnessing the changes first hand however, Alison was a little relieved that she did not consume the mixture herself. Alison was lucky to avoid any transformation so far, but how long could it last?

Eventually Selina opened her eyes, finally free from the pain, and analyzed herself, ignoring the reaction on Alison's pretty face.
114132111121.title: Selina Changes

choices: They faced another maze, but with a dangerous twist.
They were faced with another drastic choice.
1141321111211.content:
Finally free from the pain, Selina opened her eyes to analyze herself, relieved by the outcome. She was delighted that she was once again able to move on her own accord, her arms and legs were finally freed from the tremendous fat that she once possessed. Although she was not used to standing on her own feet at first, she quickly managed to regain her composure. Despite feeling a cold breeze tickle her naked body, she was relieved to have her body back to her normal shape. Looking back up at the looming face of the massive Alison, despite that she was still a mere three inches tall, she was still happy to have her fit body back again, and judging from the gleaming smile on Alison's face, she was happy too.

"Well done, it seems that you made the right choice after all," the Riddler's voice suddenly boomed from the speakers, "Once again you have proved yourselves to be a formidable team capable of accomplishing even the most astonishing of challenges. But don't get too comfortable Catwoman, I have much more planned for you."

With that said, one of the walls slid up, revealing yet another path leading to the next challenge. As Alison scooped the tiny but agile Selina back into her hand, Selina pleaded to plant her back on the ground, desiring to walk to the next challenge by herself. Shrugging her shoulders, Alison complied, and placed Selina onto the ground. Although at first she was petrified by the enormous size of Alison's foot in comparison to her, she eventually grew more and more confident. Half way across the path however, Selina admitted that she wanted Alison to carry her the rest of the way, much to her adoration.

"I hope you're both prepared for your next challenge," the Riddler once again bragged, "Because I'm sure that you both will have your hands full with this one."
1141321111211.title: The Right Choice

choices: Despite the odds, Selina managed to complete the challenge.
Despite her efforts, Selina couldn't resist the taste of the liquid.
11413211112111.content:
"What are those down there?" Alison was petrified as she found herself standing in front of a large gap in her path, looking down at the creatures that lurked below. "Are those crocodiles!?"

"No Alison," the Riddler's voice suddenly echoed across the area, "They're alligators. Notice the length of their jaws. They weren't easy to come by either, and they haven't been fed for the last two days. I can only imagine how hungry they must be now. I can tell by the look on your face, you're thinking how on earth can you possibly cross this gap in one piece? Well, if you'd direct your attention to the tubes looming above you, then you might have your answer."

Alison looked up and noticed the pipe maze hanging from the low ceiling, just low enough for her hand to reach. Unfortunately however, it was far too unstable for her to use to cross the gap. However, upon further inspection, she realized that the tiny woman who stood in the palm of her hand, the nude Catwoman, was just small enough to squeeze through the pipe maze.

As Alison stretched her arm as high as she possibly could, Selina dropped onto her chest and crawled into the pipe maze. It was a tight squeeze, and the only way she could possibly move was if she crawled through it. All Alison could do was pray that Selina would survive long enough to crawl all the way to the end of the maze.

Unfortunately however, the Riddler was the type of villain who preferred to complicate matters. As Selina crawled through the maze, a small chunk of the pipe itself fell from underneath her chest, dropping all the way down to the alligator pit. Catching a glimpse of the massive drop, Selina let out a gulp before pulling herself back together.

As she crawled even further, now even more cautious than before, she then felt a strange liquid flow through the maze, feeling it tickle her naked body. That was when the Riddler continued to explain the latest challenge.

"I see that you've progressed quite far already Catwoman," he explained, "That's good. After all, you only have two more minutes to reach the end of the maze and solve my riddle before dear Alison falls into the alligator pit below you. That is, if you manage to reach the end of the maze without falling to your demise. Oh, and by the way, you may have already noticed the bluish liquid flowing through the pipes. I would advise you not to drink the liquid Catwoman, because I don't think those pipes are big enough to contain the ball of fat that you once was, and I'm sure that you don't want to turn into a ball of fat again, am I right? Of course I'm right! Hurry up now, time is running out."

It appeared that Selina had bit off more than she could chew. Despite hearing the distant cheers of encouragement from Alison far behind, Selina found it difficult to concentrate crawling through the pipe maze with the strange liquid gushing across her entire body, as if she was swimming through it, not to mention the loose chunks of the maze falling into the alligator pit below. Time was quickly running out, and the task at hand seemed almost hopeless.

But Selina was not willing to go down without a fight. She relied on poor Alison ever since they both met. If it wasn't for her, Selina would not have gone very far, but now it was her turn. It was Selina's turn to accomplish this grave challenge. It was Alison's turn to rely on the almost defeated and humiliated Catwoman, and Selina was not willing to allow Edward Nygma the satisfaction of victory and triumph.
11413211112111.title: The Alligator Pit

choices: Not yet, there were still more challenges to come.
114132111121111.content:
Although it was feint from her position, Selina could hear, through the rushing liquid and the hissing alligators below, the continued cries of encouragement from Alison. This was the driving force that led her through the tight maze. After all that they have both been through, Selina was determined not to fail. She was determined to reach the end of the maze in time. She was determined to overcome the odds in perhaps the most difficult challenge so far. For Alison's safety, as well as the mysterious disappearance of the dark knight, the tiny Catwoman was determined to beat the Riddler's challenge.

She pushed herself to the limit. The maze seemed to grow tighter and tighter the further she crawled, with the strange liquid gushing across her entire naked body. It was difficult to resist the urge of consuming the liquid, but the last thing that she needed was to turn into a ball of fleshy fat again, especially not in such confined space, especially while dangling precariously over a large pit of starved alligators. Despite the incredible odds, Selina managed to pull through and, even with time to spare, she managed to reach the end of the pipe maze, harshly dropping onto the platform below as she gasped for air.

Completely exhausted and drenched, she stood back up and noticed Alison, far on the other side of the long pit, clapping and cheering. She then turned around the see another computer lock, no doubt containing yet another riddle to solve. She approached it, and the riddle was asked. "Riddle me this! If you look at me, then I'll look at you, but if you raise your right hand, then I'll raise my left hand. What am I?" Selina was stumped at first, she struggled to regain her focus as the time limit rapidly decreased. Running out of precious time, Selina sat back down to concentrate on the task at hand. Suddenly it hit her. Noticing a small puddle from the liquid beneath her feet, she looked at her reflection. Realizing the answer, she sprung back up and entered the answer. With literally seconds to spare, she managed to solve the riddle.

"What!?" The Riddler was in shock. "You weren't supposed to complete this challenge! How did you do it? Did you cheat? You must have, there's no way you could have done it! Well, enjoy it while you can Catwoman, for this will be the last time that you'll ever taste victory again!"

Dropping to her knees in complete exhaustion, Selina could only chuckle at the Riddler's distress. As his voice faded out however, Selina noticed a bridge extend behind her, reaching to the opposite platform where Alison stood. Crossing the narrow bridge, almost losing her balance then and there, Alison finally reunited with her tiny partner and scooped her back into her hand. She was about to kiss her before Selina threw her hands up in defense, reminding Alison that she was drenched in the inflatable liquid. At that point, another pathway was revealed to the duo, who were now more confident than ever.

It seemed that freedom was ensured, and they would both soon obtain the answers that they deserved.
114132111121111.title: Against the Odds

choices: She decided to leave Alison to die.
1141321111211111.content:
With a tiny naked Catwoman in the palm of her hand, Alison followed the path before her until she arrived in some kind of warehouse interior. There, at last, they saw the Riddler, in the flesh, standing triumphantly on top of some kind of high platform, decorated with monitor screens and glowing question marks. In the presence of the Riddler at last, Selina scowled furiously.

"Well, well, well," the Riddler boasted with delight, this time without speaking through the loud speakers, "Look who managed to make it through my maze! I must admit, even I did not expect you to come this far, but before I give you the answers that you so desperately want, I'm afraid that one more challenge awaits you."

With that said, three goons suddenly rushed onto the scene. While two of them grabbed Alison by the shoulders, the third picked Selina in between his thumb and index finger, tightly squeezing her torso in between. Selina screamed in pain as a sick smile developed on the dimwitted goon's face. "He he," he chuckled, "Not so tough now, aren't you Catwoman?" All Selina could do was kick her legs and wave her arms violently, but the overwhelming grip of the goon's filthy fingers were far too tight.

"Leave her alone, Spike!" The Riddler addressed the goon carrying the tiny Selina in his hand, "You'll get your chance to play with her after she completes this last challenge." Although he was a little disappointed, the goon followed his orders and dropped Selina onto some kind of table, completely disgusted by the way she was just treated by such an idiotic brute.

Regaining her composure, Selina stood back to her feet, watching as the two others goons threw a panicking Alison into some kind of glass chamber in front of her. As the three goons left out of sight, Selina was left alone to examine the task at hand, while the Riddler explained the final challenge from a distance.

"Confused, Catwoman?" The Riddler explained, "Well, firstly I must congratulate you for making it so far, despite failing to overcome my challenges all by your own. It was clear all along that you needed some help, and that is why I decided to team you up with dear Alison. Adorable, isn't she? And yet underneath that beautiful exterior lies an incredibly intelligent mind. Not as intelligent as me of course, but nonetheless, far more intelligent than yourself. Without her, you would still be a tiny little ball of fat. But now, I'm afraid that you have to face a rather difficult decision."

Selina's attention turned towards two red buttons in front of her. One of them was connected to the chamber where Alison stood inside, while the other was connected to some kind of box next to her. Inside the box was some kind of vial of a strange bluish liquid.

"In front of you are two buttons. One of them is connected to the chamber that Alison is currently trapped inside. The other one however is connected to that box next to you. Inside the box, you'll find a vial, containing the very mixture required to restore you back to your normal size. It is perfectly understandable, all you have to do is choose which one you'd prefer. If you choose the vial, then the chamber will fill with poison gas, and Alison will die, but if you choose to save your new friend, then that box will fall, shattering the vial and leaving you to remain three inches tall for the rest of your life. Must I remind you that you will have exactly sixty seconds to make your decision?"

"So what will it be, Catwoman? Save your friend and stay as a tiny little bug for the rest of your life, or return to normal and leave your friend to die?"
1141321111211111.title: The Final Decision

choices: Before she could answer, an unexpected guest arrived.
The Riddler decided to take more persuasive actions.
11413211112111111.content:
Selina's conscience was split down the middle. If it wasn't for Alison, she would not have gone as far as she did, she would have still been a tiny ball of fat lying on her back in the middle of the Riddler's maze. But to save a complete stranger at the expense of her independence in her normal size sounded ridiculous, even for someone as noble as the caped crusader. Selina struggled to make a decision, but in the end, her conscience got the better of her and, following her heart, she pressed down on the button to release Alison from the gas chamber. Doing so however, caused the box next to her to drop from the table and onto the concrete floor. Selina could hear the vial inside shatter, and at that moment, her heart sank, and the finality of her decision settled in.

Before Alison could react however, the Riddler's goons rushed back in and grabbed her. Selina noticed this, but before she could act herself, she heard hands clapping. She turned around to see the Riddler himself, in the flesh, sarcastically clapping his hands.

"How noble of you, Catwoman," he remarked, with a wicked smile on his face as he approached the tiny naked woman, "An unfortunate decision to make I must admit, and personally I would have let the girl die, but noble nonetheless."

"Let her go, Edward," Selina suddenly squeaked in a feeble attempt to intimidate him, "You promised you wouldn't harm her!"

The Riddler simply laughed at her useless demand, "I promised nothing. I merely asked you to make a rather simple decision, but I did not promise you anything. But since you've managed to make it this far, I guess it would be only fair to give you the answers that you so desperately crave. You want to know what happened to your precious dark knight? That's funny, because so do I!"

Selina and Alison were both confused by this announcement. Edward Nygma promised that he would reveal the dark knight detective's whereabouts if they made it to the end of his maze, but it appeared that he didn't even know himself. But judging from the change in his expression, it appeared that he knew who was responsible for his mysterious disappearance.

"Riddle me this Catwoman! Who was the one to eliminate the dark knight? The one who last saw him! That was you, wasn't it? You're the one responsible for getting rid of the dark knight detective! Admit it!"

Catwoman suddenly regained her memory, much to her dismay . As the Riddler loomed over her, furiously burning holes through her with his glaring eyes, she recollected the last time she encountered the caped crusader. On that fateful night, she stole an ancient artifact capable of manipulating the size of an individual, and she used it on the dark knight, turning him into her personal pet slave for several days, until she lost him, almost as if he completely vanished. Despite the Riddler standing high above me, I turned to Alison, still gagged by the loyal goons, staring at Selina in disgust. She was clearly devastated that the woman that she once trusted had been hiding such a dark secret from her all along.

In a futile attempt of resistance, Selina tried to explain herself. "Yes, I was the last one to see him, but I swear, I don't know where he went!"

"Don't you dare mistake me for an imbecile! I am Edward Nygma! I am the Riddler, and you are nothing but a tiny, insignificant little insect! I can crush you to death in between my fingers! Now tell me! Where is Batman!!"
11413211112111111.title: A Twist in the Plot

114132111121111111.content:
The Riddler was determined to obtain an answer from his shrunken nemesis, but before she could respond, gunfire echoed from outside. This made the goons worried, before they were snapped back into shape by their boss, who ordered Spike, the goon who toyed with the tiny naked woman earlier, to check what was happening outside. Almost immediately however, the overweight henchman found himself screaming in terror as he disappeared into the unknown. Their was a look of concern on Edward Nygma's once confident face. Almost desperately, he ordered another henchman to find out what was happening, while the other continued to hold Alison by the arm, but once again, the henchman faced a similar fate. The Riddler was now terrified.

Before the final henchman could react, he was suddenly knocked out. The Riddler went to check on him, only to find a Batarang sitting next to the goon's head. "No," he pleaded, "It can't be!" A shiver went down his spine as he felt a cold, dark shadow cover his body. He nervously turned around until he came face to face with a familiar presence. "You!!"

"Batman!"

Yes, I, Batman, stood there, under a dark shadow, with a score to settle with the Riddler. I approached him, and he panicked.

Dropping to his knees, I pleaded for mercy. "Batman," he cried, "How did you find me? Where were you hiding? You must tell me!"

With a smirk, I replied. "No."

Edward Nygma was clearly distressed. Desperately he tried to grab Alison, in an attempt to use her as a human shield, but I decided not to give him the pleasure, and launch another Batarang at him, knocking him out. There, the Riddler laid unconsciously on the concrete floor, his bowler hat knocked several inches out of reach. The Riddler was defeated. Almost immediately, Alison dropped to her knees, with tears of relief soaking her makeup.

My attention then turned towards the naked Catwoman, standing on the table no taller than three inches, shyly covering her nude body with her arms. After spending most of the whole night in the nude, almost comfortably, within the presence of the dark knight, she blushed with embarrassment. Even I couldn't help but let out a giggle at such a pathetic sight.

"Nice to see you again, Selina," I said, trying my best to contain my laughter.

Sighing, Selina blushed again. "Spare me the pleasantries, Batman," she sarcastically replied, trying her best to maintain a dignified attitude, "But, umm, thanks for saving us. But after everything that I put you through, why did you save me? A better question would be how?"

"It wasn't easy," I explained, "But while you were distracted I managed to break free from your grasp and dive out of your apartment window. I laid low for a while, leaving you with enough time to forget about your little prisoner and stop searching. I noticed that you hadn't returned for several days however, so I returned to your apartment, knowing that you'd most probably leave that artifact of yours along with your collection of goods, and used it to restore myself to my normal size so I could investigate. While there, I found an address on a sheet of paper. I followed the address to an old, devastated flat. Upon finding caltrops scattered across the floor and green question marks spray painted on the walls, I knew that something terrible had happened to you. After interrogating Sherman Fine for his most recent transactions, I managed to track you down to this abandoned warehouse in the condemned industrial estate, all rented by Edward Nygma."

Selina was astonished. "But why go through all of that, just to save me? After all that I put you through!"

"Simple. You would have done the same for me."

"Of course, I should have known," Selina sarcastically chuckled at my response, "So I guess you didn't enjoy daily trips stuck inside my suit, did you? So what now? Is it my time to spend some time in your suit?"

"Not exactly," I replied, although the suggestion was tempting, I wouldn't stoop to her level, "But I think you might be needing this." With that said, I presented her with another vial, containing a mixture capable of restoring her to her normal size. "I would have arrived here sooner, but I ran into the Mad Hatter on the way down here. I swiped this formula from him during our fight. I presumed that he was sharing his size manipulating mixtures with the Riddler, and looking at you, I guess I presumed right."

I placed the vial on the table next to the tiny cat burglar, who was thrilled to receive it. As she uncorked the vial and guzzled the mixture down, I noticed Alison, cowering in the corner. I asked if she was alright, and she told me of her problem. In response, I told her that I would sort it out immediately. I then noticed Selina, now back to her normal size, approach me as I tried to avoid looking down at her nude body. Seductively she wrapped her arms around my neck, pressing her naked breasts against my chest, and gave me a kiss. This was her special way of saying thank you.

As I went to attend to Alison's issue, Selina whispered to me. "Please make her happy, Batman," she said, talking about the poor nurse, "I would have lost all nine lives if it wasn't for her. Please make her proud." With that said, I disappeared into the night, leaving Selina behind to comfort the distraught Alison.

It was finally over.
114132111121111111.title: Dark Knight Savior

1141321111211111111.content:
At long last, the horrific night had come to an end and, once again, the dark knight disappeared into the darkness.

As promised, Batman went on to rescue Alison's mother, an accomplished surgeon, from the clutches of Rupert Thorne, who demanded a hefty ransom for her return. The dark knight defeated Thorne, and safely brought her mother back into the welcoming arms of the poor nurse, who thought very highly of her beloved relative. Her mother was her inspiration, and she was forever grateful for the caped crusader's help, not only for her mother's safety, but for saving herself from the clutches of Edward Nygma.

Immediately after they were rescued by the dark knight, both Alison and Selina Kyle were taken to hospital, were they quickly recovered to full health. While lying in hospital beds next to each other, Alison and Selina grew closer and closer, becoming very close friends. Upon leaving hospital however, they both went their separate ways. While Alison continued to succeed in her career as a nurse, following in her mother's footsteps, Selina Kyle, after designing a new costume after the one that she lost, went on to continue her life as Catwoman.

The Riddler was very fortunate to survive the night with a bruised skull alone. After all that he put her through, Catwoman was tempted to return the favor and provide him with a taste of his own medicine, but she was soon talked out of it by the dark knight, who had already confiscated the artifact she previously used against him. Despite her promise to Batman however, Catwoman secretly hid her own vial, containing a shrinking formula stolen from the Riddler's collection. She planned to save it for a very special occasion.

Although he only escaped with a bruise on his skull, the Riddler went insane over the fact that he could not figure out where the dark knight detective hid all along. He was desperate to know, but all he could do was scream his dissatisfaction out loud, causing the guards at Arkham Asylum to lock him in solitary confinement, where he pondered to himself, and plotted his next move.

In case you haven't figured it out, this particular storyline was somewhat a sequel to another storyline in this interactive story: http://www.writing.com/main/interact/cid...





Congratulations! You've completed this interactive story!

As a reward for finishing this particular story arc, here is a bonus image that I drew especially for you to enjoy: http://michelle-the-monster.deviantart.c...

In this secret image, Catwoman finally gets to turn the tables on the dark knight detective and, instead of being followed across the rooftops of the city, she gets to play the cat in this game of cat and mouse. After Batman is shrunk to a minuscule size, no longer posing any threat to anyone, Catwoman uses her tremendous size advantage to toy with the tiny little mouse that the caped crusader had become. I hope you enjoy this reward as much as I enjoyed creating it!

Thank you for your support, and remember, this is an interactive story, so as long as you follow the rules provided, feel free to contribute as much as you like.

The story is far from over...
1141321111211111111.title: Little Riddle: Epilogue

114132111122.content:
Alison knew that Selina couldn't take another transformation, burdened as she was by her tiny stature and spherical form. So, placing Selina on the table and taking the bottle for herself, she downed the mixture inside.

Her nerves were instantly set ablaze, her eyes watering, and immense pain shooting through ever cell in her body. Vainly trying to stem the pain in someway, Alison clutched her arms around herself, falling to her knees as her eyes closed, trying her best to ignore the constant glare of Edward Nygma on the monitor.

Selina could only watch as the changes engulfed Alison's body, at least grateful that her one ticket out of here hadn't kicked the bucket. But the changes Alison was going through, well, she was just thankful that she got off lightly in comparison to what Alison was currently going through.

Alison opened her eyes, noting Selina's shocked expression.
