But then Alison then noticed something else.
114132111122.title: Alison Changes

choices: As Selina slimmed down, Alison suddenly started to gain weight.
As Alison shrunk, Selina suddenly started to grow bigger.
114132112.content:
"Alison," the Riddler's voice once again echoed through the passageway, "How much would you say that little ball of yours weighs down there?"

In response, Alison looked down at the spherical, shrunken, thief in her hand for a few moments, contemplating her answer before replying. "I don't know, probably five or six pounds?"

"Good guess, and to be honest, you're not far off either. I asked you this because the next test, well, let's just say that the both of you are going to find it a very filling experience." The speakers went silent as Alison continued through the passageway until she entered another small room. She noticed two plates, with two slices of cake on each, one a normal-sized cake and the other a match for Selina's tiny form, sitting on a wooden table.

Setting Selina down on one of the plates, Alison picked up the other and noticed a card on top of it. All it read was "Eat Me".

"Should we really eat these?" Alison asked, looking down at Selina in a confused state.

"We don't really have a choice," Selina responded, laying on her huge round stomach, struggling to reach the cake with her stubby hands before Alison took a piece of the tiny cake and dropped it into her open mouth. Shrugging her shoulders, Alison then tucked in as well and, before long, both had finished.

Selina opened her mouth to ask if Alison felt different when an incredibly loud belch escaped instead. Blushing, Selina watched as Alison let loose a belch of her own.

Suddenly Selina felt her stomach tingle and groaned in agony.

"I hope you both enjoyed those delicious treats of yours," the Riddler's voice suddenly boomed, "Let's just hope that they don't falter your performances in your next challenge."
114132112.title: A Suspicious Treat

115.content:
Even Poison Ivy, the deadly seductress, feared for her very life as the victim of size manipulation. Whether it be three feet tall or one foot tall, or even a mere three inches in size, she struggled to cope under the watchful, looming eyes of allies and enemies alike.

After a previous encounter with Batman, Ivy found herself in a new special cell in Arkham Asylum, now standing at a minuscule size with diminished abilities. She was so small that even a young toddler could pose as a threat against her! As she moaned in a pit of her own miserable failure however, a riot broke out at the asylum. Amidst the riot, Ivy's long time associate, Harley Quinn, managed to break her free, promising to help her find a way to restore her to her normal, beautiful self. This is a sequel to another story: http://www.writing.com/main/interact/ite...

In an alternate version of this story however, both Harley and Ivy were shrunk after their previous encounter with the dark knight, forced to reside in a special cell in Arkham Asylum together. While there however, Jervis Tetch broke out of his own cell, where he stumbled across the minuscule duo, and offered them the chance to take part in their own little adventure. According to the Mad Hatter, there were strange pieces of confectionery spread across the entire asylum, each one capable of either shrinking or growing whoever ate them. Whoever followed the trail of sweets would be led to a mysterious surprise that the Mad Hatter refused to reveal. With little other option, the duo decided to follow the trail, in the hopes of regaining their original sizes, embarking on their own adventure through Wonderland.

So which story would you like to follow?
115.title: More Shrinking Stories

choices: At the moment, Ivy was fifteen inches tall.
At the moment, Ivy was three inches tall.
1151.content:
Poison Ivy once posed a colossal threat to me. I, the dark knight, faced the merciless wrath of a giant Ivy on more than one occasion, a long fight all about the sanctity of a rare plant that produced an incredible chemical capable of manipulating the size of a human being. On more than one occasion, I found myself fighting from the palm of my environmental nemesis, and at one point, I was even an entire fraction of a mere fraction of an inch, a mere spot on the otherwise perfectly smooth skin of Poison Ivy. I thought that I would face my inevitable doom on that night.

But in the end, the dark knight triumphed once again.

I managed to survive the night. I promised myself that I would never take Ivy likely ever again, I realized the true potential of her imposing threats. Even to this day, I was haunted by the events that took place that night, a fear that I struggled to ignore. Nolan Black, the owner of the Botanical Gardens in Gotham North, the man responsible for bringing the rare plants into the city in the first place, closed down his scientific operations after learning the error of his ways, and resumed taking care of his gardens, and although most of the plants were depleted during the course of that fateful night, the remaining plants were shipped out of the country, while the capsules that contained the substance, created by Ivy before her encounter with me, were stored within the security wing of Wayne Enterprises, hidden from the general public.

As for Poison Ivy however, she was taken back to custody, and returned to Arkham Asylum, but not the same size as she left. Escape seemed unlikely for her, an impossible task from her new point of view. Her diminished size proved to be an advantage for security. She was locked in a new special cell, sharing similar qualities to an extended hamster cage, left to rot in the misery of her own failure. From that day on, Ivy swore that she would exact her revenge on the dark knight.

Two months passed since this encounter, and within those two months, Ivy was unable to settle down with her new size. Ashamed that she had become a mere pet for security, all she could do was cry to herself and cringe at the thought of her defeat in the hands of her adversary. During one fateful night however, the hope of vengeance suddenly became more realistic.
1151.title: Ivy's Revenge

12.content:
Even the caped crusader was a victim of body exchanges, swapping bodies with allies, enemies and strangers alike. The dark knight would truly struggle to cope in the possession of a body different from his own. Separated from his paraphernalia, he could even be rendered useless. His entire world was twisted upside down during a fateful encounter with one of his most notorious opponents, the elusive Catwoman. Sharing a confusing relationship with the caped crusader, Catwoman was an accomplished burglar with malicious intentions. On that fateful night, a rare artifact caught the attention of the mischievous feline, who infiltrated Gotham city museum in order to obtain it, but after a bizarre encounter with the dark knight, things became very complicated between the duo.

But perhaps no other mishap could be more frustrating and more humiliating than the dark knight's chance encounter with a mysterious individual known only as Dennis Flaherty, a sorcerer with a hidden history with Bruce Wayne. After the announcement of the criminal mobster, the infamous Penguin, declaring his intention to kidnap Bruce Wayne, Flaherty ensured that the playboy billionaire would get his just desserts, by swapping his mind with a young six-year old girl named Emma Marshall.

Sometimes however, it wasn't just the dark knight who was forced to endure such situations. Katrina Moldoff was once an acrobatic burglar, calling herself Batwoman, establishing herself as a worthy rival for Nightwing, until a fateful encounter when she was unmasked by Roman Sionis, forcing her into early retirement. Years later however, Katrina returned to Gotham city, now close to the brink of obesity, with a sinister plot to swap bodies with her old rival, not only returning to exact her revenge disguised as Nightwing, but rendering the real Nightwing hopelessly stuck in her old, fat body, and restricted from his war against injustice.

While planning their latest crimes, with devious intentions on their minds, the deadly pairing of Poison Ivy and Harley Quinn wound up enduring a humiliating fiasco in their own hideout. An experiment gone wrong, Harley and Ivy ended up swapping bodies with each other, and realized that a potential reversal potion could not be conceived for at least another week. During that week, the two struggled to cope with their new lifestyles. While Harley struggled to control Ivy's vile, malicious plants, Ivy struggled to endure the endless abuse and humiliation in the hands of the Joker.

So which story would you like to follow?
12.title: Body Swap Stories

choices: Batman & Catwoman Switch Bodies Then And There
It Takes Time For The Bodyswap To Take Effect
Batman & Catwoman Wake Up The Next Morning In Each Other's Bodiss
121.content:
The night sky fell over Gotham City. The tall buildings are streets were illuminated in brilliant light. Such a gorgeous sight made most forget that the town was ridden with gangs—especially in the southern parts of the city. All with weapons pointed at one another in a constant power struggle with only one man and his allies that stood in between the good people of Gotham and chaos.

Distinct footsteps echoed softly as the clicking of heeled boots could be heard. A tall woman in a black leather suit that hugged every curve of her body was casually sashaying along the roof of Gotham City Museum. It wasn't her first time committing grand theft, nor was it her first time even robbing this same museum. Red goggles shaped like cat eyes shielded her eyes which were also covered in black eyeshadow. A girl had to look her best. They served to accentuate her cherry red lips that were coiled into a cocky smirk. Her cowl had two cat ears on her head. The suit in combination with her whip on her hip made it obvious who this perpetrator was.

The one and only, the ever elusive Catwoman.

"Hmmhmhmmmm!" She hummed enthusiastically as she extended the claws out of her glove's fingertips. She stopped at a glass pane that was tilted inward. Cat woman poked her index finger's claw through the glass and drew a circle, easily cutting a perfect hole. Next, she poked all her right hand's claws into the glass and pulled it out, setting it down next to her. She put her legs in first and slid her body in flexibly.

The feline thief scanned the room before stopping and taking in the sight at the center of the room. A glass casing surrounded by red ropes was her target. DO NOT TOUCH was what the small sign read. Selina smiled mischievously at that sign. She never really did follow the rules.

Catwoman slung her whip to grapple around a support beam that was in the roof. She then clipped the handle to her belt and gently swung downward. With her foot wrapped around the whip for extra support, she lowered herself to the case for a better look. Inside was a diamond almost the size of a bowling ball. What attracted her to it besides how large it was, was the fact that it was also shaped like a cat's head with ears and all. This artifact in particular was said to mysteriously vanish only to resurface in other parts of the world. Most assumed it was just due to theft.

"Come to mama!" Catwoman whispered.

The cat burgular took out a small device with a touch screen. SKELETON KEY READY is what the text read. A little souvenir from her last visit she paid to Wayne Enterprises. Bruce Wayne would never go for a girl like her anyway, too much of a goody-goody. A girl can dream though, can't she?

Catwoman tapped the device with her thumb and pointed it at the display case. DISABLING ALARM. UNLOCKING. UNLOCKED. The skeleton key worked its magic and an audible metallic pop came from the top of the display case. Catwoman carefully plucked the cylindrical top off of the case and reached in with her other hand. "Come on... got it!" She snatched the diamond out and gently placed the cap back on the display case. She grabbed ahold of her whip to make herself upright so she could study the fruit of her labor. "It's real alright..." she slid it into her satchel and climbed up her whip to the support beam to undo it and swing herself back to the window she cut a hole through to enter in the first place.

"Easy night!" The cat grinned as she strutted across the roof, hips swaying and all.

"Not so fast, Catwoman!"

"Ugh. Spoke too soon!" Catwoman rolled her eyes. She recognized that voice and knew who he was without even turning around. "Come on batsy, not tonight!"

"Justice never rests. Now return what you have stolen and I'll tell the commissioner to go easy on you." The Dark Knight stood on the corner of a more elevated part of the building. His black cape steadily breezed aside with the wind. He jumped down and approached her slowly as he spoke until he was but a few feet away.

"Alright, fine. How about we just—" Catwoman swung her whip to wrap around the caped crusader's leg and she yanked to pull his leg out from under him. She kicked her heeled boot up the side of his head to disorient him as she then made a run for it, hopping and acrobatically sprinting from rooftop to rooftop.

"Catwoman!" Batsman shouted as he ran after her. He reached to his utility belt and slung a batarang at her. She dodged it, but it wasn't being aimed at her. The batarang sliced her satchel clean off her shoulder, causing it to fall onto one of the rooftops and the precious diamond to roll out. Was it glowing? "My diamond!" Catwoman stopped dead in her tracks to turn around and rush back for it. Batman was equidistant from it as they both ran to collect the artifact. Neither of them seemed to notice how the ancient rock was glowing a neon violet the closer the two got. They both put a hand on it at the same time and a brief flash of light took over both the Dark Knight and the Cat Burglar's vision.

Now it's time for you to step into this conflict. What happened? Did they switch bodies then and there? Did nothing happen at first? Or did they just mysteriously wake up the next day but things aren't as they should be?
121.title: The Cat & The Artifact

choices: Your choice (mabye swap Gordon with someone)
1211.content:
After the flash of light, the two were knocked to the opposite sides of the building. Batman (now in catwoman's body) slowly got up from where he had fallen and he observed catwoman (in Batman's body) slowly do the same. It seems that Batman had just now realized that he wasn't himself at the moment, which was mire clearly seen as he looked down to see his new...appendages.

Catwoman was also now noticing newer changes as she looked down to see herself in the dark broodish clothing if Batman. They look at eachither and, wisely, stayed silent and just stared accusingly at eachother, then one if the worst possible things happened, the alarms started ringing. They knew they didn't have enough time to finish this fight, but they did have enough time to talk quickly as they established a meeting point to discuss this later, Catwoman told Batman where her hideout was unlike Batman who yold her the location of a spare unused batcave, not the real one.

They then bounded out just as James Gordon arrived on the scene with two other cop cars rolled in and ran up the stairs to find, broken glass, signs of struggle.... and one missing priceless diamond.
1211.title: Batman & Catwoman Switch Bodies Then And There

12111.content:
Later that night, Batman went to the hideout of catwoman. As he got closer he noticed the buildings around him in less then mint condition, he realized that these were the homes of the lower class citizens of gotham, the people his parents had been trying to help begore everthing went wrong. He quickly rushed to a apartment that had a single window hanging open...with a tiny cat, supposesly catwomans, waiting for her return.

He scaled the building in no time with his new catlike reflexes that took him years to perfect with his master in the mountains. He slid into the window to find about three other cats just hanging around the apartment, and those were the ones he could see. He walked over to the couch where he saw two cats sitting opposite of eachother, he sat down in between them and did some thinking, "how did this happen?", "Is it reversible?", "what will I tell Alfred?"

He then decided to change into different clothes that weren't so *ahem* skin-tight, as he briskly walked over to the supposed bedroom. He found another cat watching TV on the bed, which had over 50 scratches on it, he found a dresser and dug inside until he found a black nightgown that seemed to be kept quiye nice. He took it and a few minutes of discovering a little too much about catwoman he was in completely different clothing. He then took to the scratched bed and waited by the cat for the morning to cone as he thought, "i wonder how selina is doing?" Along w8th the occasional, "how the **** do women get dressed?!".
12111.title: Later that night

122.content:
"So Gotham, what do you all really think of your precious billionaire, Bruce Wayne? Acting all high and mighty, looking down at us from his tower, laughing as the rest of us struggle to survive in the slums of the city. He expects us all to admire his bravery, coping with the loss of his parents. I, for one, am sick of his pompous, false self satisfaction, and yet you all continue to kiss his golden ass. Well I have had it. That is why, tonight, I will take Bruce Wayne down a few pegs. He will soon be begging me to put him out of his misery! He'll be wishing that he was gunned down along with his parents! So say goodnight to your precious billionaire, for it may very well be his last!"

Such a chilling message from Oswald Cobblepot would not be enough to damper the spirits of my peers. The Wayne Charity Fund Party continued as scheduled, only with additional security. It seemed that the Penguin had put the Gotham City Police Department on alert tonight. Their main priority was to ensure my safety, but if he decides to make a move tonight, I will be waiting for him.

The fundraiser was as predicted. Catching up with old friends while meeting the new, all in the name of charity. Same old, same old. It seemed that nothing would ever change. Even after all these years, I was reminded of the dreadful loss of my parents on that fateful night at Crime Alley. Little did I realize however was that this was the night when my entire life changes.

During that night, I reunited with some old faces. I was particularly interested by the presence of Dennis Flaherty, someone who I had not encountered since my years in training. I did not expect to meet him here in Gotham city. Although he was rather reluctant in interacting with me, I kept my eye on him all night. I recalled an incident all those years ago, and I remembered the arts that he once delved himself in. I suspected that he was up to something.

Despite the success of the night, the fundraiser was almost spoiled upon the arrival of a young girl named Emma Marshall. Her parents, Edwin Marshall and Janice Marshall, were good friends to me, their family had been friends with the Wayne's for decades. I wish that I could say the same for their children, especially their youngest daughter, the six-year old Emma. I insisted that no children should be brought, but despite Emma's siblings sleeping with their grandparents, Edwin told me that Emma wanted to go to the party. He assured me that she promised to be on her best behavior. He was wrong.

The night was a success. Despite the antics of Emma Marshall, the fundraiser went off without a hitch. Not even the chilling message from the Penguin from earlier in the day was enough to spoil the evening.

Little did I realize however was that things were about to get worse.
122.title: Marshall's Little Girl

choices: The babysitter was someone I didn't know.
The babysitter was someone I didn't expect.
1221.content:
As everyone began to leave for home that night, I began preparations to take to the streets as the fearful dark knight. I knew that there was no time for rest, the Penguin had to be subdued, but for some odd reason, I couldn't remember anything else from that night. I had no recollection of donning the Batsuit that night. The following morning however, I awoke to find a shocking discovery that changed my life forever.

I awoke in a strange new room, I looked around, and all I could find were pink decorations, stuffed toys and fluffy furniture all around me. Even the bed I laid in had patterns of hearts and unicorns. In shock, I threw the blanket from me and looked down. I was horrified to find myself looking down at a pair of pink and white pajamas with an image of a kitten stitched onto the top. I rushed to my feet, slightly stumbling from the surprising height of the bed, and stared into the nearest mirror I could find. I was terrified to find the six-year old body of the little brat, Emma Marshall, glaring back at me in shock. Suddenly it became clear. Whatever happened that night, somehow, some way, I found myself trapped in the body of Emma Marshall!

I had never been so terrified in my life, and that was saying something. The sight of my reflection made me, almost instinctively, let out a small shriek. Never had such a high-pitched feminine sound come out of my mouth. I covered my mouth, still in disbelief by what I was looking at. Before I could compose myself however, I heard a booming voice from below.

"Emma? Emma!" It was the voice of Janice Marshall, an old friend of the Wayne family, clearly beckoning for her youngest daughter. Suddenly she stormed into the room, swinging the door wide open. There she stood, wearing yet another stunning dress as if she was prepared to go out for another night. I was astonished by the tremendous size difference, she almost looked like a giant compared to my new point of view. She approached me, a slight shiver rose up my spine. "Emma darling," she continued, "Do you realize what time it is?"

I couldn't answer, I remained silent. "You had a long night last night," she went on, "And you had a long sleep. Almost all day! But now your father are going out again tonight. Your sister, Rachel, and your brother, Phillip, are both sleeping over their friends tonight, so you'll be staying here with Hayley. And I hope you and Hayley both treat your new babysitter with proper respect this time. Okay?"

I simply nodded. The mere difference in size was far too intimidating, even for a caped crusader. All I could do was accept her offer, and in the meantime, figure out a way how to get myself out of this mess. I remembered the Marshall family from before. I wasn't willing to meet my new siblings too quickly, I remembered how cruel Hayley was to the rest of her siblings, slightly chunkier than them, the fifteen-year old would be a force to be reckoned with, but then again I was glad that the sixteen-year old Rachel and the ten-year old tearaway, Phillip, were absent, at least for tonight.

"Now come downstairs honey," she added, knocking me from my trace of thought, "Your babysitter will be here any minute, and I want you to meet her." With that said, she marched out of the room and back downstairs, noticeably awaiting me to follow her. So without any other choice, I simply followed, still astonished by the massive size of everything around me. I even had to stretch my soft, short legs to take each step down the staircase.

As I made my way downstairs, the doorbell rang throughout the large house. I awaited on the stairs as Janice opened the door, revealing my babysitter, and possibly the referee between me and my new sibling, the malicious Hayley Marshall, for the evening.
1221.title: A Long Night Ahead

choices: "First things first pudding, I have to make a phonecall."
"First things first pudding, time to make you some supper!"
12212.content:
As Janice opened the door to reveal my babysitter for the evening, I was horrified by who emerged from the dusk night.

"Hi-Ya!! Jackie Frances at your service!"

I could recognize that shrill voice anywhere.

"Oh, err," Janice stumbled on her words at the outrageous attitude of the familiar babysitter, "Thank you for helping us out tonight. Is this your first night?"

"Don't worry Mrs. M, I'm pretty good with kids. I think I can handle it!"

"Well if you're sure. Come in, come in, let me introduce you to the children." Oblivious to the confusion in Janice's voice, the blond babysitter entered the house and noticed me sitting on the stairs.

"Come on pudding," she said, calling me down the stairs as if I were some kind of child, or pet, "Why don't you tell me your name?" I refused. I was born to defy women like her.

"Oh, don't worry about her," Janice interrupted, "That's our youngest daughter, Emma. She can be shy when it comes to meeting new people, and she had a long night last night, so she might be a bit tired, okay?"

"Okay, I gotcha!"

"The other one, Hayley, needs a bit more attention though. She can be a bit disruptive and violent, but just make sure to feed her and she'll sleep easy. I've put a list of things to do on the fridge, my number should be in that list if you need anything. Please call me if you need any help, and make sure you tuck my girls into bed early. Is that all okay?"

"Sure thing Mrs. M, you can count on me!" With that said, the parents left the house, abandoning me with the abusive Hayley and the seemingly crazy babysitter who I immediately recognized. "Okay kiddo," she said to me, treating me like the child I had become, "What should we do first?"
12212.title: A Familiar Face

choices: I managed to convince her that I was Batman.
In an attempt to shut me up, she decided that it was Bathtime!
122121.content:
The first thing she did was reach for the telephone to call one of her friends. Believing Hayley and me to be doing our own things in our own bedrooms, she gossiped almost all evening on the phone, a conversation that she tried to keep secret. Upon overhearing her conversation, my suspicion was confirmed.

"Hey red, how are things? ... So far so good, this babysitting gig was a great idea, I didn't expect it to be so easy! ... As long as it brings in the money I'm happy ... Don't mention him, I'm not talking to him until he says he's sorry! ... I do kinda miss him though ... You're right, I've gotta job to do! ... No, it's kinda nice having a break from all the police, the crimes, the Batman, all of it! ... Oh, some little snot, Emma I think her name is, and this porky teen called Hayley! ... But they're rich stiffs, so I'm in the money right now! ... Yeah, I'll speak to you soon! Bye!"

As she placed the phone down, throwing her bubblegum into a nearby bin, she turned around to find me sitting next to her on the couch. I tried to speak as intimidating as I possibly could with such a girly voice, it sounded intimidating in my mind, but it was useless.

"I know who you are, Harley Quinn!"

"Hey," Harley chuckled at my feeble attempt to scare her, "Shouldn't you be in your room?"

"No," I simply replied, "I need your help, Harley."

The expression on her face suddenly changed. "What's wrong, Emma?"

"I'm not Emma. I'm not supposed to be here. I'm not supposed to be in this body. I'm trusting you enough to tell you this, so can I trust you to help me?"

It seemed that Harley Quinn was not accepting what I was telling her, looking at me as if I were playing some sort of game. "Alright then," she said in an attempt to challenge me, "So if you're not Emma, then who are you?"

"I'm Batman."

"Batman!? Now I know you're just playing!"

"No, you have to listen to me. I don't know how, but I just woke up to find myself trapped in this body. You've got to help me!"

"No way, you're just messing me around! Well then, if you're the Batman, then I'm the Joker!"

"I'm serious! This is no game! I'm Batman, and I have to stop the Penguin before it's too late!"

It seemed that no matter what I said, she just wouldn't accept it. She thought that I was playing some sort of game, it was difficult to convince her from such a short, pathetic stature. I couldn't find a way to convince her who I was. And even if I could, what then? Would she be generous and sympathetic enough to help me? I didn't care, at this point, I was desperate for help, there was no way I could stand a chance on the streets of Gotham alone, at least not like this, at least not alone.
122121.title: Harley the Babysitter

choices: "Jeez bats, you're not so big and scary now, huh?"
"Oh goodie! Mister J is gonna love his new present!"
1221211.content:
It was difficult trying to convince the bubbly clown girl who I was. She was convinced that I was just playing a game with her, to the point that she even pretended to be the clown prince of crime himself and chase me across the room, but before she could finally turn away and continue to ignore me, I managed to get to her. I reminded her of our previous encounter.

Before finding myself in this form, I last encountered Harley Quinn during a confrontation with the Joker, who was holding the mayor hostage as he threatened the city with a stolen atomic bomb. I managed to stop him by informing his beloved partner that intended to leave her behind and, as a result, she provided the distraction that I needed to get close and capture him. Although Harley was outraged that her boyfriend would betray her like that, still to this moment, and as much as I hated it, I knew that she would eventually forgive him once again.

This remainder was the trigger that finally changed her mind. I was successful. She was finally convinced that I was the one and only dark knight himself.

That was when the reality of the situation popped into both our minds. The look on Harley's cute face told the rest of the story.
1221211.title: Harley's Reaction

choices: I needed to figure out how to swap back first.
I needed to subdue the Penguin first.
12212111.content:
"Jeez bats, that's really you isn't it?" Harley Quinn was still in shock, "What the hell happened to you? How come you're living it up with these rich stiffs?"

Relieved that I managed to convince her who I was, I gave her the explanation that I owed. "I don't know how, but I woke up earlier in this body. Clearly someone has somehow managed to transfer my mind into this body."

Harley couldn't help but let out a slight giggle. "Sorry, I'm just not used to this. You're not so big and scary now, huh?" I could tell by her expression that she was enjoying this, but who could blame her? The vigilante that she once feared and looked up to was now looking up to her, stuck in a form completely vulnerable to even the weakest of elementary school children. If she wanted to, she could completely overpower me, and there was nothing that I could do about it. "Hang on a minute," she suddenly stated, before she could continue to mock me even further, "So if your mind is stuck in the body of a little girl, then where's the little girl's mind? Is it stuck in your body?"

"I think so," I replied, realizing the fear that the real Emma must have been enduring in the body of Bruce Wayne, "That's what I need to find out. Cobblepot is back out on the streets. And I need to return to my body before he can get his hands on his next target." Despite my current form, I was still determined to hide my secret identity to such a notorious criminal like Harley Quinn, even if my life depended on it. I could only imagine how the real Emma Marshall must have been felt to wake up in the body of Bruce Wayne, but how would she feel if she was then captured by the Penguin? I couldn't let that happen.

Although she was reluctant at first, considering the huge advantage that she now possessed over me, and considering the amount of pain that her relationship with the clown prince of crime had endured because of me, Harley Quinn eventually agreed to help me out and, after tucking Hayley into bed, Harley sneaked me out of the house and into her car, but not without presenting me with a baby car seat, just to add to my humiliation.

"So bats," Harley said as she drove out of the street through the city lights, "What's the plan?"
12212111.title: Not So Big and Scary Now, Huh?

choices: Harley and I decided to sneak into the Iceberg Lounge.
In disguises, Harley and I entered the Iceberg Lounge.
122121112.content:
"Before we figure out how to swap back, we need to make sure that Cobblepot won't be a problem. The last thing we need is him making things complicated."

Harley Quinn was struggling to keep her eyes on the road, still enjoying the utter humiliation that I was enduring. "Right," she added, trying her best not to giggle, "What's the rush? Besides, you look kinda cute like this!"

"Harley, this is serious," I was not in the mood for her embarrassing remarks, fed up of being treated like the little girl that I had become, "We need to subdue the Penguin!"

"Sorry bats," Harley said in response, "It's just that, well, I've always wanted a little sister..."

I immediately interrupted upon hearing such a ridiculous suggestion. "Don't get any ideas!"

After a brief awkward silence, Harley made another comment. "So where exactly are we going? I mean, don't you need to go to your Batcave to pick up your stuff or something?"

"I've lost contact with my allies. At this point, you're the only one I can trust. You're my only hope."

"I'm sorry bats, I didn't quite catch that," Harley was now rubbing it in my face, "Say that again?"

After letting out a loud sigh in defeat, I repeated myself, much to the childish delight of the woman who I currently relied on. She seemed to enjoy my company in this body more than she enjoyed the presence of her beloved clown prince of crime, and that was saying something. We eventually arrived at another set of traffic lights, faced with a choice of directions.

"So what are we going to do about the Penguin?"

"Cobblepot values his possessions. If I know Cobblepot, he'll most probably be back in his old hideout."

"Where?"

"The Iceberg Lounge."

The expression on Harley's face then suddenly changed. "No way bats," she exclaimed, "I can't go back there, not after what happened last time. If I even popped a finger inside that place again they would grab me and turn me into shark food! Besides, I hate the stink of fish!"

Trusting Harley was increasingly becoming a mistake on my part. "Please Harley," I pleaded, almost like a small child begging for a present, "I need to find out what Cobblepot is up to. It's the only way we can beat him."

Sighing, Harley simply nodded her head. "Fine, I'll go, just don't start crying on me!"
122121112.title: A Long Ride

choices: We were both let into the club with no bother at all.
Denied entry into the club, I decided to sneak in from the back.
1221211122.content:
"And I thought that this night was gonna be a drag," although Harley Quinn was reluctant to take part in my plan, she was thrilled to learn that my plan required us to wear disguises, "But there's nothing like little trip to the mall at night to calm a girl!"

It was late at night, so we were practically the only two people in the mall. Harley promised that she would return all borrowed clothes as soon as this was all over. If she didn't, I'd make sure she did what she was told. However at the moment, it seemed that Harley was enjoying my current form a bit too much. As she left the empty changing booth, sporting a rather outlandish outfit, I refused to exit my booth. "Come on out Bats," she giggled, trying her best to sound as if she was an authority figure, "Let's see that little get-up of yours."

A brief moment passed before Harley suddenly peeked her head into the booth, taking me by surprise. Almost instinctively I tried to cover up, but this only made Harley laugh even more. "Listen hun," she remarked as I regained my composure, "You ain't got nothing that I haven't seen before!" This was a sarcastic comment if I ever heard one, but nonetheless I resumed to change into the attire that she handed to me. I eventually emerged from the booth, disgusted at the sight of the white frilly dress that I wore. As predicted however, Harley was absolutely delighted. "Oh wow," she giggled, "You look so cute!" After pinching my cheek once again, we made our back to the her car and headed to the Iceberg Lounge.

Of course, with our disguises, we also had to come up with identities, and as usual, Harley was excited to give me a name. Jenny. The thought of being called Jenny left a lump in my throat, but then again, at least she named herself Gertrude Harrison, a name that I would have had no choice but to refuse. And as much as it sickened me to say it, I had to pretend that she was my mother, a concept that she was all too happy with.

Eventually we arrived at the club, and upon her first glance of the flashing neon lights, Harley let out a significant gulp of anticipation. We left the car, and as I held her hand like the child that I was, we made our way to the front door, where we were immediately interrupted by a big bouncer.
1221211122.title: In Disguises

12212111221.content:
The bouncer at first, seemed to be trying to get rid of us. However, I managed to convince him that I needed to use the restroom with Harley convincing him. She said that we'd been on a long car trip and that she needed to go too. "Let me just say this, do NOT order a Big Gulp from the last rest stop for fifty miles." Harley said as she bounced around to make it more convincing. I reluctantly joined in, saying that I drank too much apple juice and said that I was going to have an accident. Not wanting to clean up the mess, the bouncer allowed us in without any problems.

"Good, we're i..." I said as I looked around for Harley. 'Uh...mommy?" I said in my child-like voice. Suddenly, I heard a flush from a door with a penguin in a pink dress. Out came a very relieved Harley, who whistled happily. I stared at her in annoyance. "What? When you gotta go, you gotta go!"

I pinched my brow and sighed heavily. "It's okay. Now, we just have to find Penguin." Unexpectedly, Harley picked me up. "Aw, doesn't Jenny have to potty too?" I only stared at her with more annoyance. "No, that was just a ruse. We have to find Penguin."

With that, Harley and I...
12212111221.title: We were both let into the club with no trouble

choices: Before he could return, Harley Quinn managed to break free.
The Penguin returned with sinister intentions in mind.
12212111222.content:
After some time elapsed, I finally regained consciousness. As I came to, I realized that I was unable to move. I was tied, by a thick rope, to a wooden chair, with my ankles tied to the chair legs and my wrists tied behind the back. Dazed and confused, I looked around. I was not entirely sure where I was, but judging the heaping quantity of wooden crates, broken props and coats of dust and spider webs, I concluded that I was in some kind of basement, presumably underneath the Iceberg Lounge. I was still bruised from the bump I took, but from my memory, I remembered how I was denied entry into the club, and how my associate left me alone in the cold. I then recalled how I attempted to sneak into the club through the back, only to be caught by a group of thugs inside. From then on, I couldn't remember a thing, and now here I am, trapped in the basement of the crooked establishment.

That was when I heard a groan from behind. I was not alone. Although I was unable to turn my head to catch a glance of the figure that casted a shadow over me, but from the shrill pitch of her voice, no introduction was needed. It was Harley Quinn, who agreed to help me investigate the club and return to my original form. It seemed that she too was tied up, with her back against my own. It seemed that she too was found and captured by the goons of the crooked owner of the club. I couldn't help but feel obliged to take the blame for such a ridiculous plan, but at the same time, I was still uncomfortable with feeling as inferior and insignificant as I did at that point.

As we both struggled to break free, a familiar laughter echoed from a distance. Our eyes turned towards the lone door until it swung open, revealing the owner of the Iceberg Lounge. Oswald Cobblepot, better known as the Penguin, emerged from the dark staircase and approached his hostages. Pure hatred coursed through my veins, but alas, there was nothing I could do. In my normal body, I would have easily freed myself from such a common position and would already be pounding what was left of the Penguin's teeth until he pleaded for mercy, but alas, in this body, I was merely another addition to his nearly endless catalog of hostages. I felt completely useless, helpless and pathetic.

As the Penguin approached us, he looked down at my frowning face and smiled, showing off his scorching yellow teeth, and took another puff of his chunky cigar. "Well, well, well," he squawked with a dismantled accent, "Looks like my boys have caught a pair of bitches sneaking around my club! And what to do you know, one of them happens to be the clown's little squeeze!" He then turned his attention to me, unaware of my true identity. "And who's this? Your daughter? Can't be, she's way too fat!" The thugs that stood behind their boss let out a sinister chuckle. "Is she adopted? Must be, a fat little piggy like her don't belong to a tart like you!"

And with that, Harley suddenly snapped.

"Get lost you fishy freak," she screamed with all her might as I held my head in disgust, "Hey sardine breath, why don't you pick on someone your own size!" I had to admit, I too would be embarrassed by such a statement.

With another puff on his cigar, as well as an abnormal squawk, the Penguin continued to gloat. "This one's feisty, ain't she?" The thugs then started to urge their boss to throw the first hit, and he complied, slapping the infuriated Harley Quinn with the back of his deformed hand. "I'd watch your mouth if I was you. You're in my turf now bitch, and there ain't no clowns to save you around here. But you know what I have got? I've got a smiling fish lurking in a pool upstairs just waiting to take a bite out of you and your fat little friend. He could do with some pork and beef, and he might just get it if you ain't too careful. Got it?"

With a gulp and a whimper, Harley silently nodded her head, and reluctantly, I did the same. I was in no position to rebel.

"Good, I'm glad we've come to an understanding," Cobblepot remarked as one of the thugs handed over his top hat to him. With his trademark hat on his head, he made his way back upstairs, but not without leaving one more remark. "Now if you don't mind, I've got a business to run, but don't worry, I'll be back to continue our conversation later. Come on boys, let's leave these slabs of meat alone. Ha!" And with a squawk, we were left alone to wallow in our defeat.
12212111222.title: Penguin's Prisoners

choices: We both managed to escape just in time.
I managed to escape, but Harley was caught.
122121112221.content:
Harley Quinn and I were left alone, tied up and trapped in the basement of the Iceberg Lounge, being held captive by the Penguin. I remained silent for a while, unwilling to show signs of weakness to the clown girl, although at this point it was futile, stuck in the body of a chubby little girl, I felt completely weak. There was no way I could free myself, and from the constant twitching behind me, it seemed like Harley was having trouble breaking free herself. I was defeated, and I prepared myself for the inevitable in the hands of Oswald Cobblepot.

That was however until I could feel one of the ropes falling off, but it wasn't one of the ropes that were tied around me. I then felt some weight lift off from my back. I looked up to see the face of Harley Quinn, looking down at me with a disturbingly amused smile on her face. Obviously I felt uncomfortable, still tied up while Harley now roamed freely, but it was clear that she was truly enjoying the role as my superior. "Hey Jenny," she snickered, to my chagrin, "You need me to help you out a little?"

I wasn't thrilled about her gloating over me, and I initially refused her help, but watching me struggle to free myself even more just made her much more entertained. "Come on, ol' sardine breath will be back in any minute! We can't stay down here all night you know..."

I continued to refuse her help, I was embarrassed enough already because of her, I wasn't going to allow her the pleasure of helping me out of this situation. I've escaped from worse situations before, I knew I could handle it. At this point however, Harley was starting to get a little annoyed. "Come on Bats! Don't you want to get your old body back or not?"

Hearing this just made me even more determined, but then I stopped as Harley shrugged her shoulders. "Well, I tried," she remarked, turning away from me, "But clearly you have everything under control. You don't need my help, so I might as well just leave right now. Good luck getting your old body back..."

"Wait!"

Harley stopped in her tracks. She turned back to face me, biting her lip in anticipation as I tilted my head down in defeat. "Alright," I sighed, "Go ahead. Cut me free."

Harley looks reluctant. "I dunno B-man," she said, "What's the magic word?"

"Please..."

"Hmmm...I would have accepted muffin, but okay! Just stop squirming and we'll have you outta there in no time!"

With ease, she managed to loosen the ropes around me. I felt the ropes slide off my body, and I was finally able to move again, although I was still a little dazed from the earlier encounter. I thanked her for her help, to which she responded by patting me on my head. After reminding her of our current situation, I then told her that we need to find a way out of the building. She pointed at a long wide window high above the wall. I knew that this was our only way out, but I was not entirely sure I could squeeze through, considering my current body frame. Nonetheless, Harley hurried me towards the window. I was far too short to reach it, so instead Harley tried to lift me up.

"Holy cow Batsy," she huffed, struggling to lift me off the ground, "You must weigh a ton!!"

Despite struggling to lift me up, much to my annoyance, she finally managed to help me up to the window. The window was already unlocked, clearly the Penguin was not aware of this. I shoved the window open and poked my head through it. I looked around and saw that it lead to an empty alley just outside the Iceberg Lounge, nothing was seen apart from a few trash cans and small piles of junk. I managed to squeeze my shoulders through the window, but then I encountered a problem.

My body was far too thick to squeeze through. I managed to squeeze my head through the window, as well as my arms and shoulders, but my sides and stomach were far too thick. I tried pushing myself free, but it was no use. As I should have anticipated, I was completely stuck. Half of me was outside the building, the other half was still stuck in the basement. I could only imagine the sight that Harley had of me, but I knew how big the smile on her face would be, especially seeing the frilly dress I was wearing riding up my body to reveal a pair of pink panties. There was nothing I could do at this point apart from uselessly pushing the wall and dangling my flabby legs. I could hear Harley laughing her head off from inside the building, and I could feel my face glowing bright red because of it. "Harley," I yelled, completely frustrated now, "This isn't funny!"

Harley finally calmed herself down, wiping a tear from her eye. "Not from where I'm standing," she giggled, still trying to stop herself from becoming hysterical. "Don't worry B-man," she finally said, now much calmer than a few moments ago, "I'll get you out. All I need is a stick of butter!"

Despite that joke, Harley tried to live up to her promise, but not in the way I would have liked. I felt a sudden impact in my backside. Harley had clearly charged and tried to use her shoulder to shove me through the window, but it was useless, all it did was wedge me even further into the window, making me even more stuck. She then tried to pull me back into the basement by grabbing my ankles and trying to pull me out of the window, but again, all it did was slightly shift my body into a much more awkward position. It was hopeless. Unless I suddenly lost a lot of weight, I was going to be stuck here all night, and there was no other way for Harley to escape.

Then, to make matters worse, Harley suddenly squeaks. "I hear voices. Fish boy must be on his way back! It's now or never B-man! Suck in that gut or else we're gonna be fish food!" With that said, she resumed shoving me by the backside, trying desperately to squeeze me through the window. It was still useless, but then suddenly, I budged a little further. As I sucked in my gut, I could feel myself poking a little further out the window. I just needed to get past the stomach and fitting my legs through would not have been a problem.
122121112221.title: A Narrow Escape

choices: We headed off to set up a crime scene in Wayne Manor.
We headed off to ask for help from someone.
1221211122211.content:
It was a very tight squeeze. Of all the situations I've found myself over the years, this was by far one of the worst. Wedged in a narrow window, with Harley Quinn trying to shove me through by the backside, just minutes before the return of one of the most fearful gang leaders in Gotham, who would surely feed us to his sharks if we were caught. I pushed with all my might, and so did Harley, and inch by small inch, I was finally budging until, at last, I felt a huge release of pressure from my gut. I finally clawed my way out of the window, and I finally I had my whole body out of the building. I was no longer stuck.

I may have been free however, but I could feel a searing pain across my stomach. It felt like I was caught in a vice, the pain was so great that I could barely make it back to my feet. I laid on the concrete floor in the alleyway, rubbing my torso with great displeasure. That was when I spotted Harley, who herself had just managed to squeeze through the window, to my annoyance, with much greater ease. She did not get stuck, she was slim enough to slide through without a problem. The window closed behind her as she tried to help me back up to my feet, struggling while doing so. This only caused me more pain, and out of character, I let out a huge moan of discomfort.

Come on B-man, quit your whining," Harley sneered as she finally pulled me back to a vertical base, oblivious to the pain that I was in, "We need to get moving!"

The thought of running in this body was disturbing, I was already suffering enough, and I was already out of breath, but nonetheless I had to dig down deep. We began to ran, which was terribly more exhausting than usual. I noticed Harley running slightly further than my pace, and I knew she was holding back just to help me keep up. We might have our differences, but she has truly proved to be very loyal throughout this whole ordeal so far.

As we headed down the alleyway, I could overhear a familiar voice from behind us, bellowing from the other side of the closed window. "What are you waiting for?" The Penguin was clearly not too thrilled about our narrow escape. "Find them now!!" With that said, I tried to quicken up the pace, but with great failure as I suddenly tripped up and fell flat on my face. Harley stopped and tried to comfort me, noticing tears running down my face. This was uncharacteristic of me, the tears were merely not of my own conscience, they were forced out after taking such a bump. Nonetheless Harley made sure I was alright before we started heading back.

We were fortunate to reach Harley's car without getting caught. That was truly a narrow escape, but for me, it was a realization of just how weak and useless I had become. We both hopped into the car and Harley revved up the engine as fast as she could before pulling out and driving away from the Iceberg Lounge. Hopefully this was the last time that we saw the Penguin that night.

After making sure that we were out of Cobblepot's range, Harley finally eased up and started cruising the car. She took a glance at me, sitting quietly in the baby car seat, looking bruised and beaten up. "You okay?" she asked, to which I replied "I'm fine." But she knew I was lying, she knew that deep down I was in a lot of pain. She shook her head.

"No, you're not fine," she said with a more serious voice, the same voice she used before she turned to a life of crime, "Listen B-man, you're not exactly in any position to keep up the dark knight routine. If I wanted to I could have offed you back in that rich stiff's home as soon as you told me who you were. But I didn't because no one deserves this. My puddin' would never be the same if he ever saw you like this. I know you and I have our differences, but to see you like this is actually quite upsetting. I actually enjoy the time that we spend together, even if I do point guns at you or you beat the living crap out of me. But this...this just isn't the same. I want you back to normal just as much as you do, but right now, you're not the dark knight. Right now, you're just a fat kid who thinks she's a superhero. You've already put both of our lives at risk because you believed you were skinnier than you thought. I really want to help you, but you've gotta know your limitations now. You're hurt, so just try and take it easy while you can. Stop trying to be something that you aren't right now, and start acting like a little fat girl!!"

After that speech, I felt miserable. She was right. I was just a hindrance at this point. If we wanted to get anywhere to solve this mystery, I needed to know my limitations and try my best not to put our lives at risk again. I was thankful for her help, and I was thankful she did not feed me to her puddin' already, even if they aren't on good terms at this point. But from that point on, I decided to try my best to withdraw any attempts at the things that I used to do as Batman with ease. I decided to take Harley's advice and start acting more like the girl that I had become.

We were now closing in on our next destination. This was our next step to discovering the truth behind this whole ordeal.
1221211122211.title: Out of the Lounge

125.content:
The mischievous cat burglar, Catwoman, never knew why exactly she agreed to be apart of Zatanna the Magician's latest magic act, but nonetheless she found herself on the magician's stage anyway. But when Zatanna casted her spell, she suddenly found herself in the body of a present member of the audience. After the show, Zatanna tried to switch her back, but unfortunately she was unable to. Selina had to adapt to her new body or lose her original body as the Penguin and his thugs arrived on the scene, in hot pursuit of Catwoman for stealing from his belfry.

On another occasion, Poison Ivy and Batgirl were fighting against one another when there was a sudden flash of light and the pair found themselves in the other's body! How will the wily villainess cope with the body-reading form of Cassandra Cain? And will Cassandra be able to resist toying with men and women alike in her new form?

So which story would you like to follow?
125.title: More Body Swap Stories

choices: She swapped bodies with Mary Brewer, an overweight woman.
She swapped bodies with Ronald Lennon, a fat fanboy.
She swapped bodies with someone else entirely.
1251.content:
"And now, with my magic and before your very eyes, I will transfer the souls of these two volunteers into the opposite body!" Zatanna's voice boomed to the packed crowd.

For the tenth time that evening, Selina Kyle asked herself just why she had agreed to the act, but reminded herself about the time the criminal duo, Harley Quinn and Poison Ivy had turned her into a cow and how Zatanna changed her back to normal. Zatanna grinned at Selina, and then to her fellow volunteer standing next to her.

Selina took stock of her fellow volunteer and noticed just how out of shape the person was.

"Well," she thought cattily, "Out of shape is being a bit generous." The person beside her was downright huge! Selina decided not to worry however, even if Zatanna really did swap their bodies, she would be return to her normal fit form again after the show was over.

"Paws Seidob!" Zatanna announced, pointing her wand at the two.

Selina blacked out for a few moments, followed by a ripping sensation, until she eventually came to. Blinking her eyes, she looked down at her new body.
1251.title: The Selina Switch

choices: Mary soon recovered and found out why the Penguin was after Selina.
Clearly distressed, Selina asked Zatanna if she could slim her down.
12511.content:
With dull, brown eyes, three extra chins, a rear end that looked like it could fill half a row all by itself, as well as a belly that stuck a whole three feet in front of her, Selina was no longer a looker. She couldn't see her feet and her skin was a far cry from the smooth flesh she had literally a moment ago.

Looking to her right, she saw her body, a state of shock on her face as noticeable as her own.

Zatanna beamed as she brought the microphone to Selina first.

"And now," she delightfully asked, "Who are you?"

Still in disbelief, she carefully replied. "Selina Kyle."

"And you?" Zatanna asked the woman now inhabiting Selina's trim body.

"Mary Brewer."

Zatanna basked in the applause from the audience and motioned for the shocked pair to sit down off to the side and enjoy the rest of the show. So Selina and Mary did, watching as Zatanna finished her show, still in disbelief. The female magician turned herself into a pig, became a giant-sized version of herself, and finally summoned a whole Roman legion on-stage, before everything vanished before the audience's eyes in a flash of light, leaving only Zatanna with a wide grin on her lips. Everyone cheered, including Selina, until she realized just how exhausting a simple task like clapping her hands was now in the overweight body of Mary Brewer.

As the audience filed out, Zatanna walked up to Selina and Mary to give them each a hug, slightly straining to wrap her arms around Selina's current body. "Thank you so much for agreeing to do this."

"No problem," Mary replied as she continued to examine her athletic frame. Before the show, Mary was on the run from some thugs, when Zatanna saved her life. She told the magician that she would do anything she wanted in return. At first, Zatanna wouldn't accept the offer but then tonight's show was looming and both of her assistants had called in sick. So she asked Mary, and Mary agreed.

"I suppose you two would like to go back to normal, right?"

Both women nodded, though Mary was a bit slower to do so. It was nice being so fit for a change, much to the chagrin of Selina Kyle.

Zatanna closed her eyes and cast the reversal spell. Selina waited for the ripping feeling to return, but after several minutes with no feeling, she opened her eyes only to find herself still in Mary's grotesque form.

"Zatanna, what's going on?"

Zatanna tried again, speaking the words aloud. She spoke several arcane languages, but still nothing happened.

"Well...it looks like you two will have to stay like this for awhile. I'll need some time to research how to get you two back to normal."

"How much time?" Mary asked, unaware of the distressed look upon Selina's chubby face.

"A few weeks. I was certain I knew the reversal spell. Sorry."

"Sorry!?" Selina was starting to see red. "You're sorry?! Look at me! How can I be in society looking like this!"

"Hey!" Mary cut in, "That wasn't nice."

"Well news flash, honey! I'm not nice," Selina irrationally shot back. The two glared at one another until Zatanna jumped between them to break the tension. "Ladies, don't fight. I'll fix this, I promise."

"You had better," Selina growled. And with that said, Zatanna nodded. She was about to head to her study until, suddenly, several thugs burst into her venue, machine guns in hand.

"Where's that lousy cat burglar!" A familiar voice squawked, causing Selina to turn pale. Then, from the entrance, emerged Oswald Cobblepot, better known to the public as the Penguin, one of the most powerful crime bosses in Gotham city at the moment.

Luckily, Zatanna pointed her wand and the group of criminals, including the Penguin himself, fell asleep, giving her enough time to teleport herself and the other two ladies away. Finding themselves in Zatanna's home, Mary began to panic. "What was that about? Why was The Penguin there?"

Zatanna looked at Selina, realizing that she had done something to cross the crooked mobster. "You better tell her. She's a part of this now!"

Selina groaned but eventually nodded. "You see Mary...the thing is... I'm Catwoman."

Selina waited for a gasp but what she got instead was a loud thump as Mary fainted. Selina gave a great huff, putting her hands on her wide hips as best she could.

"Fantastic!"
12511.title: Enter Mary Brewer

choices: During dinner, Selina was upset about Mary's eating habit.
After dinner, Zatanna and Selina began Mary's training.
125112.content:
Taking the opportunity, Selina looked over at Zatanna.

"I can't fight Cobblepot like this! Is there anyway you can slim this body down?"

"Not if you want to stay in that body for the rest of your life."

"What!?"

"Magic isn't the answer to everything Selina. There are rules that govern it, just like there are rules governing the natural world."

Selina sighed as she placed a fat hand under one of her multiple chins. "Then I suppose I had better get used to this then," Selina muttered.

A groan brought their attention to Mary, who regained consciousness. Zatanna helped the fit woman to her feet as Mary looked down at her body again.

"So now...I'm Catwoman?" Selina's eyebrow twitched at Mary's remark, but decided not to aggravate things by telling Mary that she most certainly was not the original Catwoman. "Selina, can you tell me what happened between you and the Penguin?" Mary asked, finally regaining her composure.

"There's not much to tell. The bird just happened to have something I wanted, so I sweet talked him at the Iceberg Lounge, waited until he got himself drunk, and then I robbed him. I didn't think he'd take things this far."

"How would you like it if someone stole something of yours?"

Selina groaned at the highly moral tone coming from her mouth. "Whatever, we need to focus on training you to survive in case the bird comes by again."

"You'll teach me?"

"Of course. I don't want to be stuck like you for the rest of my days, and if you went down to some no-name punk, my reputation would be finished!"

Mary didn't know whether she should feel upset or amused at Selina's answer, but decided that it didn't matter. As fun as it was being slim, Mary certainly didn't want to lose her body, as big as it was.

"Zatanna, could you help us out with training?"

"Of course." As the magician was about to cast a spell to do so, however, a sound rang out.

GRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRROOOOOOWWWWWL!

Selina blushed fiercely as she realized the sound came from her gut. "Um...first though we should eat."

Mary nodded in agreement, feeling a bit hungry herself.

Zatanna grinned at the two of them, and soon enough a large meal was set out for them, food of all types just waiting to be eaten. Selina noticed the grin and shot a glare at Zatanna.

"You're enjoying this, aren't you?"

"Now why would you say something like that?" The magician replied, trying her best to hold back a slight giggle. Mary wasn't paying attention however, she was too busy tucking into a large plate of assorted food.

Selina was about to reprimand her until she realized that she was eating even faster. Inwardly groaning, Selina wondered just how many extra pounds she'd add to her body before she would return to normal.
125112.title: Slim Chance

choices: A few weeks later, the Penguin broke into Zatanna's home.
As training progressed, Mary gained weight, scaring Selina.
1251122.content:
Selina marveled at how much she ate, but focused on the training to come once dinner was over.

Mary, for her part, had eaten a lot as well, causing her slim stomach to balloon outwards, a sight Selina was horrified to see. Regardless, she managed to control her temper, reminding herself that it was just a stuffed stomach, not real fat.

After digesting, Zatanna transported Selina and Mary to a large, fairly empty, room with training dummies all around.

Selina waddled towards one of them and struck, the blow sending the dummy to the ground, an effort that immediately broke beads of sweat above her eyebrow. She was clearly unfit for the task at hand. "Now I want to see you try," Selina asked Mary, wiping the sweat from her brow.

Mary nodded and walked towards another dummy, striking out. Unfortunately, Mary had never really thrown a punch before, and ended up on her shapely rear end. Selina sighed and helped her up. "This is going to take a lot of work."

Mary chuckled a bit and rubbed the back of her head.

"I guess so!"
1251122.title: First Day of Training

choices: Zatanna shook her head. The spell was more complicated than she thought.
Zatanna nodded. She just forgot about it due to Mary's training.
12511222.content:
The Penguin roared at his cronies, slapping the nearest across the face with his umbrella. "Wagh! Are you telling me that you still can't find her! It's been two bloody months already!"

"I'm sorry Mr. Cobblepot, it's just....hard!" Penguin cut off any excuses by shooting the henchman that spoke then and there.

"No more excuses! Now get out there and get that thieving cat!" Without a word, the henchmen rushed out, none willing to stay around the perturbed fowl.

Meanwhile, Selina was truly impressed by Mary's aptitude. The formerly timid young woman was now far more confident. She was able to handle herself in a fight. It wasn't perfect, no way near as fluent as the original, but Selina knew Mary wouldn't fall to some random thug now.

That was the positive. The negative was the weight Mary had gained over time. She had overcompensated each training session by gorging herself silly during mealtimes, the end result being the flabby, jiggling, mass that she had turned Selina's butt and stomach into. She wasn't outright fat, but the sight of her body with so much excess weight terrified Selina.

Mary had tried to eat less, apologized to Selina, pushed herself harder during training, but the weight just wouldn't go away.

Finally, Selina just sighed.

"Never mind," Selina said, "I'll lose it when we switch back." Selina then looked at Zatanna, noticing just how much the mage had grown as well. Her fishnet stockings were struggling to contain the mass that were her thighs and rear end, and her face jiggled a bit, revealing a second chin forming. Zatanna's belly was evident to the whole world as it caused her shirt to ride up and even rip in a few places.

"What's your excuse?" Selina smirked, staring down at Zatanna's frame.

Zatanna simply shrugged. "Well, with both of your appetites, it tends to rub off on a girl."

"You actually like this?"

Zatanna nodded. "It's not bad. And with my life being what it is, becoming fat just isn't that big of a deal."

"Would you like me to help you gain?" Mary asked, much to the disgust of Selina.

Zatanna grinned at her offer and nodded. "Sure!"

Selina groaned and plopped her fat body on a nearby couch, rubbing her temples.

"I have a headache," Selina barked at Zatanna in disgust, "Have you found a way to switch us back yet?"
12511222.title: Chubby Compensation

choices: Selina woke up to find the pair of them stuffed beyond belief.
A week later, Penguin finally found Zatanna, along with his own magical aid.
125112221.content:
Selina rubbed her temples even more at the answer as she laid herself fully on her back, staring up at the ceiling. "Can you at least tell me when you think you'll have an answer?" Selina finally asked.

"A month, maybe two," Zatanna replied.

Selina decided right there and then that a cat-nap was in order, if for no other reason than to jump up and knock Zatanna to the ground for getting her into such a mess. As Selina's obese form slumbered, Zatanna was starting to eat more food, under the watchful eye of Mary Brewer.

"So what you're saying is that I should just stuff myself silly?"

"Yeah, you need to work on building your capacity."

Zatanna nodded and crammed even more into her mouth, round cheeks rounding out further to the sheer volume she had shoved in.

"Um..." Mary asked, watching Zatanna finish her second plate, "Why don't you just make yourself fat with magic?"

"Because it's too easy. You take for granted normal things when you can cause most anything to happen with a wave of a wand or some backwards phrasing." Zatanna patted her round belly, knowing she had plenty of room for more. "Nope. This is going to be all me, with no supernatural assistance!" Mary smiled and patted Zatanna's belly.

"Well, you're off to a great start." Zatanna smiled at the praise.

"So, what about you? Any family?"

Mary shook her head. "Not since I was twenty four. Mom and Dad both died in a plane crash, and I pretty much just turned to food. Pretty soon I was the size I am today and, well, guys don't really like fat chicks."

"I'm sure there's someone out there for you," Zatanna said, passing along a full plate of thick, creamy, cheddar vegetable soup.

"Should I really eat this? Selina will only get upset."

Zatanna scoffed at her comment. "Trust me, with all the stuff that she's done over the years, she deserves a little weight gain! Besides, she's pretty skinny for a girl her age!"

"Is the spell really that complicated, or are you doing this to get at Selina?"

"It really is that complicated. If there was a way to switch you back right now, I'd do it in an instant. But I don't know exactly why it's so hard to undo. I don't know if it's your soul not wanting to return to your body, the difference in size between the two of you, or simply the alignment of the planets. Hell, it could even be all of those combined!"

"I get it, I think. Remind me not to deal with magic again, though."

Zatanna chuckled and nodded, before summoning several extremely large plates packed with pastas, fried chicken, and french fries. Mary smiled as she grabbed a piece of chicken and jokingly pressed it against Zatanna's in a mock toast.

"To the fat life!"

Zatanna grinned and started on her next course.
125112221.title: Mary and Zatanna at Dinner

choices: Selina regained consciousness, finding herself completely alone.
Hours later, Zatanna woke up Selina and planned to rescue Mary.
1251122212.content:
Selina was definitely sweating after her latest sparring match with Mary in the training room, feeling the burn in every inch of her fat body, but she managed to put in a full three hours of sparring that day, making her feel a little better and a little more confident. The sight of her body and the new pounds Mary had gained in a week however, did not, but she still figured that she could easily just slim down when they were back to normal.

Selina had just sat down on the couch, idly noticing Zatanna munching on what looked to be her fourth straight box of donuts, when the front door was blown off its hinges and armed men rushed in.

Zatanna tried some spells but found that her magic had vanished as soon as it touched the men, items around their necks glowing. Zatanna's eyes widened as she recognized the amulets that protected them. "This is bad," Zatanna cried, "My magic won't work on them!"

Selina, after clocking one of the men before he could fire, shouted back. "I noticed!"

Then there was the sound of gunfire, and Selina dropped to the ground, rolling as best she could until she was under a table. Sweat was freely flowing now, Selina panting from all the exertion she had gone through, failing to notice the rapid beat her heart was pounding. Zatanna was knocked out, the magician only managing to down two foes before she had been struck on the back of the head.

Selina herself was soon held at gun-point, not resisting as she was hoisted to her feet and the sound of the Penguin's pleased squawks came to her ears. The crime lord was smoking a cigar as he walked in, noticing the two captives he had caught, swiftly letting loose a cry of displeasure.

"I told you to find Catwoman, not this humongous whale and her chubby little friend!" Selina noticed the amulet around the Penguin's own neck and how it was far bigger than the rest of his goons' own amulets. At least there was one good side to all of this. At least they weren't dead yet. "Well don't stand there staring! Find Catwoman now!"

"Right here, bird-brain!"

Selina fought the urge to roll her eyes at the lame remark as she watched Mary drop from above, clad in one of her black, skin-tight, costumes. Thankfully Zatanna had enlarged it for Mary's use, as she didn't want any hint of her newly gained pudge to spill out so others could see.

As she watched, she was quite impressed at how Mary handled the whip and dealt with multiple armed foes at once. She was actually thinning out the opposition by a large amount. But just before she could take down another henchman, the Penguin lashed out with his umbrella, gas flying from the tip, rendering the fit and agile Mary Brewer unconscious.

That was all Selina got to watch however, as a swift blow knocked her out cold.
1251122212.title: The Penguin's Arrival

choices: Mary decided to use seduction to escape.
Switch back to Zatanna and Selina in the Warrens.
12511222122.content:
Selina stirred awake, realizing that she was being shaken by Zatanna, the now pudgy magician relieved that she was conscious once more. Helping Selina to her feet, slightly struggling due to her tremendous weight, Zatanna showed her a map of Gotham city, a block on the map glowing orange.

"This is the best I can do," she explained, holding the map in front of Selina's wide eyes, "Penguin's amulets must be shielding him from narrowing the search."

"Zatanna, that's in the Warrens!" Selina was clearly distraught. "We could spend days searching that whole block with the amount of buildings there!"

"Well it's the best that I can do, Selina! Now do you want your old body back or not?"

Meanwhile, in an undisclosed location, the Penguin was idly playing with Catwoman's precious whip, waiting to gain a reaction from his prisoner, who was currently tied to a chair, back first to the wall in some old seventeenth century manacles the criminal mastermind received a few jobs earlier.

Noticing his prisoner slowly regaining consciousness, the Penguin, surrounded by two henchmen, addressed the woman who they believed to be the real Catwoman. "Aww, what's the matter kitty?" Cobblepot sarcastically asked, "Normally you'd be upset if someone took your things."

Little did the Penguin realize was that who he believed to be Catwoman was, in fact, Mary Birch, a woman who swapped bodies with the feline some time ago. Deciding that her best bet for survival was if she did not speak, Mary did not respond.

"I'm sure you wouldn't like it if I scarred that smooth skin of yours, would you?" The Penguin brought out his umbrella, pointing it towards his prisoner as a sharp blade poked from the tip, "Because that's what I'm going to do if you don't start groveling for forgiveness for stealing from me. No one steals from Oswald Cobblepot! No one!!"

Again, Mary reacted with silence, and in response, the Penguin gave an avian whark of displeasure, lowering his umbrella in frustration. With his free hand, he delivered a sharp slap across her smooth face, producing a deep cut on her cheek. He was about to deliver another until a third henchman rushed in.

"Boss," he said, "Telephone."

The Penguin however, was not interested. "Can't you see I'm busy?"

"Sorry boss, but this guy says that you owe him a favor."

With that said, the Penguin gave a grunt of displeasure. "I'll deal with you later, kitty," he said as he waddled out of sight, followed shortly by two of his goons. He then turned to face the third goon. "Watch that cat! If anything happens while I'm gone, I'll ring your neck!"

In response, the henchman nodded as he turned their attention to the shackled prisoner, pointing his gun directly at her.

"Hey Catwoman," he noted, examining the prisoner's figure, "I always thought you were slimmer. Been packing on the pounds have we?"

Mary inwardly cheered. After the training that she went through, she was more than comfortable with dealing with the incompetent goon that stood before her. Suddenly her chances of surviving increased. Her only hope was that the Penguin was distracted long enough for her to attempt an escape.
12511222122.title: Penguin's Prisoner

choices: She decided to give the Penguin a piece of her mind.
She decided that Selina and Zatanna's safety were more important.
125112221221.content:
"I admit it," Mary sighed, still posing as Catwoman, "Yes I have, but I don't think it looks bad. What do you think?"

The goon did not expect such a seductive response from the prisoner. He watched as she leaned forward a bit, revealing her exposed cleavage, emphasizing how much her breasts had expanded due to the weight that she had recently gained. The henchman reacted predictably, as intended, and moved closer. He was speechless, clearly mesmerized by the prisoner's overwhelming charms.

Smiling at the henchman's predictable reply, she winked at the flimsy thug. "Hey, handsome," she continued in an incredibly seductive voice, "I could really use a belly rub..."

At first, he was nervous, unsure whether to trust the chubby cat burglar or not, but after glancing back at the door behind him, realizing that his boss was no doubt still tending to others matters, he caved in. Dropping his gun, he took the risk. Reaching out a hand, the man gently touched the gut, bulging from extra weight encouraged by the magician, pressing the flab a bit before he started to rub in smooth, circular motions. His hand was warm, the prisoner's body heat was causing him to sweat. As he became quite enthralled by this, he moved ever closer, to the point where he he even wrapped his free arm over the prisoner's neck and shoulders. Allowing a groan to escape her lips, the woman posing as Catwoman struck.

Little did the henchman realize was that, as he rubbed the prisoner's chubby belly, she already used the sharp tips of her gloves to break the ropes and untie herself and, as the henchman wrapped his arm around her shoulders, she swung her claw, viciously scratching his face. As he struggled back to his feet however, she was already free from her shackles, and before he could react, she had already knocked him out. It seemed that Selina Kyle's tutelage was successful, Mary Birch was taught to almost perfectly imitate the real Catwoman's skills.

Now free from imprisonment however, there was still the matter of escaping from the Penguin's hideout. But then again, what's the rush? The thrill of overcoming the henchman's watchful eye was far too exciting for her to pass up so soon. She was far too confident to put her newly acquired skills to the ultimate test.
125112221221.title: Sizable Seduction

choices: Ronald leaves the stage with Catwomans body.
Zatanna concludes the show and decides what to do.
12512.content:
´Huh why do I feel something between my legs´. ``Wait Zatanna who did you swap me with. Oh no one Selena¨. Wait dont tell me now I`m a guy¨. Well I wont tell you then.
