But then who is inside my body is a overweight man. Who knows what he could do as me. Selena thinks to herself as she watches her body start to wake up. ¨Man what a rush I feel as I had, hey I feel kind of weird more energetic and lighter¨. ¨Yeah thats because your in my body¨. ¨Wait now Im Catwoman! ¨Yes you are now start behaving like it¨.

What he did next did not please Selena as he started to do back flips and moonsaults across the room with his new body.¨Yeah boy this is even better that I had imagined. Think of all the things I could do as Catwoman.¨Dont get to comfortable Zatanna is going to switch us in a few minutes. Isn`t that right Zatanna?

Well I was considering maybe giving you punishment for all the crimes you have committed¨Zatanna said. No you cant be seriously considering such an atrocity! Selena yelled at her angry.
12512.title: She swapped bodies with Ronald Lennon, a fat fa...

1252.content:
After the blinding flash, Batgirl was in a state of shock. She rubbed her eyes in disbelief as she felt a sudden chill across her body, but there was no doubt about it. There she was, feeling as bare as ever, gazing at what was her own body passed out on the floor! She looked down at herself, realizing that her skin was green and coated with leaves. She waved a lock of red hair from her face. To her horror, she was trapped in the body of Poison Ivy!

She could not remember how such a thing could have happened. All she could remember was that she was chasing Ivy through what appeared to be some kind of mall in the middle of the night until she was blinded by a mysterious flash of light, and when she came to, she was stuck in this form.

That was when someone else burst into the scene, someone else who was involved in Ivy's plot that night.

At the moment of her realization of what had just happened, Harley Quinn came crashing in, in style, driving a luxury sports car through the mall with total disregard for her own safety. She left a complete wreckage behind her as she pulled up right before her.

"Long time no see Red," said Harley with a jumpy voice as she swung the door open, offering her a ride.

Well, as much as she hated it, Cassandra knew that she had no other choice. As much as it bothered her to leave her own body behind, and as much as she hated the idea of socializing with the clown girl, she knew that she could not jeopardize the situation already. There would be no way she'd be able to survive in society in the body of the eco-terrorist.

However, this was not the only reason why she decided to join Harley Quinn that night, as she would soon find out...
1252.title: Batgirl's Regrets

12521.content:
"Hey Red, you don't look to good. Need me to buy ya some new shampoo?"

Harley Quinn was right to question who she believed to be her partner in crime, completely unaware that her friend was being possessed by the mind of Cassandra Cain, also known as Batgirl.

Batgirl was cringing, trying to resist some kind of urge in her mind. It almost felt like Ivy's personality was slowly trying to take over.

"Don't worry about me I'm fine," she suddenly replied in a soft seductive voice, very similarly to the eco-terrorist, "Shall we just call it a night?"

"You kidding? We're done shopping now?" Harley was slightly worried that she would give such a suggestion, "We haven't tried that new mall on the other side of town yet!"

Again, Batgirl was struggling to resist Ivy's control. Although their physical battle was over, it seemed like Batgirl and Ivy were still fighting now inside Ivy's head.
12521.title: Poisonous Memories

125212.content:
Eventually Harley conceded, and drove back to their hideout. They pulled into an abandoned fairground on the edge of the city, where Batgirl, trapped in Poison Ivy's body, began having sudden flashbacks, not of her own past, but of Ivy's. She suddenly remembered that she had arranged a deal with the clown prince of crime himself, the Joker!

"I'll be back now Red, just gotta catch up with my puddin'." Harley skipped off further into the fairground as Batgirl sat alone in the car.

Alone, she started to think of the dark knight. Her only hope of figuring out a way to sort this dilemma out was to contact him, but in the body of such a formidable adversary, would he be able to recognize her? Upon her second thought however, she suddenly felt blistering anger and rage at the mere thought of the caped crusader. She snapped out of it, realizing that it was Ivy once again trying to take over her mind.

"What am I going to do?" she asked herself, "I'm a criminal hiding out with Harley Quinn, and I'm starting to think and act more and more like Poison Ivy!"

Suddenly it came to her. She was in the body of Poison Ivy. This meant that she also had her powers! To test this out, she reached out her hand out of the car, focusing on the dirt below, and suddenly a vine shot from the ground, delicately dancing around her arm. She stepped out of the car and gave it another go, and suddenly a much larger vine burst out and swooped her off her feet.

"Wow," she thought to herself, "This is cool!"

Little did she realize was that the more she used these abilities, the more mental changes she would develop, and the more she would become like Ivy herself.

However, before she could explore her powers any further...
125212.title: New Powers, Old Tricks

12522.content:
After the battle with Cassandra Cain, Poison Ivy sure had a headache from the ordeal. It was a hectic fight that tired her out. Throughout it all, she felt that perhaps she should have created more reinforcements from her plant underlings. She gave it her all, and she felt tired enough to surrender before getting knocked out. Unfortunately, she feels different.

Waking up from the fight, Poison Ivy looks around the room, strangely eager to have another go against Batgirl. That girl will pay for ruining her plans, she thought. Immediately, she gets to her feet, determined to prepare for any tricks that her foe plans to dish out. Poison Ivy scans the area, only to realize that Batgirl isn't in sight. Angered an on the offence, she yells out "alright, come out bat-brat before my sweet greens get the better of you." Strangely, she stops after saying it after realizing the strange voice. Irritated, she cries out "Are you copying me!? You bat creeps are getting annoying!" Pamela realizes something. The voice is coming from her! Confused, she looks down at herself and notices the black costume present on her body. She looks at her hands and instead of it being her usual tan skin, it is instead covered in black. Pam moves them around, still unsure, only to see that they move well enough to her will.

Scared by her looks she squeals "Oh dear, I'm bat-boob! Why am I in the body of batboob!" She jump back in shock, only to realize that she moves back a great distance from her spot. Batgirl's peak physique is truly amazing. Pam can't handle this. Batgirl is her enemy, not herself. She feels parts of her body and feels the ultility belt, cape, and costume. Everything seems new, yet vaguely familiar. All of this is weird to take in. Trying to think of a solution, she says "Gotta call Harley before things get worse!"

Pam runs off to go find someone. She realizes that she is much faster in this body than in her previous one. Looking at the wall near her, Pam quickly jumps to it and runs on the side of the building. With a shocked expression, all she can say is "How in the world." Thinking of everything, Pam decides to try to cool her mind and quickly makes her way out of the building.

Heading outside to the rooftop, she takes a look at Gotham and all that it has. The city lights illuminate some areas, while there are other places hidden in the shadows. Taking it all in, Pam wonders if she can find Harley and get her to help.

While she does so, something happens. Someone swoops down behind Poison Ivy, catching her off guard. Startled, Pam turns around and sees...
12522.title: Follow Poison Ivy (in Batgirl's body)

125221.content:
"Hey Batgirl, what's going on here?" Stephanie Brown, the Spoiler, salutes her friend. A smile appears on her face after seeing her friend. "Anything new happen?"

Batgirl goes into a shock. "What? Another Batgirl? What is this, a carnival?" She then readies herself in fighting off this doppelganger. Just who is this girl?

Stephanie frowns at Cassie's words. "Oh come on, you know me. I'm Spoiler again. The upbeat heroine ready to take on anything!" She then strikes a power pose, showing how serious she is. Her enthusiastic personality confuses Batgirl.

Pam doesn't want anything to do with her. She clenches her fists and takes a few steps back. "Get away from me! I don't need to deal with another problem today!" Just great, another 'hero' ready to ruin my day, Pam thought.

Spoiler doesn't understand. Why is her friend acting so weird? "What's wrong? We can talk about this." Stephanie walks closer to Batgirl, hoping to comfort her and get answers.

Ugh, such the hero being all goody-goody while making all the other villains look bad, Pam thought. She just can't stand these types of people. It's just irritating! "You know, having another member of the bat family was just what I wanted. After all, it was just the thought I was having the moment I was making my plans. I was all like 'Gee, I sure hope another Batgirl appears. Maybe it will help ruin my plans better'" she says sarcastically. "Don't you have something better to do?"

Worried, Stephanie says to her "Batgirl, don't you remember me? You're the one who helped me get back on my feet to be a part of the bat family. You were the one who inspired me to be better than the person I was before." She points and looks away from Pam in Cassie's body. Deeply hurt, she turns around, trying to hide her sadness.

This strange act gets to Pam. She never intended for this person to get shaken up about it. It's just she doesn't know what's going on. Now it's her fault for unintentionally making some sad.

Pam doesn't trust or like the bat family, yet she realizes that this one holds no anger or intent to attack within her. For some reason, she can just tell by her movements. Despite Pam knowing that the bat family is her enemy, she feels strange in that she can place her trust in the other Batgirl before her. Perhaps if she plays along, she might get answers. Who knows, the two might become good friends. Deciding to give it a try, Pam walks over to Cassie. "I'm sorry, friend. I just don't know what came over me". Steph looks away from Batgirl, still depressed due to Cassie's actions. "You know" Pam starts, "we could..."
125221.title: Stephanie Brown, the Spoiler

1252212.content:
Deciding to give her new life a try, Ivy comforts Spoiler. "Hey, you know what, maybe we can do something together. How about we explore Gotham and see what, uh, evil bad guys are around." She does her best to cheer up Stephanie.

Stephanie looks at her, still with a sad expression on her face. Hearing what Batgirl just told her, Stephanie says "I guess so. Do you think we can be like Batman? You know, become top-notch crime fighters?"

Ivy never really thought this far. Her, of all people, would have to fight off the people she worked with. There were times when she did so due to being double-crossed or felt that they were expendable, but not fight them in an active role. Just what did she get herself into by being in Batgirl's body?

Thinking it over, she questions ust how will she pull it off. This ruse of being this Batgirl feels weird to her. She doesn't have the powers of controlling plants and people alike. All she has is the power of acting like some sort of ninja.

Regardless, now she has a new friend, yet she's some sort of hero. Trying to make a decision, Pam spurts out "Sure we can! We don't need bats anyway! Together, we can do anything!"

Stephanie turns to Cassandra. Right now, she feels happy to hear the words coming from her friend. "You think so!?" Wanting to show how great it is to hear those words, Stephanie hugs Batgirl.

During the hug, Ivy can't help but question why she made an outburst like that. It was like that time when she reactively chose to scale a wall and use some skills that she barely used before. Was her personality mixing with Cassandra's nature? All of this is weird.

Looking at Stephanie, she questions just how much passion she has within and what she can do now. This might be the right thing to do, for now, before she gets her body back. Feeling confident with herself for some strange reason, Ivy says "Let's do it."

Stephanie looks over to Cassandra "Really!? Alright then!" Since Pam doesn't know what else to say, she goes with it. At best, she could try to keep up with whatever Spoiler will make her do. Maybe something good will happen.

Poison Ivy tries to think of an excuse as to why she isn't the same Batgirl Stephanie knows. "Um, but first, you're going to have to teach me how to use this. My mind got a bit messed up in my fight." In her mind, she hopes that Spoiler will buy it.

"Oh, alright" Stephanie says. "Remember that you have the batarangs and all the tools in your belt."

Pam stares at her, questioning Spoiler's words. "Oh yeah, great information there. That's sure going to help me oh so much."

Stephanie pulls out her grapple gun. "You see this, point at a building and shoot it. Then you'll be flying through Gotham with ease."

Pam can't believe what she's hearing. She, Poison Ivy, has to go through Gotham by flying around like a crazy person. "You seriously think I'm going to go do all that craziness."

Spoiler chimes in to convince Batgirl. "Don't worry, you have me by your side." Turning away from Batgirl, she says "Now off we go, Batgirl! There's crime afoot!"
1252212.title: explore gotham.

12522121.content:
Meanwhile at a warehouse, a group of henchmen are working on something for their boss, Lynx, the Chinese female crime boss who took the mantle of the older one. She is serious in her efforts in gaining control of the operations that happen in Gotham. Her skills are great in combat and in communication. As leader of the Golden Dragons, Lynx makes sure that her henchmen are able to carry out the tasks she gives them. Any insubordination will be dealt with swiftly and given no remorse.

They work to manufacture themselves some weapons in a potential fight against Red Hood. He has been known to cause some trouble for the villains in Gotham. Not only that, but Black Mask and other crimelords want to gain control over certain parts of Gotham. They might see Lynx as a nuisance and take what she has from her. Lynx just wants to ensure that she is not one of them. With her weapons, Lynx plans on be ready for the confrontation.

While everyone is busy working, the bat-family work their way inside. Stephanie guides Batgirl through the warehouse, seeing as how she hasn't been herself lately. They stay hidden from view, trying to find a good spot for any potential take-downs or intel-gathering.

Creeping on the people, they are shocked at what's going on. For some reason, it appears as though they are mixing weapons with technology. Poison Ivy scans the area and tries to see what else is going on. She soon stops after seeing a buff android not doing anything. It appears to be shut off. But from Poison Ivy's memory, she remembers it vaguely. It was a robot that was sent to attack the Justice League and almost succeeded. It could copy any League member's power and use it as its own. They called it AMAZO and it proved to be a threat. Just what could one of those robots be doing in Gotham, she wonders.

At best, Batgirl might know something about this whole operation. Nervously, she asks "Hey Batgirl, just what exactly is going on?"

Putting a finger on her lip, Stephanie replies "Batgirl, we need to keep our voices down. Who knows what they might do when they find us."

"Oh, sorry" Poison Ivy says calmly. To think she would be on the other end of this whole situation. It feels weird and strange. First being in a Batgirl's body and now trying to pretend to be the hero until she finds where her real body is.

"We have to fan out and see what they are up to. Batman's gotta know what they are planning" Spoiler tells Batgirl. Although Batgirl has acted a little weird, she trusts her enough to carry out her task.

Together, the two continue their investigation. Hopefully they might put a stop to this operation before it gets worse and weird.
12522121.title: Meanwhile at a warehouse...Somewhere else

125221211.content:
Separated from Spoiler, Poison Ivy does her best to snoop around. As a villain who has put men under her sway and people to obey her, she knows how to get around. Even though she is trapped in the body of Cassandra Cain. If she had her powers, Poison Ivy would just come in, smack someone, control people, and set off on a possibly good day. Either way, she is still curious as to what might happen with these goods present.

Making her way around, she manages to hear a conversation going on. Some of the workers are discussing how they plan to integrate Ivo's work into being used by anyone wielding their work. It's very vague, and Poison Ivy is unsure of it all. She wants to get closer and see what they are up to. So far, she hears how they are making a suit that will be used by others to combine the AMAZO robot with some other person.

Doing this seems interesting, like stealing some gold from people, but without the mind control and plant powers. It was often fun with Harley around. Together they would cause mischief and mayhem, ready to see what the world has to offer. It was a good life they lived, but Poison Ivy is not in her body anyway. The question is, whether or not Cassandra is still dormant within her body or, somehow in hers. If that's the case, she might be trying to get her friend and idiotically herself arrested.

Behind her, watching in the shadows, someone appears to be standing there. "Looks like I caught a little spy" says the person hidden from view.

Harley doesn't know what's going on. Should Batgirl be in her body, she might get herself arrested along with Harley. After all Batman and the other heroes wouldn't resort to being evil, would they? What if Batgirl is in her body and doing a better job of being a villain? What if she's out there seducing people and getting her way just because she's a heroine trapped in a villain's body? She could even be more of a best friend to Harley, and that's something that might stop Batgirl from giving her back her body should she like that role. Thoughts race through Poison Ivy's mind as she tries to find answers.

Poison Ivy realizes something. She has got to get her body back instead of playing hero with Spoiler. After all, the girl can do this on her own without her help. Set on ditching the heroine, Poison Ivy prepares to leave. Crawling away, she makes sure no one can hear a sound.

As she moves away from the criminals, she soon bumps into someone. She gets startled, wondering who she bumped into. "I can't believe you're here of all people. Geez, try to put some effort" says the voice. It's feminine, and familiar to Poison Ivy. Looking at the person she bumped into, she sees Spoiler standing before her.
125221211.title: something happens

choices: Something is wrong. Batgirl's lost it!
What did she do to get her mad?
1252212111.content:
Poison Ivy gets nervous and tries to stay cool. She doesn't want Spoiler to know about her leaving to get back her body. She has to play it cool. "Oh hey, uh, Spoiler. So what info did you get?"

Spoiler looks at Batgirl without answering her question. She immediately grabs Batgirl's costume. "You're so nosy that it's even annoying." From Spoiler's voice, she can hear a spiteful tone, one that shows some strange anger.

She then smacks Batgirl across the face and sends her falling to the floor. Poison Ivy can't believe that she got hit like that, especially from Spoiler. "I've always hated the look of your costumes Batgirl. At least it covers your stupid face."

Poison Ivy tries to control the situation. After all, she is still Spoiler's friend. "Woah Spoiler, it's me Batgirl. I'm your friend, remember?" She then looks at her friend.

Spoiler then laughs, ignoring her pleases. "You really are stupid. Friend? More like trashcan." She then walks over to the fallen Batgirl and punches her in the stomach. Poison Ivy gags in pain, not knowing why this is happening. "To think I would stick around you, believing you were worth the team up. Guess I was wrong." With Spoiler preparing another strike, Poison Ivy instinctively blocks her fist and kicks her away.

Thinking that Spoiler has gone crazy from Bat-flu or whatever disease she caught, Poison Ivy tries to run. Behind her, she hears Spoiler chuckle. As she runs, she realizes that everything around her changes. All the lights that were present are shut off. Poison Ivy knows that Spoiler is behind her. Turning around, she sees only one light present, revealing just Spoiler and herself. "Running my town and thinking you're all that? I should've taken care of you a long while ago. You're just useless."

Poison Ivy can't believe this. Spoiler might actually kill her. To think that the once cheery girl ends up becoming all menacing and hateful. All of this is just weird and strange. For some reason, she can't help but feel that things are a little bit off.
1252212111.title: play it cool

12522121111.content:
Poison Ivy tries to gather herself. Just what has gotten into Spoiler. She was fine at first, but now she apparently is mad at her.

Spoiler walks over to her, still strangely angry and pissed off. Her footsteps get louder as she closes in on Batgirl.

Poison Ivy gets a bit scared. She doesn't know what to do. But then again she realizes something. She's a villain, one of Batman's greatest foes. Even if she is not herself right now, she can still kill and dispose of her enemies. Spoiler has gone mad and she needs to be put down. If she doesn't then Poison Ivy's life might be on the line.

Getting up, Poison Ivy prepares herself. Tonight, as her life depends on it, she might just kill a bat member. Raising her fists up, she readies herself. She knows that she can win if she gives it her all. Her eyes lock onto Spoiler, a potential threat.

Spoiler gets hit by an attack. She staggers a bit and tries to regain herself. Before she can get a good look at what hit her, strangely, another Spoiler appears before her, punching and kicking her down. The Spoiler that was going to kill of Batgirl falls to the floor and lies unconscious. Strangely, her form shifts from the girl in the costume to that of another woman with pink hair.

The real Spoiler turns to Batgirl, checking on her condition. "That's not me Batgirl, that's Fay Moffit, Lady Spellbinder." Poison Ivy then gives a sigh of relief, almost having to resort to killing someone like Spoiler. In a way, she is just like Harley to her, which makes her wonder how she is doing so far. Hopefully she took care of her plants while she was gone.

She then looks at Spoiler and is curious about what she has to do now. Spoiler looks at her, trying to regain composure. "We need to put a stop to these guys before things get really kicking."
12522121111.title: Something is wrong. Batgirl's lost it!

choices: Daily Planet, Not So Daily Situation
1253.content:
During a trip to the Daily Planet in Metropolis, Bruce Wayne finds no trace of his good friend Clark Kent. Believing him to be in danger, he enlists the help of Clark's spouse, Lois Lane, to uncover the mystery behind his disappearance. They stay in the Daily Planet late at night to continue their investigation. During their investigation however, they discover a rare piece of kryptonite in Clark's workspace, and upon touching it, Bruce and Lois suddenly swap minds! Believing that this piece of kryptonite could be responsible for Clark's disappearance, Bruce and Lois must now cope with each other's bodies and lifestyles as they now seek to not only find a way to return to their normal bodies, but to find and rescue Superman.

Back in Gotham City, during a fateful incident, Tim Drake suddenly finds himself trapped in the body of one of the dark knight's bitter foes, Harley Quinn. While the former psychiatrist enjoys her time as the caped crusader's beloved sidekick, Tim struggles to cope as the girlfriend of one of the most feared criminals in Gotham. Does Batman suspect that Robin is not himself? Does the Joker discover the true identity behind his girlfriend? Can they figure out a way to return to their original bodies? Or are they doomed to live out the rest of their lives?

Which story would you like to follow?
1253.title: Even More Body Swap Stories

choices: Their minds change over time to fit their new bodies.
12531.content:
While most people wouldn’t expect it, considering their respective reputations, Bruce Wayne and Clark Kent were good friends. For all they didn’t have in common, it was out-numbered by what they shared: a love for justice, a belief in doing their part to help others, and the struggle to separate a fantasy life and their real life. Though which was which for the last point was different between the two. Still, it was because of all that that, after nearly two months on no contact, Bruce was getting worried for his boy-scout friend. Luckily, this just so happened to coincide with a trip to Metropolis for Wayne Enterprises, and as a stockholder in the Daily Planet, Bruce thought checking in with Clark at work shouldn’t be too much of a problem.

There was only one problem: no one had seen Clark either. It wasn’t as bad as a few months, but from what Bruce could gather from some of his coworkers, Clark had started acting odd about two weeks ago, and then a few days after that, started calling in sick. Lois had done the same shortly afterwards. Bruce Metropolis secret headquarters wasn’t as advanced as the Batcave, but he was still able to look online, and in the process he couldn’t find hide nor hair of the Kryptonian Kansan.

That left really just one option: detective work at the apartment. Once night fell, Bruce became Batman, and entered the apartment using a special key he’d been given, one that bypassed the normal defenses Clark had set up. But he hadn’t stepped two feet into the apartment before being tackled by someone. The lights were all off, and Batman was so blindsided by the attack it took him a moment to realize who it was. “Where’s Clark? Start talking, or I swear to God I’ll...” Lois Lane’s voice trailed off as she realized who she’d just tackled. “Oh, it’s you. Good, maybe you can help me find a lead, Bruce.”

Ever since Clark had told Lois about his caped second life, it hadn’t been long before she’d learned who Bruce Wayne really was as well. At first, Batman hadn’t appreciated this, but it hadn’t taken long for him to realize that Clark’s wife was trustworthy, as much so as Alfred. Fixing her with a look that wasn’t quite as hard and harsh as his usual fare, Batman replied, “What do you know?” Rolling her eyes at him, Lois pointed to a nearby wall, where she’d clearly been brainstorming connections. It didn’t take a lot of looking to gather that Clark’s odd behavior seemed to have begun after staying late at the Daily Planet Office. A closer look at Lois showed she was dressed in black, clearly aiming for stealth. Without a word, the two set off to find out what had happened to Clark.

Their investigation of the office began after the last janitor left the building, and together they carefully tore the office apart for clues. They were coming up empty, until they reached Clark’s desk. In the bottom drawer, which only Lois had a key for, they found something that looked familiar: a green rock. But why would Clark have Kryptonite in his desk? Lois picked it up, then offered it to Batman. “Any clue what...” she started to say, as he took the rock in his gloved hand. But in that moment, everything changed, as their perspectives changed completely. Suddenly, each was standing where the other once was, and they quickly realized they were in each-other’s bodies.
12531.title: Daily Planet, Not So Daily Situation

choices: Let’s follow Lois, investigating the rock.
Let’s follow Bruce, getting ready in the morning.
125312.content:
In the second of the changeover, both of them let go of the rock, sending it tumbling through the air. With trained reflexes that she herself never trained, Lois Lane in Batman’s body quickly reached out to catch it again, before staring down at her batsuit-clad body. “My God...” she whispered, her voice coming out far lower and more gravely than she’d ever experienced before.

While she was still holding it, Batman reached out with the feminine hand of Lois Lane’s body to touch the rock again, but nothing happened. Fixing the beautiful face he now possessed in a grim scowl, Batman growled, “It looks like repeating the circumstance doesn’t fix the problem.” The tone of voice sounded completely wrong in the feminine, husky voice of the body he was in, but if Batman cared about that, he didn’t show it. With a gloved hand, he pointed to one pocked in particular of the utility belt on Lois’s waist. “There are plastic bags in there. Contain the sample so I can analyze it at my lab.”

Lois found Batman was telling the truth, and soon was holding onto the green rock in a sealed plastic bag. Raising an eyebrow and adding more humor than was often found in the Dark Knight’s voice, Lois asked, “Don’t you mean my lab? I know your crazy level of security, Batman, and that means that there’s no way you can get into it in my body. Plus, I run out of sick days tomorrow, so unless you want to start using your billionaire bucks to pay for Clark and my apartment, you’ll need to go to work in my body.” When Batman gave her a sharp glare, Lois laughed. “Don’t forget, I’m an investigative journalist. With your body, money, and connections, I’m sure I can crack this case in no time.”

As much as Batman didn’t want to admit it, she was right. Thanks to the biometric scanners, there was no way for Lois Lane’s body to get into his lab, and even if he’d never admit it, he didn’t want to be responsible for making Lois lose her job. That didn’t mean Batman had to like it. Gritting the teeth in a mouth far smaller than he was used to having, Batman told her, “The only password you’ll need is ‘League of Assassins’. Your retinal scan and a DNA test should take care of the rest.” Then, he gave her the actual address, and Lois told him what story she was currently assigned to, a case of corruption in the prosecutor’s office in Metropolis, possibly tying them to Intergang.

The two headed in their separate ways. Lois spent the night actually getting into the secret lab. It took some time getting a hold of traveling around the city by way of grappling hooks and running over rooftops, but after a while it started to come to her naturally. Meanwhile, Bruce returned to the Kent apartment and decided to try and get some sleep, since it was likely this body couldn’t take the sleep deprivation he was used to. Sure enough, the second Bruce’s head hit the pillow, he was out like a light.
125312.title: Switching Roles

choices: He quickly finds the evidence he needs, along with New God tech.
While searching, Bruce is interrupted by Mr. Rell coming in.
1253122.content:
It seemed that, unlike Bruce’s body, Lois’s was used to waking up a certain time. Ah, the wonders of a functioning circadian rhythm. Almost like he was on autopilot, Bruce got out of Lois and Clark’s bed, went into the bathroom, and got ready for work. Bruce normally had some make-up skills, necessary for disguises and public appearances, but the way he got Lois’s face ready in the mirror was completely professional, like he’d done it a thousand times. Once that was done, he quickly picked out an outfit for the day and went over to her laptop, where his fingers quickly and precisely input the correct code to unlock the device.

It was then that Bruce stopped, looked at Lois’s hands, and scowled. It seemed there was more to this body swap than just the bodies. More than that, the body was influencing Bruce’s mind, though so far only in subtle ways. He feared if it would go further. Still, there was nothing he could really do about it, right then and there. So, he pulled up the computer files on what Lois had dug up on her current assignment so far. Apparently, Mack Rell at the Metropolis Prosecutor’s Office was likely working in conjunction with Intergang. So far, Lois had collected some spurious testimony, but nothing that would hold up in an article or in court.

Immediately, he knew the perfect thing to try next: infiltrating the man’s office. Bruce left the apartment, locking the door behind him, and headed out to drive there, only to realize Lois didn’t have a car. With no other choice, he hailed a cab, doing his best to ignore the leers the driver gave him the whole way there. Once at the building of law and order, Bruce quickly came up with a game plan on the fly, rather than his usual method of planning everything out ahead of time. Walking up to the receptionist, a handsome young man who looked to be just out of college, Bruce fluttered his eyelashes and made sure the man got just a hint of his cleavage. “Hello, I’m here to pick up an important package from Mr. Rell. Is he in?”

As Bruce knew from Lois’s notes, the man was at a meeting right now, but the flustered receptionist let Bruce in anyway. Once inside, he strutted through the office, looking like he belonged there, until he found the correct office. It was locked, but that was nothing to stop either Lois Lane or Bruce Wayne. Pulling out a miniature lockpick set the reporter kept on her person, Bruce used it expertly to open the lock with no fuss and no witnesses. Once in the office, he started searching, looking for anything he could use in an article.
1253122.title: A New Day

choices: Continue with Tim in Harley's body
Check in with Harley in Tim's body at Wayne Manor
12532.content:
Tim Drake was exhausted, but he forced himself to stay up with Alfred just a little while longer. With Batman visiting Metropolis, he had been forced to take on The Joker earlier that night. He had fortunately managed to capture the fiend, but Harley Quinn had gotten away. He had also managed to secure the abandoned warehouse and the strange chemicals inside. What Tim couldn't piece together was the plan. He couldn't figure out how The Joker planned to distribute these chemicals or even what they did. That's what he was studying now. Unfortunately, he couldn't figure it out. Hours of work, and all he and Alfred could determine so far was that they were non-toxic. With that discovery, Alfred pressured Tim to get some sleep.

"Master Drake," He explained, "Your exposure to these chemicals was quite minimal, and now that we know they aren't dangerous, it would be best to get some sleep and have a fresh start in the morning."

"The chemicals may not be toxic, that doesn't mean they don't pose some sort of danger. With The Joker, you know there's got to be a twist." Tim retorted, "But I suppose you're right. I could use some sleep."

And so Tim retired to a room in Wayne Manor. But it didn't feel like he slept long. He awoke to the sound a police siren. 'An odd noise at Wayne Manor,' he thought, but then he looked around and realized he certainly wasn't in Wayne Manor. It was a small apartment, quite small and trashy. He wondered how he got here. He started stumbling around in the dark, feeling something quite off to his steps but unable to place what it was.

He couldn't find a light switch until he entered the bathroom. As he flicked it on, he was shocked at what stared back at him from the mirror: A stunning blond woman in a white t-shirt and short sweats.

"Excuse me, Miss," He said. Then he realized the reflection mouthed the same words he spoke. It dawned on him: He had swapped bodies with this woman.

Examining the reflection just a little closer, he noticed the tips of either end of his blond hair dyed black and red. There was some pasty white makeup on the edge of his neck that hadn't fully been washed off for the night. His heart began to sink. The face was hard to recognize without the costume and makeup, but he certainly knew who he was now -- Tim Drake had somehow swapped bodies with Harley Quinn!
12532.title: Sidekick Swap

125321.content:
Tim was in utter shock, but he knew he had to act fast to get to Wayne Manor. If he was in Harley's body, it was very likely she was in his, and that could have all sorts of terrible consequences. She could figure out his secret identity or harm Alfred!

He decided he could manage on the street in Harley's sleepwear, but he did need some shoes. The only ones he could find were obviously part of her clownish outfit. They were tall boots with heels, each side of each boot having a different color. He imagined it would take forever just to lace them, but what choice did he have?

Once he got them on, they were a little awkward to walk in. However, it wasn't long before they felt natural; Harley's body was probably used to them even in his mind wasn't. And a bit of resourcefulness got him to Wayne Manor in no time.

He needed a plan. Was he going to secure Alfred's safety first or confront Harley in his body?
125321.title: Continue with Tim in Harley's body

1253211.content:
Tim was on the outskirts of Wayne Manor after a bus ride from the inner city out to the more rural area where Bruce's parents commissioned their family estate to be constructed. Tim had been the boy wonder for long enough for Batman to trust him to hold the fort while he was away. Robin knew all the ins and outs of the mansion's security systems and guard details. It was very rare that the Dark Knight left Gotham in the hands of his apprentice, so Robin could only imagine how disappointed Bruce would be if he came back to see this mess. He had to fix it! (From now on, I'm going to refer to Robin with female pronouns for the duration of the body switch.)

Robin stealthily hid in the shadows as she moved from cover to cover. All the while evading the sight of several security personnel. Well, she moved as stealthy as one could move while wearing high heeled boots. While she was infiltrating the manor, it felt strange how she had studied all the security flaws of this home with the intent of knowing how to keep criminal scum like Harley Quinn out. Yet here she was, breaking in. Tim climbed up the vines on the side of the household. She had some trouble at first both due to the unnecessarily effeminate footwear and her body's new center of gravity. "Ow!" Robin swore in Harley's high pitched voice as a few thorns pierced her t-shirt and ripped the fabric clear across the chest.

Once on the rooftop with a huff, she realized that learning to maneuver this new body to do her usual acrobatic fighting style would be a pain. She sighed and blushed slightly when she examined the tear in her shirt exposed a prominent amount of cleavage. Thankfully, she wore a lacy black bra underneath. In a women's body or not, Robin was a man on the inside and she had to appreciate the size of the breasts Harley had. Batman trained Robin to be heavily resistant to seduction after encountering Catwoman and Poison Ivy. Yet, this was her body now, at least until she can fix it. A slight temptation beckoned her to explore her new form. A dainty hand snaked its way up her toeso and she just felt it for a moment, blushing as she inhaled deeply.

"Snap out of it!" That sounded weird coming from Harley's voice. She shook her head and regained focus. "Alfred!" She whispered, remembering the urgency of her situation. She never lost focus like that in her actual body! Robin quickly unfastened the hidden lock on the skylight and she dropped down into the dark dining room. The light was still on from the kitchen and she overheard Alfred putting some food away. Robin was uncertain if she should just approach him in this form or if there was a better way of doing this.

However, before she could make that decision, the light to the dining room was on and she was face to face with a very confused Alfred. The elderly man had frozen in shock for a moment and immediately turned around, walking at a brisk pace. He was going to go set off the alarm that would notify Batman that Wayne Manor was compromised. "Wait, Alfred! Wait!" She chased after him, almost tripping on her heels. "Who are you and how do you know my name?!" He backed away, raising his arms defensively. "Alfred! It's me! Tim! Tim Drake!" Alfred coiled a brow at that remark but returned to his serious frown. "That's preposterous! Clearly you are ill, young lady. You need professional help!" Alfred didn't believe her.

"Alfred, I can prove it!" Robin got an idea. She headed over to the large grandfather clock. Alfred chased after her. "Hey! You get back here!" Robin ignored him as she turned the clock's hands to a precise time. The clock moved to the side on its own and revealed a secret stairway that led down to the batcave. "10:47PM, the exact time of night Bruce's parents were murdered." Tim stated confidently. "H-how could you possibly know—Master Tim?" Alfred finally believed him after a brief pause. "H-how... why...?"

"Alfred, listen to me. I went to bed like you told me to and I woke up in Harley Quinn's body! We need to capture Harley in my body before I—she—he—whatever, does some serious damage!" Robin told Alfred frantically. He nodded. "Then there is no time to waste..."

Together, the dynamic duo headed to Tim's room. What did they find?

13.content:
The women of Gotham city had endured a lot of physical changes over the years. From gaining massive muscles to turning into a blob of fat, these changes however have provided them with both great advantages and ridiculous flaws.

Ever since the incident at Arkham Asylum, the infamous Titan formula had become the desire of the Joker. Unknown to the dark knight, the Clown Prince of Crime had been conducting experiments, desperately attempting to replicate the Titan formula to its former perfection. When the caped crusader caught on however, it was now or never. Before Batman could subdue the Joker once again, he had no other option but to inject his beloved girlfriend, Harley Quinn, with the formula, with tremendous results.

An unnamed scientific program had recently been conducting experiments to manipulate Venom, the same chemical used to enhance the super criminal, Bane. After learning that tests were being conducted on animals, the elusive burglar, Catwoman had to interfere. During her infiltration however, the dark knight arrived on the scene, only to realize that he was too late. Incidentally, Catwoman injected herself with the serum, rapidly expanding her muscles, increasing her immense strength, and reducing her concepts of good and evil.

On another occasion however, Catwoman learned that the deadly duo, Harley Quinn and Poison Ivy, were developing a new chemical that they intended to use to steal priceless jewelry. Anticipating a piece of the action, Catwoman found herself walking into a trap, where Harley and Ivy intended to lure the feline into the clutches of their new weapon, a large, movable plant with tentacles capable of filling a human being with a strange substance until they were completely obese and immobile.

Using a similar formula to that which Ivy used against her however, Catwoman would once again roam through the streets of Gotham city, anticipating the perfect opportunity to utilize her latest secret. When Batgirl answered the call, with the intention to subdue the cat burglar once again, Catwoman had other plans. Batgirl was horrified when Catwoman unleashed her hidden weapon against her, inflating her to the size of a round, immense blob of fat. Now under the mercy of the dreaded Catwoman, Batgirl had to endure the bitter humiliation in her vulnerable state.

So which story would you like to follow?
13.title: Expansion Stories

132.content:
Catwoman was perched on a rooftop near the research building. She needed to find a way inside the building and free the animals that were being tested on. Observing the entrances, she mentally weighed her options. She could find herself a disguise and slip in through the main entrance and find the animals that way. Or she could use the air ducts to avoid being spotted. Deciding that she did not want to risk being recognized, she jumped to the roof of the building and use a nearby vent to get in.

On another nearby rooftop, Batman was watching her enter the air duct. He had also heard about the testing and knew Catwoman would come as well. While he knew the tests were illegal and needed to be stopped, he also knew that Catwoman would be angry and try to kill the scientists. He needed to get in there fast. Grappling over to the roof, Batman entered the building through the roof maintenance door.

In the building, Catwoman made her way to the main lab, knocking out the guards along the way. She entered the lab and found it to be deserted save for the animal cages. One by one, she opened the doors to the cages and freed the animals. She had just opened the last cage when she noticed one of the syringes on the table. Inside was the Venom that was being tested. She picked it up and looked it over, trying to decide whether to keep it for herself, sell it, or destroy it. Before she could decide, she heard footsteps. Surprised, she turned quickly and accidentally stabbed herself in the arm with the syringe, injecting the Venom into her. Not noticing, she looked around the lab for an exit. She noticed a vent in the ceiling, a window, and a service door. Deciding quickly, she used...
132.title: New Bane On the Block

choices: Selina tried her best to resist, but several hours later, she caved in.
Selina managed to resist until the following morning.
Harley Quinn had something else in mind.
133.content:
Selina Kyle's form trembled with rage and humiliation as she watched her old rivals walk towards her. Poison Ivy had a smirk on her face, while Harley Quinn was smiling widely at Catwoman.

If she could have, Selina would have scratched the pair of them right there and then but, unfortunately, she could not.

She had fallen right for their trap, landing on what she assumed to be a darkened warehouse floor only to be trapped on all sides by a plant. Some kind of stalk then dropped from above and entered her mouth. What followed was the sweetest liquid Selina had ever tasted. The insidious nature of the liquid soon revealed itself as Catwoman started to blimp up.

And it wasn't like she was being filled with air or some of the crazier things she had heard about in dives all over Gotham, oh no.

Selina Kyle was now over eight hundred pounds of woman, every inch of her bulging with fat!

Immobile, ashamed, and wondering what the pair were going to do to her, Catwoman waited as they reached her vulnerable fat belly.

"My, my, Selina," Ivy smirked, drumming her fingers along Catwoman's massive multiple-rolled gut, "You've really let yourself go!"

"Yeah, we should be calling you Fat Cat or something now!" Harley added, grinning as she poked the immobile burglar.

"I'm going to kill the both of you for this!" Selina roared, her voice deeper thanks to all the fat around her throat.

"You wouldn't want to do that, Selina."

"Or what?"

"Or no one will feed you," Poison Ivy explained, "We're on the outskirts of Gotham and the clown has just escaped Arkham. Batman has his hands full and won't be coming to rescue you. Besides, that concoction my lovely plant stuffed you so full of and caused you to become this blob of fat has permanently altered your cellular structure. Now it's as if you've always been this size your entire life. You could exercise for a hundred years and never weigh any less than you do now! Besides, you should be feeling hungry very soon."

As if in response to Ivy's exposition, Selina's stomach did let loose with a mighty growl, causing Harley's eyes to widen.

"Holy cow! You have a monster in you Kitty!"

Selina blushed as she struggled to maintain what was left of her composure.

"So I'm a little hungry, Catwoman snarled in response, "So what?"

Ivy laughed at her remark and turned around, grabbing Harley by the arm and taking her along as they left Selina alone.

"We won't feed you until you beg for it Selina. So just stew in the dark until you're a broken mess. We have tons of treats just waiting for your hungry belly!"

The lights suddenly went off as the villainous duo vanished from Selina's sight, leaving her alone with a mounting appetite.
133.title: Fat Cat

choices: Batgirl found that she had been fattened up to eight hundred pounds!
Catwoman's formula caused Batgirl to grow over half a ton!
Batgirl was horrified to find that she weighed over a ton!
134.content:
Nightfall came to the city of Gotham, and as was the norm for her, Batgirl found herself swinging and gliding across the rooftops. With the dark knight tackling the criminal masterminds of the city, and with the boy wonder busy with his studies, she was alone during her patrol, at least for the moment.

She didn't seem to mind, even when a slow day like this made the hours drag on far longer than if she were actually tracking or trailing some criminal activity. She paused atop of a building in the central section of the city, around her position were a few well-known businesses. She didn't need experience to know that it was more often than not a hotbed of crime.

Scanning the locales, a slight smile appeared on her lips as she came to spot on a familiar figure, the elusive burglar, Catwoman. The dark spandex-wearing woman quietly and expertly was in the middle of breaking into one of the city's most well-known jewelry stores. It figured that the lady always had a cat's eye for anything remotely shiny or valuable. Waiting for her to break in, Batgirl figured it was time she did the same.

Disabling the security system was a little too easy for the cat burglar. Her prize was a jeweled cat figure, imported from Egypt, worth reportedly half a million dollars.

Arrive, steal, leave. Her task was so easy.

On instinct, she dodged a Batarang aiming straight for the small of her back. "Figures he'd be here," the burglar thought to herself, but as she turned her face felt a much different fist connect around her right cheek. "Well," she remarked, "Not who I figured it'd be!"

"Yeah just like I figured you'd be after the kitty cat in the case!"

"Clever girl."

Pulling out her whip, the cat and the bat exchanged strikes with one another. Their battle continued for several minutes. Selina Kyle was not at all surprised with how well Batgirl was able to keep up with her. She was, after all, a partner to the one and only dark knight. However the bat was unaware of the cat's true intentions. While her eyes were certainly on the prized feline, she had been carrying a little something she was very interested in testing, especially after something similar had occurred to her months ago.

Making a hasty retreat after another quick dodge, Catwoman made for her personal entrance, hoping that her opponent would follow, and follow she did. Outside, Batgirl wondered where Selina had escaped to. Just then, Batgirl gasped as she felt her legs suddenly give out on her, causing the defenseless girl to crash face first onto the rooftop's hard surface, knocking her out cold.

Sometime later, with a troubling headache, Batgirl finally regained consciousness, completely unaware of where she was or what had happened to her.

"Ah, nice to see you've come around." She recognized the voice of Catwoman and, sure enough, the sultry criminal strolled up towards her.

"Where am I?" Barbara asked, her mind still foggy.

"At my place," Selina explained, inching ever closer to her prisoner, " You see, I wanted you to test out something for me and, to be quite honest, it worked just as expected! Perhaps even more so."

"What are you talking about?"

"You my dear...well I suppose there's far more Batgirl than there once was." The cat smiled at the bat's puzzled expression. "See for yourself dear!"

Barbara did as she was told and, upon the sight of her once athletic frame, nearly yelled out in terror.
134.title: Big Fat Bat

choices: Unable to resist her sudden urges, Batgirl began to eat.
Catwoman decided to track down her next target.
1341.content:
Gone was the lean muscle honed after years of training and crime fighting, and in its place was roll after roll of flab. Barbara's largest feature was the rear she was currently sitting on, her butt looking to be nearly five feet wide by itself. Her gut was a mere four feet wide, only mere due to the size of her rear end. Her face had several chins and her cheeks could house an army of chipmunks!

Catwoman purred in satisfaction at the sight of Batgirl, who was only now just realizing what she had become, much to her horror. Running a gloved hand along the fat prisoner's curved stomach, Catwoman squeezed the fat a bit, marveling at just how well her device had worked.

She lifted the item from the R&D section of some big name weapon contractor, stealing the device having been child's play. But to see the results caused her to become giddy.

"Eight hundred pounds," she smirked with delight, "How does it feel, Fat Girl?"

Batgirl simply glared at the thief, unable to pose a threatening response. She wanted nothing more than to knock her lights out, but in such an alarming state, she couldn't even raise an arm. She was completely useless, completely vulnerable.

Catwoman left for a few minutes, only to return with a large bag of assorted food, placing it near her mouth so she could access it.

"Eat up, tubby! I've got some other ladies to test this out on. Have a good meal!"

And with that, the thief was gone, leaving Batgirl alone with a mounting appetite.
1341.title: Eight Hundred Pounds of Batgirl

choices: Continue the story with Harley and Batgirl.
13413.content:
Batgirl stared, almost glaring at the food placed near her mouth. It silently taunted her, almost begging her to eat, the slight rumbles from her big wide belly weren't making things any easier on her hunger refusal. However for the moment her attention would avert from her hunger urges to the sounds of what she believed was a glass vase shattering on the carpet floor near her.

Due to her training she instinctively sat silent, practically mimicking the shape of a Buddha statue, if one was made human size. Just because she had been made stunningly obese didn't mean she had forgotten the skills taught to her by the dark knight.

"Jeez for a cat bugler you'd think she'd have better security..."

She instantly recognized that certain high-pitched tone of voice. It was Harley Quinn! But what was clown prince of crime's right hand girl doing here? Lucky for her Selina had already stepped out.

"...then again, anything can wash off with a bit of grade-A acid from one of puddin's flowers!" This explained how she got in. Given the broken vase however, it was best if Harley left any future break-ins to a professional like Selina. "My, my look at all the shiny prizes kitty cat has in this place," the lady jester stated as she skipped across the room, oblivious to the ballooned heroine, until she suddenly made contact with the fat bat.

"Just my luck..." thought the bat with a look of exhaustion on her thicker face.

"Oh, what's this? Looks like a puffed up Batgirl!" Harley said as she poked away at the fatty flesh that just further aggravated the vulnerable heroine. "Wait a second. It is you, isn't it?"

Her time with the clown prince of crime had ensured that she wasn't the sharpest knife in the drawer. "Well, this is a huge," her sudden laughter earned her a sharp glare, "Pardon the obvious pun, but surprise! I came looking for a little something that kitty stole before Mister J could get his precious hands on it, but instead of finding her, I find a big bloated bat! Ha! Priceless!"

The various fat comments she was subjected to were starting to make Barbara boil over with anger. How she wished she could shut Harley's mouth and do the same to the woman responsible for leaving her in this whole mess.
13413.title: Harley's Surprise Visit

choices: After Batgirl's belly roared, Selina decided that it was feeding time.
Catwoman noticed that Batgirl was still slowly growing.
1343.content:
"What have you done to me?!" Barbara yelled as well as she could, despite the now huskier vocal tone born from the fat that wrapped around her neck, creating several new chins and bulbous cheeks. If she could just wrap her hands around feline thief she'd strangle her until she was blue in the face, but unfortunately that was impossible due to hundred pounds or so weighing her arms down.

The rest of her formerly athletic wasn't spared as everything about her had seemingly blimped to a ridiculous degree. The poor girl was at least twice as wide as she was tall, her butt and belly, the biggest offenders, having spread out multiple feet before and behind her. Her breasts enormous just to a slightly lesser degree yet somehow retained a sense of perkiness, despite being filled to the brim with new found blubber. Although a canyon of cleavage was all the fat bat could make out from her vantage point, her face seemingly drifting in the middle of the blob of fat that was now her body.

The cat smiled at her helpless pray, a glove removed so she could truly get a better feel of how thick the redheaded heroine had become.

"I suppose my little treat got ahead of it's self. I wasn't lying earlier when I said it may have worked better than originally intended."

Selina had pilfered the chemical formula from on-again off-again rival Poison Ivy as a means of payback after Ivy and clown prince of crime's sweetheart, Harley Quinn, made her the victim of their own fattening scheme. Now the cat had a means of revenge against Harley and Ivy, better yet this revision Ivy had apparently been working on was even better than the original, considering how massive and useless it had left Batgirl.

"I must weigh a ton!"

"And you'd be right sweetheart. Well an extra hundred or two above actually," Selina stated after she squeezed a belly roll or two.

She purred with a smile on her lips, the likes of which that made Barbara wish she could crush the woman under her big fat butt.

"Now what shall I do with you, of course now that you've been the perfect guinea pig, perhaps it's high time I get a little revenge..."

Batgirl wondered what she meant. At the same time she reminded herself that unfortunately she was still in the mercy of Catwoman.
1343.title: A Ton of Bat Fat

choices: Stood (or rather sat) her ground and refused
13431.content:
All of a sudden, a near monstrous roar echoed through the room. To anyone who happened to be nearby, it might have sounded like some vicious animal. To Batgirl, the truth was more embarrasing.

"Oh, sounds like someone's hungry." Catwoman said, patting Batgirl's titanic tummy. "Don't worry, I've got the thing to help with that." She then walked over to a nearby door and opened it. It was a closet, and inside was a platter full of sweets. Catwoman picked it up and walked over to Batgirl.

"I had Sweet Tooth whip this up." She said. "Don't worry, I made sure he didn't put any poison or traps in them." She set the tray on Batgirl's massive chest and picked up a scone. Batgirl shut her mouth tight.

"Look, if you don't eat, that hunger's going to drive you mad." Catwoman said. "Believe me."

Batgirl stared at her for a minute, then relented and opened her mouth. Catwoman smiled and placed the scone in Batgirl's mouth. As much as the immobilized heroine didn't want to admit, the scone was delicious. Catwoman started to feed her more treats as she began talking.

"So, you're probably wondering where my little fattening surprise came from. Well, I swiped it from Wayne Industries. Supposed to help with ending world hunger or something." Catwoman said. "But I convinced Crane to do a little alteration to it. He tried to make it so people hit with it became terrified of being skinny, but one threat to claw his face off changed that."

Batgirl was a bit confused while she chewed a donut. "What's the point of this? And what did you mean by revenge?" She asked.

"Didn't anyone tell you it's rude to talk with your mouth full?" Catwoman teased as she fed Batgirl a strawberry shortcake. By this point she had climbed up on Batgirl and was lying on her massive chest. "But to answer your question, Pammy and Harley had something similar. Well, Pammy did anyway. Made me enormous too, though not as big as you right now."

Batgirl swallowed and looked at Catwoman bewildered. "What reason would they have for doing that?" She asked.

"Hell if I know. Maybe they wanted a test subject. Maybe they wanted me out of the way. Maybe it's what Pammy's into." Catwoman replied. "Point is, they made me 800 pounds. Pammy even said it changed my celluar structure so that my body thought I was always that fat, said I could exercise for a hundred years but never lose any weight. But I was cured eventually."

"Wait, you didn't do that to me, did you?" Batgirl asked, now a little worried.

"Of course not. I'm not heartless." Catwoman answered, sticking an eclair in Batgirls mouth. "In fact, I'll even give you a chance to be cured."

"Wait, really?" Batgirl asked, chewing and swallowing the eclair. Then she realized something. "What's the catch?"

"See, I'm not totally sure Crane did a good job with my new little toy, so I want to make sure nothing goes wrong. So, here's the deal. You stay with me for, oh, let's say two weeks. I make sure this works properly, and you get free food." Catwoman explained, climbing off Batgirl now that the tray was empty. "I'd say free bed too, but you seem to be your own bed now."

"And if I say no?" Batgirl asked defiantly.

Catwoman shrugged. "Then I leave. And you get to spend the rest of your life like this." She said, slapping Batgirl's massive belly for emphasis, sending shockwaves across her whole body. It took several seconds for Batgirl to stop shaking. "So, what's your answer, Batgirl?"

Glaring at Catwoman, Batgirl...
13431.title: Treats and a Deal

choices: Catwoman sticks to her word continuing to feed and care after Batgirl
A day or two later Batgirl notices Catwoman's getting pudgy
134311.content:
Batgirl didn't really much of a choice here despite not wanting to comply with Catwoman the redheaded heroine turn blob had to swallow her pride, in the same way she had swallowed those sweets moments ago, and agree with the cat burglar's terms.

"You have me by the claw here so guess I have to agree to staying with you for now."

"Perfect" Catwoman couldn't stop from purring as she pinched a portion of the enormous ginger's belly. "You have my word I'll watch over you as if you were one of my own kitty cats."

"I hope your word actually means something..." Batgirl glared much colder then before in a way stunning the much thinner woman for a moment. It didn't take much for her to know what the fatten hero was getting at.

"Yes...well" Removing her mask the raven-haired woman ran a hand through her short locks of hair "when it comes to cats I always keep my word...as for Bats...well...that's for another time."

Batgirl said nothing in return instead her stomach once again breaking the awkward silence with a slightly less powerful growl then one from before.

"My my keeping you fed is certainly going to be quite a challenge isn't it."

Catwoman stated with a slight amused smile, chuckling later after telling Batgirl to stay put while she got her some more sweets...

The days that followed were surprisingly...peaceful, Catwoman keeping to her word as she would feed the blobbed out heroine morning, noon, and night. There were still many days ahead of her so despite her resentment at the very beginning Batgirl was slowly starting to simply learn to sit back on her tremendous butt and let Catwoman do her thing.

Which was to say feed her trays of whatever it was the slimmer woman would bring with her whenever she would call out that she was hungry. Her massively bloated stomach made her look nine months pregnant and her face was a mess, her smooth, perfect skin smeared with food and dripping milk. She could hardly move under the weight of her overstuffed belly and only the strength of Ivy's vines kept her standing up.

"Full?" Ivy asked, poking a finger into Selina's firm, bloated gut.

All Selina could do was moan in response, letting out a loud belch.

13521211112111.title: Feeding Time

135212111121111.content:
It was a few hours before Selina regained consciousness. With a tired groan, she opened up her eyes and saw that Ivy's plants had engulfed the entire apartment, making it look like a small garden. The windows were completely obscured by moss and the floor was covered in a layer of thick grass that had not been there earlier.

The vines which had kept her bound now seemed to have released their grip and Catwoman was now lying on the floor. The last thing she remembered was feeling incredibly bloated, belching and falling asleep. Ivy's stuffing session had been so intense that she had been unable to stay awake afterwards. She looked down at her body to assess the damage, and was greeted by the sight of a large, spherical belly. She was almost afraid to touch it, she looked like she was nine months pregnant...with twins! As her hands found her stomach, she felt her fingers sink into a soft layer of flab. She wasn't bloated anymore, her taught, food stuffed stomach had been replaced by a fully grown pot belly.

"How the hell did this happen so fast?!" She asked herself as her poked at her doughy middle. "That bitch is going to pay for this."

Suddenly reminded of Ivy, Catwoman sat up, allowing her new pot belly to rest comfortably in her lap. Her thighs looked a little wider than they used to be, but all the weight she had gained seemed to have settled in her stomach. The green leotard that Ivy had loaned her was even tighter than before, and left very little to the imagination. Her sizable breasts were almost overflowing the top of the costume, and Selina couldn't help but notice that they seemed a little larger than before. She struggled to her feet and looked around the room, tip toeing towards the door, which was covered in thick, heavy looking vines.

"Mmmmmm..."

A moaning noise stopped Catwoman in her tracks. She spun around and saw her captor was sleeping on the moss covered couch. Ivy gave another moan of pleasure as she rolled over, exposing her own gut, which looked about twice the size of Catwoman's. Ivy was surrounded with the same fattening foods she had forced Catwoman to consume, and from the looks of it, she had been pigging out since Selina passed out. The plant lady's once slender physique had filled out tremendously, and Selina could see that her clothes were starting to tear apart under the pressure.

"Got to get out of here before I end up like her..."

Creeping silently to the door, Catwoman attempted to turn the handle, but one of the vines sprang to life and blocked her hand. Obviously, she would need to find another route. Praying that Ivy would not rise from her slumber, Catwoman turned and made her to the mossy window she had originally entered through. She tore at the moss so that the handle was exposed, then carefully slid the window up. It made a loud clang as it opened all the way, and for a moment, Selina was sure that Ivy would awaken, but when she turned around, the chubby rogue was still fast asleep.

Smiling in satisfaction, Catwoman clambered out of the open window, relishing the fresh night air. Fortunately, it was quite late, so she could at least make her escape under the cover of darkness. She would have preferred to be wearing something that concealed her added poundage, but going back for her leather costume was too risky, and she doubted it would fit over her newfound gut anyway.

Without her whip or any of her kit, Catwoman decided it wasn't a good idea to take the rooftops home. Instead, she descended the fire escape and jumped to the floor, her newly acquired flab jiggling precariously as her feet hit the ground. Seeing her stomach shake like that made her feel disgusted. She had to find a way to reverse this!

Catwoman took the alleys home, keeping to the shadows...
135212111121111.title: An Awkward Escape

choices: Catwoman made it back to her apartment safely, time to make a plan!
Catwoman was suddenly overcome with hunger!
1352121111211111.content:
As Catwoman turned a corner, she suddenly found herself face to face with a group of surly, bearded thugs. She recognized the umbrella marking on their jackets as the the sign of the Penguin, meaning these men were loyal to him. She had been hoping to avoid a conflict like this, but Gotham was a dangerous place at night, and truth be told, she was surprised she hadn't run into one of these gangs sooner.

"Well, well...what do we have here?" The lead thug smirked, advancing towards where Selina stood hidden in the shadows.

"I'm not looking for any trouble here boys," she said.

The group just laughed at her. "Ain't that nice?" One of them shouted over. At any other time, Catwoman was sure she could have taken out these punks easily, but in her current condition, she wasn't so sure. She was already feeling tired and sluggish, and had not yet recovered from eating enough food to fill ten people. But these guys weren't going to take no for an answer.

"Wait...is that Catwoman?" One of the thugs asked. Selina realized she was still wearing her cat ears and goggles atop her head. Combined with her green leotard, she was sure to confuse her attackers. Slowly, she advanced out of the shadows towards the leader of the group, and the buzzing lamppost overhead illuminated her body for the first time.

The thugs looked gobsmacked. "That ain't Catwoman!"

"She's really let herself go."

"Yeah, she's more like Fatwoman!"

The thugs burst into deep, rumbling laughter as they pointed and laughed at Selina's pudgy pot belly. She felt a dark rage creep over her, her mouth curling into a snarl as they continued to mock her. Who were they to laugh at her?! She clenched her fists tightly.

"Come on guys," the leader said, gesturing to Catwoman's spherical stomach. "This girl's clearly pregnant or something. Is that right good lookin?"

"I. am. NOT. PREGNANT!" Catwoman roared, lunging forward in a rage as she slammed her fist into the man's face. She didn't have her claws on, but that punch knocked him out cold. She felt her belly jiggle again as she struck a combat pose, but she wasn't put off. "Who else wants some?"

"Some chick with a pot belly is gonna take us out?" One of the goons laughed. "Yeah right. Get 'er boys!"

Two more of the thugs ran towards Selina. She quickly leaped towards one of the men, but before she could strike, her belly sent sent him flying back. She allowed herself a small smile, it looked as if her new gut was her secret weapon! The other thug was approaching her from behind, but she sensed his movements and spun around, kneeing him in the groin with as much force as she could manage.

"Looks like I haven't slowed down as much as I thought," she chuckled, "Either that, or you guys were really cheap hires for Pengy."

"That's it you bloated bitch, you're goin' down!" The final thug charged at Catwoman in rage but in one swift motion, she raised her leg and kicked him back with such force that he was sent flying into the wall, where he slumped down, unconscious.

"Not bad," Catwoman purred, patting her belly in satisfaction as she surveyed the scene. "And it seems I have a change of outfit after all."

She knelt beside the nearest thug and removed his tugged at his clothing, removing his jacket, vest, pants and shoes. She left the poor guy his underwear, though she was tempted to take them just to spite him. She set the clothes aside and set to work removing Ivy's old costume. She had to peel herself out of the spandex material, which clung to her expanded belly like glue. She could feel her excess flab jiggling as she wriggled free, and she detested the sensation. Finally, she was able to free herself from the ridiculously tight costume, at which point she tossed it aside and let out a long sigh of relief, standing completely naked in the alleyway.

"That feels so much better..." Catwoman purred as she relished the feeling of the cold night air on her skin.

She would have happily walked home in the nude, but she doubted that would be practical given her current appearance. She examined her exposed body more carefully now, and saw that her changes were not just confined to her belly (which looked even bigger without the spandex suit containing it). Her stomach was a true pot belly, but was much firmer and rounder than she had expected. Her thighs were thicker, her legs had lost some of their muscle tone and her arms had thickened. If she had to guess, Selina would say she had gained about thirty pounds in the last twenty four hours. She ran her hands along her bulging stomach and up under her breasts, which she lifted. "Looks like you guys got heavier too," she said, giving her boobs a playful squeeze.

Wasting no more time, she scooped up the baggy pants she had stolen and put them on. They were a little tight, but infinitely more comfortably than her previous attire. She pulled the vest top on over her head, and it felt like she was wearing spandex again; the top barely covering the expanse of her protruding belly. Luckily, the loose fitting jacket concealed her weight gain very nicely. The clothes were ill fitting and dirty, but at least her stomach was less noticeable. She removed her cat ears and goggles and stuffed them in the jacket pocket. She didn't want to be recognized again tonight.

As if on queue, the door to Ivy's room swung open and the green skinned red head swaggered into the room, her large pot belly jiggling with each step. Catwoman shuddered at the sight, the one thing she had always feared was losing her trim figure and being unable to continue her fun filled lifestyle. She made an attempt to suck in her stomach as Ivy walked towards her, but she knew that it was a useless effort. "Selina," Ivy asked, "How did you sleep?"

Selina ignored the question, she wanted to get straight to the point. Turning to the side for emphasis, she displayed her big belly to Ivy and pointed at it. "I made a complete pig of myself last night, as you well know. But I couldn't seem to control my appetite, and I woke up around midnight and helped myself to another feast."

"Oh dear," Ivy said, surveying Selina's girth with a smile, "You seem to have overdone it a little, haven't you?"

"And lately, so have you," Selina snapped, prodding a gloved finger into Ivy's own flabby gut, "Don't you find it odd that the second I visit your apartment I start making a complete pig of myself?"

Ivy's face betrayed nothing, she looked completely innocent. "Perhaps I'm just a bad influence..."

"That much is obvious," Selina said, patting her firm belly, "But what if our new appetites are related? What if there is something more going on here? I can think of plenty of people who would want us out of the way, and getting us flabby and out of shape is a good start!"

Ivy's hands caressed her bulging gut. "I suppose you're right, I have been gaining weight recently, and I'm not sure why. I was always in perfect shape before. My new form isn't exactly as seductive as my old one!"

"You've got that right," said Selina, "Look, it might be nothing, but for the moment I'm going to spend some time away from you. It could be my proximity to you that triggered this hunger."

"I understand," Ivy sighed, "I suppose our heist can wait until another time. Let me know how you're feeling soon, in case you're right about someone manipulating us."

Selina nodded and walked over to the window, although the constricting material of her suit, combined with her bulging stomach, turned it into more a waddle. As she swung through the air, Catwoman could feel her suit tightening around her entire body, causing her considerable discomfort. When she landed on the next rooftop, she had to take a moment to catch her breath. This journey was going to be harder than usual.

Nonetheless, Ivy's powers would continue to effect Catwoman over the next few days, and she was confident that Selina would come back looking for some answers soon enough, but in the meantime, Ivy herself was rather hungry. Lifting her soft butt from the couch, Ivy went to the kitchen and began to prepare a feast. Her stomach rumbled noisily, and in response, she placed a hand on her fat gut. "There there, I'll feed you soon enough..."

Ivy had to admit, upon gaining weight, she had been mortified, but as time went on, she actually started to enjoy her new form. Her breasts had grown considerably, while she enjoyed the feeling of a big, round belly. Her outfit meant that little of her new body was left to the imagination.
