Still, there was still the matter of Oracle, Ivy noticed the sound of the woman's shouts over the other two's comm-link. The desperation in the woman's voice made Ivy grin. She knew Oracle wouldn't be able to get through to her team. She would be a sitting duck.

Summoning a massive vine, Ivy tugged the Huntress close, the woman's toned abs now nothing more than a memory. Whining at the loss of food, the Huntress started to resist, but Ivy gave her a deep kiss on the lips, clouding her mind with her charm pheromones.

"You want to tell me where Oracle is?" Ivy whispered, taking out the comm-link and crushing it between her fingers before doing so. No need for Oracle to find out she was coming. Under a trance, the bloated Huntress nodded.

"She's at the Clock Tower on 58th Street."

Ivy smiled at the Huntress and blasted both her and Canary with her new pheromones for over twenty minutes straight before leaving, spying flab starting to tear through both heroine's costumes. The sight brought a smirk to her lips. It would be amusing to see how fat they both became by the time her abilities wore off.

Finding the clock tower was simplicity itself, but how was she going to get close enough to give Oracle a whiff of her new abilities? Ivy needed to plan her route.
13522.title: Ivy's Prey

choices: Ivy subjected Oracle to over an hour of pheromones.
Ivy ensured that Oracle would be fat by rigging a special oxygen mask for her.
135221.content:
Deciding to be subtle about things, Ivy summoned a vine and had it carry her up towards an air duct, quietly taking the grill off and squeezing inside.

Her chest heaved after the effort and she felt like a sardine inside the air duct. Nonetheless she was still able to move, one flabby motion at a time.

To drive herself onward, Ivy imagined just what a fat Oracle would look like. She had never actually seen the woman known as Oracle, only coming into contact with her through a computer screen after being defeated by the other Birds of Prey. She would often give Ivy a lecture about how crime didn't pay. It was nearly as annoying as being defeated by such a menacing team.

Finally, she heard a female voice and rapid typing.

"No Robin, I can't reach them. Just go look, alright?"

Ivy then spotted a grate that offered her a view of the Oracle. She gasped when she saw the wheelchair-bound young woman with hair a shade lighter than her own red locks and pale skin. The woman who had bested her and commanded a cadre of superheroines was handicapped!

Regardless, Ivy grinned to herself and let the pheromones fly, knowing that she was close enough for the Oracle to get a whiff.

Barbara Gordon cursed as she stared at her screen for what felt like the twentieth time in under a minute.

She shouldn't have sent Dinah and Helena alone. Now her friends were captured or worse, dead, and there was nothing she could do! She would have continued this berating of herself had she not heard her stomach suddenly roaring. "It has been a while since breakfast," she thought to herself as she wheeled herself towards the mini-fridge not too far from her computer, pulling out a box of donuts and three soda cans. Looking at the food, she grabbed a sub out as well, feeling hungrier than usual. The first bite set off a tempest within the Oracle, only able to be calmed by more food.

She ate and ate, not caring at all as sauce, soda, and crumbs littered her white shirt.

No, all she cared about was eating more and more food!
135221.title: A Tight Squeeze

choices: Ivy decided to fatten up the entire Bat family, starting with Batgirl.
She decided to check in on Black Canary and the Huntress with their fat bodies.
1352212.content:
Dropping down, fat rippling as her big rear cushioned the fall, Ivy got up and waddled towards the gorging Oracle. Taking a discarded plastic bag from the mini-fridge near the glutton she had created with her new powers, Ivy soon rigged an oxygen mask, wrapping it around Oracle's neck and securing it with a few of her hair clips. Then she trapped a portion of her pheromones within the mask, ensuring Oracle would be constantly surrounded by the stuff even after Ivy had left.

Ivy then found the controls for the security footage and defenses inside the clock tower, disabling them with a few pressed keys on the keyboard. Oracle was now ignoring in lieu of stuffing her face. Ivy watched for around twenty minutes as her trim stomach pooched out and then over the waistband of her pants, saw as her thighs touched and meshed together. Ivy didn't know what was more amusing, how big the Oracle was surely going to get, or how much food she had in the fridge.

Still, after watching Oracle's shirt and pants start to rip, she left, not wanting to stick around and risk capture.

As she left out the front door, Ivy thought about just who her next victim could be.
1352212.title: Feeding the Oracle

1353.content:
The Gotham City Sirens were particular subjects of expansion serums developed by the scientific underground of Gotham city, but it was a rare occasion for all three women to undergo such drastic changes to their otherwise perfect posteriors. That was until the Riddler struck. With the assistance of the crooked professor Hugo Strange, he was able to create and inject a serum to each member of the group, Catwoman, Poison Ivy and Harley Quinn. This serum was capable of expanding the women to ridiculously large proportions over a certain amount of time, passing the point of immobility after twelve hours. As an added twist however, the Riddler decided to create a single vial containing the only known antidote to the weight gain serum, intending to watch the three women complete a series of amusing tasks, competing against one another, with the antidote as the prize. With a series of obstacles prepared across the city, most of which determining the fate, and weight, of the Sirens, this was surely the Riddler's greatest idea yet!

Meanwhile, the dark knight had problems of his own. The League of Assassins had returned to Gotham city, this time however, without their notorious leader. In his place, his daughter, Talia al Ghul led her loyal elite guard on a quest for redemption. However, their main priority was not Batman, but instead, Venom, the same chemical used to enhance the super criminal, Bane. One by one, each member of her elite guard were injected with the chemical, rapidly increasing in size and strength, capable of matching Bane himself in combat. A perfect combination of strength and speed, Talia's elite guard were now a force to be reckoned with, and with an immensely enhanced Talia leading the group of ninjas, it appeared that not even the dark knight was capable of stopping the powerful threat. Would he finally give in and join the League of Assassins once and for all, or would he be yet another victim to the continuously growing list of victims to the elite guard? Perhaps this was a fight that the caped crusader would not be able to overcome alone.

So which story would you like to follow?
1353.title: Even More Expansion Stories

choices: Follow the story of Harley Quinn and Poison Ivy.
13531.content:
"Is everything going according to plan, mister Nygma?"

The chilling tone of such a cold, calculating voice sent a shiver down the spine of Edward Nygma, the maniacal genius better known as the Riddler. To be watched over by the mysterious figure of authority made the Riddler feel uncertain, but nonetheless, as true as he continuously claimed, he was far too proud of himself to allow emotions, such as fear and inferiority, bother him in the slightest. It was hard to tell whether this was indeed the truth, or a cover of some kind of ignorance, he was the Riddler after all.

"Indeed professor," he replied, tilting his bowler hat to the monitor screen that displayed the still face of professor Hugo Strange, the former warden of Arkham Asylum, who seemed to have contacts that exceeded the government of Gotham city. "I have hired a few competent allies to inject our three puppets with the serum, and soon our little game shall begin."

"Excellent."

To elaborate, the evil professor had created a serum capable of manipulating the weight and mass of an individual, causing the individual to slowly and endlessly increase and expand in fat and size, even surpassing the point of immobility. However, there was a flaw in the production. The serum only seemed to effect females, not males. The serum would be useless to the target of the professor's obsessions, but instead, he provided it to a contact that would have use for such a spectacular formula.

"Are your little obstacles prepared?"

"Yes," the Riddler replied with a disgruntled look on his face, "Although I would hardly call them little. They were designed to provide our competitors with tasks that may effect the outcome of this entire game."

"Do not think yourself above me, mister Nygma, I still have the information you require."

"Yes professor, I apologize."

It was not often that the Riddler would apologize to someone other than himself, but this was a valuable arrangement. It seemed the Hugo Strange had plans for his three subjects, in reward for preparing these tasks, he had promised the nefarious villain to reveal the identity of his adversary, the dark knight, a proposal that the Riddler could not refuse. That was the reason for his apology, and nothing else.

"Remember mister Nygma," the professor continued, "I wish these women to amuse me. If you fail me, I will make sure that you will never leave the asylum in one piece again. Understand?"

"Yes sir." And with that, the Riddler resumed his work. All over the city, he had set up rather tasking challenges for his chosen competitors to take part in, each capable of effecting the balance of the game, including weight-specific serums and valuable clues. As an added twist however, the victor of the competition would be determined by whoever could reach and consume the one and only known antidote first, a finish that the Riddler seemed excited about.

This was truly an example of his genius, a true masterpiece.

Although the three chosen participants of the bizarre competition would not be so willing to agree.
13531.title: The Weight Game Begins

choices: She decided to head to the docks alone.
She decided to find some assistance.
135311.content:
It was a quiet night. Too quiet. The dark knight was nowhere to be seen. This would have been the perfect night for the infamous cat burglar Catwoman to venture into the streets and collect as many precious jewels and artifacts as possible, but alas, this was not the case. Selina Kyle did not expect to find herself running for her life.

It was six o'clock in the evening, way too early for Selina to be leaping across the rooftops in her leather tight costume, but she had no other choice. A group of armed thugs were after her, and after knocking out a few of them at her apartment, Selina decided to slip into her costume early and start running from these trained assailants.

After jumping over countless rooftops, with the mercenaries shortly behind her, she finally realized that enough was enough. High on top a tall block of flats, Catwoman stopped running, and prepared for the inevitable assault. Before her emerged at least ten military trained goons in warped armored outfits, one in particular was wielding a special weapon, capable of firing darts containing some kind of serum. Catwoman did not intend to find out what this serum was capable of, so this was her first target. She swiped the weapon from his hands before viciously scratching his face. The weapon was knocked out of reach for now.

With all her might and strength, she struggled to fend off the overwhelming crooks, they were just too well trained to overcome alone. This did not stop her however. She was able to take out at least seven of them before she was finally knocked to the floor and shot in the arm with one of the darts. Upon the sting of the dart, Selina felt faint, distracted enough to allow the remaining goons to retreat. She felt an awesome gushing sensation course throughout her entire body.

When she pulled the dart from her arm, the gushing sensation had stopped, but immediately she realized the effects. Climbing back to her feet, she noticed the zip of her costume was slightly tighter than usual. She was then horrified to find a large chunk of fat emerge from her stomach. She squeezed it, realizing that it was all fat. The serum that was injected to her must have done this. She was horrified to discover a small pot belly already appear under her suit.

Panicking at first, she then noticed a small flat monitor screen in one of the unconscious goons' pocket. She picked it up to find a familiar face upon the screen. "Well, well, looks like the kitty finally wants to play!" Upon the flat screen was none other than Edward Nygma, the Riddler, with a cheeky grin on his face. "Congratulations, Selina Kyle, you've been selected to participate in what I like to call the first ever Weight Game. For your initiation, you were injected with an incredible serum capable of manipulating the weight and mass of an individual, or in this case, you. Do not be frightened, all it really does is make you grow and grow, fatter and fatter, bigger and bigger, until you become nothing more than a bulging, gluttonous, jiggling blob of human fat and flesh, that is, of course, unless you finish the game."

Disgusted by such a concept, Catwoman looked down and noticed that her small pot belly had already grown slightly larger. It seemed that the Riddler wasn't kidding. It seemed that she had no other choice but to continue listening. She was now at the mercy of the Riddler.

"The objective of the game is simple. All you have to do is follow my instructions, and in time, you will reach your goal, and at your goal, you will find the one and only antidote known on the entire planet. Along the way however, I will provide you with clues to your next destination, where you will have to complete a series of amusing tasks and challenges, all with rewards that will effect the outcome of the game. Surely do not think for one second that you will be alone in this game. Between you and two other lucky participants, it will be a race to the finish, with the winner claiming the one and only prize, so make sure that you finish
first, or else you may stay like this for the rest of your lives."

This was turning out to be a terrible night for Catwoman. There was nothing that disgusted her more than the concept of becoming an obese slob. She was determined to finish first in the race to salvation, but before she could set off, there was still one significant detail left by the Riddler.

"Oh, and one more thing. You were injected with a rapidly progressive serum, so make sure that, within six to twelve hours, you will be rendered completely immobile. So have fun, I know I will!"

"Ready for your first clue? I shall 'C' you at the Docks at '7'."
135311.title: First Competitor: Catwoman

choices: Catwoman managed to solve the challenge...
Catwoman failed, but at least had a chance to redeem herself...
1353111.content:
"I hate riddles," Catwoman hissed as the Riddler's image faded away from the monitor. She slipped the device inside her outfit, deciding to hold onto it for the moment.

Realizing that time was of the essence, she quickly moved on, leaping between rooftops in the direction of the Gotham Docks. That part of the riddle had been easy enough to figure out, at least. As she used her whip to swing up onto a Gargoyle on a nearby building, her costume tightened across her chest, and she gave an annoyed growl as she clambered atop the statue. For the first time in her life, her costume felt uncomfortable. Her tight leather outfit usually fit her slender, toned form perfectly, accentuating her amazing figure and womanly curves - but tonight, thanks to the Riddler's trickery, she was starting to outgrow it. Looking down at her stomach, she was reminded of the slight bulge her stomach now possessed. The added pressure caused by how her bloated belly had caused her zipper to ride down slightly, exposing much more of her cleavage than normal.

"Jesus...I'm almost spilling out of this thing," Catwoman muttered, pulling the zip up a little further.

She continued on her journey, moving gracefully across the Gotham skyline until she began to smell the salty, fish scented air of the Docks; one of Gotham's sleaziest locations. She jumped over a chain-mail fence and landed silently on the other side, causing her zipper to descend even further than before. She quickly pulled up it again, ignoring the bloated feeling in the pit of her stomach.

"Now, what did he say... I shall 'C' you at the Docks at '7'," she repeated the riddle and scanned the area for clues.

If Batman was here, he would no doubt have solved the riddle already, but this wasn't exactly Selina's area of expertise. Suddenly, the monitor began to bleep. She hurriedly pulled it out and saw an 'INCOMING MESSAGE' alter flashing. She depressed a green button and the Riddler's sneering visage filled the screen.

"So, you've solved the first part of my riddle, but then, any brainless monkey would have made it this far!"

"Shut it Riddler," Catwoman growled.

"So, you haven't solved the riddle yet then?" He asked, chuckling.

Catwoman looked around again, repeating the riddle over and over in her head...but what was the answer!?
1353111.title: I Hate Riddles...

choices: She tried to take out the thugs one by one first.
She was suddenly interrupted by another competitor.
13531111.content:
Stumped, Catwoman could only stand in the spot, scratching the top of her head with one hand on her hip as the riddle repeated itself in her mind. No matter where she looked, she could not come close to solving the riddle. And to make matters worse, as she stood there, she suddenly felt a heavy thrust in her bulging stomach. Her zipper was now already on the verge of breaking under the tremendous bulge. Disgusted by the alarming weight shifted to her stomach, causing her back to ache slightly, she took one last glance around the area, until she turned around and, upon a relieving sight, she let out a loud groan, releasing her frustration with her own stupidity.

If only she had looked behind her all along, she would have noticed a building with the text "C7" high above the garage door. She was looking for Warehouse C7 all along. Kicked herself behind the leg, she quickly made a move on, desperate to reach the warehouse before anyone else. Instead of crawling under the garage door however, she decided to climb up and through a hidden window, just in case she was walking into a trap.

As predicted, as soon as she entered the building, she quickly hid behind a large crate upon hearing a group of thugs, obviously hired to do the Riddler's dirty work, bickering amongst themselves.

"Did you hear that?"

"Hear what?"

"Maybe Catwoman's here right now!"

"Well, considering what the boss did to her, it's not like we're gonna miss her..."

"Good one!"

"Ooh ooh I got one! What do you call a fat cat with wings?"

"What?"

"Not Catwoman!"

"That was weak man, shut the hell up!"

After overhearing their conversation, Selina knew that overcoming these chumps was her first task. Normally, she would have no problem, but with the growing problem under her costume, she knew that it was going to be rather difficult. Suddenly, she felt a vibrating sensation. She pulled out monitor from earlier, and once again, the Riddler's sinister smile appeared on the screen.

"Well done! So you've finally solved the riddle! And how about that? You were the first of my contestants to do so! But I would hurry if I were you. They could arrive at any minute. Oh, and just to make sure you don't have any thoughts of working together..."

He pressed a button, and suddenly the bloated sensation became much more rapid. Her gut had expanded to the brink of destroying the zipper completely, and the skin-tight outfit was about to tear between her thighs and buttocks. Distraught, Selina looked down in horror at what was happening to her, trying her best not to openly curse in case of attracting unwanted attention.

"...now you have only two minutes to locate and retrieve the temporary antidote before you become completely immobile. Then, and only then, will I provide you with your next challenge."

"You'll pay for this," Selina quietly scowled.

"One minute and fifty seconds. Time's running out my little ball of fun!"

Selina tried to put the monitor away, but realizing that there was no longer any room, she had no choice but to leave it behind the crate, preferring to remember where it was after the task was complete. But it was not going to be easy. She could feel her outfit tear at the seams upon every step she made. She had to make a move now, but after glancing at where the thugs were bickering earlier, she realized that they have all separated. Each one was carrying a gun, and each one was on the lookout. She then noticed something in the middle of the warehouse. On top of the largest crate of the building sat a small vial of liquid, with a wooden sight hung above that read "The Prize". That must have been the antidote to stop the rapid inflation, at least for now, but it was in the middle of a wide open area. If she reached it now, one of the thugs would clearly spot her and then finish her off. But if she reached it, what then? Would it restore her to her previous size before the Riddler triggered the rapid growth, or would she be stuck with the huge disadvantage of being a ridiculously huge size on only the first challenge? And if so, how could she have any hope of outrunning the competition and completing the rest of the challenges to completely save herself?

Time was running out. Catwoman needed to reach the antidote, without being seen, and she needed it now before she got way too big.
13531111.title: Two Minute Warning

choices: She tried to squeeze through the vent.
She realized that she was not alone.
135311111.content:
Selina knew that she could not take on the thugs head on, nor could she dart for the antidote in the open. The thugs were armed, and under direct orders from the Riddler himself, they would not hesitate to shoot on sight as soon as the rapidly growing cat burglar showed herself even for a second. Her only hope was to take out the goons one by one and as silently as possible, and she had to do it fast. Time was running out, and in less than two minutes, she would grow to the point of immobility, and then regaining her once beautiful form would be impossible. She knew that it was going to be difficult, but what other choice did she have, besides sitting on her fat ass and just allowing herself to bloat into a humongous blob of jiggling fat?

With her back against the first crate, she crouched down, trying her best to ignore her bulging stomach sliding down her thickening thighs. She pulled down her goggles from her forehead and over her eyes, allowing her to trace the heat signatures of everyone in the area. She detected five goons, all armed, and all quite some distance from each other. The nearest goon was just on the other side of the first crate. An easy target. As hastily and quietly as she could, she crept towards him and used her flabby arms to strangle him to sleep. She gently placed him onto the floor before escaping from the open. One down, four to go, but she had already wasted fifteen precious seconds, and her zipper was practically useless now. She had to make a move on.

She spotted the next thug, not far from the first, making his way to his unconscious partner in crime's location. It wouldn't be long until he spotted his fallen comrade and alerted the others that they were not alone. She had to make sure that did not happen. She tried to creep up to him, but the more she moved, the more she realized that her body was starting to chafe, struggling to be contained within the ridiculously tight leather outfit. Hearing the loud squeaking of her suit, the thug turned around. Selina managed to hide behind cover just in time, but now the thug was suspicious.

"Hey guys," the thug yelled out, "On me! I think I got her cornered!"

Only then she realized that she was boxed in, hiding behind a large crate that stood right against the wall, with one thug around the corner on her left and, according to her goggles, the other three goons making their way to her location on the right. The thug was right. She was trapped.

"Come on you idiots," he continued, "The big fat cat's right here! What's taking you so long!?"

"We're on our way!"

"Well hurry up!"

"What's the rush? Didn't you hear the boss in your headset? She's gonna turn into a blob of fat in over a minute. Then she'll be target practice..."

"Seriously? Man, she must look pretty smoking hot right now..."

"Dude!"

"What!?"

All was not lost however. As she quivered at the thought of the thug's fetish, she then spotted a ventilation grill on one of the crates, one that appeared to lead towards the crate in the middle of the room where the antidote sat, just the right size for a regular-sized human to squeeze through. Unfortunately however, at this point, Catwoman was not the size of a regular-sized human. She had just reached the one minute mark, and already she was three times her normal weight, well over the three hundred and fifty pound mark, and she continued to grow even bigger by the second. But what other choice did she have? At this size, she was barely able to stand, let alone take on four armed thugs, and her hips was so wide now that she couldn't even reach her belt to grab her whip. She could barely even breath under the tremendous tightness of her outfit, which continued to tear apart, just mere strings away from total destruction.

The thugs were about to make their move. She had to make hers. She wobbled to the wall and ripped off the grill, revealing a narrow squeeze, but a squeeze that could lead her to putting a stop to her alarming expansion. Then again, it could also lead elsewhere, maybe even out of the building altogether, and what then? She already wasted a whole minute taking out only one thug and ending up cornered, how could she possibly reach the antidote in time, especially through such a tight squeeze?

At this point however, it was a chance that she had to make.
135311111.title: A Futile Challenge

choices: The voice belonged to Batgirl, who came to help Catwoman.
The voice belonged to Jenna Duffy, who saw everything that happened.
1353111112.content:
In her last ounce of strength, she exhaustedly bent down to the floor to squeeze her head through the vent. Her costume relentless squeaked and screech upon each movement of her enormous body fat, but nonetheless she managed to squeeze her shoulders through next. That was when she heard the thugs behind her screaming and yelling, but to her confusion, not to advance towards her. She to struggled to wiggle herself into the vent, she then heard gunfire, assault rifles blaring in between separate pauses of violent screaming. It sounded like the goons had their hands full with other problems, but at this point, this was the least of her concerns.

Before she could proceed deeper into the vent, she realized that her hips were wedged outside the gap. She could not drag herself any further, and to make matters worse, as she tried to pull herself back out, she realized that she could not. While her entire stomach and torso were trapped inside the vent, her legs and her gigantic posterior were stuck outside. She was stuck.

She was completely helpless. Now reaching the five hundred pound mark, her shoulders were completely stuck, preventing her from moving anything above the waist, and with her body still growing, she did not even have the strength to kick her free legs due to the tremendous weight of her ass, which continued to engulf what was left of her shrinking costume. Whatever time she had left to reach the antidote was no longer necessary. She could have had thirty seconds left or even thirty days left, she was not budging from this humiliating position.

Depressed by falling into such a dire fate, she suddenly realized that the noises in the background had stopped. No more screaming, no more gunfire. She had no idea what had happened since she couldn't look back, but she knew that something had happened to the thugs. But upon hearing the sound of a familiar voice, she couldn't help but let out a loud gulp.

"Well well, look at what the cat dragged in..."
1353111112.title: Stuck in the Cat Flap

choices: In the garden, Poison Ivy was injected first.
In the mall, Harley Quinn was injected first.
135312.content:
It had been some time since their escape from the asylum, and while the police were still searching for them, it was a smart idea to lay low and go into hiding for a little while. But while the police had much bigger problems to deal with, there was no time for a full scale search, and so, once again, Poison Ivy and Harley Quinn were free to roam the streets of Gotham once more, at least as long as they maintain a low profile, an urge that poor Harley struggled to resist. Sharing a hideout at a defunct botanical garden, the troublesome duo steadily grew impatient with each other, both with conflicting desires for their latest scheme.

"Listen red," a shrill shriek echoed in the vast botanical landscape, "The bat hasn't been spotted in Gotham for weeks! I'm telling you, we've gotta make the most of what time we have left to ourselves!"

In response, a slightly deeper, more sensual voice followed the echo. "Forget it Harl, we're not going anywhere until we're certain that Batman is out of town. Or at least until we figure out a way to stop him in his tracks."

They were clearly at a disagreement. While the mischievous clown girl, Harley Quinn, wanted nothing more than to make a scene, reflecting the showmanship of her beloved spouse, the beautiful Eco-terrorist, Poison Ivy, was far more hesitant to attract such attention, she was a brilliant thinker who preferred to stick to the plot. This was, of course, not the first time these two women were down each other's throats, but after what poor Harley had to endure during their previous reign of terror before returning to captivity, she was not too keen to sit around waiting for the time to strike. In her mind, the time to act was now.

"No, no I'm not just gonna sit on my butt until you come up with another one of your stupid plans!" Harley was determined to return to the streets. "That flying rodent deserves what's coming to him!"

"Well, pardon me for breaking you out of Arkham in the first place," Ivy suddenly sat up, infuriated by Harley's misbehavior, "But if you don't want to be a part of this, then you might as well just leave!"

"Fine! I will!" And with that, Harley stormed out of the garden, throwing a tantrum as she did so. As she made her way out of the garden and into the streets however, she was unaware that she was being watched.

As Poison Ivy then struggled to settle down, still furious with her partner's bitter behavior, those same eyes focused on her from a distance. These men appeared to be military soldiers, or at least trained goons in suits of armor, two in particular were wielding special weapons, capable of firing darts containing the same serum referred to by the Riddler earlier, but of course, not even Ivy was aware of their presence. It was all going according to plan. Two squads, one following Ivy and one stalking Harley, both squads with at least one of these serum-filled rifles, with the mission to inject one serum into each of the two women. They did not question, they only served, and with the Riddler whispering into their headsets, they were determined to make sure that they satisfy their superiors.

This was the moment to strike. This was the moment when the Weight Game began.
135312.title: Meet the Participants

choices: Ivy managed to reach the docks with time to spare.
On the way to the docks, Ivy was interrupted.
1353121.content:
The mercenaries waited patiently in the shadows, utilizing advanced equipment to accurately stalk the unsuspecting Poison Ivy, who was still bitter from her recent argument with Harley Quinn. At six o'clock that evening, Ivy attempted to blow off some steam by watering her precious plant. The delectable aroma of the foliage that surrounded her had a way of charming the notorious criminal into a calmer state. There was nothing that she enjoyed more than the company of her so-called beloved pets.

Before she could finally settle with her plants however, she could sense a disturbance through the soil. She then felt a slight tingle on her bare skin. She looked down to see a bright red dot bruising her otherwise perfect skin. She immediately recognized the red dot sight from afar, and in response, unleashed her fury.

Four armed thugs were swept off their feet, their ankles wrapped together by a number of large, strong vines that sprouted from the earth. From the bushes emerged Poison Ivy, who looked at the intruders with pity. "My my," she remarked, "Looks like a group of trespassers just asking for trouble." Before she could do anything with her new prisoners however, one of them still held their weapon, and managed to fire it at Ivy.

In retaliation, her vines slammed the four mercenaries harshly to the ground, knocking them all out cold, something that Ivy did not want to happen. She was clearly distracted by a stinging pinch in her bicep. She pulled out a tiny dart that stuck to her arm, but not before feeling a gushing sensation course throughout her entire body. The sensation didn't seem to bother her that much however, so without any further distractions, she proceeded to inspect the four hired goons.

Only one of the injured goons was still conscious. Ivy decided to interrogate him first. She demanded an explanation before noticing a green painted question mark upon his attire. "Ugh," she sighed in annoyance, she instantly recognized the trademark symbol, "What as he up to now?" That was when she found a small flat monitor screen in the goon's pocket. She picked it up, only to find a familiar face staring at her on the screen.

"Well, well, aren't you a rebellious little vixen?" Upon the flat screen was none other than Edward Nygma, the Riddler, with a cheeky grin on his face. "Congratulations, miss Pamela Isley, you've been selected to participate in what I like to call the first ever Weight Game. For your initiation, you were injected with an incredible serum capable of manipulating the weight and mass of an individual, or in this case, you. Do not be frightened, all it really does is make you grow and grow, fatter and fatter, bigger and bigger, until you become a bulging, gluttonous, jiggling blob of human fat and flesh, that is, of course, unless you finish the game."

Disgusted by such a concept, Ivy didn't believe him at first, but with that said, she couldn't help but notice a slight bulge develop on her stomach. She did feel strangely bloated, much to her chagrin. It seemed that the Riddler was telling the truth, and if this was the case, she had to find a cure before the serum could take full effect.

"The objective of the game is simple," the Riddler continued, "All you have to do is follow my instructions, and in time, you will reach your goal, and at your goal, you will find the one and only antidote known on the entire planet. Needless to say, there is no other cure, so there's no point in wasting your time in finding another one. That means you, miss Isley. Along the way however, I will provide you with clues to your next destination, where you will have to complete a series of amusing tasks and challenges, all with rewards that will effect the outcome of the game. Surely do not think for one second that you will be alone in this game. Between you and two other lucky participants, it will be a race to the finish, with the winner claiming the single prize, so make sure that you finish first, or else you may stay like this for the rest of your lives."

Although she was reluctant to participate in such a foolish game, the sudden bloated sensation she felt was far too irritable for her to cope with. Whether she liked it or not, she had to take part in the race, but before she could make preparations, there was still one significant detail left by the Riddler.

"Oh, and one more thing. You were injected with a rapidly progressive serum, so make sure that, within six to twelve hours, you will be rendered completely immobile. So have fun, I know I will!"

"Ready for your first clue? I shall 'C' you at the Docks at '7'"
1353121.title: Second Competitor: Poison Ivy

13531211.content:
Deciphering the clue, Ivy left her hideout and headed for the Gotham Docks, the small monitor still in her hand. Unfortunately, the docks were about 3 blocks away from her hideout, so she commanded a vine to take her there as fast as it could. Luckily, she made it there before the other "contestants" did. Reaching the gate, she noticed that, in the time it took to get here, she had gained again. The bulge became a full pot belly, and her breasts had grown a few cup sizes. Annoyed, she entered the docks and headed for warehouse C7.

Before she could enter, however, the monitor sputtered to life, and the Riddler's face filled the screen.

"Congratulations, my green, chlorophyll vixen. You've worked out the first part of my game. And I am impressed, because you're the first one here. Now the next part can begin. Inside the warehouse is a temporary antidote and your next clue. The antidote won't reduce you're weight, but it will stop the growth for a little bit. All you need to do is get it. But there's a catch. The door is locked with an electronic pad, and will only open after you solve a few riddles. You have as many chances as you need. Get at least 5 right, and the door opens. But for every wrong answer, I push this button, and your weight increases. Too many wrong, and, well, you know. And I'm watching you, so don't try to cheat. Good luck. Oh, and the other contestants will be along at any point, so you'd best hurry." Riddler laughed and the screen went dark.

Ivy wanted to just use a vine and smash the door down, but Riddler was watching, and he might speed up the gain if she did. Sighing, she decided to play. Before she got to the door, she heard a ripping sound. Looking down, she saw that the front of her costume had torn, and green belly flesh was spilling out of the rip.

"Damn it, better hurry before I destroy my costume." She said to herself.

She got to the door and looked at the pad. It had a screen with a riddle on it, and a keyboard below it. The riddle read:

"I am always on my way, but I never arrive. Many wait for me, but they never see me. What am I?"

Ignoring the growing bloated sensation, Ivy though for a moment, and then came up with an answer. The answer was...
13531211.title: New Part of the Game

choices: She decided to head to the docks alone.
She decided to ask Poison Ivy for help.
1353122.content:
Patiently the mercenaries waited in the shadows, utilizing advanced equipment to accurately stalk the unsuspecting Harley Quinn, who was still bitter from her recent argument with Poison Ivy. In an attempt to blow off some steam, she decided to head to a nearby shopping mall. It was six o'clock in the evening, so the mall was still open, but this did not bother her. She figured that stealing a nice set of clothes could do her good and calm her down a little.

Inside, she picked out a number of fashionable clothes to match her slim trim figure, unaware of the bright red dot that touched her bare skin. As she made her way to the changing booth, a silent shot was fired, with accuracy that could even match Floyd Lawton.

"Ouch!"

Harley felt a stinging pinch on her bicep. She looked down to see a tiny dart stuck in her arm, but before she could pull it out, she suddenly felt a gushing sensation course throughout her entire body. As she pulled the dart out, the sensation didn't seem to bother her much. She simply returned to trying on her chosen clothes, unaware that she was immediately effected by the weight gain serum.

She tried on her first outfit, and to her surprise, some areas did not seem to fit her, particularly around and waist. "Huh, that's funny," she thought to herself, "I'm sure this was my size. Oh well..." She merely resumed and tried on a dress, but again, it seemed to tight on her. "What's going on here?" Convinced that she had picked out the wrong sizes, unhappy with the inaccurate labeling of her clothes, she decided to return into her regular street clothes, but unfortunately, not even her own clothes seemed to fit her right. Confused, she looked down at her body to investigate, and was horrified at the sight of her stomach. Just moments ago, her stomach was flat, but now her stomach had become padded and cushy like a soft pillow.

Harley started to panic until she remembered the dart on the floor. She picked it up to investigate, and inscribed on the dart was a mere painted question mark.

That was when something slid from beneath the changing booth door, in between her feet. She peeked out of the booth to find who was behind it, but there was no one to be seen. She looked down to find what appeared to be a small flat monitor screen, but as she picked it up, suddenly a familiar face appeared on the screen.

"Ah, finally, I thought that you'd never figure it out!" Upon the flat screen was none other than Edward Nygma, the Riddler, with a cheeky grin on his face. "Congratulations, Dr. Harleen Quinzel, you've been selected to participate in what I like to call the first ever Weight Game. For your initiation, you were injected with an incredible serum capable of manipulating the weight and mass of an individual, or in this case, you. Do not be frightened, all it really does is make you grow and grow, fatter and fatter, bigger and bigger, until you become a bulging, gluttonous, jiggling blob of human fat and flesh, that is, of course, unless you finish the game."

Disgusted by such a concept, Harley then noticed that her stomach was now bigger than it had been just a few moments ago, and that there were some other areas on her body now with much more flesh to squeeze. It seemed that the Riddler was not joking. He had, in fact, injected her with a formula, and now she was doomed to grow into a humongous tub of lard. Needless to say, this caught her attention.

"The objective of the game is simple. All you have to do is follow my instructions, and in time, you will reach your goal, and at your goal, you will find the one and only antidote known on this entire planet. Along the way however, I will provide you with clues to your next destination, where you will have to complete a series of amusing tasks and challenges, all with rewards that will effect the outcome of the game. Surely do not think for one second that you will be alone in this game. Between you and two other lucky participants, it will be a race to the finish, with the winner claiming the single prize, so make sure that you finish first, or else you may stay like this for the rest of your lives."

Suddenly a burst of anticipation crept up the tingling spine of Harley Quinn. She suddenly realized that she had to make haste. But before she could leave however, there was still one significant detail left by the Riddler.

"Oh, and one more thing. You were injected with a rapidly progressive serum, so make sure that, within six to twelve hours, you will be rendered completely immobile. So have fun, I know I will!"

"Ready for you first clue? I shall 'C' you at the Docks at '7'."
1353122.title: Third Competitor: Harley Quinn

13533.content: After another defeat at the hands of Batman, Poison Ivy decides that it's time to expand her powers. Using her own expertise and some chemicals she stole from Wayne Labs, she creates a chemical that she thinks will allow her to take control of anyone she wants, regardless of gender or species. But when she uses it on herself, she discovers that she made an error. She gains the power she wanted, but it came with an unforeseen side effect: her breasts have started to grow at an alarming rate. What's worse is that her breasts are filling up with a strange liquid that, no matter what she does, she can't lactate. Something has gone horribly wrong, and Ivy has to find a way to fix it before she gets too big to move.
13533.title: Reader's Choice

135332.content: How about this story. Batman was patrolling Gotham City as usual until he discovers suspicious factory. Once inside he discovers a new villain making a scheme. Batman tries to disrupt the villain's plan but the villian sprays Batman with a substance that leaves him hungry. Upon being sprayed the mysterious new villain vanishes, but when Batman tries to give chase he is overcome by hunger which will cause the dark knight to gain weight.
135332.title: Why not something original?

1353321.content:
It was like any other night in Gotham. Batman was out and about cleaning up the streets of Gotham. Lately there have been strange reports of an evil mastermind trying to buy out the whole city using their delicious baked goods and food chains. This villain used the greed and gluttony of the people to slowly whisk away businesses. Yet the waistline of the people were slowly starting to grow as a result. After five minutes Batman finally sees the factory.

"This must be the place. It seems quiet. Too quiet."

Batman climbs in through the roof. As he was sneaking around he saw a tall woman dressed in a lab coat. She wore her black hair in a bun and had a tan complexion and sparkling green eyes. Batman was dumbfounded at what he saw. That was the baker who catered his last party. Her name was Velma Berry. A woman who's origins are as mysterious as she is.

"Perfect, my formula is complete. Now my goods will be irresistible. Soon Gotham will be eating out of my hand. But before I leave a certain someone needs to be taught a lesson."

Batman runs towards Velma and throws a Bat-a-rang. Surprisingly, Velma, dodges the projectile and sprays Batman with her formula. Batman tries to sheild himself with his cape, but the formula just seeped through.

"Sorry Batman, but I have to go. I hope you enjoy my present. A ha ha ha ha!"

Velma back-flips out of the factory. Batman was about to give chase until his stomach starts growling.

"Damn, she's getting away. Must fight off hunger."

Batman tries to fight off his hunger, but reluctantly gives in as he sees...
1353321.title: Sumo-Sized Dark Knight

1353322.content: After her defeat at the hands of Batman, the assassin Copperhead wanted revenge. Escaping her cell, she devises a new plan: she'll swipe Bane's Venom supply, and use it herself to tear the Bat to pieces. However, the Venom has a different effect on her than it does Bane: she continues to grow more muscular even without the need of a delivery system.
1353322.title: Other

choices: Pretty as a Rose, Strong as Oak
13533222.content: Sick and tired of relying only on her plants and hypnotized henchmen, Poison Ivy decides that she needs to become a physical match to Batman. So she devises her own version of Venom that works on her and makes her a towering Amazon. The Dark Knight better watch out, because now Ivy has the strength of Bane to match her beauty and power.
13533222.title: Another Story Idea

135332222.content:
The 3 B's

         Catwoman, Harley Quinn, and Poison Ivy have gotten into a little, or should I Big, problem. While on a shopping trip, into a local chemical plant. Catwoman being there for support. Harley comes across a abandoned room. Inside of that room are 3 vials of liquid. Naturally she goes to bring it to her friends. Tripping ,Harley comes crashing down and realeasing the vials onto herself and friends. A couple of days laters Catwoman has been complaning of her suit. Which has been tightening around the rear. Poision Ivy has been having bra trouble. Harley has even have some stomach bloating! Surley this is nothing to worry about...right?
135332222.title: Yet another option

14.content:
Even the caped crusader was a victim of gender swaps, where even reality itself was altered so that he was, and always had been a female. Despite a vast variety of experiences as the opposite sex, often separated from his previous lifestyle, he would continue to cope with the ongoing humiliation.

Overwhelmed by suspicions of a possible terrorist attack on Gotham High School, the dark knight saw it as an opportunity to test out his latest machine, a shape-shift chamber, developed from the substance produced by Clayface, capable of transforming a human being perfectly. Unfortunately during the test, the machine malfunctioned, and he was left in the body of a young, teenage girl. Since the machine could not be fixed for at least three months, and with the help of Stephanie Brown, he decided to pose as the girl he had become, as a high school student, in an attempt to unfold the mysterious attack plot.

The Elizabeth Arkham Asylum for the Criminally Insane was an infamous psychiatric hospital with a terrible record and a horrifying reputation that would even drive the staff to the brink of insanity. After discovering an unknown source of power from within the walls, the caped crusader suddenly found himself in an alternate reality, where he was a female, and he worked as a rookie security guard at the dreaded asylum. With the intention to track the mysterious source, he decided to go with the flow, and posed as Kristy Osborn in order to enter the asylum undetected. Unfortunately however, some of the inmates had ideas of their own.

Over the course of two weeks, several young girls, all under the age of thirteen, mysteriously disappeared from Gotham city. Tracing the sources, the dark knight was eventually lead to the deadly pairing of Poison Ivy, a beautiful eco-terrorist obsessed with plants and botany, and Harley Quinn, a former psychiatrist obsessively fixated on one of her former patients, believing to be in love with him. During their encounter however, the duo revealed their true intentions, transforming the caped crusader into an exact replica of one of their victims, and adopting him as their own child.

An elusive adversary of the dark knight, Catwoman was an accomplished burglar with enigmatic intentions. She shared a confusing relationship with the caped crusader, often turning flirtatious and, occasionally, legitimately romantic. Despite this however, one fateful night, Catwoman retrieved a powerful device from the scientific laboratories, capable of transforming a human being entirely. Her twisted mind eventually developed a plot to completely humiliate her rival, and as a result, the dark knight was completely transformed, to the pleasure of the cat burglar.

So which story would you like to follow?
14.title: Gender Swap Stories

choices: I was a hot, blond, curvaceous 16-year old sophomore.
I was a hyper-obese, freckled 14-year old freshman.
141.content:
Suspicions of a possible terrorist attack on Gotham High School consumed me. Joker, Penguin, Two-Face, Scarecrow, it could have been any one of them! I had to know, but there wasn't a single trace. This was the perfect opportunity to test out my latest creation. I had to take action.

As I prepared to turn on the machine, Alfred Pennyworth, my trusted assistant, entered and inquired about my device.

"It's a metamorphosis chamber Alfred," I explained, clearly proud of my latest achievement, "Using similar qualities to the substance produced by our old friend Clayface, this machine is capable of shifting the formation of a human's biological cells, changing their appearance and, therefore, assume the disguise of an entirely different person, male or female, fat or thin, man or child! It can even change someone's voice to match its new form! It is the ultimate shape-changing device!"

"I see," Alfred was clearly unamused. "Are you sure about this, master Bruce? It seems highly unstable."

"Don't worry Alfred," I assured him of the safety precautions if anything went wrong with the chamber. I was totally confident in my latest creation, a machine capable of mimicking the same abilities as Basil Karlo, but little did I realize that such immense power could not be manipulated by a mere machine. I was oblivious to the unstable nature of the device, a mistake that I could not let down.

I entered the chamber and switched it on. I proposed to Alfred that, if I used this machine to disguise myself as another human being, more accurately a high school student, I could investigate the area, undetected, on a regular daily basis, to ensure its safety, and to prevent any possible terrorist attacks. Alfred was reluctant in me doing so. I should have listened to him.

Inside the chamber I felt my entire body change. I wanted to take a form similar to when I was in my later teenage years, regress myself back to the age of a senior high school student, but alas, during the operation, something went horribly wrong. The machine malfunctioned, and my body was altered drastically, more than I anticipated. A loud, deep scream of pain coursed into a high-pitched, piercing shriek. Indeed my voice was changing, but I knew that this was not the only part of my body that was changing.

Over my sound of my shrill, feminine cry for help, I could hear Alfred trying his best to shut down the machine. Eventually he did, but the damage had already been done. The chamber was up in smoke, and the fuse had died out, but this was the least of my worries. Dazed and aching, I crawled out of the chamber, noticing the widened eyes on Alfred's look of astonishment.

Confused, I climbed up, only to stumble upon the sight of my new body, tucked inside my old clothes. Horrified by the result of my foolish mistake, I returned to my feet and rushed towards the reflective mirror on the side of the broken chamber.

Shocked wasn't even the word to describe how I felt as I stared at the unusual reflection that looked back at me.
141.title: Back to School

choices: I was still a teen girl, but now....
I was myself again... And yet...
1411.content:
I stood, gaping at my reflection. A beautiful blonde girl stared back, mouth wide open. I couldn't believe how badly I had messed up.

"Well, sir, at least we know that the chamber works." Said Alfred with a slight smirk. I turned to him with a frown. "Alfred, this isn't funny!" I said in a sultry voice. He chuckled, "Perhaps not to you." Then he grew serious. "I suppose we shall have to be more specific next time. Shall we get you changed back?"

I looked at my new body in the mirror again, then replied. "Um, yeah. Let's hurry up and change me back." I stepped into the chamber as Alfred flipped on the switch. As I felt the machine work around me, I started to calm down. I'd be back to normal in no time.

However, the device soon began beeping, and began to shut down. I felt rather uneasy as it opened, the grim look on Alfred's face not helping.

I walked back to the mirror and was shocked to see...
1411.title: The new girl.

choices: A revealing top and tight pants.
14111.content:
"Ohmygawd! Like, no way! This stupid thing didn't change me at all!" Bruce shrieked at her reflection. She just stared at the girl in the mirror, frustrated. She couldn't believe it hadn't changed her back. "It didn't even give me bigger boobs." she thought angrily.

Turning to Alfred, the new girl said, "Well Alfred, it looks like I'm stuck like this. I guess now I can gather information at the school. But to do that, I'm going to need some new clothes." Alfred nodded. "And a backstory too, Master Wayne. But first, some outfits would be beneficial."

After throwing on some of her old clothes to stay decent, the two arrived at the mall. While Bruce tried on clothes, Alfred got in touch with a few friends who could help establish a background for Wayne while in this body.

"Okay Alfred, what do you think?" Asked Bruce with his new voice. Alfred turned to find a stunning blonde girl in...
14111.title: Nothing had changed... That the eye could see.

choices: I looked like a muscular tomboy
I looked like a goth/punk girl
14112.content:
I groaned at the image before me, while Alfred chuckled slightly.

"Forgive me sir, but I can't help but think this one's more accurate to your personality."

"Not helpful, Alfred."
14112.title: I was still a teen girl, but now....

choices: Tough, potentially violent thug at public school
Friendly sports girl at public school
141121.content:
The girl in the mirror had obviously been working out. She maintained a healthy figure, with toned muscles and a strong air to her. Her hair was darker than the previous blondie, but still a brunette rather than a black haired girl. I briefly wondered where the blonde hair had gone and discovered, to my discomfort, a good portion of it had fallen off my head and remained at the bottom of the machine. This brown hair was much shorter and must have grown on its own.

Alfred closed the door to the machine shut. "I'm sorry Master Bruce, but I cannot allow any further experiments."

I stared at him in horror. "Alfred, what are you doing?!"

"This accursed machine has changed you multiple times. At least now you are in a form more capable of fighting. Until it can be improved, I don't want this machine anywhere near you."

"So you intend for me to be trapped as a teenage girl?!"

"I intend to stop hearing you cry out in pain, over and over again!"

That shut me up, whether I liked it or not. Afred maintained a stiff upper lip and a wry comment most of the time, but I could see this latest experience was hurting him. Just like it hurt him so many nights when I went out to fight crime.

"I apologize Mast-"

"No, Alfred, you're right. We have to be more careful and no one will expect Bruce to be a teenage girl. This will do for now."

I could see the relief on his face. "Very good, sir."

Now I just needed to craft a new identity to hide as an average school girl.
141121.title: I looked like a muscular tomboy

choices: Bruce goes to the mall to get better clothes
141122.content:
In the reflection was a young girl with half-black, half-dyed hair, which included a variety of colors. She wore heavy makeup with dark eyeshadow and black lipstick. She looked out of place in her white collared shirt. A black dress or torn jeans seemed more appropriate.

It was also my reflection. And yet, obviously, not my reflection.

I dragged an annoyed hand through my hair. "Well, this is just perfect. This machine changes me more and more by the second."

"We could try again, sir, but I fear the results of another journey through it."

Dammit. "You make a good point. Which would leave us shopping and with a new identity to craft for my undercover identity."

"What do you think, sir?"
141122.title: I looked like a goth/punk girl

choices: I met up with Stephanie Brown in the school grounds.
My trip to high school did not go according to plan.
1412.content:
At first, I could barely climb back to my feet, the sudden heavy mass that I had gained prevented proper balance. I was horrified by the form that my now repulsive body had taken. Very quickly I was starting to run out of breath. Even getting up to my feet became a challenging chore that I couldn't withstand without breaking beads of sweat. In one final attempt, I finally managed to stand up and stay up on my feet. I looked down to inspect my new body, and I was horrified by the results.

The experiment went more horribly wrong than I thought. When I activated the metamorphosis chamber, I intended to change into the form of a younger teenage version of my normal self, taking certain physical attributes from Dick Grayson to avoid being detected as Bruce Wayne. But when the machine malfunctioned, the transformation went out of control, and I was looking down at the horrific result.

At my first glance, I noticed two three huge lumps of fat bulging from my torso. The first two lumps I discovered to be considerably flat breasts, while the much larger mountain further below turned out to be my fat stomach, all stretching my old clothes. Petrified, I rushed towards the reflective mirror on the side of the broken chamber. Shocked wasn't even the word to describe how I felt as I stared at the unusual reflection of a hyper-obese fourteen year old girl with long, light brown hair, green eyes and freckles. I saw my bulging stomach squeezed inside my top, so I unbuttoned it, unleashing a sudden rush of fat out in plain sight. I noticed that my chubby face was red, coated with sweat. Even standing up was proving to be difficult in such an unhealthy form. All in all, I was horrified.

"I say," I suddenly heard Alfred's voice from behind, clearly astonished by what had transpired, "Is that really you, master Bruce?"

I was too afraid to answer, all I could do was continue to stare at my reflection, as if I were in a trance, until I suddenly felt Alfred's hand tap my flabby shoulder. I turned to face him, as much as I hated to admit it, with a tear in my eye. I could feel the tear tickling the curve of my chubby cheek as Alfred opened his arms, welcoming me into his arms. With nothing further to say, still in denial about what had just happened to me, I fell into his arms, almost dropping him to the ground, and embraced him, burying my face into his bicep and began crying. This was clearly the hormones effecting my personality. Despite the malfunction, the metamorphosis chamber made an almost perfect alteration.

Eventually I managed to regain my composure, since there was very little of my dignity left to maintain. With Alfred's aid and comfort, I inspected the damage. Unfortunately however, Alfred estimated that the machine would not be functional for another three months. Although the transformation was not as I intended, I was still in a suitable form to carry out my plan, as intended, for at least the first quarter of the school year.

So, with this in mind, after appointing Nightwing in charge of the Batcave, Alfred made the arrangements. Unfortunately however, with little time to spare, and little time to get used to my new short, chunky body, I was scheduled to attend my first day as a freshman in Gotham high school the following morning.
1412.title: Fat Freshman

14121.content:
It was the longest night I've ever had, and that was saying something. I couldn't sleep, I was restless in the body of a fat short teenage girl, I just couldn't get comfortable. What was more horrible was that I was unable to survey the dark streets of Gotham city as Batman but instead, as Nightwing filled in for the missing dark knight, I had to stay in bed until the morning, where I will face life as a high school freshman once again, only this time however, as a chubby teenage girl.

Morning broke earlier than usual. I was not used to waking up so early in the morning, especially not in such an unhealthy form. Nonetheless, with Alfred's unnecessary help, I got up and got ready for my first day back in school. It felt awkward when Alfred walked in with the school uniform. It was bad enough that I had to attend school in such a horrendous form, but to wear such a tight vest and a loose skirt was truly undignified, even for a playboy billionaire! I felt absolutely ridiculous in the uniform, and I looked equally as shocking. Even Alfred was embarrassed for me! Despite everything however, I had to press on. This was my life from now on and, for the next three months at least, I had no other choice but to get used to it.

Alfred dropped me off in the school grounds from the limo. With my backpack around my shoulder, I watched as Alfred drove out of sight, leaving me alone to face the horror of returning as a high school freshman, or at least I thought.

A group of tall girls, possibly from the eleventh grade, approached me, looming over me with scornful looks upon their faces. In an attempt to intimidate me, one of the girls, apparently named Crystal Horrocks, stood before me, with a sick smile on her lips, and harshly pushed me, slightly knocking me off balance. I tried my best to stand firm, but it was futile. These were evidently the bullies of the school, picking on their seemingly weaker peers, but unfortunately for me, I was currently stuck in the body of a weak overweight girl, completely defenseless against such intimidating girls. Before things could get out of hand however, we were separated when a blonde senior student rushed in between us, chasing the junior students away, at least for the moment.

The blonde girl turned around and looked down to me. I was relieved to be greeted by the face of Stephanie Brown, a friend of Tim Drake from back when he himself attended high school. I recognized her as the vigilante Spoiler, but in school, she was simply recognized as the bright, popular school girl. With a smile on her face, she made a cheeky remark. "Hello Bruce, did you lose some weight?"

"Very funny Stephanie," I replied, unimpressed by her attempt at humor, "But thanks, I didn't think those girls would leave me alone."

"Yeah, Crystal's crew can be a bit spiteful at times, but as long as you stay with me, then you'll be alright."

"Thanks. It's very kind of you to allow me to pose as your little sister for a while."

"That's right! I guess you are my little sister from now on, right?"

"Only for three months, but after this, we'll go back to our separate ways again. Okay?"

"Okay Bruce...oops, I'm sorry. I mean Britney Brown!"

With that said, Stephanie led me through the front door, touring me through the school grounds and constantly reminding me of my new name. I had to get used to being called Britney, a name that made me slightly cringe every time I heard it. Unfortunately however, I realized that I also had to get used to being compared to Stephanie by her peers, who treated me like the young girl that I had become. I could have done without the fat remarks, but I should have known how hard life in school would be like this.

Eventually it was time for first period. Stephanie and I had to go our separate ways, at least for a short period of time, as I faced my first class alone, where I would be introduced to the students who I would be studying with for the next three months or so.
14121.title: Stephanie's Little Sister

choices: I went shopping for clothes first.
I went to the optometrist first.
1413.content:
Looking back at me from the reflection was a small mouse-like girl with a face completely dotted with freckles. One thing I noticed was she was squinting back at her reflection with soft brown eyes. Her dark shoulder length bright ginger hair was somewhat frizzy. As I looked at my reflection I noticed that I were not a bomb shell, I looked more like a shy girl that was more concerned with her studies than with her looks.

Alfred looked in shock at what had happened. Before him stood this cute mousy girl glaring at her reflection, he was at a complete loss for words.

Finally the words formed in his mouth "Sir!? I can see that the chamber was to some extent a success. Would you like me to get the car ready? I believe we will need to go shopping. And we may want to look into an optometrist to see if you need glasses." He stood waiting for a reply.

His words broke me from my trance-like state as I looked towards Alfred, realizing I could barely make him out and say in a quiet voice, "Y-Yes Alfred, I think that would be a good idea..." Sill in a dazed state, I looked back at my reflection, awestruck by the unexpected result of my machine malfunction. I anticipated the chamber would at least change me back into a younger version of myself, but instead, I had become a weak, fragile, mousy girl, presumably the age of a sophomore.

"Very well sir...I mean madam! I will pull the car around; come out when you are ready."

1422.content:
Lightning flashed outside the window as Batman walked through Arkham Asylum’s library.

Despite all the time Bruce Wayne has spent visiting the old mental hospital he had never grown comfortable with it.

He knew everyone of its inmate’s record from the famed like Joker, Two Face, and Riddler to the forgettable like Sumo, Humpty Dumpty and Zerba-man.

Bruce felt like he had a responsibility to help them, just like he felt that he had a responsibility to protect the city of Gotham. A few he had known before their fall into insanity; but he knew that none of them were born mad criminals.

They were all victims of tragedy and misfortune that had broke their mental state.

He knew that he could have been one of those inmates following the deaths of his parents all those years ago if it hadn’t been for the likes of Alfred and Dr. Tompkins.

So he did what he could to help. He often made donations to the hospital from his personal funds and did his best to make sure that the brightest mind were given jobs in its walls.

Bruce’s dream is that one day those he had battled over years would be healed and be able to live the lives they deserved not the ones they were given.

Bruce saw the security guards surrounding the massive hole in the library’s wall.

“About time you got here!” Aaron Cash head of the Asylum’s security yelled to the cape crusader.

“How many got through?” Batman asked as he looked through the massive hole.

“Hard to tell they didn’t sign the guess book.” One of the guard joked

Batman didn’t laugh.

“At least a dozen. They also took the librarian as well.” Aaron said

Batman entered the hole in the wall, it was apparently connected to the old building which had left a secret passageway behind the walls.

As Batman traveled down the path the old tile floors changed to dirt and began to descend into the ground like it was cave.

Batman eventually reached a massive cavern and in the center of it was a large Ruby Spider Totem.

Batman move closer to it and scanned it. To his surprise it had a high Mana level which rivaled magic produced by the Mistress of Magic herself Zatanna.

Suddenly before he could decide how to proceed on this discovery

143.title: Preteen Horror

choices: The device has some unintended consiquences
144.content:
Selena Kyle never considered herself a good person, she just never considered herself an evil one either. She straddled the line between thief and vigilante, robbing from the rich, giving to herself, and sometimes helping out the city when a madman went to far. But all the good she did for the city never gave her any benefits. She was trapped in her small apartment, with frequent visits from her parole officer, and it was all thanks to Batman.

She never really understood his obsession with stopping her. She didn't kill anyone, and only hurt others in self defense, there where dozens of people doing worse things in the city every night. Of course, she never really understood her own obsession with him. He would never team up for a heist with her, and she would never be invited to go patrolling with her.

She bit her lip in excitement. Beside her bed, she had just acquired the latest piece of technology from LexCorp science labs, a secret machine that would have been banned from existence if anyone knew it existed. It was the ultimate weapon, a gun that wouldn't kill her opponent, but transform them to her will. A machine that had a psychic connection to its user, and could reform the victims DNA, and fabric. The thought of what she could do with it excited her to no end.

With it she could alter the Batman to become her sidekick, and be the love that she deserved. But she knew its effects on the mind were limited, it would take some time from Gotham's Dark Knight to come around. She didn't care. The gun was ready to be tested.

She put on her famous costume, grabbed the gun, put the telepathic chip under her hair, and went out into the city's rooftops.

She knew the streets well. She knew Batman well. She knew his patrol route. It was only a matter of time before she ran into the Caped Crusader.

“Selina, shouldn't you be in your apartment, next to your patrol officer?” a gruff voice asked behind her.
“Please, when I'm dressed to kill, at least call me by my professional name,” she said.
“Catwoman, there are no exotic cat-themed diamonds on loan in Gotham. Go home.”
“Fine. But the least you can do is escort me back, like a true gentleman,” she said seductively.
“The only place I'll escort you is to Gotham PD,” Batman said as he grabbed her shoulder.
“Well, if you won't be a gentleman, what's the point in being a man at all?” she asked, as she turned around and shot him with the device.

14432.title: Batman/Catwoman to Batwoman/Catman

choices: Batwoman becomes more of a Bat Burglar
144321.content:
As Batman stumbled backwards, he immediately felt bizarre sensations coursing through his body. He gripped his chest in pain as his bones cracked and shifted and... changed.

Catwoman wasn't doing much better. While she had expected Batman to experience a strange alteration, the jolt of energy zooming in her veins was an unexpected development. She pushed herself away from the Caped Crusader. This wasn't right. If it malfunctioned and something happened to her and Batman...

She had to get out of here.

Batman reached out to stop her but the shifting sensations were too much. He fell to his knees, only able to watch as Catwoman pushed through roof door and fumbled down the stairs.

The thief had to lean on the railway, struggling down each step. With every second came a new, unusual feeling. Fat moved around, shifting from the chest to fill out an increasing height. Soft skin and a thin waist altered to muscle and strength. The costume began to tear in places, unprepared for its new occupant.

But the strangest feeling of all... was a bizarre new guilt in the pit of her stomach.

On the roof, Batman was struggling with his own changes. His towering height was shrinking, reallocating to fill the same chest area Catwoman lost. Years of bruising and scars vanished and smoothed out. Hands course from training and fighting were now dainty and soft. His muscle hadn't quite vanished, but it was more hidden than usual. His hips and waist, already benefiting from the Wayne genes, found it easy to shift into an hour-glass figure.

Batman took several, long, deep breaths. He was almost swimming in the outfit by now.

Both masked figures paused again, gasping in shock as one more change hit their bodies.

And the changes were complete.

By the time Batwoman recovered enough to chase down her attacker, Catman had vanished into the night.

With a sigh lighter than she would like, Batwoman radioed Alfred. "I'm coming home, Alfred. Don't ask- I'll explain later."

-------

It took some doing to explain the situation to Alfred. Several childhood stories and code words had to be exchanged before the loyal butler finally let this new woman into the cave.

And now here she was, standing in front of a mirror, looking herself over.

Several thoughts leaped from Batwoman's analytical mind.

1. I'm going to kill Selina.
2. Muscle mass changed, but not vanished. Still have power to win most fights.
3. Temporary suit is going to be necessary. Adjust for shifts in balance. Add some weight to what I've lost.
4. More than one suit, actually. There are some pros to this. One suit to emphasize fear, need to keep striking fear. But... there could be something to using this body to a different advantage.

Batwoman did not consider why this thought leaped so quickly to the surface.

5. Bruce Wayne... he's on vacation. A cousin- no, too much attention. An assistant? Possible. Perhaps, there should be more identities for more suits. A wealthy socialite could get into the same places as Bruce and an assistant could get into places he couldn't.

She flicked with her hair a little. It was a bit short. She was sure it was longer than it was but it could be improved.

6. Style it into something more attractive.

And while she was at it-

"Master Bruce?" She turned quickly at the sound of her loyal butler. He was carrying a small pile of women's clothing. "Leftover from some of your many romances, I imagine."

"Thank you, Alfred." Voice. That was going to take some getting used to. Lighter. She'd have to experiment with different tones and inflections.

He was looking at her strangely. "You seem to be taking this... better than expected, Master Bruce."

"Its just a little change." She ignored his raised eyebrow. "And its temporary. As soon as we find Selina, I steal back what she stole from me."

"The sooner the better, sir."

She gave a non-committal hum, looking through the outfits. "I'll need some new identities in the mean time. Something that people won't look too closely at."

"I'll begin preparation for the fake IDs, sir."

"Very good, Alfred."

Batwoman was quick to focus on the work ahead of her. She didn't have time to consider any other changes she might be unaware of.
144321.title: Yes, Villain-Batwoman and Hero-Catman

1443211.content:
There were certain advantages to this arrangement. The body required some adjusting, sure. She had to practice with her voice. Her posture. Her behavior. Little experimentation here and there. She had to blend in so people didn't ask questions.

And it was so much easier to blend in as this woman than it was as Bruce Wayne. No one had ever seen this woman before. And nine times out of ten, she'd be forgotten by whoever she encountered before long. Depending on the outfit, strangers weren't often looking at her face.

She felt some stranger pride in that.

Her main focus, however, was tracking down Catwoman. Wherever that ferocious feline went, she had hidden deep underground. Not a single trace of the thief remained.

So, Batwoman turned to predicting the thief's next move. She glanced through local art shows and museums around town. Any event or function that might grab the burglar's interest.

But when she thought about it, it seemed risky to leave those precious artifacts where they were. Catwoman was too crafty. She could steal them any time. And Batwoman had no way to stop her.

That was when she hit on an idea. A deviously, wickedly, clever idea.

What if she stole the artifacts first?

It only made sense. Replacing art with identical forgeries. Inside the forgery would be a tracking device. With that precaution, Catwoman would be caught in no time.

Her plans formed quickly. The prize Harrington Ruby was on display at a local gala. That would be Batwoman's best chance to make the switch.

She didn't explain this to Alfred. He wouldn't understand.

The question was, how to go about it... she needed a convincing disguise...
