14432111.content:
It took a little thought, but Bruce quickly knew the best answer for this particular issue: if one wanted to go unnoticed at a fancy party, one needed to blend in perfectly. And there was nothing more common at such a gathering as a ditzy bimbo of a socialite. With that decided, it came time to plan the heist. No, the plan! Bruce reminded herself. I'm only stealing this to get to Catwoman! That excuse settled Bruce's conscience, but on some deeper level she knew that it was just an excuse, a rationalization she was using when really, the theft itself sounded more exciting than beating up any number of supervillains.

So instead of fighting crime, the transformed Dark Knight was instead working on committing one. Perfecting the disguise wasn't too hard, even with the new body. Bruce had the curves for the disguise without needing to artificially enhance them, and the make-up came easy to her as well. She found the perfect blonde wig and dress, and once that was all done, it came time to figure out how to hide the gadgets she'd use to take the ruby. It turned out there was an easy carrying place all along: her new cleavage. Sure enough, she was easily able to fit in the fake ruby, lazer scalpel, and a remote interface for causing a blackout. Now, it just came time to pull off the job.

choices: Alfred gives Bruce a telling off.
Before Bruce can get home, Selina attacks.
144321111.content:
When Bruce arrived at the party, she was entirely in character. Giggling off and on, laughing at any halfway funny joke she heard, showing off her wonderful curves to anyone willing to take a peak, it was intoxicatingly fun. But the mission was always in Bruce’s mind, so she made sure to wind her way through the party and over to where the ruby was held. There was no sign of her foe, but just the act of remembering what Bruce had seen of it before leaving got her even more excited.

Yes, Selina in a man’s body would be quite the opponent...and quite the lover as well. The thought immediately sounded both wonderful and strange to Bruce, and she shook her pretty head. I can’t far too fall into character, she reminded herself. Of course, not ten minutes later, she found the opportunity: everyone had moved to another room, and the guards had gone with them. Alone now with the diamond, Bruce carefully took out the fake ruby and laser scalpel from her cleavage, cut a hole in the glass, and carefully pulled out the real gem (which she’d researched to find had no internal protection, like laser tripwires), put in the fake one, and his the scalpel and the real ruby in her cleavage once more.

Now, it was time to get back to acting. Letting large tears start running down her face, Bruce ran into the next room and purposefully bumped into a tall, manly guard. “Guards, I saw someone suspicious, and they, they, they took something!” Bruce extended a well-manicured finger to where she’d just come from, and the guard quickly went into the room, calling for back-up. Before another guard could come up to her Bruce pressed on her earring, which was actually the blackout button. The lights went out, but Bruce had memorized the layout and easily found her way out of the party and into the night, smiling gleefully.

That had been...so amazing!! Her heart was pumping so fast, and it had been so easy! All those skills she’d accumulated to fight crime, they could so easily be used to cause it. With the ruby (literally) quite close to her heart, she knew Selina would be after her soon. After all, Catwoman always made a point to steal anything she wanted if it had been nabbed by a less experience criminal, it was part of her vanity. Bruce could understand why, there was a lot for Selina, and now Bruce, to be vain about.
144321111.title: A Thieving Bat

choices: Bruce works with Selina to try and change back.
Bruce swipes the device and wants to stay this way.
1443211112.content:
Now walking in the night air, the chill of it making goosebumps spread across Bruce’s slender arms, she was almost to her car, ready to flee the scene completely, when a masculine hand grabbed hold of her shoulder. “I think you have something that doesn’t belong to you,” came a baritone rumble, and Bruce turned to see Selina there, still a man, still utterly gorgeous.

In a way, the ex-Catwoman didn’t look too different from how Bruce herself had looked as a man. Broad shoulders, well developed musculature, and a chin so defined it could cut glass. Just looking at this man, and feeling his hand on her, made Bruce shiver in anticipatory pleasure. “Well, well, well. Look who finally decided to show his face. I thought you weren’t going to put in an appearance.” Still, what he’d said did rile Bruce up a little, so she added, “Why do you care if I’ve taken a little trinket? Which of us is the renowned cat burglar?”

Looking at his face, it was clear Selina was struggling between treating Bruce lightly and being more serious. “That’s true, but...” It looked like Selina was struggling with something, before finally saying, “Haven’t you noticed it, Bruce? We didn’t just change in our bodies. I’ve been finding myself thinking of crime as beneath me, and you went from Batman to Batthief in no time at all. We’ve taken on each other’s moral stances, as well as other things.”

Bruce considered that. It was certainly true she’d taken to theft like a cat to canary hunting. It was fun. Exciting. So much more exhilarating than punching thugs. But before this, she’d hated criminals, and now she was one. Now that she was aware these changes were the cause, what was Bruce going to do about it? She could work with Selina to turn back...or she could take the time to enjoy this new life a little more.

145.content:
While trying to stop the latest crime spree, the dynamic duo were faced with a crisis. During a fight against Poison Ivy, Robin was hit with a new chemical, capable of altering the biology of an individual. Now undergoing drastic physical changes, Richard Grayson found himself struggling to cope with his new form. It was up to the caped crusader and the former boy wonder to find a cure, because if they failed to do so, they would have had to get used to their new situation.

Some time had passed since this bizarre event, and things had changed. Dick Grayson dropped his old alias and abandoned his former mentor to become the vigilante known as Nightwing, and the second young man to adopt the Robin persona was left dead by the infamous Joker. Now accompanied by Tim Drake, the latest young ward to fight alongside the dark knight, Batman was faced with a similar crisis. This time however, it was him to be hit by the biology-altering chemical, and to make things worse, it was not only capable of altering gender, it was also capable of altering age! This time, it was up to Robin to find a cure before his mentor is transformed into a girl even younger than himself!

So which of these stories would you prefer to follow?
145.title: More Gender Swap Stories

choices: Batman managed to capture Poison Ivy.
1451.content:
The moon hung over Gotham's red sky as two shadowy silhouettes blurred between rooftops. Beneath them, an old, previously abandoned warehouse saw new life in it, as large wooden crates were unloaded from a still running truck.
"Do you think this is the spot?" Robin asked gleefully.
The tall dark figure beside him looked through a pair of miniature binoculars, focusing on the guards necks. A green vine was coming out from their shirt collars, and creeping into their ears.
"It's the right place," the figure said, with a respectful amount of intensity in his voice.

The larger dark figure was better known to the world as Batman, the caped crusader of Gotham, his city. With his civilian identity as billionaire playboy Bruce Wayne, he siphoned money from his own company to fund his night-time activities. Ever since Bruce's parents were shot in front of him by a mugger when he was only eight years old, he dedicated his life to freeing the city from other crimes. For a reason that will forever be unknown to the general public, he decided to fight crime while dressed as a bat. Beside him was Robin, the boy wonder. He was dressed in a black, red and yellow suit, but did not have nearly the amount of gadgets or armor that his mentor did. Robin also had a civilian identity as Dick Grayson, the ward of Bruce Wayne. He was more acrobatic than the tall man beside him, an attribute he received by training to be a circus acrobat with his parents before their untimely deaths.

With an unspoken signal, both heroes swooped down from the shadows and got into a quick scuffle with the guards. As the guards fell, they didn't make a sound. "Strange," said Batman, as he examined the unconscious guard on the floor. He plucked the vine from the ear and the guard's eyes suddenly opened wide. Batman covered the man's mouth to stop him from yelling. "Quiet," he whispered as he took the hand off of the guard's mouth.
"Where am I? What's going on?" the guard whimpered.
"It appeared you were under the influence of Gotham's famed femme fatale..."
"...Poison Ivy?" the guard finished, in both in fear and surprise.
"Go home, and take your friend with you," Batman said as he pointed to the other guard, and with the guards gone, Robin, who was acting as a look-out on top of the truck, did a mid-air somersault and landed on one of the crates. With less distractions, Batman began to become more aware of his surroundings, and let Robin look through the cargo being transported.

"What do you see?" Bruce asked after Robin rummaged through the evidence.
"Packages of seeds, extra strength mineral growing water," Robin replied as he held up a container, "And this."
"Careful Robin," said the caped crusader as the biological hazard symbol caught his eye.
"I'm always careful," Robin smirked as he tossed it into the air and caught the canister behind his back.
"There's probably more clues inside. Find a safe place to hide that, and we'll check out what's inside the warehouse."

Robin tucked the container into a pocket in his cape, and merged into the shadows as he was taught to do.

Undetected, the two crime fighters made it inside, and hid between the piles of crates until something caught their attention. "There are giant vines growing between these crates," Robin stated. Batman merely gave him a stern look, disappointed that his partner broke silence to point out the obvious. Unfortunately, most of Bruce's expressions looked the same, and no one besides himself could ever tell what he was thinking.

"Soon, soon the city of sisters will be at one with nature!" A familiar voice echoed from deeper within the shadows.
"Indeed Pamela, indeed," said the person at the other end of the conversation. Robin looked through the cracks in the crates. The woman known as Poison Ivy was speaking into a portable computer. More brainwashed guards where unpacking the crates around her. The containers of chemicals were being carefully put on the table housing her computer.

Pamela Lillian Isley was an ex-biochemist turned eco-terroritst after a chemical explosion at a lab made her skin a shade of green. She developed an extra-human ability to talk to and control plants, and was known throughout the criminal community to be an expert in the art of seduction.

"Now, while she's distracted Robin," said Batman quietly before they both leaped into action.

"Pamela Isley, your reign of wretched root growing carnage is about to be plucked!"

"Batman? What took you so long?" asked Ivy in a rather suggestive voice. Batman flung himself out of the way, as two vines flew at him. Meanwhile, Robin managed to take down one of the guards.

"What's happening?" the guard screamed in surprise as Robin took a vine out of his ear.
This distracted Ivy, and Robin thought he'd get her attention by jump kicking the other guard in the back.
"Robin, careful," shouted Batman as the guard dropped one of the containers with a bio-hazard sign on it.
"Relax, I got it," said Robin and he dove down and caught the container before it broke on the ground.
"Is that so?" smirked Ivy, as a vine whipped the containers off of the table, causing them to break in front of Robin.

A purple gas seemed to come from the broken capsules. "Robin," Batman yelled, "Hold your breath!" In response, Robin covered himself with his cape as he tried to roll away. "No more games Isley!" Batman grabbed the eco-terrorist by her soft wrists.

"It's been a while since you held me this way, big boy," Ivy replied playfully.
1451.title: The Bust

14511.content:
Suddenly a flower that Poison Ivy kept in her hair opened, and Batman's eyes were attacked by pollen. Instinctively he let go of her to try and rub them. He quickly regained his composure, and grabbed a miniature spray can from utility belt, and pointed it towards his face. With a squirt, he could instantly see again, but Ivy was already growing a giant stalk of some sort through a hole in the roof of the old crumbling warehouse.

"Too late to catch her," he thought to himself, "Must check on Robin."

"Robin are you okay?" Batman yelled.
"Fine," Robin replied as he looked up from his cape. He was a good fifty yards from where the chemicals were released.
"We should evacuate and call in a HAZMAT team," Batman yelled at the guards, slightly disappointed by his failure to capture the criminal, and in response, everyone quickly exited the building.

"Stop worrying about me Batman," Robin said as Batman expressed his concern for his partner.

"Lover's quarrel?" one of the guards joked, and in response, Batman immediately turned to glare at him, shutting the guard straight up.
"Call the Gotham City Police, tell them what you saw here," Batman grunted.
"Right," the guard replied, but as he turned back to ask another question, he realized that all that was around him were shadows.

At the Batcave, the cavern below Bruce Wayne's family estate of Wayne Manor, which acted as the guy's center of operations, Bruce sat in front of his giant computer, looking at Robin. Both vigilantes were unmasked, and they could now read each others' emotions.

"You were too reckless out there, we were dealing with an unknown substance during that battle, your actions not only allowed for me to be distracted to the point where Isley got away, but also put yourself within contact on an unknown chemical being gathered by an eco-terrorist."

"Nothing happened, okay Bruce? We stopped her plan and cut off her supplies. I took precautions, and I didn't get exposed to the chemical," Dick replied, agitated by his mentor's behavior.

"Sometimes I wonder if you're too young to be doing these things we me."

"Sometimes I wonder if I wouldn't be more successful patrolling on my own."

The two looked at each other, each trying to keep their emotions in check.

"It's been a long night, we'll talk more in the morning." Dick didn't want to argue. He was tired, and even though he wouldn't admit it to anyone, the close exposure he had to the chemicals creeped him out. There were rumors that Poison Ivy was experimenting on turning people into plants. He became freaked out at the thought of what could have happened if he had been exposed.

Taking off his uniform, he walked up a staircase and stepped into a passageway leading to Wayne Manor.
14511.title: Back to the Cave

choices: They decided to conduct some tests.
145111.content:
Dick had trouble waking up in the morning. His eyes felt heavier than usual, and even though the sun was coming right through the window onto his face, all he wanted to do was roll over.

There came a knock on the bedroom door. "Master Dick, I encourage you to get down to the kitchen soon, your breakfast may get cold." It was Alfred Pennyworth, the loyal butler who had raised Bruce Wayne since before he was an orphan.

His stomach felt empty, and began to rumble. He threw off his covers and got up. He then stopped instantly as he realized something was very wrong. He looked down at his shirtless torso to see two barely developed breasts jiggle with his movement. With fear, he poked the side of one to see if it was a dream. His finger popped back as he realized how sensitive the new area was. His fingers were slimmer too, and his arms were more slender. All the muscles he had been building seemed to have disappeared. His legs even seemed different. They got wider as they moved towards his hips. He had thick child-bearing hips now! His boxers even looked flatter than usual, and in horror, Dick realized that he couldn't feel the stretch in them that he could most mornings. He slowly lifted the boxers to find that his male anatomy had been completely replaced with parts for the fairer sex. In his bare feet, he hopped to the mirror, trying to adjust to his new proportions.

He stared at the girl in the reflection, the first thing he noticed was that his lips were plumper than they used to be. His nose was smaller, his jawline looked less squared, his eyelashes were longer, and his eyebrows even looked skinnier. His hair was still the same length, but it seemed shinier than it usually did. He touched it and noticed it had a softer feel that his hair did before the change. As he touched his face, he noticed that his skin felt softer too. Being trained as a detective, all the information came into his head, as he pieced together what had just happened. Somehow in the night, he had become a girl!

A loud higher pitched scream emerged from his throat, as he heard the doorknob to his room frantically turn.
Alfred barged in. "Is everything alright...miss?" In surprise, Alfred quickly did a visual examination of the room, and realized that Dick was nowhere to be seen. Alfred looked at the girl, standing in only men's boxers in front of the mirror. She looked like she could have been master Grayson's twin sister. "Master Dick?" he asked quietly, shyly trying to avert his eyes from the girl's bare chest.

"Oh Alfred," Dick sighed as he became overly emotional about the situation and ran into the butler's hands to cry.

"What's going on?" Bruce asked as he jogged up the stairs. He was already in his track suit and had done two laps around the estate, but he stopped jogging as he saw a nearly naked girl in his helper's arms.

Alfred looked up at the man he had raised almost single-handedly and said "We have a situation sir."
145111.title: Dick wakes with Something Missing

choices: Focus on Robin's Point of View.
Focus on Batman's Point of View.
1451111.content:
It was six hours later in the Batcave when the results had come in. Using state of the art computers, and getting some of his most trusted allies to diagnose scans of the blood sample, Bruce had come to one conclusion; that his partner was now female.

All the results said the same thing; that Dick was in amazing shape for a kid his age, but somehow turned into a young woman overnight. Looking over his shoulder, Bruce watched Dick try and do aerobics on a set of exercise bars he set up in the corner of the cave. Dick had just missed one of the bars because he was still trying to balance the weight in his chest and depend on his upper body strength.

Alfred walked over and placed a cup of hot chocolate beside Bruce. "Penny for your thoughts, sir?"

"It doesn't make sense. I've read the police reports about the toxins found at the crime scene, nothing there matched anything that could have just switched a person's gender. He must have been exposed elsewhere."

"Sir, might I suggest calling your ex for assistance?"

"Zatanna? I've already sent her a message. With any luck, she'll be able to get to the city by the end of this week. In the meantime, I want Dick to be kept a close eye on. As far as I can tell, his brain scans still suggests that he has male brain patterns. There is no telling how he will deal to situations in society, or fighting crime."

"Yes sir, I'll keep my eye on him...er, her." With that said, Alfred then walked down to the young lady, who had only yesterday been a male. She was trying her balance on the requirement. As Alfred walked up, she was on her twentieth second of doing a one-armed handstand while doing the splits. "Very impressive Master Dick," Alfred said and she pushed herself off the beam and made a perfect landing.

"Tell me you have some good news, Alfred."

"Good news, as far as all the tests could tell, is that you're perfectly healthy. In fact, despite the metamorphosis, you seem to be incredibly fit for a woman your age."

"So it's not going to reverse on it's own?" she asked.

"We'll need to do more tests tomorrow," Alfred replied with little emotion in his voice.

"But you said I'm fine. And just because I don't have a penis doesn't make me any less dangerous in the field!"

"If you say so, sir." Before he walked away, the butler noticed that Dick has been rubbing her shirt throughout her exercises. "Perhaps this will help," he said, handing something over to Dick.

"What is it?" Dick asked holding the object in front of him.

"It's called a sports bra, sir," said Alfred in his trademark deadpan manner.
1451111.title: Robin's Test Results

choices: She woke up in the morning.
During her sleep, more changes took place.
14511111.content:
She hated to admit it, but the sports bra made movements easier. Even though it felt a bit tight, she managed to improve her motion, and did better on the exercise equipment. "That wasn't so hard," Dick said, wiping the sweat from her forehead.

"Indeed, sir, but you can still expect to skip patrolling the city tonight." Dick looked at Alfred, not sure if she found it odd to still be called 'sir' or not. Still, Alfred's mannerisms hadn't seemed to change at all, and there was something about that which she found very comforting. Ever since she woke up, Bruce seemed more distant. "If you'd like to come upstairs, I'm sure I could whip up something to your liking," Alfred offered. Dick then looked at her figure. She knew that females stored fat differently in their systems than men did, but she figured splurging on a treat after exercise wouldn't hurt.

As she made it to the kitchen, a large dish of chocolate ice cream sat in the middle of the table. "You shouldn't have," she said as she took a large bite. The sudden rush of cold gave her an instant headache and she stopped for a minute. She probably would have stopped eating there, but after a bite, this craving for chocolate emerged, and she started taking much smaller spoon sizes.

She felt full much sooner too. It was probably because her body was smaller.

"Are you not going to finish your ice cream sir? There is still half a bowl left."

"No thanks Alfred, I'll save it for later," she said. She wanted to burp, but looking at Alfred, she felt too self conscious to do it in front of him. "I think I'm going to retire to my room now."

"But it's only four in the afternoon," Alfred protested.

"Well, I'm tired and need my beauty sleep," she joked.

"Very good mam," Alfred replied, trying to get in on the joke.

For the rest of the afternoon, Dick looked at her reflection in the mirror. Making weird faces, doing feminine poses, and a bunch of other things people would hold against her forever if they ever found out she did them. "It's only temporary," Dick whispered to herself, trying to reassure herself.

As night appeared, she looked out the window. She knew Bruce was out there right now, fighting crime, and trying to catch Poison Ivy, so he could cure her. She had no clue why she was so sleepy. Usually this time at night was when she was most awake. Maybe the body was taking up more energy because of the transformation.

With a feminine sigh, she laid back on her bed and closed her eyes.
14511111.title: The Rest of Robin's Day

choices: On the way to the mall...
145111111.content:
Dick woke up to an unpleasant feeling in the morning. Her back, chest and arms hurt. "Ow," she peeped as she kept trying to move her arms. She looked down and realized that she fell asleep with her sports bra still on. After a very painful effort to remove it, she moved to the bathroom and filled the tub with hot water, where she let the pain soak away for an hour. She didn't want to leave, she felt comfortable, natural, and safe here, like she was in a womb. Then she remembered that she now possessed a womb. This thought stirred her from her relaxed state, and she got out of the tub. Wrapping a towel around herself, she walked back to her dresser, where she realized that all of her clothes no longer fit her. Throwing on a oversize t-shirt and some briefs, she walked down to the kitchen, where Alfred was making oatmeal.

"Good morning, master Dick. Breakfast will be provided shortly."

"Thanks Alfred," she said, trying hard not to make eye contact with him.

"What's the matter sir? Lady troubles?"

"I woke up wearing a bra, I was in pain for like half an hour. None of my clothes fit me, and I don't feel like myself."

Alfred stayed quiet until the oatmeal was finished. "Well master Dick, I suppose we could travel to the city and pick up an outfit or two which you would find more comfortable to wear."

"Are you sure that's wise?"

"You being grouchy and sore on top of being a woman does no one here any good."

After breakfast, the two entered the secret passage, accessed behind a clock, to enter the Batcave. "Master Bruce always keeps a few extra disguises in here," Alfred said, as he pulled out a giant chest that was hidden under the stairs. The chest opened, and a mirror was on the inside of the lid, along with dozens of wigs, coats, and clothes of all shapes and sizes.

"Hey, there are black spandex pants in here," Dick said.
"As well as a tank top, and a long-haired wig matching your color."
Dick tried on the wig, and it really did look like she had been growing out her hair for months. "Alfred, look away."
"Yes mam," Alfred said as he turned his back to her and covered his own eyes. After a minute, she said, "Okay, you can look now."

Alfred turned towards Dick and saw a girl with long jet black hair, wearing spandex, and a tank top two sizes too large for her, showing more than a liberal amount of cleavage.
"Sir, your boxers are on the ground," Alfred said.
"They made the spandex look all crunchy," she said.

Alfred knew that new clothes needed to be found soon, the combination of pieces were most unflattering, and if she moved around two much, soon a camel toe would start to show.

"Very good master Dick, shall we head towards the mall?"
145111111.title: Day Two Begins

choices: It was another group of attackers.
1451111111.content:
Alfred and Dick took one of Bruce's more casual looking cars down to the Gotham North End Mall.

"Now, if any asks, you are my niece, Patricia, visiting from Opal city," Alfred stated.

"You're over thinking this, no one is going to ask us about being related."

"Perhaps, but my face is well known to some, and the press could be more than curious of what Bruce Wayne's butler is doing with a young lady like yourself."

"Well, it's a simple in and out activity. We grab the clothes and head back."

"I pray you're correct in that assertion."

The two then parked in the giant parking lot and walked towards the stores. About an hour in, Alfred was carrying two bags of clothes, as Dick tried on yet another outfit. "We've been here much longer than intended," Alfred expressed with concern.

"Just a second," Dick said as she walked out of the change room. She was wearing a skirt that flowed down to her knees, and an old-fashioned blouse. "It provides more mobility than I expected."

"Indee..." Alfred stopped half way through as an explosion rocked an area of the mall.
1451111111.title: Alfred and Patricia

choices: Batman was in the Batcave waiting for them.
14511111111.content:
Out of the debris of the explosion, a group of five men walked into the store, all of them wearing warped clown masks. One of them fired a gun into the air. "Alright, freeze ladies! Stay still and quiet and no one gets hurt!"

Alfred looked over towards Dick to say something, but no one was there.

"Is that the girl?"
"No."
"Is it her?"
"Close, but no." The goons were inspecting at the individual ladies in attendance. Suddenly, they wandered to a girl, no more than five years old.
"Leave my daughter alone," a rich lady screamed.
"This is the one," the guy said, grabbing the little girl's arm and yanking her from her mother.

Out of nowhere, a girl wearing heavy eye shadow right across her face jumped in and hit the man in the face with a wooden foot stool. The stool broke, and the goon fell to the floor unconscious.

"One down, four more to go," Dick thought as she jumped between the rows of clothes and into the shoe section. Grabbing two high-heeled shoes, she placed one in each hand, and lashed out at the masked man coming his way. The heels hit the guy's knee caps, and as he fell to the ground, a knee emerged from under the skirt and hit the man in the face. He was out like a light. "Three more left," she thought. She grabbed a perfume bottle which had fallen out of one of the ladies' bags. "Warning: Do Not Expose to Skin," she read.

"I want her found, no way we're telling the boss that we were defeated by a teenage girl in a frilly dress," said the leader as he grabbed the five year old and held a gun to the witnesses as he backed out of the store.

Dick used the stealth skills she had been taught, until she got close enough to smash the bottle at the side of another man's face. "My eyes," he shouted as a rash broke out on him.

"You may look and act like garbage, but at least you smell pretty," Dick said as she planted her fist into the guy's face. "Ow! My bones are more sensitive than before," Dick thought as she rubbed her knuckle, trying to soothe the pain.

"Gotcha!" A larger goon grabbed Dick from behind. Dick tried to squirm, but her limbs were shorter, and she couldn't focus her weight towards the ground to slip the thug off balance. "Ya bitch, I likes it when you squirm," he chuckled in a deep voice as his thick meaty hand began to slide into Dick's skirt. This action nearly froze the poor girl, and she thought about what else the guy was going to do to her. Before the horrible thoughts could become a reality however, the goon loosened his grip, as a wooden chair broke against the back of his head. As the goon hit the floor, Dick turned around to see that Alfred had sneaked up on them. She looked at the Butler, almost as to ask permission of what to do next.

"Don't look at me miss, there is still one more ruffian that needs stopping."

"Right, thank you stranger," Dick said as she raced towards the other end of the mall.

"Who was that girl?" some of the shoppers asked each other.

As she exited the store, she found the leader of the team knocked out, as a well dressed woman put the gun in her purse, and picked up the crying five year old.
"There, there, it's alright, we're going to get you back to your mommy," she said, as she walked towards the store. She walked past Dick, giving her a look and a wink. "While he was focused on you, I got the drop on him."

Dick kept his mouth shut, he knew this woman. She was Selina Kyle, the playful socialite who would occasionally dress in a dominatrix outfit and steal cat-related items. "Girl's got to have a hobby," she continued, "Oh, and nice moves, but just between us girls, don't go so heavy on the makeup next time, it distracts too much from your other features."

"I have no idea if that's a compliment or an insult," Dick thought to herself as she looked back at the store, seeing Alfred picking up the bags and giving the exit signal to her. She quickly ran into the washroom, dabbed as much of the eye shadow as she could off her face, and squeezed though the window, where she landed in the bushes and made her way towards the vehicle.

"Are you alright Master Dick?" Alfred asked as she got in the back seat.

"Yes, very. That was the most fun I had all day," Dick said with a girlish smile. They drove out of the mall, as ten cop cars sped past them to the store they were just at. "I had no clue women's accessories would be so useful in a fight," Dick continued as she took off her wig.

"Nor did I," the Butler responded as they drove back to Wayne Manor.
14511111111.title: First Apperance of the Girl Wonder

145111111111.content:
Bruce was watching the monitors on his giant information station as the other two slowly walked down the stairs. "Looks like you two have had a busy day," he said, his eyes locked on the screens in front of him.

"We were in the right place at the wrong time," Dick answered.

"You weren't the only one, according to the news, the Duke of Cornchester's wife and daughter were also shopping there, as well as our old friend, Selina Kyle. It's too coincidental, the news is making her to look like the hero. It's more likely she set the thing up. But why?"

"So did Selina get all the credit?"

"Watch," said Bruce, nodding at the screen.

"While local socialite Selina Kyle took down the ring leader of the kidnapping attempt, it was another young woman, possibly in her mid-to-late teens who took down the other four attackers." Camera footage from the store camera's and a videophone showed Dick as the mysterious chick fighting the men.

"Well, at least they got my good side," Dick joked.

"The mysterious woman fled the scene right after her actions, and failed to leave a comment on why she did this," the reporter continued.
"She saved us all," said a random woman.
"She was pretty," said the five year old.
"I would totally go out with her, nothing hotter than a chick who can kick your ass before showing you hers," said a random teenage boy.
"He wasn't even there," complained Dick.
"Looks like he's your new fanbase," joked Alfred.

"I looked at all the available footage. You did well, all things considered."

"Thanks Bruce." Dick's heart began to beat faster, he was actually enjoying the attention.

"You still can't patrol with me tonight."

"Why?" she pouted.

"I don't have a costume that fits you, and that outfit you're wearing doesn't strike fear into the hearts of superstitious criminals." Robin looked at herself, she did look more cute than intimidating. "Have Alfred run some more blood tests on you. I want to make sure that your condition is stable before you take any further action outside of this house."

Both Dick and Alfred were silent. After the fight that day, Dick was more determined than ever to prove her worth. Alfred had medical training from his time in the special forces, but he also seemed uncomfortable running tests on the young woman beside him.

"Well?" Bruce said intensely.

"Of course sir," "Yes Bruce," the two said in unison.

"Good, now I have a lady to catch. Word on the police frequency is that she's giving the whole east end a nasty rash," Bruce said as he covered his face in the cowl. His vehicle, the dark custom designed car, better known as the Batmobile, fired up its two back engines and sped off.

Alfred went into his doctor's case and took out a needle. "This will only hurt for a second," he promised.
145111111111.title: Reviewing Her Debut

choices: She failed to defeat the thugs.
1451111111111.content:
Dick laid in her bed in a silk night gown. It was pink, and she never intended for anyone to see her in it, ever, but it was comfortable, and made her feel less exposed at night. Alfred was very hesitant to buy it, and the look on the cashier's face, when he fumbled to explain Dick was his daughter was priceless. She looked at the mirror in her room. She looked sexy. She knew it, and she hated it. She didn't want to be a physically attractive woman, she wanted to be an irresistible man. The stupid chemical that did this didn't seem to effect anyone else, so she thought at least. At least she still thought like a man.

She thought back to earlier that night, when Alfred took her blood, and did a physical examination of her. She was embarrassed, but with any luck the changes had stopped, or were about to reverse themselves. Guys don't just turn into girls, except in bad fan-fiction stories on the Internet. There was probably a way out of this. If nothing else, Bruce's ex, Zatanna, would drop by in the next few days, and could probably use her magic to cure her.

Zatanna was a stage magician, but also knew about real magic, which she sneaked into her act. By saying any sentence backwards, she could make her command a reality.

After laying in bed for an hour, Dick couldn't sleep, she thought about how much crime the dark knight was letting go in order to find the cure for her. "Well, I'm just as dangerous on my own," Dick thought to herself, "I can do this."

Filled with an emotional need to prove herself, she took off her night gown and through on some dark spandex clothes Alfred bought at the mall. She was disappointed that she didn't even look intimidating. She looked more huggable than anything else. Despite this, she put on her wig, threw on her utility belt and tied her cape around her neck. She then found some leather gloves that used to fit her before her last growth spurt. She sneered at the mirror. She looked like she was rebelling against something at least. She sighed and took out a kit full of make-up. It was in Bruce's trunk in the Batcave. She tried some on, and her reflection looked almost unrecognizable.

"Watch out crime, there's a new girl in town," she said as she did martial arts against the air in front of the mirror.

Sneaking past Alfred in the kitchen, she made it to the clock and walked down into the cave, where a miniature motorcycle was waiting for her. With the press of a button, the vehicle started up, and she blasted off through the hidden entrance and onto the road heading into Gotham city. She was on her way to the original chemical accident, which supposedly caused her transformation, when passing an alley, she saw three guys picking on a woman. Without hesitation, the bike stopped and she jumped off of it, ready to fight.

The men averaged over six feet in fight and had clearly been working out recently. Robin was momentarily distracted looking at their massive arm muscles, but quickly snapped herself out of it. "I am a man," she kept mentally repeating to herself. By the time she got close enough to strike, the crooks had already gotten the purse from the woman, and one of them was looking through it, while the others were holding the woman against the wall at knife point.

"Okay, here goes nothing," Robin thought, ready to leap into action.
1451111111111.title: Into the Night

choices: She returned the purse and went back to the Batcave
She went off to meet Catwoman beneath the pier.
14511111111111.content:
With a leap from the darkness, the Girl Wonder leaped into the air and landed right on one of the thug's shoulders and, using her fists, she bashed into both sides of the man's temple at once. As the man fell down forward unconsciously, she pushed off of him, and did a back-flip onto the pavement.

"Who the hell is that?" one thug asked in shock, "Looks like another crazy cape!"

"Silly boys, come and get me," Robin taunted.

"She's mine," said the shorter thug as he charged her.

"Silly man, I'm too fast for you," Robin said as she jumped off of the wall, "Besides, you look like you'd prefer someone whose attitude is more concrete," she finished as she directed him face first into the alley's brick wall.

"You'll pay for that," the other thug said, as he let the woman go and pointed the knife at Robin. Robin let out a smirk, she'd been trained to disarm people in these situations. This would be child's play for her. The two charged at each other as the other woman started running, yelling for the police. Within seconds, the knife was on the ground, and Robin had the man pinned down.

"And all this for a purse that doesn't even match your personality," she sneered as she tied the man's hands and feet together.

Suddenly, from the shadows came a slow clap, as a seductive frame swayed into the light. "Bravo. Perfect form, pretty good puns," said the cat burglar known as Catwoman, "But lose the suit, you can't get anywhere in this city unless you have a theme."

"It's my first time out on patrol," Dick said, defensively.

"Really? Because from what I've seen, it looks like you've been doing this for years," Selina purred playfully, "In fact, I'd think you'd even get the bat's little boy a fight to remember."

"Robin? From Batman and Robin? Don't tell me you believe in those freaks," Dick said, playing ignorant to protect his identity.

"Don't play the blonde, we both know that he's no urban myth. It's why you're out here right? You're hoping to get his attention."

"Am I?" she asked.

"Darling, believe me, he never stops for the good ones. You want the bat's attention, you need to be the bad girl," Selina smiled with a wink.

"Please tell me that's not the only reason you do your heists," Robin remarked, worried about the stereotype Selina would support if she was only doing this to get a man's attention.

"Hey, it's profitable, too," she replied as she revealed a large diamond from her pocket.

"Where did you get that?"

"Please girl, a lady must have her secrets."

Robin felt sad. This was the first female she'd talked to in a while, even before the transformation, and she looked as though she was going to blow her off. Catwoman seemed to sense the sadness beneath the make-up and wig, and decided that it might be used for an opportunity.

"Tell you what, see that purse on the ground? Bring it to me in two hours under the second pier at the harbor, and I'll let you in on a little secret." And with that offer, she swayed back into the shadows.

"This is probably Selina's way of inviting me to a girl's night out," Robin thought to herself. Was Catwoman setting her up, or was she seeing if Robin would make a good partner? Maybe she just wanted to have some fun, as both cats and girls were known to do.

Robin went over to pick up the purse. It belonged to a Mrs. O'Connell. Robin knew her. She was a widower when her husband died in the line of duty. Robin felt a sudden sense of guilt overcome her. She didn't want to steal this purse, but she might also never get a chance to gain Catwoman's trust again. Bruce would probably be back in two hours, and hell would be raised if he found out about Dick's unscheduled activities that night.
14511111111111.title: Girl Talk

145111111111111.content:
Looking at the purse, Dick felt a sense of guilt. She couldn't do it. She couldn't bring herself to take the property from officer O'Connell's widow. With a deep sigh, she felt she let herself down, this was a chance that she knew she'd never get again. But then again, Catwoman of all people would be the first to point out that curiosity could kill the cat.

Robin threw the purse around her shoulder, and started up be bike. The engine roared, and Robin felt more than a slight sensation between her legs as the vibrations started. She revved the motor three times before she realized that she'd been in the same spot for five minutes.

"I didn't do this when I left the cave earlier," Robin thought to herself as she used the mental discipline techniques she received from her mentor to ride through the city, stopping only at Mrs. O'Connell's place briefly to drop the purse off and pay her respects to the fallen officer.

The streets seemed unusually quiet outside the bike as Robin passed through them. A calm before the storm perhaps?

She made her way into the area below Wayne Manor, where she quickly put the motorcycle back into it's place and went back upstairs. Bruce was too good a detective to not realize that the motorcycle had been taken out. As Robin sneaked up to her room she thought about a few cover stories to tell Bruce. Still, her mind was only half focused on that. She wiped her make-up off in front of the mirror, embarrassed about her reaction on starting up the motorcycle. It felt so strange to get a new physical experience after training so many years to master her body.

After a few minutes, she removed the wig and looked at a tomboyish girl in the reflection. This wasn't the body that she had trained with. This was a new weapon, with different feelings, weaknesses, abilities, and social expectations. She wasn't prepared to do her night-time activities with it, but she wondered if it would be worth her time to do all the training again.

"I'll be cured by the end of the week," she assured herself, and a sadness came over her, an emotional pit that she had not revisited since the night she had lost her parents.
145111111111111.title: Returning to Wayne Manor

choices: Robin woke up to find even more changes...
1451111111111111.content:
Dick's head hurt, but she refused to let the tears start to form. She wasn't going to let herself become an emotionally sissy girl. She was going to get through this, and not hold herself back. Putting on her recently bought gym shorts and t-shirt, she went back down into the Batcave to train. An old punching bag hung beside the exercise bars. This would do fine to get her anger out.

With a swift punch of her left fist, the bag moved. It wasn't as powerful as she thought it would be, and her knuckle already hurt. She jabbed at the bag with her right hand, her breasts jiggling as she did. She had to get used to her new balance and motions if she was going to fight in battle. The punching and kicking continued for a good fifteen minutes before she was worn out, the adrenaline pushing her system.

"Don't tell me your tired now," said a deep masculine voice.
"I'm not," Dick panted.
"You take a break like this during battle and you'll be useless in the field," Batman revealed himself from the shadows. Dick turned around and sucker punched the bag. The bag gave a respectable swing.
"It's the art of deception. I only look like I'm tired," Dick joked.
"You practice that more now that you're female?" Batman replied as he walked around the equipment.
"Aren't you supposed to be finding a cure for me?"
"Depends if you want be be cured yet," Batman said with a straight face. Dick could only assume he was joking.
"Like yesterday," she smirked.

Dick knew it was usually around this time when Bruce would order her to do a training exercise, or do a surprise attack on her to see how she reacted. But nothing happened. "Why won't you get near me?" Dick's mind seemed to scream. She didn't know why, but ever since the transformation, she just wanted Bruce to comfort her and tell her everything was going to be alright.

Bruce looked at the motorcycle resting in the cave. "Have a fun ride tonight?"
"I just rode it around the estate to let out some steam," Robin lied.
"Dick, I can tell when you're lying."

She thought for a moment, then realized that she had nothing to lose by telling him what happened. "I went for a short patrol."
"Did you see anything?"
"Typical Gotham night. Stopped a purse snatching. Oh, and Selina Kyle says hi!"

Batman just stayed quiet.

"Catch Poison Ivy yet?" she asked, breaking the awkward silence.
"I'm working on some leads," Batman grumbled vaguely, "You've worked out enough for one night. We should both rest."

Robin looked down at her sweaty shirt. Her heart was beating faster than usual. The way Batman gave orders both annoyed her, and wished he'd give her more. "I guess I do need to take a shower and get some beauty sleep," Dick shrugged without thinking.
1451111111111111.title: The Locker Cave Talk

choices: Bruce needed to do more work.
14511111111111112.content:
Dick woke up sorer than usual. Her eyes felt like refusing to open, and every inch of her felt like she had just suffered through a simultaneous growth spurt. The fabric in her blankets even felt like millions of little fingers touching her. Still, the bed was warm, and feelings of safety in the womb kept her still.

It was only after the sun passed over her face that she felt like moving around to follow it. As she finally got up from the bed, the mirror held an unwelcome surprise within its reflection. The girl there was much curvier than Dick had shown herself to be. Her lips plumper, her breasts larger, and her ass rounder. Even her eyelashes seemed noticeably longer. Her hair too must have been an inch longer than it was yesterday.

The tomboyish image she had tried to adapt to while fighting crime was gone. Here was a voluptuous woman standing stunned by her own charms.

"Alfred!" she screamed.

Both Alfred and Bruce rushed into her room to see the naked woman who had once been Robin standing there. "Oh my," gasped the butler.

After finding her some clothes, the three had a very quiet breakfast before bringing her down into the Batcave. "Dick, we have something to show you," said Bruce.

"You see, I had planned to wash your crime-fighting outfit, when I saw this in the cape," Alfred continued as he placed the Robin outfit on the examination table. With his gloves on, Alfred pulled out a piece of a broken container. "I trust this looks familiar to you?"

"That's the chemical I took from the crates," Dick responded.
"Well, during the scuffle, that chemical was released from its container and was absorbed through your costume," Bruce explained. At that point, Dick's face turned red. She had forgotten that she had stuck the chemical container in her hidden pocket. She had at least some of the blame for being in her current situation.

"We tried some tests master Dick. Take a look in the microscope and tell us what you see," Alfred continued as he put a blood sample under a Wayne Tech industrial strength microscope.

"I don't know what I'm seeing," Dick said with her eye in the microscope.
"The chemical is altering the structure of the DNA," Bruce said with a hint of both sadness and determination in his voice.
"The Y-Chromosomes are being altered," Alfred finished so that Bruce's voice wouldn't choke.
"Why would that concern me?" asked Dick.
"Y-Chromosomes are the part of your genes that make you a man," Bruce explained.

Dick seemed much calmer than the others expected her to be.
"Oh. But it ends there, right?"
"I wish it were that simple young master Dick. But the cells themselves are transforming to produce more defined corners."
"In English, please?"
"The body's cells are becoming more like plant cells," Bruce answered, with a bit of anger growing in his voice.
"So I'm going to turn into a plant?" Dick asked.
"We don't know that for sure," Aflred replied as he tried to comfort her.

"Well, there is one other person with a similar cell structure," Bruce added in disdain. The other two didn't even need to get an answer, they both knew who he was talking about. Pamela Isley.

"So her plan was to change the city into a group of people like her?" Dick asked.
"As far as I can tell," Bruce said.
"But why?" she asked, hoping for a more detailed response.
"It's not the why that concerns me. It's the how and the fact that she has the materials to get this far," Bruce said.

"Forgive me sir, I have not had the pleasure of being as familiar with the lady in question as you were, but didn't Miss Isley prefer the company of men? Surely it wouldn't be in her interest to rid Gotham of them," Alfred stated.
14511111111111112.title: The Plot (and Robin) Blossoms

145111111111111121.content:
"I did some research Alfred," Bruce answered, "There is one person I've encountered before who has the means and motive to do this."
"Who?" Dick said in a higher pitch than she meant to.
"I was looking through the JLA databases, section of Greek Mythology. There is a sorceress who enjoyed humiliation of men." Bruce could see that as he spoke, both Dick and Alfred were searching their memories, trying to think of the person. "She had a knack for turning men into animals."
"Circe the sorceress?" Alfred finally inquired. There was a disappointment in Bruce's eyes as he looked at Dick. He had given the boy several books on Greek mythology, and Alfred even slowed his response to give Dick a chance to mention the answer.

"Oh," Dick said as she seemed to have split her attention between the conversation and examining her nails.
"I've called in Diana," Bruce said.
"Diana is coming here?" Dick asked as her face lit up. As a boy, Dick had a secret crush on Diana. Now in her current form, Dick was hoping to see how she'd stack up against her old crush. "She's so pretty," Dick thought, although she was unsure if it was the male or female personality that was thinking that thought.

"Nearest I can tell, Poison Ivy's plot was to infect the water supply and infect the city."
"But why?" Alfred asked.
"I'm not sure, yet..." Bruce said as he looked at Dick.

"Is there something wrong?" Dick asked as she felt Bruce gazing on her.
"Of course not," Bruce said, with his playboy persona starting to emerge. He saw that Dick was leaning sideways with her legs crossed. It was a position made to exploit her curves. Bruce wasn't sure if even Dick noticed. "Say, young lady, why don't you take the day off from training and relax?" Bruce suggested, his words noticeably more smooth.
"Okay," Dick blushed, as she held out her hand for Bruce to take it. The billionaire did, and together they walked up the cavern steps and into Wayne manor. "All this attention..." Dick's mind thought, her heart racing at the feel of human contact.

"Here you go, my lady," Bruce said as he dropped Dick off at her bedroom. Dick let out a girlish giggle.
"If you behave, maybe after lunch, we'll get you some new clothes," Bruce commented.
"But I don't want to behave," Dick almost said before stopping herself. The words refused to leave her moist lips, something about them didn't feel right.
"I'll see you in a bit," Bruce said as he shut her door.

Bruce returned to his subterranean hideaway where Alfred was already dusting the computer monitor. "Dare I ask?" Alfred remarked.
"I had to test a theory."
"Theory sir?"
"Since the moment Dick woke up, she seemed off, even for someone in her condition. Today at the table, he spent an abnormal amount of time softly humming and twirling her hair. Her heels rarely touching the ground as he rubbed her legs."
"Are you implying what I think you are, Master Bruce?" Alfred inquired.
"Dick is showing early signs of being a girl in love."
"Love? Are you sure?"
"It's what I tested just now in the cave. During our conversation, she barely made eye contact, but made several glances at our privates."
"Such conduct is unbecoming for any member of this household," Alfred protested at Bruce's observation.
"That's what concerns me. Circe doesn't want just men to become women, and Ivy would have nothing to gain from that."

Alfred was silent, not knowing how to respond. "Poison Ivy's dedication to nature, Circe's torment of men, Dick's rather unbecoming behavior, it all points to one thing."
"What's that sir?"
"Nymphs."
"Nymphs?"
"Poison Ivy made a deal with Circe to create a city of Nymphs."
145111111111111121.title: Bruce's Answer

1451111111111111212.content:
Back, next to the treeline along the boarders of the Wayne Manor estate, air pressure set down upon the freshly mowed grass. A trinity of wheel marks pressed down against certain lumps of grass. Roughly two tons of metal had just landed on the Wayne Manor, but no one outside of the pilot or those in the Batcave would ever have know.

"She's here." Batman say, in the most enthusiastic voice he could allow himself to muster.
"Then I suppose we should give her a proper greeting." Alfred said in response to Bruce's dry tone.

As the two walked out into the yard, the pilot emerged from the plane. A woman in a white business suit and large dark sunglasses, exited from what could only be described as an invisible cockpit. She leaped towards the ground and almost seemed to float the last two inches before she finally made contact with the Earth.

Her hair blowing in the wind, she was the object of feminine perfection as far as most men were concerned. Her muscled toned but not overbearing, and the colors on her face that where impossible to tell if they were painted on or natural, signaled to the men that she had arrived.

"Diana." Bruce say as he walked up to her in his playboy suit and gave her a hug.
"Mr. Bruce Wayne. Well, I haven't seen you since last week." Diana said smugly.
"If we're not careful, Clark and the others might think that we're in some sort of relationship."
"If only." Alfred signed behind them.
"What was that?" Bruce mentioned in a gruff voice.
"Oh, Alfred, it's good to see you too."

The three started walking towards the house.
"I got your message and came as soon as I could." she said.
"Thanks, while I'm not unfamiliar with Greek myths, I figured your first hand experience with them would be invaluable with this situation."
Bruce looked up to Diana in this subject because she had a direct relationship to the classical myths. While he and his other team members would call Diana Prince by her civilian name, the rest of the world knew her as Wonder Woman. She was Ambassador from her island to the world of men. Her culture breathed the reality of titans, gods, sorceresses and underworlds that most the rest of the world had written off as fiction. In fact just last week she stopped a rampaging cyclops.

"May I speak with Robin please?" she asked. She knew his real name, but using code names so often in the field, in order to protect their everyday identities, made this a habit.
"Of course. She's right upstairs." Bruce answered. He trusted Diana with his life, she only asked for permission as a formality, showing her respect towards him.
The three of them walked up the stairs as Alfred knocked on Dick's door.
"Master Dick, there is a visitor here to see you."
After ten seconds of silence, Alfred opened the door.
1451111111111111212.title: Extra Help Arrives

choices: We See Robin's Point of View
14511111111111112122.content:
"Master Dick?" Alfred said as he entered the room, but there was no response.
"Robin?!" Bruce projected his voice as he walked in.
Diana said nothing as she followed the two men.

"The window is open." said Alfred in his calm British matter-of-fact manner.
"And there are are a bunch of vines crawling up through it." Bruce said as he rubbed his chin in thought.
"Well we did have some decorative Ivy crawling on the manor walls, there was nothing that would have been able to hold a young man's weight." Alfred exclaimed.

"So Robin caused these to grow?" Diana said as she touched the plants.
"Only if my nymph theory is right."
"Nymphs do have limited control over their surrounding nature." she added.
"We saw Ivy grow a giant plant the other night, she used chemical's though. Is it possible she could have altered Dick's DNA to where it could naturally produce those chemicals?"
"If magic is involved, then yes." Diana said as she turned to walk out of the bedroom.
"Mam, may I ask where you are going?" Alfred asked.
"To my plane, I'm going to slip into something more comfortable. Bruce, suit up, we're going on patrol."
14511111111111112122.title: Robin is Gone

choices: We See How Diana and Batman are Doing
145111111111111121222.content:
She could hardly stand looking at her own reflection. The girl wonder ran through the alleyways of the city. Her bare feet hitting the pavement beneath her. It felt like the souls of her feet were suffocating in the man-made world. The yearned to be above grass where the energy of nature could feed her with its energy. Another streetlight showed her reflection in a barred window.

Her body was now merely different shades of green. Here hard the darkest shade, it was almost indistinguishable from black. Her lips looked fuller and darker than they had last time she checked. It looked like her mouth was forming some sort of natural lipstick. Even her nails were a darker shade than her skin. Even with basic training in biology, Dick has little clue why that was. Her skin was a milky-green, she stayed entranced at her reflection for about a minute before she realized that she had been stroking her hair that whole time. Her hair was longer too, almost too her elbows.

Her whole skin felt like silk. There had to be some magic mixed in with this chemical. Her current clothes looked like a leotard made out of leaves and vines. She wasn't even sure how that happened, or what happened to her old clothes.

She looked down at her body, with was clearly molding into an hourglass figure.

"I'm Robin." she whispered. Although every time she said those words, they felt more and more like a lie. Her voice was barely even recognizable.

"Hey, it's dangerous to be out here at night." A voice said behind her.
She let out a feminine gasp turned around, surprised. People weren't supposed to sneak up on her like that.
A tall thug stood before her.
"You're right. Maybe you could help me." she said. Her voice was trying hard to suppress a musical tone that seemed to naturally occur when she spoke.
"Sure, there is a shelter right down the street." the man said.
"Thanks." Dick said as she followed him.

Dick held his hands together in front of him. It looked a bit girly, but he found that he couldn't stop twirling his hair in the guy's presence if he didn't.

"Here you go, local shelter for women. You should be safe here for the night." the guy said as he walked up to the door.
"Thanks." Dick said as she planted a quick peck on the thugs cheek and walked though the door.

As the door shut behind him, Dick turned around to see the thug looking just a surprised as he was. Both of them wondering why they acted to unlike themselves in the last several minutes.

"I need to find a cure fast." said Robin as she slipped out the backdoor of the shelter.
145111111111111121222.title: The Transformation is Almost Complete

1451111111111111212221.content:
Her heart pounding, the girl ran through the maze that was the old Gotham Industrial Ward. It felt too strange. Her body, needing to be near nature. Her ability to control men. Her body ached to go towards plants, but her years of mental training had prepared her. She had strong enough willpower to fight the urge. She didn't want to become connected to a tree.

Her head throbbing, she finally took a rest in the shadow of the building behind her. Suddenly she noticed a figure jump between the rooftops above her. Thirty seconds later, a leather clad femme fatale emerged from the shadows.
"Well, well, what do we have here." she purred. "Another new girl looking to join the city's sirens?"
"I don't feel like talking." Robin sighed.
"No, I suppose not. Your outfit says your a lady of action, am I right? You're costume is showing more cleavage than mine."
Robin wanted to dispute that, but took one look at her chest and realized the cat lady was right.
"Don't mean to be racist, but judging by your skin tone, you look like one of Ivy's girls."
Robin examined her arms, and again could not think of a comeback.

"You know where I can meet her?" Dick smiled.
"Actually, I do, three blocks down, in the old fertilizer warehouse."
"Wait, how..."
"I know because we have an agreement to leave each other alone." Catwoman smiled. Dick wasn't sure if Selina recognized the girl in front of her was the same one she met the other night, or if she really was clueless to the situation.
"Maybe I can get Ivy to undo this to me." Dick thought, as she picked herself back up and started walking.
"The fertilizer warehouse." Dick said, confirming the spot.
There was no response, Catwoman had already made it back to the rooftop.
"Tell the Batman I said hi." she yelled before jumping away and disappearing into the night.


Ten minutes passed as Robin made it to the warehouse.
"Move, move." Ivy shouted at the men inside as they started stacking boxes next to overgrown plants.
"Ivy!" Robin yelled.
"Well, well, if it isn't Circe's first recruit. What took you so long to get here?" she asked.
1451111111111111212221.title: Gotham's Women Of The Night

choices: Batman and Wonder Woman Begin To Change
Something Goes Wrong and They Don't Transform
14511111111111112122211.content:
"My name is Robin!" she shouted at Poison Ivy as she tackled her.
"Robin, as in the Bat's boy?" Pamela Ivy said as the two rolled on the ground.
Dick stayed silent.
"You don't look much like the BOY Wonder." she scoffed, reversing Robin's moves and tossing her into some boxes.
"You look like we could be sisters." Ivy finished.
"Sorry plant lady, I have no interest in being part of your family tree." Robin said as she kicked her opponent.
Ivy rubbed her torso where she was kicked. "Sorry sapling, but it seems your bark is worse than your bite." she said as she signaled for her men to attack.
"Five on one. Sure you boys don't want to improve your odds?" Robin said in spite as she got herself up.

"I agree, it's not a fair fight." Batman said as a baterang took out two of the goons. Sudden;y Wonder Woman burst through the skylight and took out the other three.

"Looks like it's just you and me." Robin said to Ivy, and the two women grappled once more.

Batman was about to interfere when Wonder Woman held him back. "She's got this." Diana said.

"Amazing isn't it. The formula works, and you're the first of the many daughters of Earth that will help save this city."
"I'm not crazy like you." Robin said.
"Girl, please, embrace your gift. You'll be part of the upper echelon of the new world order."
"I'm not a girl, this is not a gift." Robin said struggling.
"Please, don't act like you're not enjoying every second of it." Ivy said as Robin finally pinned her to the ground.
"I win, now change me back!" Robin demanded.

Suddenly Ivy got her left hand free and clicked a remote trigger.
"What's..." Robin began to ask as a small explosion went off behind Batman.
Ivy and Robin looked on as Batman and Wonder Woman were covered in the bio-toxic fluid that caused Robin's transformation.
"You let go because I willed you to let go. And now I won't be able to convert the city, I'll settle on my three greatest foes becoming my minions." Ivy explained.

Batman and Wonder Woman got up.
"No." Robin gasped.
"It's my concentrated formula. The effects should be nearly instantaneous." Ivy gloated.
14511111111111112122211.title: Girl Fight!

145111111111111121222111.content:
Batman laid on the ground, clutching his stomach.
"I can feel it, changing." he grunted.
"Soon Sisters, we'll spread the glory of the green world, and bring about the age of God's once more."
"She's been brainwashed by Circe." Wonder Woman said as she laid beside Bruce.
"Don't have much time." Batman said as his voice cracked.
Wonder Woman looked at her skin starting to show a green tinge. She unhooked her mythical lasso of truth from her side. It was an ancient artifact that forced anyone touching it to tell the truth and do her bidding.

Wonder Woman tossed the lasso as Robin pushed Ivy into it's path. The lasso tightened around Ivy's arm.

"Tell us how to undo this." Wonder Woman said.
"The antidote, in the red create." Ivy obeyed.

Robin rushed to the create and opened it, picking up a vile or red liquid.
"Take this." Robin through the vile to the struggling Batman, who was not sporting noticeable mounds on his chest.
"Wait." Ivy said. "Wait for the transformation to complete. The potion will work faster at repairing you." Ivy said, still under the lasso's spell.

An hour passed, and the four women were still waiting in the warehouse. Batman had undergone the same transformation as Robin, but in a fraction of the time. Wonder Woman's transformation had only stopped at her turning green.
"Now you can drink it." Ivy said.
The three women around her drank from the vile.
Wonder Woman was the first to return to her former self. Partly, because she was already a woman, partly, because as Bruce knew, she wasn't quite human.

Batman was next, a quick change caused the green to fade from her body, but she still clearly had the body of a supermodel. Another half hour after that, Robin's original skin tone began to appear as her leotard of leaves began to change color and fall off.
Robin crossed her arms over her torso, trying hard to keep some modesty, especially since some of Ivy's tied up goons were beginning to regain consciousness.

"I have an extra dress in my plane." Wonder Woman said. "It's on the roof."
With those last three words, Robin dashed towards the nearest exit.

"What happened? Why haven't we changed back?" a female Batman yelled at Ivy.
"The antidote only undid the science part of it, my part. The beauty spell part is magic, Circe's doing."
"So that means..." Wonder Woman said.
"...We're stuck like this until Zantanna comes back." Batman finished.
145111111111111121222111.title: The Battle Ends

1451111111111111212221112.content:
It was a week later at Wayne Manor. Three lady's laid by the cliff-side, sunbathing as they chatted. Pamela Isley was been put firmly behind bars, and Wonder Woman had lead the efforts to catch Circe and bring her to justice.

"It's nice to have a day off." Diana said.
"Even the Amazon's need a little break ever now and then." Bruce observed
"NEED is too strong of a word." the Amazon replied.
"And the rest of the Justice League thinks we have the flu, right?" Robin asked.
"I have told them as much. But I see no shame in your situations. You are every bit as capable of being warriors as you were a week ago."
"Clark must never know." Bruce said sternly, taking off her sun glasses and giving a tough stare at Diana.
"I don't see what the big deal is..."
"Clark must never know." Robin interrupted.
"Admit it, once Ivy was defeated, you had fun."
Robin looked down at her new white sundress, some blush began to form in her cheeks.
"Well, it was an unique opportunity to practice our undercover abilities." Bruce said.
"And I'm even more flexible now than I used to be." Robin said, finally admitting that there was an advantage to being a girl.

"Ladies." Alfred said opening the back door. "May I present Ms. Zatanna Zatara.

With that Zatanna entered the women's view. She was in her traditional magicians assistants outfit. She probably had just finished a show and rushed over. She even had her top hat and fishnet stockings on. She was a long time friend and ally of Bruce and one of the earliest to learn of his secret identity. Gifted with the ability to do almost anything through magic, by chanting some words, she had arrived to fix the 'boys' predicament.

"Oh. My. God. You lady's are gorgeous." Zatanna joked.
"Nice to see you too Zee." Robin replied.
"Please tell me you got lots of pictures Alfred." the magician said to the Butler.
"Indeed, miss. What sort of help would I be if I didn't carefully document the situation?"
Robin have a betrayed stare at Alfred. Alfred responded with a wink to imply he was joking."
Bruce and Diana got up.

"Zatanna, I trust you'll get us back to normal." Bruce said.
"Are you sure you want to get rid of that body so quickly? Most women would kill for it."
"I'm not most woman." Bruce replied.
"Fine, just one more thing before we do this." Zatanna said. "Aremac raeppa!"
Suddenly a camera appeared in her hands.
"Alfred, if you may. Ladies, gather around."
The woman moved around their magician friend. "Bruce, if you're not smiling, I swear I leave you like this for a month." she said.
Bruce forced a smile to match the other women's.
"Say cheese, ladies." Alfred said as he snapped a picture, which instantly developed.
"I'm going to have this framed." she said.
"Clark must never know." Bruce said as she put her hand on Zatanna's shoulders.
An intense stare later, the magician finally caved. "Fine, I'll his it behind a lead cover." she sighed.

Dick, Bruce, over there." she ordered, and the men obeyed. "Selamef ot Selam!" she chanted, and the dynamic duo stood in front of her, back to their original male bodies.
"We're back, we're really back." Robin said, still wearing his dress.
Bruce looked down, he was only in his swimming trunks. "We are." he said.
"Wait, how come Bruce is wearing men's clothes and I'm not?" Dick objected.
"Because I like him better this way." Zatanna smiled with a wink.
"Seriously?!" Robin whined.
"Fine, if you're going to be that way, I have one more spell." she said.
Robin clammed up. "No, this is fine." he said backing away.
"I insist." she said.
"Well, if she insists..." Wonder Woman said.
The magician took one deep breath and finally let out: "Eht Dne"
1451111111111111212221112.title: Miss Zatara arrives

145111111111112.content:
Robin thought long and hard on her options and she realize that Bruce would be busy with his affairs with Gotham. So she thought on Selina's offer and is very interested on what she is talking about.

Then an idea came into mind that she could make a makeshift purse and create forgery info that would fool Selina. Unfortunately as it came to reality that Selina would figure it out and would be unwise to fool a master thief such as Selina.

Within a moment Robin takes the purse and starts going to the docks.

It taken her about an hour to get to the docks and when she arrived, there was no one around the docks except for Selina.

"Ah you gotten here earlier. I am surprised that you would get here after our talk."

"Well you did said about how you gotten the diamond and you also wanted the purse."

Selina grinned at that. "You're right and I did promise you how I gotten the diamond."

Robins' eyes widened over what Selina is about to talk about her secret.
145111111111112.title: She went off to meet Catwoman beneath the pier.

choices: Selina wants to go to an fancy club to get information
Selina has something more exciting in mind
1451111111111121.content:
Selina smiled, “The diamond is from the museum.”
“The museum?” Dick asked.
Selina nodded. “There is some old money visiting Gotham, and they displayed some of their jewels at the local history museum for an exhibit. But the truth was that the majority of them are fake, and that the real jewels were being shown to a rich elite, in the highest of social circles. It just so happens that someone let the cat out of the bag.”
The girl wonder let out an audible groan. Not only was it a bad pun, but she couldn’t reveal that she new it was a lie. If anything like this happened, Bruce Wayne would have no doubt known about it.
“So how are you going to sell it?” the Girl wonder asked.
“Darling, I am not selling this gem, this will go into my private collection. Then the real treasure will be drawn to me.”
“What?” the girl asked, partially confused by Catwoman’s sensual voice during her previous sentence.
“I am saying that that cat likes to play with the rat, even if he is a flying one.”
“Ohh. I get it.” Robin said. Selina was clearly trying to get Bruce’s attention. “Why don’t you just ask him for a date?”
“Little girl, you have a lot to learn about being a woman.”
Robin was silent, she wasn’t going to dispute that claim.
“First, you never ask men like Batman out. He’s true love is crime. Second, if I become the criminal he needs, he’ll spend all his attention on little ol’me. And when a man like that gives you attention, well, it feels good,” she said, purring.
“So, you’re playing the long con?” Robin interrupted, almost too enthusiastically.
Selina gave a wink. “Guilty.”

“So now that I know your secret, now what?” the girl asked.
“Well, I thought that you and I, could have a girls’ night on the town.”
“Doing what?”
“Gathering information of sorts.”
“What does that mean?”
“Oh you’ll see darling. But I promise you’ll like it.” Catwoman said with another wink.
“Does she ever stop winking, or does she have something wrong with her eye?” Robin thought to herself.
1451111111111121.title: Selina's Secret Plan

1453.content:
After a battle at Ace Chemicals fighting the nefarious Joker, Batman was knocked unconscious in an explosion. Upon awakening, he finds that his body has been drastically changed by the chemicals. Realizing that there is no antidote, Bruce Wayne must now continue her crime-fighting spree as a teenage girl, under a new identity.

While helping Superman battle against Lex Luthor, Batman shields his ally from Luthor's secret weapon: Pink Kryptonite. Transformed into a female Kryptonian, Bruce must now not only get used to his new body, but his new powers as well.
1453.title: Let's get a few more options!

choices: Alfred has no trouble believing this.
Alfred does not believe this is Bruce.
14531.content:
A rolling cackle bounced through air of the Ace Chemicals facility, long since shut down for various health and safety violations, including the one that created the man filling the space with his cacophony. “Aren’t reunions amazing, Bats?!” The Joker asked, smiling toothily at his opponent in the shadows. The only response he got from the Dark Knight was a grim scowl, and their fisticuffs began in earnest, on a catwalk surrounded by vats of chemicals that had never been properly cleaned by the company, after its shutdown.

The Caped Crusader was faster, stronger, and more skilled than his opponent. The only advantage the Joker had was his unpredictability, but this particular night he was going down far easier than normal. In record time, he was being held aloft by his collar, blood beginning to leak from one corner of his mouth. But Batman was not happy with this development. This had been easy. Too easy. Suddenly, his brilliant mind teased out what was going on, and he growled, “Where is it?”

Now it was the Joker’s turn to frown. “Do you really not remember? It’s the anniversary of the night you knocked the Red Hood into that vat, over there,” he said, pointing to one in particular. “I thought it would be nice to get your attention, bring you here, and maybe die together in an enormous explosion. What can I say, I’m a romantic.” Before Batman could ask another question, the bomb planted on the underside of the catwalk went off, followed by several others placed throughout the facility.

The force and proximity were too much even for the Batman, who was knocked unconscious with his opponent, and his body flung into one of the vats, left to stew for hours before waking up. When he did, he knew right away something wasn’t right. His body armor wasn’t fitting correctly, hanging off his body like it was several sizes too large instead of being specifically built to perfectly fit his torso. In the moonlight, Bruce was barely able to see his reflection in the chemical liquids he’d been bathing in, and what he saw made him freeze in surprise.

In his bat-costume, there was a teenage girl, with long blonde hair and the kind of beautiful face that made sure she would be popular wherever she went. With time, she’d likely become utterly beautiful. It was impossible to tell anything else about her body visually, but from the sensations Bruce was feeling inside his costume, he knew she had a thin figure, and was quite busty. With a scowl that didn’t look right on his pretty face, Bruce climbed out of the remains of the vat and got into the Batmobile. There was no sign of the Joker, and he needed to get home, to find out what to do about this.
14531.title: Chemical Imbalance

choices: Bruce takes Alfred’s advice, but finds himself forced to attend high school.
Bruce disagrees, and tries to fight crime anyway.
145311.content:
The drive there only left Bruce more time to think about this situation. It was ridiculous, and there was no way he would be able to let any of his enemies know about this...the same could be said of most of his allies as well. Part of the power of the Batman was his strength, his seeming invulnerability, the mystery. If people knew he’d been transformed into some teenage girl, no matter how powerful he still was, there was no way Bruce could ever recover his vigilante identity’s mystique and menace.
