It was, he had to admit, a little more difficult to drive the Batmobile, considering it was designed with him in mind, and his limbs were all different lengths now. Still, he didn’t crash it, and soon was pulling the car in through a hidden entrance into the Batcave, where Alfred awaited him. As to be expected, Alfred did no so much as blink as Bruce exited the vehicle, his body entirely different but his body language distinctly ‘him’. “Well,” Alred said, and Bruce stalked across the cave to his computer. “It seems your evening was more eventful than either of us would have guessed.”

Ignoring that comment, Bruce took a sample of the remnants of the chemicals that did this to him from the costume and analyzed it. It became clear immediately this was something quite odd: various chemicals never meant to be mixed together, left to stew for years on end. Finding a way to reverse this would take time. Weeks, at the very least. “I’m going to need a cover story,” he said, to himself. “I’ll have to create paperwork for this new body...an illegitimate daughter of Bruce Wayne perhaps? I’ll need to use a robot to play my ‘father’ when necessary...or perhaps a hologram. As for my crimefighting, I’m sure I can make one of Barbara’s suits fit me.”

A clearing of the throat from behind Bruce made him turn around to look at Alfred. “Master Bruce, if I may make a suggestion?” Always willing, if not exactly happy, to hear what his butler had to say, Bruce lightly inclined his head. “If you keep to crimefighting in this new body, it may help some people put together your ‘daughter’ being the new blonde crimefighter.” That was a good point, Bruce had to admit. But what was the alternative? “Contact Dick. Have him be Batman for you, until this is solved.”
145311.title: Alfred's Seen it All

choices: Bruce becomes a stereotypical rich bitch.
1453112.content:
Part of Bruce wanted to agree to the idea. After all, he did intend to pass the cowl to his eldest son one day, when he was ready to retire. But he couldn’t do it. Shaking his head, Bruce explained his reasoning. “Dick isn’t ready for that yet, it wouldn’t work. Most criminals in Gotham have no clue the original Batgirl is in a wheelchair now, so I can wear an auburn wig, add some contacts, and as far as anyone would know, I’d be her.” Alfred didn’t have a comeback for that.

But he did have more advice. “If that is what you wish, Master Bruce, then nothing I say will stop you. However, I can see that you’re not ready for any crime fighting for the rest of the night. You need sleep, especially now that your body is once again in its teenage years.” As much as Bruce wanted to object, he knew he couldn’t. Whether it carried over from body to body or not, if he didn’t count being knocked conscious by the explosion, Bruce hadn’t gotten any sleep in 32 hours. Even he had his limits.

Leaving the Batcave for the manor, Bruce looked through what female clothes were available, mostly things for various plans or excuses, and found things that would fit him well enough. They were lacy nightwear, and they were a little tight across his chest, but he could buy more clothes the next day. While undressing from the Batsuit to wear the clothes, Bruce did his best not to think anything of this changed body. Yes, it was female, but he was not.

Once in his personal favorite bedroom, Bruce did have to marvel at how soft the bedsheets felt, this skin was clearly more sensitive than his own body’s. Still, it took some time for him to fall asleep. He was planning the next steps: a press conference with a hologram of his ‘father’ introducing his daughter to Gotham City, forging the paperwork necessary to go to a local high school, buying the necessary new clothes, and to keep up appearances, likely some sort of party here at the manor. Something to give the city more proof of this Wayne daughter. What Bruce didn’t know, as he finally fell asleep, was that he should have taken a shower. The chemical was still on his skin, and in his hair. Still active, it took all night, but it wormed its way into his brain, and began its work there as well, slowly altering Bruce’s personality over the next few days.
1453112.title: The Next Batgirl

14531121.content:
The first thing Bruce thought once he’d woken up the next morning was, ‘Oh sweet merciful heaven’s, I need a shower!’ The smell coming off him hadn’t been a bother last night, as his mental defences had been set up to ignore smells like that, something that was always useful when he had to fight in high-odor areas. But for some reason, the fact he smelled terribly bothered him quite a bit, so he quickly ran to the nearest bathroom, disrobed, and took his shower. There were moments, as he washed his new body, where he couldn’t help but admire parts of it. It was clear he was quite the attractive girl now. While this bathing did get the chemicals out of his hair, it was far too late for that to do anything to help his situation.
From there, he picked out what to wear, which he found wasn’t as flattering for his curvy body as he would have liked, then set up working on things for the day. It wasn’t hard to get a press conference set up on the area outside the manor, set of noon, nor to prepare the holographic image of his normal body, and create a recorded speech in that voice with everything he’d need to say. Sometimes, Bruce did find himself looking at how he’s once looked, and admiring the widely set shoulders and confidently masculine looks, before shaking his head and getting back to work.

The conference went off easily, and now the whole world knew Bruce as Bryce Wayne, legitimized daughter from a youthful fling. Setting up his paperwork to start class at Gotham Academy was child’s play, and that done, he headed out to pick out civilian clothes at a local mall. At first, he had trouble deciding what style fit the new body best: Flirty? Casual? High-class? In the end, Bruce remembered he had his own credit card with him, and just got anything that he thought might work, and had Alfred carry it all home. The only thing left was the party, also announced at the press conference. Looking at what he had available, Bruce saw he could attend in a suit made for women, that would make clear that the Wayne heir still was a person of power and respect, or in a beautiful dress that emphasized his figure, putting more importance on the body’s gender. Which to choose?
14531121.title: Bryce Wayne's First Day Out

choices: Just like his usual self, only female.
14532.content:
For all that the public seemed to think they were at each other’s throats constantly, Superman and Batman always saw each other as trusted colleagues. Their methods differed, and in some ways so did their ethos, but both wanted similar things, and respected what the other brought to the table. Still, they generally stuck to their own rogues galleries, with a few exceptions.

Crossing city lines was one such exception, and with Lex Luthor hiding out somewhere in Gotham City, while holding Lois Lane hostage, Batman was called in to assist in finding and subduing the brilliant billionaire bastard. Superman’s usual technique of searching via X-Ray Vision was already something Lex had learned to easily avoid, made even more difficult in a city where more than half the building was still full of lead paint. Luckily, Batman’s methods yielded more fruit: through tracing monetary transfers from shell business to shell business, he was able to pinpoint traces of Luthor’s interference, and it all led to a hidden lead-lined chamber in the sewers.

If Batman had a sense of humor, he would have made a joke of Superman, the symbol of everything good and righteous, squeeky clean boy scout, walking around the Gotham City sewer system. Of course, he didn’t, so he didn’t. It didn’t take long for them to find the room in question, and the inside of it was bare...aside from a human-sized metal coffin, set against one wall, with air holes in the sides just large enough to keep whoever was inside it alive.

Immediately, Superman sped across the room and started to rip the locked tomb open, but Batman knew a trap when he saw one. Sure enough, as the metal started to rip away, Batman could see the telltale glow of Kryptonite inside, though the exact hue seemed different from normal. Before Superman could be affected, just as he’d finished ripping away the lead-lined lid, Batman ran forward and pushed Superman across the room, only able to do so thanks to the element of surprise. But now the lid was open, and it was clear there was no person inside the casket, only a chunk of mineral, that was bright pink. It’s radiation hit Bruce in a way Kryptonite never had before, and he sunk to the ground as his body began to change. It was turning him from a human being into a Kryptonian, and from a man into a woman. But what kind of woman?
14532.title: Super Bat

choices: Bruce awakes, and soon discovers his new powers.
Back in the trapped room, the coffin and Kryptonite is gone now.
145321.content:
As Batman lay crumpled on the ground, his body shifting and changing, Superman did not stay idle. Realizing what was going on, and still holding the lead lid as a shield, he quickly zipped across the room and sealed the metal coffin shut once more. He’d been tempted to use the door to smash the strange variety of Kryptonite inside, but what was going on to Batman was more important, and it was possible that whatever was going on with him would require the mineral in the coffin to be solved.

Now that neither had to fear further radiation from the pink mineral, Superman turned his attention back on his crime-fighting cohort, only to see the costume did not fit him anymore, and the cowl had been removed. Where had once been a man in the peak of human condition was a woman in much the same state. Tall, muscular, and utterly gorgeous, her silky black hair fell like a cascading curtain down to the end of her neck, and her sharp, almost predatory facial features make her look like a warrior. With the costume’s bagginess, Superman was also able to tell this woman was completely stacked, but decided against using his X-Ray vision to see more details, out of respect for his friend’s privacy.

Batman was clearly still out of it, so with an apologetic smile Superman told him, “I know you hate being carried, but you’ll have to look grim and bear it.” Batman grunted in annoyance, but made no other protest as Superman lifted his body in a fireman carry and flew the two of them through the sewers, into the Gotham night air, and towards Wayne Manor. The entire time, Superman did his best, as a married man, to ignore how his friend’s suddenly feminine form felt in his arms.

Once at the Wayne estate, Superman met with Alfred, who was always happy to see one of his favorite friends of Master Bruce. But when the butler’s eyes fell on the transformed Bruce Wayne, a heavy sigh came from the British man. He wasn’t necessarily surprised, too much had happened since the child he’d been put in charge of began his mission to fight crime for anything to truly faze him, but he was worried. “Take care of him,” Superman asked of Alfred, while setting Bruce on one of the incredibly expensive couches in the manor, in spite of the bits of sewer grime still staining the Batman costume. “I’ll go back to grab what did this to him, so I can find a way to reverse it.” With that, the Man of Steel sped off.
145321.title: Brianna Wayne, Kryptonian

choices: Harley Quinn gets her twin sister
14533.content: Harley Quinn wants a twin sister so she covers her mallet with magic powder, when she gets into a fight with batman she hit him the head Turing him into into her, in clothing, body and mind.
14533.title: more options!

choices: Have some fun with your new twin.
145331.content: Batman in a fight against Harley-Quinn was hit by her hammer and from some pink dust Batman slowly got the looks of a girl and soon his clothing started to change to Harley-Quinn’s clothing of red and black and a black eye cowl but also his body started to change to white skin and looked like he had makeup on and his mind also changed to being insane and like Harley’s and like that Batman was gone and from that moment he would always be Harley Quinn’s twin.
145331.title: Harley Quinn gets her twin sister

145332.content: What about stories that make the ladies of Gotham more feminine?
145332.title: read choice

1453321.content: After a narrow escape from a robbery gone wrong, Catwoman is laying low at the hideout of fellow supervillain, Poison Ivy. However, the plant-obsessed woman is growing sick of her new roommate's tomboyish tendencies. Ivy has taken it upon herself to create a formula that will turn her more masculine minded friend into the feminine companion she's always wanted.

14533222.title: no

15.content: Which type of story would you prefer to follow?
15.title: Story Choice

151.content:
The women of Gotham city had endured a lot of physical changes over the years. From gaining massive muscles to turning into a blob of fat, these changes however have provided them with both great advantages and ridiculous flaws.

An unnamed scientific program had recently been conducting experiments to manipulate female strengths and sizes. Fascinated by the concept of being a giant, the elusive Catwoman couldn't resist the temptation of sneaking into the facility and stealing the plans for herself. During her infiltration however, the dark knight arrived on the scene, only to realize that he was too late. Incidentally, Catwoman used the device on herself, transforming herself into an overwhelming, huge giantess of remarkable strength and endurance. With such a huge advantage on her side, how could she resist turning Gotham city into her own little playground?

Ever since the incident at Arkham Asylum, the infamous Titan formula had become the desire of the Joker. Unknown to the dark knight, the Clown Prince of Crime had been conducting experiments, desperately attempting to replicate the Titan formula to its former perfection. When the caped crusader caught on however, it was now or never. Before Batman could subdue the Joker once again however, he had no other option but to inject his beloved girlfriend, the psychotic Harley Quinn, with the untested formula, with surprising results.

So which story would you like to follow?
151.title: Growth Stories

choices: The electricity caused Harley to grow taller
The electricity caused her muscles to grow
The electricity caused growth of both!
1512.content:
One thing was for sure: Being in prison sucks! The food was bad, the guards where really unfriendly and ontop of that, Mister J was kept in a completely different part of the building! How unfair was that! She wasn't even allowed to have dinner with poor old Pudd'n! He had to be dreadfully lonely by now!

On top of all that, it seemed like her sweetheart's plan didn't quite work out - she could still see the little mark the titan injection left on her leg and despite the fun little tingle and really looking forwards to being a huge and strong girl busting out her

After only a few days and asking nicely, it was enough! Criminal or not, she had the right to see her boyfriend! She picked up the tray of food and banged it on the bars angrily, making a loud and piercing banging sound.

"Guards!" She yelled. "Guards! I demand to see my Pudd'n! What did you do with him? Where is he?! Get him heeere!" The tantrum continued and within just a few seconds the first guard was at her door. "Cut it out, Harley! You're not seeing anyone, and you know it! Now shut up or we'll make you!" "Mista!" Bang. "J!" Bang "Now!" Bang Bang.

The guard grunted angrily. Being with the Joker wasn't a good way to get on the guard's good side, and making annoying noises... Not a great idea.

"You asked for this..." He mumbled with a sinister grin as he unlocked the door and pulled out the stun gun. Harley was just about to make a break for it, when she felt the two prongs impact her leg and she fell to the ground, electricity coursing through her body. However, as the stinging pain finally subsided, something else, entirely unexpected happened...
1512.title: Giant Harley

15123.content:
Harley felt the tingle return and both she and the guard watched as her body inched upward in height, her muscles swelling larger. Harley stood up as her transformation continued.

"Ooh, that was unexpected," she said playfully, loving the terrified expression on the guard's face as he slowly backed away. When Harley's head was level with his own-- 6'4" --and her physique closely resembled an amateur middleweight bodybuilder's, her growth stopped.

"Wow, surprising side effects of prison abuse," Harley commented, looking over her new body. Then she realized something. "Hey, didn't you tell me to shut up a minute ago?" Standing in the doorway of her cell, the guard had no time to react as Harley's fist slammed into his face and he went flying backwards, hitting the wall painfully.

Harley walked over to the unconscious guard and eyed the stun gun lying by his side. "I'll take this," she said brightly, about to shock herself again. Just then, other guards entered the area, watching what had happened on the security cameras. "Oh, hiya, fellas!"

"Harley? Is that you?" one of them asked.

"Yup," she replied, turning towards the guards. "Like the new and improved me?" Before they could even draw their guns, Harley ran towards them with surprising speed and beat them senseless. "Now, where was I?" She said afterward, walking past the badly beaten men, before stunning herself in the leg. Her body responded immediately, her physique soon becoming as large as a Strongman competitor's, while her head brushed the doorway. Suddenly, an alarm went off and around 20 more guards surrounded her, all with their guns pointed at her.

One of the younger, nervous ones accidently pulled the trigger and the bullet his Harley in the shoulder. Momentarily stunned and expecting to feel a lot of pain, the giant woman was surprised when she saw the bullet ricochet off her densely packed deltoid and hit the nearby wall.

"Huh! What do you know? I'm bulletproof, too!" She said happily, before looking around at the now terrified men. "This is going to be fun," she said with a malicious grin on her face.
15123.title: The electricity caused growth of both!

151231.content:
Having easily beaten the guards back at her cell and realizing she was now bulletproof, Harley casually walked through the prison floor by floor, swatting aside everyone who got in her way and causing a huge path of destruction in the process.

Kicking open one of the side doors, Harley found herself in the prison workout area. Breathing the fresh air as she looked around, her happiness started to disappear when she heard the familiar roar of an engine.

"Aw, crap. It's him," Harley said.

Was it...
151231.title: after the fight

choices: follow joker, as he escapes from prison somehow
1512312.content:
With Batman and Robin out of the city for the next several nights and Nightwing in Bludhaven, the only heroes on call were Batgirl and Spoiler. They were both in the Batcave, putting their suits on, when an alarm went off. Walking over to the Batcomputer, they saw it was coming from Blackgate prison.

"Looks like someone's trying to escape," Cassandra Cain said, pulling on her cowl.

"Shall we teach them the error of their ways?" Stephanie Brown asked, putting her belt into place.

They each hopped on a motorcycle and drove off towards the prison, weaving in and out of the late evening traffic as they went. Approaching Blackgate, they saw a huge Hulking figure tossing cars around in the parking lot.

"Bane again," Batgirl said, stepping off of her bike with a sigh.

"GIVE ME BACK MY PUDDIN'!!" Harley screamed in her usual shrill voice, ripping a car in half with her bare hands, before tossing the useless chassis aside.

"Harley?!" both girls said in shock, running towards the mayhem. When they arrived, the now 7 foot tall villain was slamming her fist into the pavement, throwing up chunks of asphalt in the process and causing the ground to shake. She was clearly distraught at being separated from the Joker for so long.

"Oh, it's the Bat's brats," she said, her enormous muscles tensed.

"Harley, you're...Huge!" Spoiler said, fear in her voice as she stated the obvious.

"Yup and it's all thanks to Mistah J's Titan formula," Harley replied happily, turning her hand to look at her nails, causing the huge biceps on her arm to flex.

"Joker did this to you?" Batgirl asked with alarm. "We have to help you then, Miss Quinn. You're a danger to everyone else around you until you're cured."

"I'm just a danger to anyone who stands between me and my puddin," Harley replied.

"If you won't come quietly," Cassandra said, grabbing a smoke pellet from her belt and throwing it into the behemoth's face. It exploded and both heroes advanced on her, their blows bouncing off of Harley's rock hard body.

When the smoke cleared and both women realized their attacks were useless, they backed off.

Harley chuckled. "You know, that kind of tickled. Is it my turn now?" Stunning herself in the leg again, she felt the tingle return and her body grew even larger, stopping only when she was 7'6" and her muscles swelled to an even greater size.

Charging at the two heroes, they were able to just barely avoid her massive body in time. Harley picked up a nearby car and tried to crush Spoiler with it, but she leapt out of the way. Batgirl jumped onto Harley's back, wrapping her arms around the giant's neck as best she could, but she felt one enormous hand pluck her off easily, holding on to her cape.

Holding her out at arm's length, Cassandra writhed around, trying to get free, while Harley cocked back her fist. Releasing her cape, the colossal woman thankfully only hit air, but she recovered almost immediately and tried to stomp Batgirl.

Spoiler leapt toward her target, but the Titan infused Harley was ready for her. She easily caught the purple-clad hero in midair and slammed her onto the roof of a nearby police van, creating a huge dent and shattering a window. She was about to deliver the killing blow, when a rope thrown by Batgirl wrapped itself around her wrist. With a simple tug, Batgirl went flying through the air and ran painfully into the side of the van. Her head throbbing, Cassandra felt a pair of powerful hands pick her up and place her next to Spoiler.

"I wish you Bat-Jerks would just leave us alone," Harley said angrily, looking down at her beaten foes. Tossing the two women into the van, she heard a thud as they hit the door on the other side with a groan before collapsing into the seat. Harley then proceeded to pick up the van with one hand and launch it into the sky. She watched as it sailed past the prison, past the trees, until it was…gone.

"There's that problem taken care of," Harley said. "Now, if only I could find Mistah J."
1512312.title: batgirl and spoiler

choices: the girls are somehow able to defeat harley
just then, batman and robin arrive
15123122.content:
The van sailed through the air, both women slamming painfully into the walls and floor repeatedly as they flew across Gotham like a football. Eventually, it landed, rolling down the street like a wrecking ball, knocking everything out of its way, before hitting Gotham Harbor, stopping only when it was in the ocean. Good thing Batgirl and Spoiler were both wearing the best body armor Wayne Enterprises could make, otherwise they'd be dead by now.

The heroines painfully got out of the vehicle before it sank, nursing multiple cracked ribs and bruised bodies as they swam to shore. Collapsing into the dirt, they lied there, trying to recover.

"Let's...not do that...again," Spoiler said, sitting up, grabbing her side and realizing there were huge gashes on her arms and legs.

"We have to be smarter," Batgirl groaned. "Harley's not that bright, but she's too powerful. And if she becomes even larger, she'll be unstoppable."

"She's already unstoppable! She's practically a tank now!"

"I know. I think..." Batgirl gasped as she stood, clutching her bruised arm. "We need to use one of Batman's toys. It should help us. A lot."

_________________

Making it back to the Batcave, both girls staggered inside, before collapsing into the nearest chairs they could find. After recovering, Stephanie asked, "So, what's this toy you were talking about earlier?"

"It's over here." They both walked over to a lower level of the cave, Cassandra putting her hand on a handprint scanner that unlocked a nearby vault with a hiss.

"What is it?" Spoiler asked, as the vault door swung open.

"It's how we even the odds," Batgirl said, smiling.
15123122.title: follow batgirl and spoiler

choices: batgirl somehow stops harley from growing again
151231222.content:
This felt amazing, Batgirl thought, as she leapt through the air in one of Batman's armored suits, making her way back to Harley while Spoiler followed on another motorcycle on the ground. She felt so strong. So unstoppable. She was leaping several blocks at once as she made her way through the city, her powerful stomps creating craters and setting off car alarms as she went along.

The suit was 9 feet tall and was capable of going toe to toe with Bane, as it had several times in the past. Batman had augmented it further over the years, giving it more power and defensive capabilities, making it practically unbeatable.

Batgirl followed Harley's path of destruction until she spotted her far below on the ground. Unbeknownst to the Hulking supervillain, The Joker had been moved, on Batman's orders, to a safe location somewhere in the city, to make sure The Clown Prince and his girlfriend remained separated. Apparently Harley had taken this news badly, because she was currently destroying a flower shop in frustration.

Landing with a powerful thud that shook the ground, Batgirl called out to her nemesis, "Give up now or I'll be forced to hurt you." She hoped Harley resisted. Batgirl couldn't wait to break in this new suit.

"Oh, it's the brats again," she said brightly, an actual smile on her face. The villain still stood 7'6" as she turned around. "Where's your little friend? Watching us from the rooftops?" She looked up hopefully, trying to find a caped silhouetted figure somewhere. "And..." Her face lit up, as if noticing the armored suit for the first time. She skipped playfully over to Batgirl, the ground quaking with every step. She gasped in amazement, as if being presented with a brand new car. "You brought me a new toy to play with! How sweet of you!" She peered in through the thick bulletproof window on the front, spotting the smaller woman inside. "Why don't you want to come out and play, Short Stuff? Was I a bit too rough on you last time? I promise to be good." She gave Batgirl the Sad Puppy Dog look, trying to seem as innocent as possible.

"Hello? Is anyone home in there?" Harley tapped on the glass several times, sending a deafening, thunderous rumble throughout the tiny cockpit of the suit. Batgirl staggered backward, her ears throbbing, as she heard Harley say, "Ooopsie! Was that a bit too loud for your tiny eardrums? I'm sorry. Guess I just don't know my own strength these days, huh?" She giggled innocently at her mistake.

When she had recovered, Batgirl said, "This ends one of two ways, Quinn. Either you come quietly, or we have a rematch."

"WHAAAT???" Harley's voice became even higher. She couldn't believe her ears. "You want to fight me again?? After I wiped the floor with you last time? AND you without any backup?" Her voice returned to normal. "Well, it's your funeral, Shrimp. And here I thought we were getting along so well." She approached the Armored Suit, hopping around like a prizefighter, playfully jabbing it or giving it light body blows. She still thought this was a game. Either she was in a really good mood for some reason, or she was feeling overconfident from her last fight. Either way, even though she was only "playing" with Batgirl, not using even a tenth of her strength, it was enough force to drive the Suit backwards several feet at a time, pounding the cockpit with more ear shattering booms. Maybe this wasn't such a good idea...

"Having fun yet, Squirt?" Harley asked, smiling. "You know, this is getting kinda sad," she said, continuing to pound away, a dull thud ringing throughout the neighborhood. "Here you are, with a good foot or so on me and you're just standing there, taking it!" More pounding. "It IS kinda fun, though. I see why all you super jerks do it so much." She giggled as the "fight" continued, sending Batgirl farther and farther back, until she suddenly stopped, her body coated in sweat. "Hang on, though. Doesn't that give you an unfair advantage? Don't you have, like, Bat Grenades and Bat Missles and Bat whatever-the-hell-else under that thing? Shouldn't I be the same size as you? You know, so it's a fair fight?" Cassandra didn't like where this was heading. "I know! I'll grow myself bigger, then we can continue. It'll only take a jif!"

She brought the stun gun from before out again and tried to shock herself with it, but Batgirl slapped it away. "Now, that wasn't very nice, you know?" Harley said. "You don't treat your sparring partners like that. I should teach you a few tips on how to OOF!" Batgirl began punching Harley repeatedly, using all the strength the suit had to send the giant villain backward, and there seemed to be JUST enough power to do it. She finished with a roundhouse kick to Harley's head that sent her flying through the air, crushing an SUV when she landed.

"I'm through playing games, Quinn," Batgirl told her.

"So I see," the titaness replied, picking herself off the ground. It didn't look like her punches did much damage, though Cassandra was pleased to see that the other woman was bleeding from the mouth. "Next time, give a girl fair warning before you start to pummel her, will ya?" Quinn dusted herself off. "Just for that, I'm going to kick your ass." She ran towards her target, preparing to rip it limb from limb. Batgirl did the same. Both were willing to fight to the death, judging from the look in their eyes, when Harley suddenly stopped a few feet from the suit, her face turning into a playful grin again. She held out her leg and watched as the Armored Suit tripped over it and went flying through an apartment building on the other side of the street, demolishing it instantly and burying Batgirl in the rubble.

"But first, I need little pick-me-up." Harley said happily, skipping off towards a fuse box nearby. "Hmm...Now, let's see...I grew before from just a stun gun. But I wonder if any old electricity will do?" From behind her, she heard Batgirl emerge from the rubble and turned around. "There you are, Shortie!" She ripped the wires out of the box, sparks flying everywhere as she held them up in her hands. "Hey, do you think this a good idea?!"
151231222.title: harley still overpowers them

choices: batgirl comes out on her own
harley plucks her out by the cape
1512312222.content:
From the other side of the street, the giant metal suit was staggering around, Batgirl trying to get her bearings. Her head was spinning and she could feel a trickle of blood dripping down her face from underneath her mask. Alarms were going off as a few systems in the machine were failing. And her ears were STILL ringing from the "fight" she had with Harley few minutes ago. To make matters worse, Harley wasn't even trying to hurt her, she was just playing around. If she wanted to, Batgirl was sure the supersized villain could rip the suit in half in seconds and toss her around like a little rag doll. Maybe she bit off more than she could chew this time.

She looked up as Harley yelled something at her. She only caught a few words, but saw the electricity sparking and knew it was bad. She ran towards Quinn, the suit responding sluggishly at first as she saw the villain plunge the wires into her leg.

"Aah, THAT hit the spot!" Harley said, a content look on her face, as the Armored Batsuit made its way over to her. Already, she was 8 feet tall. "Wow you're REALLY tiny now," Harley exclaimed, peering her huge into the cockpit, spotting Batgirl, smiling. "Are you ready to go again? Do you think this pitiful suit can take it? 'Cause I took you out with a leg trip earlier." She giggled.

Suddenly, Quinn reached out, hugging the Batsuit lovingly, almost as if she were trying to apologize. Immediately more alarms blared from inside the cockpit, as metal groaned from somewhere behind Batgirl. As Harley reached 8 and a half feet tall, steam began to pour from the back of the suit and the villain backed off, bits of metal clanging to the ground. "Oops, sorry about that, Squirt. But at least we're almost the same height now. Ready to continue our little fight?" She giggled as she drew back her fist, slamming it into the bulletproof glass with a bit too much force than she had intended. Immediately, the glass was nearly shattered and Batgirl found herself flying backwards like a bullet.

She plowed through half a dozen structures this time, each impact destroying more and more of the suit. She finally came to rest half a block away from Quinn, the alarms blaring again, her vision a bit blurry as more trickles of blood could be felt. Lying on her back, the suit barely functional as it rested atop a pile of bricks, Batgirl could see the outline of Harley's huge fist where it had impacted, the metal bent as if it had been made of play dough. This suit was meant to take on Bane and his Venom, Batgirl thought as she could hear Harley's heavy footfalls coming nearer, the ground shaking. But Titan was in a league of its own.

Harley's huge head fills Cassandra's field of vision, as the massive woman squats down to inspect the damage, her face inches from the cockpit. "Wow. That was only a love tap I gave you," Harley remarked, as sparks flew from the suit. "Good thing I didn't hit you as hard as I possibly could, huh? You'd probably be a thick, gooey paste in this hunka junk." She grabbed one of the suit's arms to put it back on its feet, when her grip accidentally crushed it, almost severing it completely from the rest of the machine. "Whoops." Batgirl felt herself being lifted off the ground and when she was upright again, she was looking UP into Quinn's playful face. She had to be close to 9 and a half feet tall now, her muscles absolutely gigantic, though her body was still proportionate.

Harley tried to brush some of the debris off of the suit, but just managed to do more damage. "Wow, tonights just not your night, is it? Bet Batman will be pissed when he sees what you did to one of his little doodads." Batgirl groaned in pain, as Harley smiled down at her. "You know, you should get out of that thing. I think it's been through enough for one night. Here." Her giant hand approaching the bulletproof glass, she easily separated it from the rest of the suit with just a couple of fingers, as if she were opening a can of soda.

"There you go," Quinn said sweetly, talking as if she were talking to a frightened animal of some kind. "Come on out and enjoy some fresh air." Batgirl hesitated. "Oh, come on. I'm not going to hurt you...Well, not intentionally, anyway." She giggled once more as she surveyed the mangled suit. "All this was accidental." Still Cassandra didn't budge.

"Oh, don't make me come in after you." Harley smiled playfully.
1512312222.title: quinn grows again (still playful, though)

1513.content:
A month had passed since her boyfriend's failed take over of Arkham Asylum with the decisive battle against the dark knight, leaving the Joker in a wounded and weakened state. Because of this failure, Harley Quinn had become increasingly desperate to restore the clown prince of crime to his former jolly self. Harley was hardly a woman of patience however, figuring the cure would come in the form of the same Titan formula that left her beloved with such fragile health. Harley however required a test subject, but she may had just found one when she recalled the woman her boyfriend left wheelchair bound some time ago, the Oracle. If Barbara Gordon could be restored to full functioning health, then perhaps so could Harley's mad love, or so she thought.

With the dark knight and the boy wonder away with other duties, Batgirl was left to watch over Gotham on her own. Risky yet something she was willing to do, given who she was. However things soon began to take a drastic turn when a shipment of venom fell under siege by the Penguin's goons, and matters were made worse when Bane returned, wishing to reclaim his stolen property. Along the way, if she had any chance of stopping the muscle monster and criminal mastermind on her own, Batgirl decided that she had to take things to an extreme that even the fabled dark knight would go against.

So which story would you like to follow?
1513.title: More Growth Stories

choices: The venom caused Batgirl to nearly match Bane in size.
The venom had a startling affect, she was now even bigger than Bane!
15132.content:
Gotham was always a cesspool of criminal activity, yet one brave individual was determined to not let it overwhelm her. Batgirl sailed through the cool brisk winter air before perching herself atop a rooftop in the city docks. At the moment she was alone, given that both the dark knight and boy wonder were away with duties that took them both far and away from the city they called home, thus leaving Barbara on her own with Alfred Pennyworth as her sole radio contact. Of course, there was Nightwing but who knew what he was doing these days, if he was even in town to begin with.

Regardless, in the past few days she had been following up on a set of particular heists that she figured, through her own skills of deduction, were all seemingly connected with one another. It was just a matter of figuring out who was the mastermind behind it. After all, Gotham city certainly wasn't shorthanded when it came to the criminally corrupted, even without having sided herself with the dark knight. Her own father could have told her that!

Back to the investigation at hand, the highly dangerous and addictive chemical, Venom, was for whatever reason being shipped into the city by an outside source one that she deduced was the muscle monster himself, Bane. Because of how long his body had been exposed to the hyper steroid-like substance the masked man was practically addicted to it, most likely in need of it even when he wasn't breaking people's faces into dust. The numerous venom arrivals were no doubt a red flag that Bane was on his way back to Gotham, but someone out there was surprisingly beating him to the punch and, unfortunately for her, there was a lot of suspects that could easily come to mind.

Sneaking into the warehouse through a nearby air duct, Batgirl crawled her way through the metal passageway, following the sounds of a few male voices. The men were no doubt the ones sent to pick up the venom supply. She paused as she watched silently through a vent's small opening. Doing so, she could make out the trio of men, one of which was busy ripping the cover of a tightly sealed crate.

"Sweet! Boss was right! Looks like the stuff got here right on time."

"Shut up man, he'll bust our heads if we don't get this here crap back to him ASAP. So let's just load up and be done with it."

"I'm just glad that freak Bane ain't around. Hell, I'm surprise that the bat ain't here either!" The trio were suddenly surprised however, when one of them was taken down effortlessly after Batgirl slammed, feet first, into his lower back. "Dammit! You just had to mention him didn't you," yelled one of the thugs, who soon found himself wincing in pain after an expertly tossed Batarang struck his rifle, forcing it away from his hand. Before he could recover, a sharp fist ended up connecting with his jaw.

"Wait! You ain't the bat," the man grunted after he was forcefully pinned to the wall by a Batclaw.

"It's Batgirl. Introductions aside you're going to tell me everything about your boss and what he has planned for the stolen venom."

The thug refused to comment, stating that she wasn't the dark knight so there was less to fear. The lack of respect struck a nerve with Batgirl, who asked again with a sharper tone as she closed in on him. Once again he refused to talk, so she decided to take a different route. Wrapping up a foot of thick cable wire, she released him from her Batclaw, only to send him sailing into the air after using her line grappler. The tail end of the cable struck with the ceiling, leaving the panicked thug to dangle upside down by a singular foot.

"Now maybe you'll be a little more cooperative. Talk and maybe I'll bring you back down softly."

"Dammit, he'll kill me," the goon yelled in fear after the cable shook from Batgirl's simple thug, "Alright, alright! It was the Penguin! He's the one having us nab all the venom! But I don't know what for, he ain't telling us. You gotta believe me!" To be quite honest she wasn't too surprised with the reveal. "Now get me down," the man pleaded before, suddenly, a titanic arm came bursting through the rooftop and grabbed a hold of him.

"I must thank you for using your final moment to deliver me some valuable information." Smashing in like the monster that he was, Bane made a resounding impact as his humongous form touched the ground. He was rather surprised to see Batgirl before him, instead of the city's usual silent protector, and casually tossed the line cable back at her. The device snapped back into place as she readied herself for any sudden moments from Bane. Squeezing at the throat of the poor thug, it was clear that he was ready to kill the man at a moment's notice.

"Let him go, Bane," Batgirl bravely shouted, despite the obvious size difference between them. He ignored her plea, instead applying more pressure, stating that the unfortunate man would be an example of what he had in store for the Penguin. "I said let him go, Bane!"

"Unfortunately for you and him, you are not the Batman, and even then I see no reason to bow to your requests," Bane stated with a cold stare.

"Help...me..." The helpless thug was beginning to fade fast as the life was being drained completely out of him. Barbara knew that she had to make a move now or the man's life was lost. With quick succession, the muscular giant howled as a trio of shock-powered Batarangs connected and imploded on his massive chest. It was just enough to loosen his grip and, using the Batclaw, she reeled in the goon who amazingly thanked her for the rescue. She didn't waste a moment urging him to revive the other two and get out as soon as they could.

Insulted, Bane rushed straight at her. It was only due to her sharpened reflexes that she was able to evade in time. Instinctively she attempted a counterstrike, but unfortunately, she nearly snapped a knuckle after making contact with his tremendous back. She backed off, for a moment, out of the corner of her eye she spotted the Penguin's goon squad making a break for it. Bane noticed as well, but his attention returned to the brave bat after another shocking Batarang struck him. Of course this was only serving to anger the empowered giant even more than he already was.

"For your foolishness, I will break you Batgirl! You will serve as my message to the Penguin, and the Batman!"

With that statement, Barbara knew that she was now completely in over her head. The dark knight himself had problems dealing with Bane during their numerous encounters. How was she going to survive against this venom-filled beast of a man?

The venom! Would she actually, not even he wouldn't go that far! But Bane had murder in his cold eyes, and as drastic as it may seem, she had to do something, otherwise she really was going to die there and then!

Bane rushed at her once more with a fierce growl, but just as before, Barbara was able to dodge his wild stampede. As she did so however, she tossed a smoke pellet directly at his eyes. The marble-like object burst as it made contact, temporarily blinding the big man, although doing nothing to cool his rage. With the venom packed crate still intact, Barbara quickly loaded up an injector-like device containing the serum as she heard Bane curse her in Spanish. His blindness wouldn't last much longer. Her gloved hand shook nerves born from what she was about to do.

"Here it goes," she muttered to herself, her breath held, as she injected the venom into her body.
15132.title: The Birth of Bane Girl

choices: Bane immediately gained the upper hand during battle.
Batgirl immediately gained the upper hand during battle.
151321.content:
As the foreign chemical surged through her bloodstream at an alarming rate, Barbara clutched at her midsection, her entire body beginning to feel as if it had been lit completely on fire. She screamed and yelled in agony as portions of her body began to pulse and vibrate.The venom was taking hold, and her transformation was about to begin.

Her pain-filled yells masked the sound of her suit's fabric tearing away at the seams as her muscles began to stretch out and grow. Her arms and tremendous biceps made short work of her sleeves. Calves ripped through the tights individually, each nearly the size of her natural waist, her midsection however was now starting to rival the dimensions of a rather large flat-screen, her bulbous thighs now nearly matching the redwood-sized pillars of Bane himself tore through her lower attire. Only by chance was she left with a small portion stretched to the limit, but still covering her up somewhat. Meanwhile her back widened, like a bat spreading it's wings, her lats forming a perfect V-shape growing wider by the second. As for her pectorals and breasts, they both expanded outwards, adding inches upon inches of cleavage.

Her suit's top continuously grew tighter, the bat symbol stretching as she grew, but like her tights while it had been ruined through her expansion, a good portion still held together, shielding her from any loss of dignity.

A short time later her painful growth had come to a close, taking in several quick breathes to regain her lost air, the color on her face nearly matching that of her fiery hair. She looked herself over. It was a rough estimation, but in her mind she was just a bit below Bane in size. The man, while on venom, stood roughly over nine feet tall and weighed around three hundred and fifty pounds. At her size however, she guessed she was just under nine feet and Bane must be a good quarter or two pounds heavier then she.

Still, that was only with one quick injection. She could only imagine what she would be like if she used the same tech Bane used on himself. No, she shook away such thoughts. That was the venom's addictiveness altering her mindset! She had to stay focused on stopping Bane, especially now that she had the muscle to do it.

"You are either incredibly bold or foolishly reckless, perhaps both! To pull off such a move that even Batman has never done to himself. Do you not know of the consequences of your actions?" Bane asked, allowing Barbara to consider if his anger had settled during her amazing transformation, or if he was merely leading her into a false sense of security.

"I know darn well of the risks, but sometimes you just have to take them if it means keeping threats like you from the streets."

"You wish to challenge me for my venom?"

"I wish to challenge you to stop you," the muscular bat stated as she stared right at the powerful masked man.

"Very well. Let us see how well you do with a size that is no doubt foreign to you and your fighting techniques!"

She wasn't about to admit it, but Bane was right. This new body of hers was going to take some to get used to, but she had already come this far, and she was going to give it her all to stop him once and for all.
151321.title: A Venom-Filled Bat

choices: Barbara later woke up in Wayne Manor.
Barbara later woke up to find herself as the Penguin's prisoner.
1513211.content:
It was just as she had figured. Bane mentioned this stronger yet bulkier body of hers was proving to be a bit of hassle to put out any constant offense or defensive maneuvers. Her reflexes and reaction time were sharpened to her older slimmer self, and while she could strike with the power of a battering ram, she was finding herself missing far and wide with several attacks, strikes that would have hit the mark in the past. She let out a grunt after Bane connected on her solidified rib cage, reminding her that the masked man was still bigger and stronger then her. She quickly responded with a right to his jaw, causing him to stagger, but not tumble. Still it was an opening and she took it, pounding away at the wide target that was his chest, Bane grunting and growling as she did so.

He eventually blocked a strike and countered with one of his own with enough power to send the muscular bat reeling to one side. She attempted to regather herself, but in doing so, was unable to prevent Bane from charging straight at her, at full speed, and with far too much momentum, she could do nothing but possibly brace herself for impact as the two of them went straight through one of the side walls!

Even with how massive she had become, Barbara still yelled out in pain, having taken the blunt of the attack, Bane then took her by the arm and spun her around before tossing her away. She came crashing down a good few feet away, and a part of her was thankful she was currently so large. If not, she would have been killed after those last few attacks. She lifted herself up, only to be met with another one of Bane's piston-like punches and, yet again, she staggered, causing him to charge at her a second time. This time however, she was on to him.

"Only got one shot at this," she thought to herself, just before she dodged Bane's bullish rush and proceeded to give him a bit of his own medicine by shoulder tackling him through another portion of the same wall he had plowed through with her.

As they reentered Bane found himself on the floor, the muscled heroine quickly mounting him, lying in punch after punch, but Bane would not relent yet again countering her offense, this time with a precise headbutt. It was enough to get her off and away from him. Moving quickly, Bane grabbed and pressed the muscled bat over his head and again he tossed her, this time almost in the shape of a dart. While she didn't go through Barbara still screamed as she crashed, side first, into another wall. She assumed it was only due to the amount of muscle she had packed on that prevented her shoulder from ripping completely out of its socket. She gasped, clutching her right arm and side, her legs were still good but there was no question that she was hurting.

"As expected, despite your growth, you and I are far from equals. I will now collect what is mine and take my leave for I have a foolish bird I must find!"

She didn't bother responding, Bane's words were the truth after all, instead she spotted her fallen utility belt, it had snapped off after her waist had grown far too large. Silently she pulled out her trusty Batclaw. Bane far too busy grabbing a hold of his venom shipment to bother with her. As he lifted the crate over his wide shoulder she fired the weapon and, by luck, was able to to snatch a single container, reeling it back without Bane even realizing it was gone.

He had beaten her, but she made sure that he didn't escape with all of his property.

Some time later, Barbara found herself staggering through the darker back alleys of the city, the venom was beginning to wear off and she was really starting to feel the pain and punishment Bane had put her through earlier. Her shoulder wasn't separated, but the impact from that last attack, combined with a hell of a sore back, was beginning to take it's toll. She collapsed into a sitting position, cursing to herself after nearly crashing into a nearby trash can. She was exhausted physically and mentally and she knew it. Still she reached for her radio transmitter, built into her cowl, to call Alfred for a pick up.

She eventually reached him. He mentioned how terrible she sounded and urged her to stay where she was, which wasn't a problem, Barbara wasn't sure if she could get to her feet even if she wanted to. Afterward she reclined onto a building's wall, her head resting on the hard surface. She needed this moment of rest and didn't even fight against the sudden slumber beginning to take hold of her.
1513211.title: Bane Breaks Batgirl

choices: Shift the story to the whereabouts of Bane.
Shift the story to the direction of the Penguin.
15132111.content:
For whatever reason she could feel a form of light shine on her closed eyelids. After a few more pestering moments she at last awoke, unsure of where she was or how she had gotten there. It did feel comfortable though.

"Good morning, Miss Barbara." Even with a bit of sleep still in her eyes, she was vaguely able to make the cheerful expression of Alfred Pennyworth. The elder well suited man was busy opening the shutters of a nearby window. She quickly realized this was the light that had awoken her from her deep slumber.

"Am I at the manor? What time is it?" She asked as she wiped the sleep from her eyes.

"Yes ma'am you are and it's a bit past ten in the morning. You've been asleep since I found you late last night crumbled beside a building in the city's south section."

To be honest she didn't even remember Alfred finding her, much less the trip back here. Last night's events must have taken more out of her than she thought. She tried to stand, but the moment she did so, a sensation of pain suddenly shot through her, forcing back onto the pillow and mattress. Alfred voiced his concern, warning her not to move around so suddenly, her body still recovering from her battle wounds from the night before. Frustrated with her weakened state, she sighed deeply.

"I can't just stay here waiting to heal Alfred, there's still so much to do!"

The butler asked what she meant and just what what had occurred last night. She explained how the Penguin was the one responsible for the stolen venom, although she wasn't sure what exactly he was using it for, and how Bane had appeared seeking to reclaim what was his and punish the one responsible for the thievery.

"I take it he is the one that caused you such injury, Miss Barbara?"

"Nice guess," she said amusingly, however Alfred was not in a joking mood.

"How on earth did you escape from him, given your injured state and how damaged your suit was?"

"Well, he is the reason for me hurting at the moment, but..." Alfred caught her pause, asking if something was a matter, and in response, she asked for her utility belt. Upon receiving it she popped out the container, that was actually about as big as her hand, she had taken from Bane. With something of a smile she showed it off to the older man.

"My word! Is that?"

"It is. Venom, I took it from Bane...and the reason my suit was stretched and shred so much was because...I used this on myself."

She wasn't the least bit surprised when Alfred stared at her as if she had grown a second head, a near paleness coming over him. He instantly scowled her, asking what was she thinking exposing herself to such a drug, that Bruce and her father would never forgive her if they knew what she had done. She argued that she had no choice in the matter, Bane was ready to kill her for her interference.

"Master Bruce, much less your own father, would have found an alternative to stopping that mad man!"

"I didn't have a lot of options Alfred, and I'm not my father nor am I Bruce Wayne. I had to do things the way I saw fit."

She found herself still rather frustrated at the continuing comparison to the dark knight. From the Penguin's goons to Bane, now even Alfred of all people! She was beginning to understand why Nightwing ultimately went solo. She pushed those thoughts aside however, Alfred was simply worried about her and a wonderful person and friend that she couldn't allow herself to be angry with the older man.

"I understand your concerns for my well-being Alfred, but I simply can't lay in bed while maniacs like Penguin and Bane are out there. Bane wants vengeance and he'll tear through all of Gotham to get to the Penguin. I was left in charge of it's safety. I won't let innocent people die because I refused to act!" As willing as he was to argue, Alfred could only find himself agreeing with her safety for the public. After all, he heard something similar many times from the very man he proudly worked for.

"Alright but please don't strain yourself, Miss Barbara," he asked of her as he helped her out of bed and to her feet. Assuring him she was alright she slapped on some spare slippers and made for the door. "Where are you going?"

"I need to take care of a few things down in the cave," she explained.

"Are you sure, do you need me for anything?"

"I'm fine. Really. Just do me a favor. Watch for and inform me of any news feed that involves the Penguin, Bane, or both." She flashed him a quick grin as he agreed to her request. This was her case and she alone was going to bring it to a close.
15132111.title: The Morning After

choices: Barbara was back to her muscular form from the night before!
Barbara had grown even bigger then she was the night before!
151321111.content:
It had been a long night, not just for the recovering Batgirl, but for the man responsible for her injuries. Bane had already trashed a few locations, in search of the criminal mastermind, the Penguin, but amazingly enough, found little success. He wasn't pleased with the fact that the vertically challenged mobster was somehow eluding him. Just where had that accursed bird gotten to was the question burning away in his mind.

At the moment however, he was simply roaming the streets, looking for any sort of clue or overheard conversation that could bring him closer to his goal, he did so in his natural venom-free size, cloaking himself with a coat and hat so as to not bring any unwanted attention to himself. On the opposite end and just about ready to turn the corner was a citizen of Gotham who, by comparison, had a rather boring evening. Selina Kyle walked along at a simple pace as she did whenever she took one of her beloved cats out for a morning stroll, leash in one hand and a newspaper in the other.

The current day's headlines didn't seem to interest her, although she did glance over about an incident at the docks, perhaps this was the dark knight's doing, she hadn't seen or heard from him these past few days, although there was talk of a bat still sailing around Gotham city. Regardless she shifted to another headline, reading how someone had made a mess of a few safe houses that thugs of all natures used to evade the police department. Her night may have been dull, but it seemed like it was an average everyday night for the rest of the city. The thought amused her a bit that when she turned the corner she accidentally brushed up against a fellow passerby.

She apologized to the man as her cat meowed and hid beside her. With a simple tip of his hat, the unknown stranger said the same before continuing on his way.

"There there," she muttered, petting her dear cat's head. She wondered what it was about that man that startled her pet cat, although there was indeed something about him that felt familiar.

Meanwhile, back at the Batcave, Alfred walked in with a teapot and a simple lunch on a dinner tray, the butler figured that Barbara Gordon should have something to eat since she had completely skipped out on breakfast.

"Miss Barbara, are you still here?" He asked after failing to see her anywhere nearby.

"Yes I'm still here, Alfred, just getting in some training is all," she responded from somewhere inside the cave.

Training in her condition? Alfred could only sigh as he recalled Bruce Wayne doing the same far too many times for his own good. It seemed to him that some things just ran in the bat family. In any case, he pressed on, having followed the sound of her voice until, at last, he came upon her location.

"Something wrong, Alfred?" She asked with teasing sarcasm.

"Miss Barbara! What have you..." the poor man paused to keep himself from spilling her lunch and tea all over the cave floor.
151321111.title: Cat on the Street

choices: Skip ahead to Batgirl's search for Bane.
Shift over to the Penguin's location.
1513211111.content:
"Easy Alfred, can't have you passing out on my account!"

It was easy for her to say. The man had seen many things from his years of assisting the dark knight and beyond, but the stunning sight of Barbara Gordon, not just standing several feet taller than him but ripe with muscles that most men couldn't even hope to ever achieve in a lifetime, was something even he couldn't have prepared for. Barbara assisted him over to one side so that dear old Alfred could take a moment to gather himself, his reaction was pretty much what she was expecting.

"Miss Barbara! Please tell me you didn't re-inject the venom into your blood?" Alfred asked, even if the answer was staring at him right in the face.

"I did," she said in response with a rather apologetic smile.

After asked why, the butler didn't want to believe she was that purposely foolish, she explained that it was to help her heal faster. Prior to that however, she had been busy doing a good deal of research, using the data the Batcomputer already had on venom, and analyzing a sample of her blood she had taken before injecting herself again. Later, after making some progress, she gave herself the second shot and, when her growth concluded, she took another sample of her blood.

Alfred interrupted at this point, asking if she felt light headed in any way due to the two blood sample she had taken so close from one another. She waved off his concern, stating that if she hadn't been affected by now it was a safe bet, she was going to be alright from here on out, instead continued to feed on the meal brought to her same with taking in a few drinks from time to time.

She couldn't help but laugh whenever she had a bit of difficultly doing such simple tasks, guess she wasn't completely used to her powerful size just yet. All that aside however, she continued with her explanation. Analyzing, comparing, and generally researching everything she knew and had about the blood samples and venom she was at last able to reach her goal. A suppressor of sorts, a chemical formula that when mixed in with the venom would still retain all the muscle pumping properties of the original but lessen the aggressive, violent, and addictive mental changes. Barbara stated that this was needed if she wanted to train and master her new size, only with a clean and focused mind would she be able to do such a thing. Her eventual second confrontation with Bane was also something to think about, only with her skills, sharpened to her new muscles, would she stand a chance against him.

"So you're absolutely sure this will keep you of sound mind, Miss Barbara?" Alfred asked, while reassured somewhat, was still rightfully concerned for the young woman's safety.

"Yes I am. I created this Alfred, because at some point I may need the venom's added power. This suppressor of mine is what's going to keep me...me, instead of becoming a monster like Bane." Barbara knew full well that she couldn't afford to lose her mind to the venom's darker side. Later though, she spied Alfred taking notice of her attire. "You like? For the life of me I'll never understand why he has so many different bat suits," she stated with a laugh, just before she showed off how well this new suit fit her much larger then average size. "Apparently it's well fitted, well equipped, and very stretchy," she added with a slight bicep pose.

"So I see, and just to go back to what you said before, master Bruce seemingly prepares for any sort of situation he may or may not find himself in."

Barbara finished off her meal at this point and excused herself for a moment as she walked off to another part of the cave. He asked her if there was problem, and she responded with a no, that she was only going for one last thing she needed. A minute or two later she returned, metallic braces, with a singular tub attached to each, strapped to her huge forearms.

"I knew Bruce had to have these somewhere. They're not exactly like Bane's current tech, in fact, these only reach to my biceps, but they should work well enough anyway."

Alfred asked what she meant by that, she explained that the tubing system would give her a quicker, less painful transformation. She even modified it so that it could extract the venom straight out of her. Now all that was left was to get herself ready, she'd be hitting the streets again soon enough.
1513211111.title: The Muscular Bat is Back

choices: Batgirl began her search for Bane and the Penguin.
Catwoman went out into the night.
15132111112.content:
Elsewhere in the heart of Gotham, the Penguin eyed the paper handed to him by one of his hired goons.

"See boss, it's just like you said, that freak Bane tore up a few places looking for you!" The thug was rather surprised to see the monocle-wearing mobster unfazed by the news. In fact, he was even more surprised when the paper came crashing back into his face.

"Do I look worried to you, boy? Of course I don't! As all of you know, I expected the man's arrival, and soon enough, he was going to come looking for me, but I already have something in the works for him." Two of his armored men exchanged looks with one another before questioning their employer on how he was going to stop Bane from ripping their spines out. "You leave that to me. For now, simply stay on the look out for that dumb monster, or possibly even that flying rodent, Batman!"

"But boss, it was Batgirl the other day," stated one of the men that had been saved by the redhead heroine the night before.

"So it was." The unlucky goon gasped after the Penguin pressed the tip of his umbrella to the man's throat. "I don't care if it's a bat or a bird! Any of you spot someone dressed up in that specific attire, you open fire! Do you fools understand me!?" Out of fear they all nodded in agreement.

"Good! Oh, and one more thing. Murphy dear boy, if you ever have your sorry arse saved by a bat again, do not return here and hope that I never find you! Understood?"

The umbrella tip dug slightly deeper into the thug's throat. "Yeah boss, no problem! Won't happen again!"

"Excellent! I shall continue to prepare for our potential visitors." With that said, the Penguin seemingly waddled away, leaving the goon squad alone.

"Wonder what he's planning?"

"Dunno, probably some weird-ass crap with that venom we've stolen. Gonna need it if Bane comes rushing through like a damn bull!"

The men all agreed, hoping that their boss had something powerful in mind to stop the muscular monster.

Sometime later, inside her apartment, Selina Kyle was busy readying herself for her usual evening activity, her thoughts going back to the man she had accidentally bumped into earlier in the day. Something about him was poking away at her curiosity, and it wasn't in a flirtatious nature like with the dark knight. No, it was a completely different vibe, one that had also startled her poor tabby. While she always kept her eyes out for any potential prize perhaps her little rooftop stroll would also provide with some answers to the mystery man's identity. Gathering her trusty whip, she was nearly ready to go.

Back at the Batcave, Barbara Gordon went through the last preparations she needed. Her body now back to normal, she had done as much training as she could, hoping that it would be enough. Fully equipped and with her motorcycle rived up, she slid on her cowl, Alfred wishing her the best of luck while promising her to stay in constant radio contact. She nodded in agreement before taking a seat on the motorbike. She waved goodbye as the engine roared and, a moment later, she was off.
15132111112.title: Preparations All Over Gotham

choices: Bane proved to be too much for Catwoman.
Amazingly, Catwoman was able to get away from Bane.
151321111122.content:
Catwoman smiled nearly from ear to ear as she gracefully exited from her latest heist. A wondrous diamond styled necklace, she estimated it's value to be at least several thousands in worth.

"That was far too easy!" Her smile faded however, when she picked up on a commotion nearby. "What's this now?" she wondered, before making her way down to the street below. She silently crawled on the cold pavement following the sounds of what she figured was another drunken brawl in one of the bars just across the street. Suddenly came the yell of one poor fool who had just been tossed right out of a window. He came crashing down, but before he could even pick himself up, the man grunted after Catwoman wrapped her thigh around his neck.

"So friend, what's your story?" Her cheerful smile almost made him forget who she was.

"If I wanted this sort of action I'd go down to the strip club, but what the hell, guess it don't mean crap if I tell you that this masked freak is tearing apart everyone inside."

"Hmm, how interesting! Pleasant dreams." Before he could properly react, the man was knocked unconscious after a quick strike. For a moment she wondered if it was worth looking into, she could leave now, never look back and not care what happened to the unconscious idiot or anyone else inside, but as the saying went, her curiosity was beginning to get the better of her. Selina, with slight amusement, hoped that last part about killing the cat wouldn't come true.

Sneaking on over to the freshly made opening, she parted pieces shards of broken glass from her path. Peeking into the building, she spotted a rather towering figure of a man fighting off a handful of thugs, or maybe it was better to say the opposite, considering the much smaller in size group were doing everything in their power to stop the giant from sending them all to the emergency room, or worse.

"Someone kill the..." the thug yelled as he was tossed aside, like a rag doll, crashing into a nearby table. Another attempted to use a chair as a weapon, except the darn thing exploded into pieces the moment it made contact with the behemoth's back, who turned over and gave out a solid right to the poor sap as a response.

The cat silently watched as one last goon pulled out a rifle, determined to to put down the human juggernaut, but just as he pulled the trigger, the gun was effortlessly swatted away. However, despite that the weapon had still fired off a round, instinctively Selina lowered her head to avoid the shot. She later cringed as a slight sensation of pain ran through her right hand. Fearing she had indeed been shot, she looked over her entire arm and all seemed to be working order. Her eyes however nearly bulged right out of their sockets as she came to realize that, while no part of her had struck by the bullet, her prized jewelry was. It was demolished, damaged, no different than the broken remains of the window. Basically, it was completely worthless to her now!

Selina was furious and, like a woman scorn, wished to pay back the clueless thug who had effectively ruined her night.

Inside, Bane grasped at his captive's neck, demanding he tell him about the Penguin or else he'd pop the worthless man's head like a grape. Suddenly the man was freed when the cat's whip made sharp contact with Bane's wrist. With a second strike Selina, perched where the broken window used to be, she brought him over toward her.

"You, my friend, just cost me a hard night's work!"

She knocked him out not a moment later. Needless to say, Bane was furious at the unexpected interference, cursing and yelling at her as he easily tossed aside anything in his way.

"Easy stallion," Catwoman explained as Bane made his way towards her, "I'm not exactly fluent in your Spanish tongue, but if this kitty's pissed you off, well, blame it on that fool over there!" She then leaped onto the street, dusting herself off ready to make her leave, until Bane came crashing through the front door, ripping it completely off it's hinges.

"I was this close from receiving the answers I seek and you...you wretched Bruja have cost me my chance at finding El Pinguino! For that, I'm going to snap your body in half nine times over!"

"Well shoot, guess that whole curiosity killing the cat thing might have some truth to it after all," Selina thought to herself as she applied her bravest of faces, even if in reality she knew what that hulking beast of a man was capable of. Her hand steady on her whip, she knew she couldn't take him in a straight up fight. Instead she only had to distract and evade him long enough for her to come up with some sort of escape plan. It was the only chance she'd have of getting away with her life intact.
151321111122.title: Curiosity May Just Kill the Cat

choices: She is saved by another hero or heroine
1513211111221.content:
Furious, Bane charged at her. Selina had just enough time to leap out of the way as Bane ran past her, slamming into a parked car a short distance away. Taking advantage of his momentary confusion, Selina used her whip, wrapping it around the behemoth's leg, in an effort to trip him.

But it was like trying to rip a tree out of the ground. Pulling the whip as hard as she could, Bane realized what she was trying to do and yanked the whip toward him, sending Catwoman flying through the air, before slamming into his rock hard midsection.

Dazed, Selina rolled over, just in time to see a massive hand pull her off the ground. His thick fingers wrapped around her neck, Catwoman struggled for breath, clawing at his hand for release, before she was launched backward, the breath forced from her lungs as she slammed into an SUV, glass showering the sidewalk as the vehicle rolled over.

The armor she wore protected her somewhat, but she could already feel bruises forming on her back, along with a couple of cracked ribs.

Wincing with pain and swaying as she got to her feet, a fire hydrant whizzed by her face, embedding itself in the building behind her. A small crowd started to form, though they were at least 30 feet away from the action, a few taking pictures.

Bane charged again, this time brandishing a car like a battering ram. Leaping out of the way as the car missed her by inches, Catwoman jumped on Bane's back, trying with all her might to rip out a Venom tube thicker than both of her arms combined.

Bane reached behind him with one of his enormous hands and pulled Catwoman away, before viciously throwing her on the asphalt. A huge fist aimed at her face, Selina barely dodged it, before Bane stood erect again, sighing in annoyance.

"I grow bored of this fight, Catwoman," he told her. Activating the Venom once more, Selina watched helplessly as his muscles pulsed with more and more power.

"Oh, hell," she thought to herself, crawling away on the ground. She didn't know how badly she was hurt and she didn't care; all that mattered to her was getting away from this monster before he killed her.

But before she could go more than a couple of feet, a much larger hand pulled her off the ground again. Holding both of her arms in one of his meaty fists, Bane suspended Catwoman in front of him, her body limp and wracked with pain.

"Sorry it had to be this way, Catwoman," he said, cocking his other arm back, ready to deliver the killing blow...
1513211111221.title: Bane proved to be too much for Catwoman.

15132111112212.content:
Try as she might Selina simply could not find the strength or method to break Bane's iron hold. Her strength decreasing by the second as her body began to come to terms with her injuries and it was clear had no intention of letting up on his god-like grip.

This was it this was she was going to go out not in a fabulous blaze of glory but as a stain on the streets of Gotham thanks to this enraged brute.

"Adios"

It was all Bane muttered his tone as cold as the look in his eyes. Momentarily Selina looked away as she did however a miracle occurred!

Bane howled in anger as he unceremoniously tossed her aside after a sharp blade had made contact with his entire forearm.

"A...Talon."

Much to Bane not to mention Catwoman's surprise there indeed stood a member of the fabled Court of Owls. A female Talon to be more precise leaving Selina to wonder why the Court would waste it's time with her until she remembered having a run-in with a lady Talon and Batgirl some time ago. There was also word that the two of them had been seen together on occasion.

She would have laughed at the irony of an owl saving a cat but her body was still burning with pain so for the moment she was just thankful to still be alive.

"Look I now you all are immortal to some degree but I'm pretty sure big boy over there can still take you out for a while by breaking you in some way."

Selina wasn't sure if her silent savoir could understand her but figured it was best to warn the woman nonetheless.

To her credit Strix, the "name" given to her by Batgirl, held her own against the mighty Bane expertly dodging his strikes and attacks until she reached the fallen Catwoman lifting the injured Selina into her arms.

Bane attempted to stop the owl from escaping with his prey only to be met with a handful of knives thrown in his direction and much like with The Batman when he regathered his attention The Talon was gone with Catwoman.

"Clever girl. Much like Santa Prisca The Court breeds excellence." Bane muttered deciding to leave the cat and owl for another day, or least until he was through with a certain penguin.
15132111112212.title: The cat who is saved by an owl
