151321111122122.content:
"Sorry boys but Mr. Cobblepot is busy at the moment and can't be bothered."

The raven-haired woman known solely as "Candy" who acted as Cobblepot's secretary explained to some of her employer's hired muscle as she finished up filing her nails.

"Yeah but we heard that freak Bane is here and he's looking for the boss."

One of the men explained clearly on edge at the news that the masked man was already ripping through Gotham in search of Penguin. The tanned young woman didn't seem concerned as she stood up readjusting her eye-glasses her black dress hugging her curves nicely as she leaned in to better explain things.

"Mr. Cobblepot is already well aware of that and is in the process of taking measures to combat Bane but as I said he does not want to be bothered at the moment and for your safety please ask again at a later time because seeing Mr. Cobblepot unleash his anger and frustrations can be rather...unnerving."

Elsewhere in the Iceberg lounge Oswald Cobblepot watched with anticipation as he stood inside a private room overseeing the ground floor below where he had rounded up a dozen or so of his men all to combat against one sole individual, his personal assistant Tracey Buxton!

The bitchy blonde stood opposite of the men chuckling as she overheard them say how their boss must be insane to be putting her into this sort of situation. Some of the men had a good hundred pounds on her there was no way she was walking out of this alive.

"I hope none of you are hoping to go easy on Tracey here. That's not what this exercise is about after all." Penguin stated over the loudspeaker.

"I know what you're thinking though our girl has no chance of survival but I assure you that will soon change. What you lot will do is come at her with everything you have, do you understand? Anyone who defies this request well my girl you leave them to me afterwards."

Most of the men stood silent others bickering among themselves only snapping their attentions back at their boss and the blonde before them as he spoke up once more.

"Now Tracey go ahead and prepare yourself. Show them why they will need everything they have to stop you."

"Right Mr. Cobblepot."

To the men's surprise the blonde plucked out two syringes from somewhere within her white dress. Both loaded with the Venom formula!

She cackled afterwards as she injected herself with the chemical compound in quick succession. Her body beginning to pulse and vibrate as the formula took hold her shapely form changing before the eyes of the henchmen.

The fabric of her dress tearing rapidly away as her forearms and biceps grew too large to be contained. Her swelling calves destroying her fishnets the skirt portion of her dress falling victim to her growing thighs as they swelled further.

Her previously small midsection extending in girth until she rival if not outclassed even some of the largest men in attendance. While just above her back widen hardening as she grew just a tad bit wider then she was tall. Her pectorals and already sizable breasts expanding in power and size until her top was ultimately destroyed thanks to the combined might of her now tremendous upper body, leaving her in a lacy yet very stretched out black bra.

A few more startling moments later and the growth had appeared to have run it's course and there stood the mighty blonde flexing her enormous arms relishing in the power she now possessed!

Bigger, stronger, and far larger then any man in the room the amazon took a heavy step forward daring them all to come straight at her.

"Let's get things started shall we." stated Cobblepot with a laugh as he signaled for the fight to begin. Clearly the man was pleased with the way his plan was preceding.
151321111122122.title: Penguin's plan finally revealed?

152.content:
The women of Gotham city had endured a lot of physical changes over the years. On some occasions however, these changes have resulted in them reverting back their younger years, much to the advantage of their adversaries.

With the dark knight unavailable, it was up to Batgirl to prevent yet another burglary committed by the elusive Catwoman. Hoping to confront the cat burglar inside the national bank however, much to her shock, she instead found a young baby, less than a year old, crying in the cat burglar's outfit on the bank floor. Upon further inspection, Batgirl realized that this little baby was actually Catwoman. Somehow, some way, someone must have transformed the poor feline into a baby in the middle of the burglary. While taking care of baby Selina, Batgirl must find out who was responsible and figure out how to change her back before the mysterious stranger can strike again.

On another occasion however, it was Batgirl who was a victim of age regression. In a gritty night club in the middle of a late night, two notorious criminal bosses, Two-Face and Black Mask, were supposed to arrange some sort of deal with each other. Suspecting the worst, Batgirl, fresh from a bruising encounter with Poison Ivy, infiltrated the night club in pursuit of the deadly mobsters until, suddenly, the effects of Ivy's new pheromone began to take effect and, as a result, she found herself slowly regressing back to her youth. She must now find a way to escape the night club and confront Ivy before she becomes to young to even stand!

So which story would you like to follow?

153.content:
The caped crusader was at his most vulnerable as the victim of animal transformation. One of his most infamous transformations was when an unnamed female mobster, mimicking the gimmick and powers of the evil sorceress Circe, placed a curse on him, transforming him into a pig, during a night on patrol with Batgirl. As the rumors of the dark knight's transformation spread across Gotham city, and with no sign of any other of his allies, it was up to Batgirl to find a way to reverse the effects of the transformation. She alone must defend Batman, in this vulnerable form, as she struggled to solve the mystery behind it all. But would she be able to find the unnamed mobster and reverse the effects, or will the likes of Catwoman, the Penguin and Harley Quinn help themselves to servings of pork chops?

Even Catwoman however, was forced to endure such a humiliating point of view, more significantly with her encounter with Kirk Langstrom. After learning about cases of animal cruelty in Langstrom's laboratory, Catwoman couldn't resist. She had to teach the professor a lesson, but what he had in store for her was far more than she bargained for. After throwing a mysterious substance into the face of the cat burglar, she was horrified to find herself transforming into a mouse! To make matters worse, Langstrom revealed that his latest formula was funded by the criminal mastermind, Two-Face! Forced to adapt to her new form, Selina had to learn that life wasn't so bad as a mouse before she was found and captured by the vengeful Harvey Dent.

So which story would you like to follow?
153.title: Animal Transformation Stories

1532.content:
Selina ran for all she was worth, the shadow looming over head making her squeak loudly.

She was far from the former thief she had been. She was far from the cat burglar she used to be. She was now nothing more than a mouse!

It all started at the laboratory of Kirk Langstrom.

Catwoman slunk in, efficiently as ever, about to pounce on the scientist who abused animals for his own gain, when the man had surprised her, turning around and dousing her whole body with an odd purple chemical.

What followed was a clenching in her stomach and a squeezing feeling as she shrunk into her once tight suit, the lab quickly appearing like a city as she sunk into her costume. Fur grew all over her body and whiskers twitched as they formed. Her hands and feet turned into paws as she dashed out of the mire that her costume had become. Her ears twitched next, expanding more and more as she became quite the floppy-eared mouse. It seemed that the predator had become the prey. Now Selina knew what it felt like to be someone's plaything!

The shadow then appeared. Completely petrified, all she could do was dart away.

Running for all she was worth, Selina was now more desperate than ever. Never in her wildest dreams did Catwoman imagine that she would be transformed into a weak little mouse!

1543312.content:
Harleen Quinzel was once a therapist for the inmates at Arkham Asylum. She always took pride in her work and felt as if she could make a difference in the prisoner's lives. However, one day, she was assigned to be the therapist of Jack Napier, aka, the Joker. During their sessions, Harleen felt as if the Joker was trying to seduce her, but she ignored his advances. When she went over every detail of his criminal past, it horrified her. It was then that Harleen knew what she had to do; become a crime-fighter.

It was Joker's raving madness that drove her to this, so she needed something that would strike fear into the heart of that clown. She then found a flyer for the now defunct Haley's Circus' clown act. She had become particularly inspired by the harlequin she saw in the poster and knew the exact costume she needed. She got a red and black leotard with black diamonds on the red, a black and red jester hat, red and black shoes. and put on clown make-up. Harleen Quinzel was dead, and now there was only Harley Quinn, the sole crime-fighter of Gotham.

Throughout her entire crime-fighting career, Harley made several enemies, but she never forgot about her hatred for the Joker. However, things began to get out of hand as the enemies just kept coming and Harley was losing her mind. She needed a sidekick, and she got one. During a Joker attack on the Gotham City Police Station, Harley saved the life of the Commissioner's daughter Barbara. Out of gratitude, Barbara begged to be Harley's new sidekick, and Harley accepted her.

Now, Gotham had the protection of the Quinn Twins, Harley Quinn and her plucky young sidekick, Barbie Quinn. Barbie was dressed in an identical costume as Harley, but her height was the only difference as she was slightly shorter than her. With the make-up and the hat, the two did look like sisters, and all of Gotham feared them.

What now?
1543312.title: The Quinn twins Origins

All around she could see once ravaged buildings now restored by the very plants the humans had once taken for granted. In fact, much of the original bleak cityscape was now replaced by the color green. Ever since she had taken power, she had spent much of her time repairing the damage that man had caused. If anyone should atone for the actions of man, it should be her. In the years since she had taken over, many cities around the planet looked like this.

She stood as she glanced her now beloved city. She wore a floor length emerald green dress with satin gloves to match which went well with her green skin and heavily contrasted her long dark red hair. Her green eyes finished her plantlike appearance.

She raised one hand and a giant leaf petal came up to the building top that she stood upon. She stepped onto the petal which gently carried her down towards the streets below. She hovered above them and watched her subjects below.

She had been able to destroy all of mankind if she had wished and had originally wanted to. But she chose mercy in the end seeing as many of the sniveling knaves below her were simply terrified of her. She chose mercy in the end after deciding that they could be changed in the end. She figured she could atone more by changing the ones whom had done harm in the first place.

Many of the remaining humans shared a green tint like hers thanks to her precious plants secreting chemicals allowing them to adapt to her new world. The chemicals however weren't powerful enough to allow them the ability to control her plants.

She sat upon the leaf and said, "Take me to the park. I could do with some time out there."

The plants holding her obeyed and soon began growing their way towards the park. Upon arriving, she stood and a series of leaves grew under her, forming a series of makeshift steps. She descended the steps and into the park which had been transformed into a giant...

1551.content:
The caped crusader was at his most vulnerable in the hands of Gotham city's deadliest females. No matter what his fate, the dark knight truly struggled to cope, even unable to defend himself from the overwhelming power of his enemies.

On one occasion, Batman fell victim to a trap, courtesy of his more mysterious opponents, Catwoman. Sharing a confusing relationship with the caped crusader, Catwoman was an accomplished burglar with malicious intentions. A rare artifact caught the attention of the mischievous feline, an item that she could use to her advantage. Even if the dark knight arrived on the scene, she knew that, once he arrived, he would be no match for such a powerful artifact, capable of total domination and humiliation in the hands of his rival. Catwoman would soon find herself with her own little plaything, and perhaps even more.

A former psychiatrist, Dr. Harleen Quinzel, now known as Harley Quinn became obsessively fixated on her first patient, her current boyfriend, the Joker. Under orders, Harley Quinn managed to steal an ancient artifact capable of manipulating the body and shape of those unfortunate to stand in its path. With this artifact in hand, Harley managed to lure the dark knight into her clutches, where she planned to place her boyfriend's arch nemesis into his dirty hands. Harley however, had plans of her own. How could she resist having a little toy to play with?

So which story would you like to follow?

15511.content:
All the traces pointed all fingers towards one thief, or cat burglar. I knew that she would strike at Gotham museum, they shipped a new item and stored it here two nights ago. Before following her, I did some research on the item. From what I found, it was a rare artifact of Egyptian origin, an ancient ring with an emerald jewel carved in the shape of some kind of Siamese cat. Apparently, the ring bearer would possess unimaginable power, capable of manipulating another living being, including humans, into any shape or form the bearer desired. As impossible as it sounded, I couldn't take any chances. It was no wonder why Catwoman would be interested in such a powerful item.

I followed her into the museum, it was dark, silent and vast, the burglar could be crawling about anywhere in the building. The security was even tightened since the last time, but this didn't seem to phase her, and this was no problem for me. Creeping through the building in search of the mischievous thief, I had a strong suspicion that this would be no ordinary night.

Further down a long hallway, I found her, naturally crawling through the improved burglar alarms, like the professional that she was. I watched from the shadows as she successfully reached her goal. She obtained the ancient ring and, almost instinctively, leaped from the scene. Once again, I followed her out of the museum and onto the rooftops of the city. I followed her to a familiar spot, overlooking the entire residential district, bright under the moonlight. It was here where we both shared our first kiss, a night I would never forget.

She prepared herself for my arrival, as if our encounters had become routine. She was the least bit surprised when I finally revealed myself. "There you are," she remarked with false innocence, "I was hoping you would show up earlier tonight."

I was not amused. "Where is the ring Selina?"

"You can see right through me, can't you?" Catwoman laughed sarcastically as she reached into her suit and pulled out the ring from her cleavage, holding it in between her sharp fingers. "That's good, because I can see straight through you, Batman."

"I'm afraid I can't let you steal that ring."

Catwoman simply chuckled. "Sorry darling," she replied, "But we're not going through all this again. Not tonight. There's going to be a change of plans."

I immediately realized what she intended to do. I had to take action. I lunged towards her, but she immediately dodged my attack and leaped up to another vantage point, as if she anticipated my response. "Don't you ever get tired of the same old routine Batman?" She asked as she once again jumped out of my reach, "How about a little change for once?" I did not reply. I was more concerned with subduing the petty thief before she put the ring on her finger and figured out how to activate its tremendous power. I lunged one more time, but once again, it was futile, as she once again jumped out of my reach. Now with the ring in her finger, she pointed it towards me. It seemed that she had already researched how to use the ring herself. "Let's shake things up a little bit!"

There was little I could do. She pointed the ring directly toward me with malicious intentions. A blinding light beamed from the diamond ring, shining over me. Under the beam of light, I realized that something remarkable was happening to me, much to the enjoyment and much to the desire of Catwoman.

155111.content:
Under the bright gaze of the diamond ring, I was blinded. I could feel everything before me fade from my reach, my entire body felt an overwhelming surge as I collapsed to my knees, to the delight of my smiling opponent. For a moment, I lost all of my senses as the shimmering sensation coursed through my body, but when I finally regained my vision, no longer sweating under the gleaming beam of the incredible ring, I was horrified by the outcome.

Everything around me had grown out of proportion. It seemed like a long sprint to the edge of the formerly enclosed rooftop, and the vast stone beneath my feet reached out to a distance like I was standing in the middle of a desert. For a moment, I thought that Catwoman had disappeared into the night, until I caught a glimpse of a pair of leather boots, enormous in size, standing directly in front of me. As I stood up to my feet, as tall I as could, I continued to tilt my head up, following the immense, god-like figure that stood before me, until, occupied by a huge, devious grin, I saw the face of Catwoman, looming high above, looking down at me as she licked her lips. In that terrifying moment, I realized that the power possessed by the ring was too true and, as a victim of its tremendous power, I had shrunk. I now stood, from my estimation, at a mere three inches in size, a mere fraction of the overall, massive size of the cat burglar who stood triumphantly above me.

Smiling from ear to ear, Catwoman began to bend down with a twinkle in her eye. In a squatting position, she continued to stare at me in amazement, proud of what she had accomplished. "Well, well, well," she giggled in delight, "Looks like it's my turn to do the chasing." I was too petrified to reply, all I wanted to do was run away, out of the grasp as my sinister adversary. Unfortunately however, as I saw her massive hand hover above my head, I knew that she had other intentions on her mind.

"I've waited a long time for this, Batman," she continued as she approached me with her enormous leather glove. Under the looming shadow of her massive hand, all I could do was turn around and run for dear life, something that I thought that I'd never do in my entire life. Even at my diminished size however, my attempt to escape was futile. I was immediately swept from my feet, landing into the soft hand of Catwoman, who held me in a tight grip with her fingers. The immense force she held me between her fingers rendered me unable to move. I squirmed, like a fly caught in a web, as Catwoman lifted me high above the ground, holding me in front of her face as if I was nothing. I was so small that, if she wanted to, she could have swallowed me whole.

I dreaded the inevitable humiliation that I was about to endure in the hands of my malicious rival, who now had full control and dominance over me. As she squeezed me in between her sharp fingers, holding me in front of her glaring cat eyes, I could read from the smile on her lips that I was doomed to suffer under her very power.

"Believe me my little bat, I have so much more in store for you!"

I was completely helpless. No larger than a mere three inches, all I could do was squirm, squeezed in between the sharp fingers of my old nemesis. She licked her lips in anticipation, holding her new toy in front of her, she could do anything she could possibly imagine to me, and there was nothing that I could do about it. At first she was delighted with her total dominance over me, but almost suddenly, I noticed a shimmering look in her eye as she remembered her true intentions.

"I must admit," Catwoman stated, changing the tone in her voice, "As much as I would enjoy having a little intimate moment together right now, there's something that I would like you to do for me before we get down to business."

I dreaded what she had in mind. Whatever it was, I knew that I wasn't going to like it. I had no intention of helping the woman in any of her petty crimes, and I certainly had no intention of sharing an intimate moment with her like this, but at this point, there was very little I could do about it.

"If you may recall, Poison Ivy has stolen some of my goods, and I want them back. I need you to provide a little distraction as I sneak in and retrieve them. You do this little favor for me, and I might just let you grow a few more inches higher!"

I couldn't believe what I was hearing. Catwoman would rather throw me, in this state, into the clutches of the evil Poison Ivy, just so she could have her already stolen goods back? I refused, but almost immediately, I faced the consequences.

I felt Catwoman loosen her grip as I slid in between her fingers. I was about to land hard onto the concrete floor until, suddenly, Catwoman caught me by the leg. With my ankle trapped between her thumb and her finger, the pressure she applied almost broke my ankle. She then began to shake me, I could feel the bones in my leg snap out of place. Dangling from a broken leg, I gave in and agreed to help her. With that said, Catwoman lifted me back into her hands and sarcastically apologized for breaking my leg, an apology that I refused to accept.

Before I could catch my breath however, Catwoman threw me, head first, in between her breasts. Being squeezed in between two huge mountains of soft flesh, pressed in place by a leather suit, was enough to make me suffocate.

"Enjoying the view down there my little bat?" Catwoman was completely careless. She showed complete disregard for my safety. She had shrunk me to a mere three inches, broke my leg and stuffed me, face first, into her tight cleavage. I was humiliated, but there was little I could do. Stuck in between her breasts, I could feel beads of sweat drench my costume as Catwoman made her way to her desired destination, where Poison Ivy awaited my arrival.

Eventually we arrived at the scene. Catwoman finally pulled me from her cleavage, noticing how drenched I was from her sweat. Again, she falsely apologized, clearly trying to hold back her satisfaction of having complete control over me, before looking down at an abandoned boutique where Poison Ivy called her latest hideout. The little shop was overflowing with foliage, and the scent was strong. Realizing what she had to do, Catwoman then looked back down at me, lying in the palm of her hand, comforting my broken leg.

"Are you ready my sweet little bat?"

I couldn't take it much further. Catwoman had complete control over me, but this did not mean that I had to take orders! My leg was broken, and I just spent the last hour stuffed down her massive, sweaty cleavage. Enough was enough. I refused to go along with her insane plan.

As terrified as I was, I tried my best to show no sign of intimidation. I stood by what I said. I refused to help such an evil woman retrieve the goods that she had already stolen. I would not be apart of such petty activities.

"Well," she smirked, not as disappointed as I thought she would be, "I guess there's more than one way to skin a bat!"

155331.content:
The women of Gotham city have undergone many unusual changes, but perhaps none more bizarre than these odd tales.

While in the process of pilfering a priceless item from the museum, Catwoman falls under a curse. Over the following few days, she found her entire world changing. She was eating a lot more and her skin was turning pink. The only one who could help her was the one and only Batman. But could the caped crusader help Selina Kyle from slowly but surely turning into a pig? Or would the hungry criminals of Gotham help themselves to some pork chops?

Renee Montoya and her girlfriend, Batwoman, managed to track the Mad Hatter and confront him in his latest hideout, an abandoned warehouse. While fighting his thugs, they were both blasted by the crazed villain. Knocked out by the blast, the duo awoke several hours later, not only finding that their foes had disappeared, but discovering some odd changes happening to their bodies. While Batwoman was slowly transforming into a walrus, Montoya was starting to look more and more like a dodo! Will they be able to find the man responsible and change back before it's too late?

So which story would you like to follow?

Supposedly it was a representation of a goddess of plenty, but to Catwoman, the only thing that mattered was that it was valuable, or at least it would look quite good on her shelf, alongside her many other purloined objects.

Arriving home forty minutes later, Selina divested herself from her tight costume and prepared for bed.

As she slept, she failed to notice the eyes of the idol glowing green. A gleaming light struck her slumbering form.

The next morning, awaking with a yawn, Selina went towards the kitchen, rubbing her stomach a bit. For some odd reason, she was starving.

What she had intended to be merely a slice of toast and one egg turned into nine slices of buttered toast, the entirety of her eggs, and several large pitchers of milk. Laying back in her dining room chair, Selina cradled the taut orb her stuffed stomach now was, marveling at her capacity. She had never eaten that much food at once.

After taking a shower, it eventually donned on her. Not her sudden craving for food, but her work. She decided that, with all the stolen goods she already possessed, she was just pushing herself too hard.

"Maybe I could take a vacation in a few weeks," she thought to herself, ignoring the slight bump that developed across her soft belly.
1553311.title: Pig Woman

choices: Selina freaked out at the sight of her new tail.
Over the next few days, Selina heavily packed on the pounds.
15533111.content:
Ignoring her sudden urges, Selina planned to go the grocery store that day and, after taking a nap and digesting her big breakfast, she executed her plan.

Cart in hand, she went down the aisles, finding herself grabbing far more junk food than usual. As she entered the frozen dessert aisle, Selina spied the large selection of ice cream on sale. The treats caused her mouth to water until, suddenly, another noise emerged.

"SNORT!"

Blinking a bit, Selina looked around. There was only a mother and her baby at the end of the current aisle she was in and it looked like they didn't hear her.

"Phew," she sighed, "That was SNORT close."

Eyes widening at the sound that escaped her nose, Selina hurried through the aisle, but not before grabbing several extra large pints of ice cream. She hoped that the checkout line wouldn't be busy, but unfortunately it was packed, and the thought of all the food she had in her cart caused her stomach to rumble.

"So SNORT hungry!"

"Selina?"

Selina jumped a bit at her name and turned around, hoping the voice she heard wasn't who she thought it was. But unfortunately fate was against her that day, for as she turned around, she spied Bruce Wayne, her on-again off-again boyfriend. He had a shopping cart of his own, with various healthy foods and some wines.

"B-Bruce...what are you doing here?"

Bruce looked a bit shy as well as he replied. "Well, I gave Alfred the day off and realized that I was running out of some protein supplements and wine so, here I am."

"I see...SNORT!"

Bruce blinked a bit as Selina covered her nose.

"Selina...did you just snort?"

Thankfully, Selina was next and, after swiftly telling Bruce she'd call him, she paid for her items and left, leaving Bruce to only rub his chin in thought. As he replayed the last sight of her walking away in his head, he could have sworn that he saw a bulge just above her rear end. It almost looked like some kind of tail!
15533111.title: Snorting Selina

choices: Upon her first glimpse, Ivy broke into laughter.
Upon her first glimpse, Ivy listened to Selina's explanation.
155331111.content:
Arriving home, mortified beyond belief, Selina swiftly slumped onto her couch, a sudden pain shooting just above her rear. Squealing, she jumped up and reached behind her for the source of the pain, finding some kind of rope with her hands. But, as she turned her head and looked down, she realized that what she thought was a rope was instead a curly, pink pig's tail!

An involuntary snort was the only sound she made for several minutes before sitting down, carefully positioning herself so she didn't sit on her new appendage.

"It's okay Selina, it's okay. You just have a tail, that's all. A pig's tail...Oh SNORT!" What followed was a series of sobs, moans, and snorts as Selina gave vent to the turmoil that were her emotions before, after ten minutes of venting, she remembered she had a friend who just might be able to help her. But as Selina went to grab her phone and dial said friend, her stomach rumbled and her feet carried her to the kitchen table and the bags of groceries she hadn't put away yet.

The rational part of Selina's brain switched off as she dug into the food, eating without a care for manners, decency, or convention.

"Ooh..." Selina moaned, eyes opening. She felt sluggish, bloated, and content at the moment, a hand patting her stomach, only to meet with her middle far sooner than she remembered ever having done so before. This brought more awareness shooting through her and she looked down, only to find a large mass where her toned abs once was.

Standing up, Selina realized that she wasn't just stuffed. No, whatever was happening to her had caused her whole body to become fat, not chubby, but full on fat. Selina pinched, poked, slapped, and fondled every new inch of herself. Looking in the mirror, she snorted wildly. Yes, she was definitely a fat woman now.

Turning from her reflection, Selina rushed towards the scale in her bathroom and, after a moment's hesitation, hopped on. The digital counter climbed and went berserk before displaying an error message.

Round cheeks turning pale, Selina remembered that the scale had a limit of three hundred pounds. For it to fritz out like this meant that she was way over the limit!

Another snort, a few sobs, and then she remembered her friend. "Yes," she realized, "Poison Ivy could help."

Dialing her number, she managed to get the plant-obsessed villain.

"Ivy? It's Selina. I need your help!"

Pamela Isley had seen a lot in her years as a criminal, but the sight of Selina Kyle, overweight with a tail and snorting like a pig was a bit much, even for her experience.
155331111.title: Pig Tail

choices: Ivy watched Selina gorge and sent the image to Harley's cellphone.
Ivy followed Selina to her apartment to examine the stolen idol.
1553311111.content:
Selina puffed out her rounder cheeks in annoyance as she allowed Ivy to let out her amusement at Selina's predicament. Of course, after four straight minutes of laughter, Selina finally put a stop to it by giving her best ugly squeal, the sound cutting off the sound and grabbing Ivy's attention. If Selina was surprised at how perfectly pig-like she sounded, she did not show it.

""Ivy," she cried, before letting out another loud snort, "Will you help me?"

Ivy nodded, moving aside to let the far fatter woman in, sneaking a peek at the rotund rear Selina now had. If Ivy wasn't aware that the butt she was staring at was Selina's, she would most certainly have enjoyed that massive amount of ham for her Thanksgiving day meal with Harley Quinn!

After seating Selina on her sturdiest metal chair, Ivy began her analysis, poking a syringe into Selina's arm and eliciting a squeal. Once her blood was taken, Ivy analyzed it and finally announced her discovery. "Genetically, there's nothing wrong with you. You appear perfectly human at the DNA level."

Selina oinked mightily at her conclusion, hands squeezing her pig-pink gut. "So this is nothing!?"

"Well, if there's no scientific problem with you, obviously your problem is magical in nature. What did you do? Piss off Zatanna? Steal Wonder Woman's bra?" Selina simply frowned, until she suddenly recollected an earlier issue.

"Well, I did take this idol earlier this week, but it was from some old civilization, and one not known for magic."

"I'm guessing that it has something to do with your current appearance."

Selina was about to contest the point, largely because she didn't like where Ivy's point was leading, namely returning what she stole, something Selina never did, when her gut suddenly rumbled. The thief caught the amused gleam in Ivy's eyes as she leaned forward.

"Is the piggy hungry?" Selina flipped her off and snorted angrily, but conceded and nodded her head. "Well you'll be happy to hear that Harley stocked up on sweets!"

Selina wasn't happy, but her stomach rumbled again, and she knew that she would have no choice but to quiet it down.
1553311111.title: Ivy's Help?

choices: Despite the potential of her plan, Ivy decided to help Selina out.
Ivy decided to "borrow" the idol to begin her diabolical plot.
15533111112.content:
A few hours and some piggy gorging later, Selina waddled into her apartment, fifty pounds heavier than earlier, followed closely behind by Poison Ivy to examine the possible source of her current dilemma.

"Here it is," she oinked out loud, pointing towards the idol that sat on her table. Approaching the idol, Ivy knelt down to get a closer look at the statue that had caused the mysterious slow transformation of Catwoman, being careful not to touch it herself.

"Hmmm," Ivy examined the idol closely, "Well, from what I can tell, it doesn't look too out of the ordinary, although these eyes seem remarkably striking."

"They're what make it so valuable."

It was at that point when Ivy realized what was so striking about the eyes. They where a rare, one of a kind, type of gemstone, cut from a special crystallized plant sap that caused altering effects on those who happened to be exposed to the glow of them in the moonlight. They would actual plant itself, causing almost instant change if it's spores were inhaled. The changes were usually harmless, like skin pigmentation alteration or itchiness, but could be dictated through genetic tampering to suit the tamperer's needs, whatever they may be.

Ivy knew she could reverse the changes for her friend if she felt like it, but she also knew that she could use the gems to create her own special piggy plant that could put Gotham city in the palm of her hand, change the population into a piggy utopia of fat and gluttony, addicted to her plant's honey.
15533111112.title: Idol Inspection

choices: She tested it on Selina Kyle, with excellent results.
She tested it on herself, with disastrous results.
155331111122.content:
Ivy decided to use the idol for her own purposes. Ivy used a special pollen and blew it at Selina. Within seconds, Selina was passed out on the couch.

"Sleep tight, little piggy," said Poison Ivy as she stroked the head of her gluttonous friend.

Back at her hideout, Ivy managed to use the sap to make a plant that produced her honey. She was able to make a couple of gallons of the golden honey. Ivy was even tempted to taste it, but she stopped herself. She knew of its side effects. However, she wasn't sure if it worked or not so she needed a test subject.

"Hmm, I could taste it myself, or I could let Selina try it. After all, it's the least I could do for her."

So who did she decide to test the honey on?

1553322211.content:
Ever since the break out at Arkham Asylum, the dark knight had his hands full trying to get them, looking at the Batcomputer to see the most deadliest villain...

Joker-Face (Joker and Scarface) - Being made from a tree after having chemical waste dumped on it, not to mention that it was a popular spot for the mob to kill people, the dummy was completely insane and smart, but was he alive?

Harleyquist (Harley Quinn and Ventriloquist) - Harley Wesker was, or is, Joker-Face's girlfriend until the night he died. Driven insane, she carved a dummy from the bark of the tree and named it Joker-Face. Harley allowed the Joker-Face personality do the dirty work, including robbery and murder. She was totally dominated by Joker-Face, who barked orders at her and degraded her with verbal (and even physical) abuse, not all that different from when the Joker was alive. Harley tried to reform by working puppets in a children's show, but could never escape from her first love.

Bane Crocodile (Bane and Killer Croc) - Sharp mind and strong body. Despite what some may think, it was not the drugs that made him like a crocodile, rather it helped him stay more "human". The untested drug was developed to counteract the virus he had, which was slowly transforming him. At the same time, his strength was dramatically increased as a side effect, not so bad of a side effect except that now he must rely on the drug or else suffer extreme weakness and further transformation into his cold-blooded form.

Two-Clay (Two-face and Clay face) - Harvey Karlo played an unstoppable knightly lawyer on an old television show, but as an actor he was tied up in crooked business that helped his stardom. When relations with the mob were getting bad, he got into an "accident" which disfigured half his body, ruining his acting career. Not only did his body undergo a horrific change, his mind also became split. Half of him believed he was the heroic lawyer he played on TV while the other half stayed as a revenge seeking victim. When the lawyer would take control, the clay half would transform and complete the other side of his face to perfection, but when the victim would take control, the clay would expand and cover over the good side, showing a complete monster.

Freeze Penguin (Mr.Freeze and Penguin) - Victor Cobblepot was always off-putting because of his strange appearance and harsh demeanor. He spend most of his life down in lab basements doing research on cryo-weaponry, with a fascination of birds as his side hobby (despite being called a penguin during childhood). At the company he worked he met the second woman to not care about his appearance, the first being his late mother. After the two of them wed, she became ill, and Victor used the company's resources (without permission) to put her in cryo-stasis while he worked on a cure. In a scuffle between the company head and himself, Victor was accidentally shot with one of the cryo-weapons, and was left in a pool of chemicals, forcing him to rely on sub-zero temperatures to survive. In the fight between the two, Nora's capsule was broken, killing her. Fashioning his collection of umbrellas, his icon of love and protection, into freeze gun tipped weapons, he sought out to kill the company head.

The batcomputer alert suddenly went off, and one of the villains appeared on the screen.

1553322221.content:
One involving the Joker and Harley Quinn or another entirely?

1553322221.title: Which Bimbo story?

15533222211.content:
Gotham had so many abandoned warehouses, that the people of Opal City used to joke that it had a warehouse that produced the abandoned warehouses, but ironically enough, it had been abandoned for years. It was in this abandoned warehouse district that the crooks of Gotham would take refuge from the cops and capes, and prepare and plot their next moves. Batman was only one man after-all, and even his extended team of crime fighters couldn't look at the entire city at once.

It was in one of these warehouses that the Clown Price of Crime, the Joker, sat as he tinkered with his latest concoctions. (The) Joker had laid low these last few weeks, as Batman took his time fighting in stranger and stranger adventures. So much chaos happening in the Caped Crusaders life that Joker felt no need to add to the chaos. Batman would always come out okay, with his handsome scowl looking at Joker's crooked grin. Joker smiled at this image, if anyone was to alter the Batman for the better, it would be him.

"Wat'cha doin Mista Jay?" came a voice behind him.
"Oh nothing Harley, I was just thinking."
"Thinkin of what puddin?"
"Of what a nuisance you've been lately!" Joker yelled as he turned around and tossed an empty flask at Harley, as his voice turned to anger.

Harley Quinn was once known as Dr. Harleen Quinzel, the Joker's psychiatrist when he was being held at Arkham. She was a bright but lonely woman who took pity on the Joker. Over time, she began to see the genius in the madman, and helped him escape, before helping him with his crimes. If you asked her, she'd tell you that she was the Joker's love. If you asked the Joker, he'd tell you another story.

"Jeez, Mista Jay, what's wrong?" Harley said, making sure to keep her distance.
"It's this confounded formula. I tried, and I try, but it doesn't make sense. People are beginning to build a tolerance to my laughing gas."

The painted smile on Harley's face began to widen. "I got just the thing for ya." she said as he pulled a small container out of her pocket.

"What's this now?" asked the Joker, intrigued.
"It's a sample of Ms. Ivy's latest drink."
"And what, does it do?"
"It's a biological compound that's designed to rewrite the DNA from the most basic level, and rework it to form something more pleasing."
"English Harley." Joker replied with more than just a hint of disdain in his voice.
"It changes apples to oranges."
"So in other words, I alter this with my laughing gas, and it drives the audience fruity." the Joker said with a laugh.
"Good one Mista Jay."
"Shut up Harley." the Joker said as he grabbed the flask. "It's going to take some time, but I'll have to reverse-engineer this."

With that Joker turned his back to Harley and began working at his table. He'd get Batman to smile one of these days.
15533222211.title: The Joke's on the Bat Bimbo.

choices: Robin is on patrol and sees Harley
155332222111.content:
Its a little known fact that the Joker is one of the brightest minds in Gotham. Most people just shrug off his actions as insanity, but the Joker never does anything without a plan, or a backup plan. But despite his near legendary reputation, the Joker, like Batman, is only human, and mistakes do happen.

It was a week since Harley gave him the formula to add to his laughing gas. Joker reversed engineered it, to the point where he was confident the human immune system wouldn't grow a tolerance to it.

"Are you done yet Mista Jay?" Harley asked.
"For the hundredth time, no Harley, I am not finished. It's going to be laughing gas, not chuckling gas. I want to see the people smile. Thousands of smiles, like the ones I used to have before you joined me."
"I just want to play Mista Jay. We've been cooped here for almost a week. I need some air."
"Shut up Harley. I'm working."
"Let's rob a bank! That'll be good for you! Wadda ya say, puddin?"
"You know Harley. You're right." The Joker said with a pause.
"I am?" Harley asked surprised.
"I do need to go out. And I think this formula is done."

Before Harley Quinn could respond, the Joker threw the vial he had straight at her. The vile smashed on her torso, and her clothes absorbed the chemical.

"I...I..." Harley tried to say something, but a giant grin came across her face.
"HA!" she laughed.
"Ha? Just ha?" the Joker responded, disappointed with the result.
"HAHAHAHAHA!" Harley burst out laughing.
"It worked. The new formula worked!" Joker said as jumped of the ground and clicked his heels in the air.

Harley was rolling on the ground, laughing so hard that is seemed impossible that she was getting any air.

"I did it! I did it! I got the last laugh!" the Joker shouted triumphantly.

Then suddenly silence.

"Harley?" Joker asked as she laid in a fetal position on the floor. "Are you alive?"
Her answer came in the form of a grunt.
"Harley, this isn't funny! I worked hard on that formula. I'm not going to have your biology mess it up."

Harley started shaking, then contorted her body. "Harley?" Joker asked again, more curious than worried.
Before his eyes, the woman changed. He breasts seemed to inflate two full sizes. Her ass matched them. Her smile grew smaller until her lips started to pout. Her pupils shrank, leaving an empty look inside of her.

Silently, she rose from the floor. Her hips swayed as she moved.
"Hey Mista." she said, her voice more sultry than Joker had ever heard before.
"Hey." Joker replied in a puzzled manner.
"You's sosmart Mista." she said as she stumbled towards him.
"Yes, I've established that 1000 times over."
"I's wants to givza a kiss." she said as she leaned in towards him.
"You and a million other girls in this god forsaken city, Harley."
"Dontcha want me? Mista?" she said as she leaned against him.
"Harley, get off me." the Joker said sternly.
"Just one little kiss." she said leaning in.
"I'm not in the mood." the Joker said as he smacked her across the face, sending her to the floor. "My formula was meant to make them laugh, not pout. It's a failure. You're a failure Harley."
She started towards him.
"Just one widdle kiss." she pouted.
"Harley, if you love me, you'll leave me alone with my thoughts. Go out, have fun. Capture Batman and we'll talk."
With that he tossed her out of the abandoned warehouse office, and slammed the door behind her.

"Looks like it's back to the drawing board." Joker said to himself as he went to reverse engineer the formula again.
155332222111.title: Baby don't pout

choices: Robin and Harley Quinn go find Batman
See what one of the other characters is doing
1553322221111.content:
It was another quiet night on the Gotham coastline for Tim Drake. He was Batman's third Robin, and arguable the smartest. Instead of acrobatics, or outright fighting skills, Tim chose to focus on his detective abilities. 155332222111112121121.title: Batman regains his senses

choices: Catwoman leaves with the stolen goods
1553322221111121211211.content:
Bruce Wayne’s brain went through about a million calculations in a minute. He came to the conclusion that the lab wasn’t worth wasting any more time in. The Joker could have taken the chemical needed and he wouldn’t know until hours later. And it seemed Alfred and the Bat-computer created a partial cure, or perhaps it could be considered more of a retrovirus. Either way, he realized that he’d be able to do more good on the streets.

He looked out the window, two big-boob bimbos were already searching in the trash below.
“I’d better take the high grounds.” Batman thought to himself. He’d get a better view, and be farther away from the infected. That decision was a no brainer.

With any luck he’d find Harley within the next hour, and could cure the city before daybreak.


Meanwhile, about two miles away, the Clown Prince of Crime was having more trouble than he would have expected, crossing the city.

“Aren’t you ladies scared of me? Don’t you know who I am?” he asked as he kicked one of the bimbos to the ground.

“Hey sexy.” A tall one said.
“Ew. Honey, you need some beauty sleep,” said the Joker before he activated his flower pin, releasing some knockout gas. Causing the girl to collapse backwards.
“On her back in two seconds flat. Joker, you’ve still got it.” He said to himself.

“Hey sexy,” another voice behind him said.
“Jeez, it’s like night of the living dumb out here.”
“Wanna kiss?”
“No. I don’t want to kiss you or your ugly sisters. Does this look like a face that wants to kiss?”
“I don’t know. Maybe.” she said twirling her hair.

“Here, at least use this,” the Joker said holding out a tube of his lipstick.
“Ooh.” the woman said, just before the tube exploded in her face.

The Joker started laughing hysterically. “It’s the little things.”

“Hey Joker.” A voice from behind him said.

“Hey…Augh! You’re the bat brat.”
“Brilliant deduction. Maybe you should try out for the title of worlds’ greatest detective.” Robyn said. She hated to admit it, but ever since her encounter with Dick, her mind was thinking much clearer.
“Get away from me.” he said.
“Why, you afraid a girl could kick your ass?”
“No, I’m afraid she’ll kiss it, and then…well we all know what happens then.”
“Relax Joker, I ran into Harley earlier, but I’ve found at least a partial cure. We can get Gotham back to its depressing self once I get her blood sample.”
“So you’re not going to kiss me?”
“No, tonight we need every clear mind we can get.”
“And I’m one of the clearest minds here. It only took a bimbo apocalypse for you to see it.”
“Enough Joker. I need to know where you sent Harley Quinn.”
“How can I say no to that pretty face?” he replied matter-of-factly.
Tim felt her heart flutter. “Not him.” she thought. He repulsed her, but that complement, her body couldn’t defend itself from it. The Joker could see it to. This would be something he could hold over Batman for years.
“Joker!” Tim yelled, trying to sound serious, but her voice sounded surprisingly soft.
“Now, don’t be like that birdy. You may be cute in a tomboyish way, but throw on a little lipstick, and you’ll be ready for the big leagues.” he said as he reached into his pocket for another tube.
“I…I…” Tim managed to shake off her feelings before they got worse. She fled, she couldn’t be around him. As she turned the corner, her mind started to wander. She imagined Joker holding her by a fire, just sitting back in silence.
“What is wrong with me?!” Tim yelled.
A group of four bimbos passed her, not even paying attention to the girl dressed as Robin.
“That’s good to know.” she thought.

Less than a block away, Gotham’s most famous cat themed burglar was taking handfuls of dimonds from a jewelry store. She didn’t even care that the alarm was set off. No one was coming tonight.
“Hey Kitty.” A familiar sounding voice said.
“Harley?” Selina Kyle (a.k.a. Catwoman) said as she turned in surprise.
“Kitty, I’m not feeling well.” she said.
“You look swollen.” Selina said, noticing that Harley’s breasts were now as big as her own.
“I…I..need help.” she managed to say before collapsing.

Selina looked at the pile of diamonds in her hands, and then looked at her fellow criminal. She let out a deep sigh.
1553322221111121211211.title: All the pieces fall into place

15533222211111212112111.content:
Batman swung from rooftop to rooftop. The number of buxom girls wandering the streets was noticeably increasing. “If this keeps up, A.R.G.U.S. will quarantine Gotham, or worse,” he thought. He was keeping an eye out for Robin, or Nightwing. One of them might help him out. Even the Joker could have his uses in this situation.

It was then he noticed her, Selina Kyle, the woman who loved him, some of the time. Selina looked injured, walking towards a hoard of whores. Batman swooped down, grabbed her, and quickly carried her into an open window before shutting it behind them.

“Wow, you literally swept me off my feet. What’s the occasion?”
“Selina, have you seen the Gotham tonight?”
“I’ve seen the prostituted doing their million woman march. All the cops are busy dealing with them.”
“That’s not quite what’s going on.”
Suddenly, Selina’s head shot back in pain.
“Bruce!” she cried.
Batman ran over.
“You seemed injured when I picked you up. What happened?”
“Bruce, I…” Selina grabbed him and pulled herself up for a kiss. Their lips locked. Batman pulled back, but it was too late.
“I…I…” Selina started to giggle like a girl hiding a secret.

Batman stood still, stunned, as his mind raced with thoughts. He pieced together what happened. The change would come soon, it would be inevitable.
“Harley. She did this…sexy.” Selina said before breaking out in a moan.

He was so close. The time it took someone to change, Selina’s mental effects, probably followed shortly by her physical ones, meant that Harley would have had to infect her less than five minutes ago. Harley was unable to use a vehicle in her condition. This meant that she had to be less than a hundred yards from them.

Batman opened a pouch on his utility belt, and popped a pill he designed to slow down his metabolism. It was meant to be used if he was injected with poison, but hopefully, this would slow down the effects. Selina’s hips and breasts began to grow, along with her lips.

“Does the Bat want to pet the sexy pussy…cat?” Selina said seductively.
“Must focus.” Batman said as he turned from her and burst through the door, out onto the street.
“Hey Sexy.” About a dozen voices greeted him as moved away from Selina.
“Get Harley’s blood, bring it to Alfred.” Batman thought to himself over and over. With any luck, his mental commands would stick with him even after the transformation.
15533222211111212112111.title: A Kiss For Batman

choices: The Joker runs into Robyn again
155332222111112121121112.content:
Batman could feel his mass beginning to shift. “The physical changes must happen before the mental changes in male victims,” Batman thought, before repeating the phrase “Get Harley’s blood, bring it to Alfred,” over and over again.

He looked around. Harley’s Harlequin Jester costume should have stood out, even in this mess. His suit started to feel heavy. “No.” he said. He could feel the bones reshaping themselves, the breasts starting to inflate on his chest. All he had to do was get a sample of Harley Quinn’s blood. His hips began to widen. “Ah.” He let out a moan. The male organs retreated into a newly formed slit, and her cries of pain began to come in a higher pitch.

“I still have my brain for now,” she thought, “Get Harley’s blood, bring it to Alfred.”

“You.” said a voice behind her. “You’re supposed to be safe in my office while I deal with this mess.”
She turned around. “Sorry.” she said. Her mind was starting to become foggy. Images of sex entered her thoughts.
“No.” Joker gasped.
“Yes…sexy.” she said.
“You’re really him aren’t you?”
“Maybe,” she giggled, “why don’t you take this suit off and find out.”
“No.”
“Please?! I’ll make it worth your while.”
Joker actually paused for a moment, and thought about finally being dominant on his archenemy. Then he remembered that he’d end up worse than the Robyn girl, and shook loose from the fantasy.
“Not like this, Bat-bimbo.” he said as he slapped her across the face. She landed harshly on the pavement.
“But pudding, I like it rough,” she said with a laugh.
“No. You do not get to call me that!” he said as he kicked her in the stomach. The suit absorbed most of the force.
“More.” she said as he continued kicked.
Joker couldn’t believe it, even in her condition, she seemed to be playing him.
“You’re worthless. You know what you did?! You ruined it! We had this whole city in our hands. Our own eternal playground for your gothic comedy,” he said as he grabbed her by the neck and began to choke her.

She seemed to be enjoying that too.

“You’re not Batman. You’re a grotesque parody of him. You stupid, stupid girl. You had to be infected by my plague.”

The Joker thought.

“My plague…my plague. This started because of that idiot Harley. But I had a part.” He realized.
He released his grip on her neck and slowly stood back up.

He had won. He had beaten the Batman. He had made her smile, made her laugh. But it meant nothing. She wasn’t laughing with him. She didn’t even know what she was doing.

“Stay there Bat-bitch. I’ve got a city to save.”
“I love it when you talk heroic.” She said, taking off her mask to admire him better.
“Jeez woman. Keep the mask on!” Joker yelled as he covered his eyes.

“Harley. Harley is nearby.” Bruce managed to say as she returned her cowl to the proper position, before giggling uncontrollably.

Joker looked around at the chaos engulfing his city. He realized that today, he would have to become the hero Gotham needed.
155332222111112121121112.title: The Joker's Fantasy Realized

1553322221111121211211122.content:
Through the sea of diseased dimwits, the Joker went looking for his partner in crime. Harley had to be around here somewhere.
“Harley. Harley you harlot, where are you?”

A ground of ladies were rolling over each other, using their mouths for all sorts of things beside eating food.

“You can do that?!” Joker asked in surprise.
“We can show you sexy.” One said, as the others around him started saying sexy like an erratic echo.

Joker ran to the next building entrance, thinking what a cruel joke the world played on him. His greatest foe, his reason for crime, was reduced the one of the brain-dead women who seemed to be multiplying on the street.

“I just need to find you Harley!” he shouted in anger.

“Hey pudding.” said a weak voice through an open doorway of a jewelry shop. He had trained his ears to hear it. He slid in through the entrance and closed the door behind him.

“Harley, my darling! Come here and give me your blood!” he said in a welcoming manner.
“I’m sorry, sexy. I didn’t get the Batman like you wanted.”
“Oh never mind that. Believe me, that’s all taken care of.”
“So you mean we can, you know…?”
“Of course Harley, my little gesture queen of romantic gestures. We can do that all night long. But first, I just need something a drop of blood. Maybe I’ll get it from creating a smile on that pretty face of yours.”
“But I’m smiling, sexy.” she said.
“No Harley, you’re pouting. Don’t feel bad, I know that you can’t tell the difference in your current state. Although I doubt you could tell the difference before all this happened.”

Joker leaned over her, about to grab the knife from his inside jacket pocket, only to find that it was missing. Replaced by a tube of lipstick.

“Well this is embarrassing.” he said, seeing that he was too late to back away from Harley, who had managed to wrap her arms around him and pull herself in for a kiss.

“Mmmhmmmhmmm” the Joker murmured as he tried to pull her off him. Their lips seemed to be air locked. Finally Harley relented, and released her grip, and Joker sent her falling to the floor.
“Damn it woman. I always knew you’d be the end of me.”

Harley looked confused. “What’s wrong Mr. Jay? Don’t you feel better?”
“What’s the point? It’s inevitable. My greatest joke is this atrocity I played on myself. And now there’s no one left to laugh,” he sighed, as he walked over to the mirror.

“Might as well enjoy the show. It’s a miserable farewell to such a great player.”

Like all the other victims, he could feel his bones start to morph and take shape. His breasts swelled as his hips widened. “That kind of tickles.” he said, before starting a low laugh, which eventually got louder.” Soon the voice became that of a woman’s, her laughter echoing through the city.

“Not bad,” she said, “but the pancake make-up seems a bit campy now.”
“Still got it. Ms. Jay”
“Yes, but for what, another thirty seconds, a minute if I’m lucky?”

Ms. Jay’s thoughts began to think of Batman, not the pathetic mockery of Batman that creature on the street was, but the original Batman, the one with chiselled abs and strong chin. She imagined him stopping her latest crime, throwing her onto her back, and humping her criminal nature out of her.

She looked around, there was no strong Bat-Adonis here. Harley would have to do.
“You look sexy girl.” she said, and immediately after, the two began making out.

The two were going at it so hard that they didn’t even notice a point end prick Harley’s neck until after it happened.

“Good going Joker.” the woman said. She looked behind and saw a girl dressed as Robyn, and a woman dressed as Batman.
“You distracted her. Now we can get the sample to the…um…Bat-computer.” Bat-bimbo said.
Robin giggled. “It comes and goes, they’re brain…um…brain…uh?”
“Brain-forts.” Bat-Bimbo said.
“Brain-farts.” Robyn corrected.

The Joker fell down laughing hysterically at the Joke. After Joker left Batman, Robyn had found her mentor, and stuck her with the same partial antidote that Alfred had used on her.

“Hey Joker. I’ll let you do my make-up if you come to the station with me.” Robyn said.
The Joker kept laughing, as they dragged her off.
1553322221111121211211122.title: The Joker Almost Saves the Day

choices: One last adventure for Bat-Bimbo and Girl Wonder
15533222211111212112111221.content:
Bat-Bimbo and the Girl Wonder made it to the Batcave, where their trusted Butler awaited them.
“Ladies, I assume you’ve found the cure?” he said in a gentlemanly manner.
“Let me um…uh…kiss your sexy lips and I’ll tell you.” Bat-Bimbo said.
“I’m disturbed on many levels by this. Just hand over the blood samples, and we’ll fix you.”
“I bet you want to fix us both, together.” Robyn said, as she and her partner burst out laughing.
Alfred grabbed a capsule of blood from Robyn’s hand and immediately put it in the computer.

And hour later it was finished.

“I’ve taken the liberty of emailing your friends in the League, they’ve set up a perimeter around the city to contain this. I’ve also managed to turn the cure into a heavier than air gas. Two swoops of the Bat-plane and this nightmare will be over.”
“Great, I’ll pilot the plane.” Bat-Bimbo said.
“In no uncertain terms are you to do so Mistress…Master Bruce. I’ll handle this myself.”
“I love it when you talk direct, it’s such a turn on.” Robyn said as she snuck up on him and gave him a kiss.

Alfred waited a few minutes. “I suppose you’re not contagious. Don’t worry, in a few more hours, this will be little more than a nightmare.”

The computer did most of the work. Alfred loaded up the cure onto the plane, and left the cave to save Gotham.


Alfred came back, properly parked the plane in its underground hanger and exited it, with the fainted hint of a smile on his face.
“The news reports are in, the cure it working almost instantly.”
“Then why aren’t we back to normal?” Bat-Bimbo asked.

“Hmm, let me see your bloodwork.” Alfred said, and he pricked Robyn.
“Ow, that uh, hurt, in a good way.” Robin said.
“I’m sure.”

Alfred took the computer to analyse the blood, and shortly after got the answers he needed.

“I have good news and bad news.” he said.
“I only want the good news.” Bat-Bimbo said.
“Ya, good news makes me feel, uh, good.” Robyn added.
“I know about way we can feel good.” Bat-Bimbo winked.

“Ladies. The good news is that you’ll be cured, eventually. The retrovirus we cooked up to cure you before getting patient zeroes blood is working. However, it’s working at a much slower rate, and have built your systems up to be resistant from the complete cure.”
“Smaller words.” Bat-Bimbo demanded.
“Please.”
“What?”
“Smaller words please. You may both be acting like sex driven dull witted women, however, that is no excuse for poor manners.”
“Smaller words please?” Robyn moaned in a way that sounded sexual.
Alfred sighed.
“You’ll be back to normal in a week. Until then, I suggest that you both remain under house arrest until you revert to normal.”
“Please can you change your…uh…mind about that?” Bat-bimbo asked.
15533222211111212112111221.title: The Bat-bimbo at the Batcave

155332222111112121121112211.content:
“Please, can I go out patrolling now?” Robyn asked Bruce.

Bruce Wayne had reverted back to his original male form, and regained all use of his amazing thought processes. Robyn on the other hand was still noticeably female. She had cut her hair down to a manageable size, and had most of her mental abilities returned to her.

Bruce deduced that the return to normal had been caused by two major factors. One was that Tim was infected longer than he was, so his body started to stabilize the changes that were made. The second major factor was that Tim Drake wasn’t quite finished puberty, so his body was more accepting of physical and mental changes that Bruce’s was.

Bruce looked as his adopted son, who was temporarily his adopted daughter. The girl had missed about a month of school and had to be home taught by Alfred. Her reversion back to being male was slower, but it was happening. Her breasts were shrinking a cup-size a week, and her shoulders were getting noticeably more broad.

Her nails were painted red, the same shade that was on her uniform, and she was also wearing matching lipstick. Her mind was clearly not male. Still, she was acing all of her home subjects, and Bruce didn’t want Alfred to accuse him of being sexist.

“Fine, you can go out and patrol tonight. But be back in three hours.”
“Only three hours?”
“Fine, four.”
“Thank you, you’re the best,” she said as she hugged him, giving him a kiss on the cheek.
She ran towards one of the cave exits before Bruce could change his mind. She was wearing the old Robin costume, the one that showed off her legs.

“Women and their legs.” Bruce thought, as he got back to trying to solve the mystery of a missing ancient tablet of transmogrification. Gotham was getting weirder every year.


Meanwhile on the Gotham skyline, Nightwing was laying back on a gargoyle after just stopping a bank robbery, which seemed to be the pastime of half of Gotham’s criminals. He was young, the night was young, he thought about celebrating by going to a club. Any club that wasn’t owned by the Penguin or crime families loved having him there, and would usually wave all fees and costs for him.

“Hey.” Robyn said, appearing behind him.
“Not bad, uh…”
“Robyn.”
“I can tell Batman has been training you well.”
“Feels like it’s been a lot longer.”
“I haven’t seen or heard from you for a month. He must be training you hard.”
“Ya, something like that.”
“Don’t be modest, I can see the muscles in your arms and chest.”
Robyn crossed her arms to cover herself, embarrassed.
“I’m sorry, don’t be embarrassed. It’s a compliment. Fit women are really gorgeous.”
“You’re just saying that.” she said blushing. Her mind was clearly feeling some after effects from the transformation. She needed to be held, and no one at Wayne manor was offering to do that for her.
“No I’m not.”
“Listen, I’m not going to be here for too much longer. I have to go soon, and the regular Robin will be back.”
“Oh that’s too bad. I think you and him would get along.”
“I don’t know, I think I’d embarrass him,” she said, as she subtly touched his arm.
Nightwing had picked up enough women to know where this was heading.
“Well, I was going to call this and early night,” he said.
Robyn looked disappointed.
“…But how about you and I go to a club just down the street from her. We can dance, have a good time, and see where that leads.”
Robyn smiled, she couldn’t stop blushing. Dick was so handsome and fit, and he was taking an interest in her. Her eyes lowered to see Nightwing’s pants were tightening a bit. He was into her to!
“Okay,” she said twirling her hair, “But don’t tell Batman.”
“I never do.”

The two swung off the building as they raced towards the line-up outside the club. It was just another quiet night in Gotham, thanks to her, and Robyn the Bimbo Wonder was about to live up to her name. For the next few days at least.

From a cell of Arkham Asylum, the Joker laid on his back, watching a news clip of Nightwing and a familiar looking pop up on the television. Someone caught Robyn making out with Nightwing on the rooftop, and taped the event with their cellphone. He laughed to himself, the joke may not have been on the Bat-Bimbo, but Bird Boy was going to be in for a surprise when she reverted to normal.

That was the great thing about being the Joker, he could find the humour in any little victories her could get. He took out a pack of playing cards and started playing solitaire as his mind hatched an escape plan. He just had to break out of here and tell Nightwing who the new girl was. The whole failed plague was still giving him a chance to tell one last joke.
155332222111112121121112211.title: The Last Days of Robyn, Bimbo Wonder
