he finds himself applying for a job in the most dangerous part of Gotham.

Arkham Asylum where the cities most dangerous, insane criminals and supervillians like Joker, Mr Freeze and his female counter part Poison Ivy, many people have died here doing their job that most people would call suicidal for trying to help the insane killlers become ordinary people, but it was the only job avelable to him with is diplomas and credentials.

but he's here to apply for the open role of being Arkham Asylum's new
155332222222221111.title: Arkham Asylum he works as a psychiatrist or gar...

1553322222222211112.content:
being accepted into the new Job as Arkhams Gardener was a relief, not because of the large salary that came with it but that it gave him a bit of solitude seeing as he was only one tending to it on the account of the previous employees meeting a fatal end at the hands of environmental extremist Poison Ivy who claimed they were hurting her babies.

the solitude from the employees and lack of camera within the gardens gave him an excuse to be himself with the lone area as he listen and tended to the multiple plants within the large indoor garden, they called him father, sang about him and telling him all about mother that he deduced as ivy because she loved them.

his natural ability over plants aided them when they were neglected by the lack of staff assigned to them before he came along, this earn him praise from the management who raised he pay over the healthy and prosperous plants that earned them regular visits from the people of Gotham and even Billionaire Bruce Wayne who talked about expanding the gardens.

Life couldn't be more good for him except while he was living the life he dreamed of, another was waiting patently to meet him.

-poison ivy-

the environmentalist turned plant woman was waiting to meet the one tending to her babies that sang about him, calling him their daddy as they described his ability over them, finally she had an Adam to her Eve, a fellow plant user that she hopes wont die from her touch, now she sits patiently listening to her babies describe him to her.

what happen next
1553322222222211112.title: he becomes the new gardener

15533222222222111121.content:
today had he had to work over night, the same night that Joker escape from Black gate prison destroying it and then surrendering when Batman arrives to save the mayor from him, now all of the inmates from black gate as well as the joker, now it should have been simple, the clown and his crew locked up in the most secure facility in the city, no way in or out.

except he escaped, now the man power of the facility and the technology instilled into it should have stopped him but it turned out that he had planned this all along, his clown girl friend Harley had taken control of the Asylum releasing all of the criminals and pyscho's the city had to offer and turning the facilities defences against the guards and cops that were stationed inside the island.

now he was locked in the prison of an island with other unfortunate souls against armed thugs that outnumbered and out gunned them, fortunately batman was on the island and mopping the criminals that was in his way, most of them ending up with broken bones and come too after a vicious beating.

he had been tending to the garden during this event and listened as the sound of gun fire between the guards and prisoners grew silent, knowing that the inmates had won thanks to the plant life outside telling him in explicit detail of how the guards were pushed back into other sections of the island or simply taken prisoner when they weren't killed.

a couple of the inmates tried to attack him only to given the warm welcome the garden it's self result in their immediate demise, with no choice but to join in the fray and put a stop to this chaos he grabbed one of the fallen leafs on the ground and manipulated it to grow over him.

the leaf spread across his arm, growing vines first that produced leaf's that joined with the other resulting in a green leaf sleave, the torso followed suit turning into leaf suit that spread across his body, his hands were covered in roots that formed together into a gloves, his legs and feet were covered just like the torso in green leave that melded together in a green suit, a hood formed around his head with a mask covering his face upto his nose.

this suit was biological, pure plant life that he can manipulate into camouflaging himself with the environment or turning any part of the suit into a weapon for defensive or offensive capabilities included and not limited to poisonous thorns that grow at will on his 2nd skin,

the suit can change colour to better match the environment for the purpose of stealth,
it can harden or grow thorns on it's skin to protect him from danger,
it can extend and shift any part of it into a weapon for example a blade.

now he was ready for anything the island had to throw at him included batman if he chose to fight him.

-poison ivy-
the screaming and rioting outside had little attention from her as she focused more on the plant life that described to her the events of a couple of those pathetic humans trying to harm her Adam only to be dealt with by him and his ability's, they described what he looked like and what he had just changed into, she desperate to get out and see this man and her precious children, she knew that this riot will give her the opportunity to escape she just need the right moron to seduce into freeing her and seeking this man out.
15533222222222111121.title: Batman Arkham Asylum

1553322222222211112121.content:
-with ivy-
for all of her Luck it wasn't the kind of idiot she thought would release her from her prison but an idiot none the less, Harley her fellow woman in crime had released her, allowing her to breath in the taste of freedom, so to speak, now she can find her Adam before that horrid Batman does.

-Adam-
the Plant life had just alerted me that Poison Ivy had been freed from her cell thanks to the Jokers sidekick Harley, and was now on her way out intent on finding me. but the question is do I find her, or does she find me?

-Batman-
"oracle, Ivy escape from her cell" Batman alerted his analyst Barber, formerly known as Batgirl before Joker Crippled her for life.

"that's not your only Problem Batman, reports from the remaining Arkham security is the planets attacking the inmates before Ivy escape along with the description of a Figure in green leaf suit saving them" Oracle informed him, surprising him for a bit.

"What?"

"from what you said about a new plant user I gothem, I reckon this is our guy, the one you've been trying to find all this time".

'while I need to stop the Joker, I cant just let him walk around freely without knowing where he stands in all of this' "Oracle, keep me informed of anything Relating to him, any changes" he ordered.

"on it, I'll also try to locate Ivy for you"

"no need I know where going"
1553322222222211112121.title: yes poison ivy escapes

15533222222222111121211.content:
-Adams pov-
I was in the front courtyard that connects to the gardens, the offices and the ward, fighting escaped inmates and the crazies one after the other sent by the joker who was now aware of my presence on the island, making crude and humourless remarks about me over the intercom.

a group of them now stood before me, armed with bats, batons and pipes, glaring and smirking sadistically at me "well, well, well what do we have here boy's?" one of them asked his fellow inmates with laugh.

"A dead man that's what" another answered earning a row of laughter's from the others.

"are you really sure you want to do this?" I asked, after I had defeated what could be the 13th gang this night "i took out every single one of your buddies sent after me, are you sure you want to join them?" my threat had loud and clear but they in their stupidity brushed it off with their arrogance and ignorance.

"the only one going to die here is you!" the leader said before charging at me.

shifting my foot I commanded the roots within the soil to warp around his leg, tripping him before he saw the cause, the roots then wrapped around his screaming form and dragged him into the soil, burring him neck deep into the earth.

the others quickly charged at me in retaliation to their friends plight, the first swung his metal bat at me, I duck under it, and shifted the leafs at the top of my wrists to form into a blade that extended out, just as he was about to follow through with a second swing I swiftly cut though his bat, severing the top from the handle before retracting it and upper cutting him 5 feet off the ground before he landed and the roots grabbed a hold of his limbs, securing him to the earth.

the next two came at me at the same time, my suit hardened into a wood like skin when their fists made contact I felt nothing, but them on the other hand, clutched their injured limbs and cried in pain, my suit returned to normal with the exception my fist still in their wood like amour state when gripped both their heads in my large oak hands and slammed them down hard on the ground, knocking them out.

but then I felt one of them grab me from behind and hold me in full nelson preventing me from moving that much, but my suit instinctively made spikes on it's skin that pierced the suit and skin of the inmate, forcing him to let go so he could clutch his bleeding wounds, however from out of no where a large vine uprooted from the soil behind us and grabbed him by the leg before dragging deep into the earth never to be seen again.

the sound of clapping reached my ears, as well as the sound of joy from my planet suit that shifted against me in excitement, turning towards the source I saw the Pamela Isley aka Poison Ivy descend up on the ground from a large rose petal, her beauty was breath taking, green flora skin with vines running along it, rose coloured lips and red hair that flowed unnaturally with pollen, her deep green eye's surrounded in a dark sclera, she only wore a red shirt that held by one button showing off as much of her skin and breast off, and a leaf panties that hugged around her form, even her ass cheeks.

she dropped down before me, walking with a sway of her hips before standing in front of me, she smiled as her hands slowly moved to my hood and made it unfold with her power, allowing her to see my spiky brown root hair, her fingers dug into my masked and pulled it down presenting my face to her, she spoke with an enchanting whisper "finally" her face drew close to mine "my Adam" her rose lips meeting mine.
15533222222222111121211.title: Ivy finds him

info.brief_description: The knights and villains of Gotham city find themselves in weird transformation stories.
info.description:
Batman has been involved in many fantastic stories and boasts a historic legacy, but in this interactive story, the dark knight finds himself in a collection of bizarre stories of transformation.

But it is not just Batman who endures these transformations. The Birds of Prey were also subject to these strange scenarios, and even the dark knight's rogue gallery, including Catwoman, Poison Ivy and Harley Quinn, have a few problems of their own.

Anything can happen in this interactive story. Does Catwoman tranform into an actual cat? Does Harley Quinn swap bodies with the Joker? Does Batman regress to the age of eight years again? Or does the Huntress expands into a blueberry? It is up to you!

Before you can begin this interactive story however, you must first understand the following rules:

1. If any addition to the story is unsatisfactory to me I will edit. Please do not take offense by this, but at least improve your grammar, and at least think of a good title for your addition!
2. No Death, Killing or Suicide, unless it is permitted.
3. If you wish, feel free to create your own character, but be sure to provide a suitable origin and description.
4. This is strictly a Batman story. Although the story doesn't necessarily have to feature Batman himself, please keep the story in Gotham city.
5. No other character from the DC universe, including Superman, Wonder Woman and the Flash, can be introduced, or even referenced, unless permitted otherwise.
6. Shrinking, growing, weight gaining, age regression and any other form of transformation is encouraged.
7. Fetishes are approved, but please, nothing too graphic (penetration, etc.), and nothing too humorous (farts, etc.)
8. I'd prefer it if these transformation stories don't effect the main plot in the Batman universe. So please avoid making permanent changes, unless a some kind of sequel where the character has a chance to return to normal is hinted. Think of each story as an unaired TAS episode!
9. Try your best not to reveal the identity of Batman, Robin, or any other masked character, unless permitted otherwise.
10. Homosexuality is permitted, as long as it isn't too graphic. Pedophilia however, is strictly prohibited.
11. Be sure to keep an eye on this page for any new rules and regulations.
